{"kind": "blogger#postList", "nextPageToken": "CgkIChii2tWxuCsQy4Ca9ZL8nrwx", "items": [{"kind": "blogger#post", "id": "1890632714812065885", "blog": {"id": "3564735312144269387"}, "published": "2017-05-04T22:53:00+05:30", "updated": "2017-05-08T09:30:56+05:30", "etag": "\"iHf3yWDE_geBgZ8U7rgZ_xuTeAQ/dGltZXN0YW1wOiAxNDk0MjE2MDU2MzI3Cm9mZnNldDogMTk4MDAwMDAK\"", "url": "http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/flu-shots-pneumococcal-vaccines-part-3.html", "selfLink": "https://www.googleapis.com/blogger/v3/blogs/3564735312144269387/posts/1890632714812065885", "title": "FLU SHOTS, PNEUMOCOCCAL VACCINES , part 3 -- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL", "content": "<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div dir=\"ltr\" style=\"text-align: left;\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THIS POST IS CONTINUED FROM PART 2 , BELOW---</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/flu-shots-pneumococcal-vaccines-part-2.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/flu-shots-pneumococcal-vaccines-part-2.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DOCTORS, VACCINE\nCOMPANIES AND EVIL PHARMA GIVE TOTAL BULLSHIT THT VACCINES IMMUNISE YOU.&nbsp; THIS SHOWS THEY DO NOT KNOW THEIR SUBJECT<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Multicellular animals\nhave dedicated cells or tissues to deal with the threat of infection. Some of\nthese responses happen immediately so that an infecting agent can be quickly\ncontained. Other responses are slower but are more tailored to the infecting\nagent.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Collectively, these protections are known as the immune system. The\nhuman immune system is essential for our survival in a world full of\npotentially dangerous microbes, and serious impairment of even one arm of this\nsystem can predispose to severe, even life-threatening, infections.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TYTn6a6NWLU/WQt3N0bQGgI/AAAAAAABTFA/7mP930h_qdcWdVsM9SceWwKmJknNMpL9QCLcB/s1600/imaMMNges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"226\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TYTn6a6NWLU/WQt3N0bQGgI/AAAAAAABTFA/7mP930h_qdcWdVsM9SceWwKmJknNMpL9QCLcB/s400/imaMMNges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The human immune system has two levels of\nimmunity: specific and non-specific immunity. Through non-specific immunity,\nalso called innate immunity, the human body protects itself against foreign\nmaterial that is perceived to be harmful.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microbes as small as viruses and\nbacteria can be attacked, as can larger organisms such as worms. Collectively,\nthese organisms are called pathogens when they cause disease in the host. Infection\noccurs when a pathogen invades body cells and reproduces. Infection will\nusually lead to an immune response.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;If the response is quick and effective, the\ninfection will be eliminated or contained so quickly that the disease will not\noccur. Vaccination works to stimulate a specific immune response that will\ncreate memory B and T cells specific to a certain pathogen. These memory cells\npersist in the body and can lead to a quick and effective response should the\nbody encounter the pathogen again.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With flu viruses changing every season this\ndoes not happen.. If a vaccine is ineffective, and/or if the disease doesn't\npose a great threat to begin with in terms of a high incidence of serious\ncomplications and death, then the benefit risk equation could well tip toward\nthe vaccine posing an unacceptable risk for most people. This is particularly\ntrue if the vaccine has been linked to serious side effects.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is only one kind\nof immunity and that is natural immunity which is achieved by battling the\ninfectious diseases itself. Vaccination is merely the artificial triggering of\ntemporary responses to manmade pathogens.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccines are both harmful and\ndangerous and are leading to generations of humans with no natural defenses to\ndisease.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccines do not provide long-term immunity; only temporary at best. In\nvaccines, an antigen is injected into the body to produce a reaction and the\nimmune system responds in the form of antibodies, but antibody presence does\nnot confer immunity.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People still catch the diseases that they are vaccinated\nagainst. Vaccines actually skip the normal immune responses to activate killer\ncells which can trigger an overproduction of cytokines in response to the toxic\nvaccine adjuvants and can damage tissues and organs<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccines should never\nbe called immunizations because that is a misnomer. Immunity and vaccinations\nare two different subjects altogether.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact, breast milk is so potent with\nimmune energizing effects in the infant that <b><span style=\"color: red;\">BASTARD </span></b>researchers at the CDC\nrecommend women withhold breastfeeding their children in order to boost the\n\"effectiveness\" of childhood vaccines.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">The paper claims that women\nshould stop breastfeeding long enough for the man-made poison to work on\nartificial/temporary \"immunity.\"</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccines, as they are\ncommonly given, destroy the natural immunity process and accelerate the\nauto-immune disease process. Vaccine promoters typically stress the importance\nof compliance with the federally recommended vaccine schedule to create and\nmaintain vaccine induced \"herd immunity.\" This may require multiple\ndoses of certain vaccines, the MMR included, because no vaccine is 100 percent\neffective.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, they never\nseem to be able to explain why the majority of outbreaks occur in areas that\nare thought to HAVE herd immunity status already, i.e., where the majority of\npeople are fully vaccinated and \"should\" therefore protect the entire\ncommunity from infection and transmission of infection. Natural herd immunity\ndoes exist, vaccine-induced herd immunity is a total misnomer.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccine makers\nsimply assumed that vaccines would work in the same way as natural immunity,\nbut science has clearly refuted that notion. In fact, vaccination and exposure\nto a given disease produce two qualitatively different types of immune\nresponses.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccines do not confer\nthe same type of immunity that natural exposure to the disease does ... Vaccines\nonly confer temporary protection \u2026 In most cases, natural exposure to disease\nwould give you a longer lasting, more robust [and] qualitatively superior\nimmunity because it gives you both cell mediated immunity and humoral immunity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Humoral is the antibody\nproduction. The way you measure vaccine-induced immunity is by how high the antibody\ntiters are (how many antibodies you have). The problem is the cell mediated\nimmunity is very important as well. Most vaccines evade cell mediated immunity\nand go straight for the antibodies, which is only one part of immunity.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How can getting a poorly\nmatched, poorly functioning vaccine really be \"the best way\" to\nprotect yourself against influenza, especially when you consider that the flu\nvaccine is the one resulting in the most payouts from the vaccine injury\ncompensation program (VICP)?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">PEOPLE MUST THINK INDEPENDENTLY.\n&nbsp;DOCTORS HAVE NOT FALLEN FROM HEAVEN</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/hiv-does-not-cause-aids-many-aids.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/hiv-does-not-cause-aids-many-aids.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EXzcm4kJbNc/WQtz2t9ugxI/AAAAAAABTEY/mK34BtNuuJI2eZeG5zM1OXj3A3P2aJPRACLcB/s1600/03vaccine-c88artoon-fileminimizer.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-EXzcm4kJbNc/WQtz2t9ugxI/AAAAAAABTEY/mK34BtNuuJI2eZeG5zM1OXj3A3P2aJPRACLcB/s640/03vaccine-c88artoon-fileminimizer.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Immunity is the ability\nof the human body to tolerate the presence of material indigenous to the body\n(\u201cself\u201d), and to eliminate foreign (\u201cnonself\u201d) material. This discriminatory ability\nprovides protection from infectious disease, since most microbes are identified\nas foreign by the immune system.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Immunity to a microbe is usually indicated by\nthe presence of antibody to that organism. Immunity is generally specific to a\nsingle organism or group of closely related organisms. There are two basic\nmechanisms for acquiring immunity, active and passive.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Active immunity is\nprotection that is produced by the person\u2019s own immune system. This type of\nimmunity usually lasts for many years, often during a lifetime.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Passive immunity is\nprotection by products produced by an animal or human and transferred to\nanother human, usually by injection. Passive immunity often provides effective protection,\nbut this protection wanes (disappears) with time, usually within a few weeks or\nmonths.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The immune system is a\ncomplex system of interacting cells whose primary purpose is to identify\nforeign (\u201cnonself\u201d) substances referred to as antigens. Antigens can be either live\n(such as viruses and bacteria) or inactivated. The immune system develops a\ndefense against the antigen.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This defense is known\nas the immune response and usually involves the production of protein molecules\nby B lymphocytes, called antibodies (or immunoglobulins), and of specific\ncells, including T-lymphocytes (also known as cell-mediated immunity) whose\npurpose is to facilitate the elimination of foreign substances. The most\neffective immune responses are generally produced in response to a live antigen.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JhdbeO8eLQA/WQt25h6Y-pI/AAAAAAABTE8/U0J4RzxQ4eEaqCd8L7YZwqVgbXStHomWACLcB/s1600/rimMMland.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-JhdbeO8eLQA/WQt25h6Y-pI/AAAAAAABTE8/U0J4RzxQ4eEaqCd8L7YZwqVgbXStHomWACLcB/s640/rimMMland.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Passive immunity is the transfer of antibody produced by one human or other\nanimal to another. Passive immunity provides protection against some\ninfections, but this protection is temporary.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The antibodies will degrade\nduring a period of weeks to months, and the recipient will no longer be\nprotected. Active immunity is stimulation of the immune system to produce\nantigen-specific humoral (antibody) and cellular immunity. Unlike passive\nimmunity, which is temporary, active immunity usually lasts for many years,\noften for a lifetime.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One way to acquire\nactive immunity is to survive infection with the disease-causing form of the\norganism. While exceptions (like malaria) exist, in general, once persons recover\nfrom infectious diseases, they will have lifelong immunity to that disease. The\npersistence of protection for many years after the infection is known as\nimmunologic memory.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following exposure of the immune system to an antigen,\ncertain cells (memory B cells) continue to circulate in the blood (and also reside\nin the bone marrow) for many years. Upon reexposure to the antigen, these\nmemory cells begin to replicate and produce antibody very rapidly to reestablish\nprotection. Another way to produce active immunity is by vaccination.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccines interact with\nthe immune system and often produce an immune response similar to that produced\nby the natural infection, but they do not subject the recipient to the disease\nand its potential complications.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">Flu vaccines do NOT &nbsp;produce immunologic memory similar to that\nacquired by having the natural disease as viruses mutate every season.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;In India\npeople do NOT die out of flue\u2014and most flu deaths are LIES just to help the flu\nvaccine manufacturers . This is endless money pouring in into KOSHER COFFERS..</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OL8liikhxls/WQt0kZTubSI/AAAAAAABTEg/JCb6IRV4GmYhbyGGnhSnNY0QDAgu_Bf8ACLcB/s1600/dd395-Baby-VacciGGne-TEXT-31.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"337\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-OL8liikhxls/WQt0kZTubSI/AAAAAAABTEg/JCb6IRV4GmYhbyGGnhSnNY0QDAgu_Bf8ACLcB/s400/dd395-Baby-VacciGGne-TEXT-31.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two basic\ntypes of vaccines: live attenuated and inactivated. The characteristics of live\nand inactivated vaccines are different, and these characteristics determine how\nthe vaccine is used. Live attenuated vaccines are produced by modifying a\ndisease-producing (\u201cwild\u201d) virus or bacterium in a laboratory.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The resulting\nvaccine organism retains the ability to replicate (grow) and produce immunity,\nbut usually does not cause illness. The majority of live attenuated vaccines available\nin the United States contain live viruses.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Live vaccines are\nderived from \u201cwild,\u201d or disease-causing, viruses or bacteria. These wild\nviruses or bacteria are attenuated, or weakened, in a laboratory, usually by repeated\nculturing. To produce an immune response, live attenuated vaccines must\nreplicate (grow) in the vaccinated person.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A relatively small dose of virus or\nbacteria is administered, which replicates in the body and creates enough of\nthe organism to stimulate an immune response. Anything that either damages the\nlive organism in the vial (e.g., heat, light) or interferes with replication of\nthe organism in the body (circulating antibody) can cause the vaccine to be\nineffective.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ada81lbJ488/WQt1wGjWb_I/AAAAAAABTEs/a9C83IGhCscLqnk0gdrcdxVclDMmAGX5wCLcB/s1600/downloa99d.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Ada81lbJ488/WQt1wGjWb_I/AAAAAAABTEs/a9C83IGhCscLqnk0gdrcdxVclDMmAGX5wCLcB/s400/downloa99d.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although live\nattenuated vaccines replicate, they usually do not cause disease such as may\noccur with the \u201cwild\u201d form of the organism. When a live attenuated vaccine does\ncause \u201cdisease,\u201d it is usually much milder than the natural disease and is\nreferred to as an adverse reaction. The immune response to a live attenuated\nvaccine is virtually identical to that produced by a natural infection.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The immune\nsystem does not differentiate between an infection with a weakened vaccine\nvirus and an infection with a wild virus. Live attenuated vaccines produce\nimmunity in most recipients with one dose, except those administered orally. Live\nattenuated vaccines may cause severe or fatal reactions as a result of\nuncontrolled replication (growth) of the vaccine virus.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-86edAdyXZoA/WQt1_4BnMbI/AAAAAAABTEw/7eF4ZlgTEEMHsm14xtx2LkUddc-AJHR0ACLcB/s1600/ea0472ed86160ee17f8c46f530fc4df08.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"500\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-86edAdyXZoA/WQt1_4BnMbI/AAAAAAABTEw/7eF4ZlgTEEMHsm14xtx2LkUddc-AJHR0ACLcB/s640/ea0472ed86160ee17f8c46f530fc4df08.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A live attenuated\nvaccine virus could theoretically revert to its original pathogenic\n(disease-causing) form. This is known to happen with live (oral) polio vaccine.\nActive immunity from a live attenuated vaccine may not develop because of\ninterference from circulating antibody to the vaccine virus.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antibody from any\nsource (e.g., transplacental, transfusion) can interfere with replication of\nthe vaccine organism and lead to poor response or no response to the vaccine\n(also known as vaccine failure). Live attenuated vaccines are fragile and can\nbe damaged or destroyed by heat and light. They must be handled and stored\ncarefully.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Bh1EwyopOoo/WQt2lcgR5oI/AAAAAAABTE4/o5sfqAifvmc-4p40mgZW_sLJc2RPtaufQCLcB/s1600/vaccinMMe-manufacturers-protection-fb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"336\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Bh1EwyopOoo/WQt2lcgR5oI/AAAAAAABTE4/o5sfqAifvmc-4p40mgZW_sLJc2RPtaufQCLcB/s640/vaccinMMe-manufacturers-protection-fb.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inactivated vaccines are produced by growing the bacterium or virus\nin culture media, then inactivating it with heat and/ or chemicals (usually deadly\nformalin). In the case of fractional vaccines, the organism is further treated\nto purify only those components to be included in the vaccine (e.g., the\npolysaccharide capsule of pneumococcus). Inactivated vaccines are not alive and\ncannot replicate.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire dose of\nantigen is administered in the injection. These vaccines cannot cause disease\nfrom infection, even in an immunodeficient person. Inactivated antigens are\nless affected by circulating antibody than are live agents, so they may be\ngiven when antibody is present in the blood (e.g., in infancy or following\nreceipt of antibody-containing blood products).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Inactivated vaccines\nalways require multiple doses. In general, the first dose does not produce\nprotective immunity, but \u201cprimes\u201d the immune system. A protective immune\nresponse develops after the second or third dose.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In contrast to live\nvaccines, in which the immune response closely resembles natural infection, the\nimmune response to an inactivated vaccine is mostly humoral. Little or no cellular\nimmunity results. Antibody titers against inactivated antigens diminish with\ntime. As a result, some inactivated vaccines may require periodic supplemental\ndoses to increase, or \u201cboost,\u201d antibody titers<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zLwTJgjI0sI/WQuMiGhtRnI/AAAAAAABTFk/tTKKVQh9WSk4jW0NrkPGIZPg0ccu7CbyQCLcB/s1600/aac-family-wmmellness-ny-vaccine-talk-2014-19-638.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-zLwTJgjI0sI/WQuMiGhtRnI/AAAAAAABTFk/tTKKVQh9WSk4jW0NrkPGIZPg0ccu7CbyQCLcB/s640/aac-family-wmmellness-ny-vaccine-talk-2014-19-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">CDC\u2019s Advisory\nCommittee on Immunization Practices (ACIP) recommended that LAIV&nbsp; (live attenuated influenza vaccine ) not be\nused during the 2016\u201317 season..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">The vaccine dose (0.2 mL) comes inside a\nspecial sprayer device. A plastic clip on the plunger divides the dose into two\nequal parts. The patient is seated in an upright position with head tilted\nback. Half of the contents of the sprayer (0.1 mL) is sprayed into each\nnostril.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">I HAD PREDICTED THIS WONT WORK &nbsp;AND THE CUNTS ARE WRONG !</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3OT6puRe6Ts/WQuMD3eDThI/AAAAAAABTFg/HQoI-wPqxAoxBWzPBwTZBkuAVOJS6S6OQCLcB/s1600/06-Congressionalmm-Record-Article-v3.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3OT6puRe6Ts/WQuMD3eDThI/AAAAAAABTFg/HQoI-wPqxAoxBWzPBwTZBkuAVOJS6S6OQCLcB/s640/06-Congressionalmm-Record-Article-v3.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the CDC's\ndecision to pull Nasal spray FluMist off the American market is based on lack\nof effectiveness, there are other important considerations when considering use\nof a live-virus vaccine.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The injectable flu vaccine is an inactivated vaccine\nwhile the nasal spray contains live, albeit weakened (attenuated) virus. The\nattenuated virus is intended to stimulate the immune system to fight disease\nwithout causing clinical symptoms of severe illness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, when you get a\nlive attenuated viral vaccine, you shed live vaccine-strain virus in your body\nfluids \u2014 just like when you get a viral infection and shed virus in your body\nfluids. So after getting a live-virus vaccine, you can asymptomatically shed\nand transmit vaccine-strain virus to other people, including immune compromised\npeople, for whom vaccine strain virus infection could cause serious\ncomplications.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Live attenuated viral\nvaccines also have the potential to affect the evolution of viruses, which are\nconstantly recombining with each other, because vaccine-strain live viruses are\nreleased into the environment where further mutations can occur<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Influenza vaccine produced\nfor the 2016\u20132017 season will be either trivalent (three components) or\nquadrivalent (4 components). Both types of vaccine contain two A viruses and\none B virus: The components of the 2016\u20132017 vaccines are:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A/California/7/2009\n(H1N1)pdm09-like virus (same as 2015\u20132016)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; A/Hong Kong/ 4801/2014\n(H3N2)-like virus<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; B/Brisbane/60/2008\u2013like\nvirus (Victoria lineage)<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The quadrivalent\nvaccine will contain these three viruses, plus a B/Phuket/3073/2013\u2013like virus\n(Yamagata lineage) virus.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AoTcMIHyd2Q/WQt0RQPUM2I/AAAAAAABTEc/4z7v9pnxfpEu0xgMzkMlO8s4At96LHZuwCLcB/s1600/can-you-sHHee-the-problem-120808-dan-wasserman.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-AoTcMIHyd2Q/WQt0RQPUM2I/AAAAAAABTEc/4z7v9pnxfpEu0xgMzkMlO8s4At96LHZuwCLcB/s400/can-you-sHHee-the-problem-120808-dan-wasserman.gif\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE IN INDIA DO NOT NEED\nTHIS FLU VACCINE..&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">LEFTOVER VACCINES ARE BEING DUMPED ON INDIANS FREE.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;FUKKAT\nMEIN !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">INDIA MUST JAIL THESE EVIL PHARMA BASTARDS WHO USE INDIANS AS GUINEA PIGS .</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://naturalnews.com/2017-04-30-vaccine-industry-goes-nuclear-in-push-law-that-would-deny-you-your-job-if-you-arent-vaccinated.html\">http://naturalnews.com/2017-04-30-vaccine-industry-goes-nuclear-in-push-law-that-would-deny-you-your-job-if-you-arent-vaccinated.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-size: large;\">OBAMACARE HAS HELPED VACCINE MANUFACTURERS AND KOSHER INSURANCE COMPANIES&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_F3RguNGZmE/WQtzaYxNIeI/AAAAAAABTEU/L-XmN_kwbD4NjsscHZ5omHPQVlUwVrzqACLcB/s1600/oQQbamacare6.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5Cz3cfnnlLg/WQuKsUpY4nI/AAAAAAABTFY/GIRlJan8ljI0Dj-wK3xmYE3BoSJhOS6eQCLcB/s1600/Burton_Rise_in_eeeAutism_Graphic.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TFQ-o9TSXEY/WQuLWWDTHTI/AAAAAAABTFc/oXmAIl2Aw7sFZ2ZDlvu0AJw5lYtscJvEQCLcB/s640/auwtism-and-vaccines-5-638.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CDC is a cesspool of\ncorruption, mismanagement and dysfunction with alarming conflicts of interest\nsuborning its research, regulatory and policymaking functions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Offit is an American pediatrician.. Here are just some of the ways\nvaccines impair and alter your immune response:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Preservatives are used to protect vaccines packaged\nin multi-dose vials.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Each time a vaccine dose is drawn from a multi-dose vial,\nbacteria or fungi can enter the vial. Preservatives are needed to prevent\ncontamination of multi-dose vials each time individual doses are drawn.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Evil pharma &nbsp;utilize polysorbate-80 in their drug\nmanufacturing to help with the transmission of pharmaceuticals across the blood\nbrain barrier ( BBB).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With aluminum and\npolysorbate-80 tightly bound in the HPV vaccine, and able to pass freely into\nthe brain across the BBB, regardless of the state of health of the BBB, this\ncan explain some of the fainting, seizures, and neurological sequelae that have\nbeen reported in teenage girls after they have received the HPV vaccine<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The blood\u2013brain barrier\n(BBB) is meant to protect the brain from noxious agents; however, it also\nsignificantly hinders the delivery of therapeutics to the brain. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most of the strategies\ndescribed for the passage of drugs across the BBB can be enhanced by\nnanotechnology and some of the mechanisms involved include:---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">\" SIGNED WITHOUT PREJUDICE \"</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MANY WHITE MEN WOULD ASK --WHAT THE FUCK DO YOU MEAN BY THAT</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">I TELL THEM-- BY BEING A SHIP CAPTAIN, I HAVE CERTAIN RIGHTS BESTOWED ON ME --I WILL NOT SURRENDER THOSE RIGHTS BY SIGNING ON THIS DOCUMENT</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT SEA WHEN I GET CHARTER PARTIES WITHOUT A \"PARAMOUNT CLAUSE\" I ISSUE A LETTER OF PROTEST</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://www.gard.no/web/updates/content/20738957/the-importance-of-paramount-clauses</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">AT ADANI PORT IN GUJARAT , THEY REFUSED TO BERTH MY SHIP-- UNLESS I SIGNED MY RIGHTS AWAY.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; THE TANGLED WITH THE WRONG CAPTAIN.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: serif;\">..</span></div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_24b+seedCZojD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_24b+seedCZojD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">HIGH FRUCTOSE CORN SYRUP MADE SOFT DRINKS SENT TO THIRD\nWORLD NATIONS HAD MERCURY</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://www.anh-usa.org/mercury-found-in-high-fructose-corn-syrup/\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://www.anh-usa.org/mercury-found-in-high-fructose-corn-syrup/</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">ACIDIC COKE ( PHOSPHORIC ACID ) &nbsp;LEACHED ALUMINIUM OFF THE CANS</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/03/high-fructose-corn-syrup-fatty-liver.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/03/high-fructose-corn-syrup-fatty-liver.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">I HAVE CARRIED WHITE PHOSPHORIC ACID FROM ASHDOD ISRAEL TO\nEUROPE FOR COKE FACTORIES</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/phosphoric-acid-on-chemical-tankers.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/phosphoric-acid-on-chemical-tankers.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">SOFT DRINKS WITH HFCS GAVE INDIANS KIDNEY STONES\u2014WE NEVER\nHAD THIS PROBLEM IN INDIA BEFORE</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/06/kidney-and-gallbladder-stones-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/06/kidney-and-gallbladder-stones-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Some chemical companies, make lye by pumping\nsalt through large vats of mercury. Since lye is a key ingredient in making\nHFCS (it\u2019s used to separate corn starch from the kernel), it follows that\nmercury exists in HFCS used in soft drinks. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Such HFCS was used in\nsoft drinks shipped to third world nations <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mercury cell method\nproduces chlorine-free sodium hydroxide, the use of several tonnes of mercury\nleads to serious environmental and health problems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like insulation on an\nelectric wire, the fatty coating of myelin keeps the pulses confined and maintains\nthe integrity of the electrical signal so that it has a high signal-to-noise\nratio. When the insulation on a wire is damaged or destroyed, the flow of\nelectrical current may be interrupted and a short-circuit occurs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oligodendrocyte cells give white matter its color by manufacturing myelin. If\nmyelin falls into disrepair, nerve axons cease to function, even though they\nthemselves aren't damaged.. At birth, relatively few pathways have myelin\ninsulation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Myelination in the human brain continues from before birth until at\nleast 20 years of age. Up until the age of 10 or so, vast areas of the cortex\nare not yet myelinated. Up to the age of 20, large areas of the frontal lobes\nare not yet myelinated.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Myelination begins in the developmentally oldest parts\nof the brain, like the brain stem, moving to the areas of the nervous system\nthat have developed more recently, like the prefrontal lobe and cortex. Myelin\nspreads throughout the nervous system in stages, which vary slightly in each\nindividual.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Impairment of myelination can alter neural communication without\nnecessarily causing severe CNS (central nervous system) damage. The prefrontal\nportions of the cerebrum have a profound influence on human behavior.&nbsp; If an individual is injected with vaccines,\nmost of which have adjuvants like mercury and aluminum compounds, as well as\nforeign proteins (some from other species in which the vaccines were grown) and\nbiological organisms, unprotected nerves will be impacted.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The argument for a\nrole of vaccines in the development of autistic disorders hinges on these\nbiological effects upon nerves, damaging them in a way that influences behavior\nand learning patterns. &nbsp;Vaccine adjuvants\nare crucial to initiating an auto-immune response leading to post-vaccine\nneurological symptoms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The entire immune\nsystem is very much a part of a functional CNS, with vital roles in cognition,\ninjury repair, neurodegenerative disease, and sensory systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microglia pervade the\nCNS, including the white and gray matter that constitute the organ\u2019s parenchyma.\nParenchyma the functional tissue of an organ as distinguished from the\nconnective and supporting tissue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Microglia are a type of\nneuroglia (glial cell) located throughout the brain and spinal cord. Microglia\naccount for 10\u201315% of all cells found within the brain. As the resident\nmacrophage cells, they act as the first and main form of active immune defense in\nthe central nervous system (CNS).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Other immune cells,\nincluding T cells, monocytes, and mast cells, reside in the brain and spinal\ncord\u2019s outer membranes, known as the meninges, and circulate in cerebrospinal\nfluid (CSF).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although the\nblood-brain barrier protects the nervous system from microorganisms, it may be\ndamaged by bacteria, viruses, fungi, and other organisms. If damage occurs,\nresistance to infection of the nervous system is decreased.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The major classes\nof inflammatory disease are meningitis and encephalitis (infections of the\nmeninges, or covering membranes, of the brain and of the brain itself,\nrespectively) and abscesses, which may be situated outside or just below the\nmeninges or in the brain itself. Some viruses lie almost dormant within neural\ntissue for years before causing destruction.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Demyelinating disease\nis characteristically scattered throughout the brain and spinal cord, with\nsmall foci where the myelin is destroyed and replaced with glial scar tissue.\nNerve fibres running through such areas may remain undamaged, but the lack of\ninsulation normally provided by the myelin leads to a blockage of conduction of\nelectrical impulses.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Demyelination is also the result of an immune attack upon\nthe central nervous system. Because the nervous system is a biologic\nelectrochemical complex, it is possible to regard every aspect of its function\nas an electrical manifestation.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/sKUt4gifUxA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/sKUt4gifUxA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Compared to their GRANDPARENTS\n, children today are SIX times more likely to suffer from some form of chronic\nillness, and this statistical likelihood is constantly increasing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; It is made one\nseason in advance by lies and predictions. &nbsp;Lab created flu virus is unloaded in third world\nnations by criminals employed by vaccine manufacturers .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Main stream media is on the side of the\nvaccine manufacturers and so is the judiciary in almost all nations\u2014why ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many illnesses with\nflu-like symptoms are incorrectly attributed to the flu.&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;All bribed people play ball-there is plenty\nmoney to be made and sexual jaunts abroad in whorehouses ( catering to all\nperversions) owned by EVIL PHARMA .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Researchers in Hong\nKong have found that in addition to actually increasing the risk of flu,\nreceiving the flu vaccine also raises the risk of getting a respiratory\ninfection by 5.5 times. The study was published in the journal Clinical\nInfectious Diseases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A recent study (2017 )\nconducted in Hong Kong looked at vaccinated versus unvaccinated subjects and\nhow they fared health-wise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the study, the\nseasonal trivalent flu vaccine was tested for side effects of flu shot. What\nmakes this effort particularly noteworthy is the fact that it was a\ndouble-blind placebo-controlled trial.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While some subjects received the flu\nvaccine, others received saline solution \u2013 a truly inactive and neutral\nplacebo. This is in contrast to many vaccine trials that use what are called\n\u201cactive\u201d placebos, which contain some of the substances used in the vaccines.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The flu vaccine was found\nto increase odds of getting the flu, respiratory infection greatly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The trial studied the\neffects of the vaccine on children aged 6 to 15 years. The subjects who were\nadministered the flu vaccine received Sanofi Pasteur\u2019s Vaxigrip. The others\nreceived a saline solution placebo. All subjects were tracked for an average of\n272 days.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The researchers\nultimately concluded that regarding effectiveness against influenza, there was\nno difference between those who received the vaccine and those who received the\nsaline solution placebo. However, a look at the study numbers reveals that\ncases of influenza were actually higher in the vaccinated group, with 116 kids\ncoming down with the flu versus 88 in the placebo group.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adding to the bad news\nis the fact that the vaccine group became 5.5 times more likely to come down\nwith a respiratory illness. These kids showed high incidents of the Swine flu,\nthe common cold (Rhinovirus), Coxsackie/Echovirus and other viruses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The implications of\nthis study are very serious. They suggest that getting a flu shot not only\nincreases the risk of influenza, but also reduces immunity to respiratory\nviruses. The act of injecting antigens in the body seems to damage the immune\nresponse, rendering people more vulnerable to disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meanwhile, big pharma\nand organizations like the CDC, FDA, NIH, the international WHO and the Gates\nFoundation continue to push a vaccine agenda forward.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Devadasi system\nprostitution &nbsp;was OFFICIALLY allowed by\nlaw .&nbsp; The military memorandum &nbsp;21 A was released on &nbsp;June 17, 1886, and sent to all the Cantonments\nof India by Quartermaster-General Chapman, in the name of the Rothschild\u2019s man Commander-in-Chief\nof the Army in India (Field Marshal Frederick Sleigh Roberts, 1st Earl Roberts,\nVC, KG, KP, GCB, OM, GCSI, GCIE, KStJ, VD, PC )..&nbsp; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Robert baby just forged\nthe signature <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE : This order said\n(and military orders are well-nigh inexorable): \u201cIn the regimental bazaars &nbsp;it is necessary to have a sufficient number of\nwomen, to take care that they are sufficiently attractive, to provide them with\nproper houses, and, above all, to insist upon means of ablution being always\navailable.\u201d It proceeds: \u201cIf young soldiers are carefully advised in regard to\nthe advantage of ablution, and recognize that convenient arrangements exist in\nthe regimental bazaar[that is, in the chakla], they may be expected to avoid\nthe risks involved in association with women who are not recognized [that is,\nlicensed] by the regimental authorities.\u201d In other words, young soldiers are\nnot expected to be moral, but only to be instructed as to the safest way of practicing\nimmorality. This remarkable document goes on to suggest that young soldiers\nshould be taught to consider it a \u201cpoint of honour\u201d to save each other from\ncontagion by pointing out to their officers women with whom there was risk of\ndisease. The document calls attention to the need of more women, and the\nnecessity of making the free quarters \u201chouses that will meet the wishes of the\nwomen\u201d \u2013 in order, it is implied, that they may be the more easily lured to\nlive in them.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">UNQUOTE</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AFTER DWARAKNATH TAGORE\nDIED ( 1846 ) IT WAS FALET THAT THE GIRLS WIN SAONAGACHI WERE NOT OF PRISTINE\nQUALITY FOR THE WHITE MANs TASTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The officer in command\nof the 2nd Battalion Cheshire Regiment sent the following application to the\nmagistrate of Umballa Cantonment: \u201cRequisition for extra attractive VIRGIN women\nfor regimental bazaar, in accordance with Circular Memorandum 21a.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE: \u201cThe orders\nspecified were faithfully carried out, under the supervision of commanding officers,\nand were to this effect. The commanding officer gave orders to his\nquartermaster to arrange with the regimental Kutwal [an under-official, native]\nto take two policemen (without uniform), and go into the villages and take from\nthe homes of these poor people their daughters from fourteen years and upwards,\nabout twelve or fifteen girls at a time. They were to select the best-looking\nVIRGINS . Next morning, these were all put in front of the Colonel and\nQuartermaster. The former made his selection of the number required. They were\nthen presented with a pass or license, and then made over to the old woman in\ncharge of this house of vice under the Government. The women already there, who\nwere examined by the doctor, and found diseased, had their passes taken away\nfrom them, and were then removed by the police out of the Cantonment, and these\nfresh, innocent girls put in their places.\u201dUNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A copy of Lord Roberts\u2019\n\u201cInfamous Memorandum\u201d fell into the hands of&nbsp;\none of his detractors&nbsp; who sent the\nsigned original to England. It was there reprinted and distributed to every\nmember of the House of Commons, and created a great sensation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jew Rothschild awarded\nRobert Baby, the &nbsp;German Order of the\nBlack Eagle for the sex camps he arranged&nbsp;\nduring the Boer war in South Africa.. &nbsp;When Roberts baby died he lay in state in\nWestminster Hall \u2013the only non-royal other than Churchill ( with a Rothschild\nmother Jennie Jerome ) &nbsp;to be given the\nhonour by Jew Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me quote Wikipedia\n:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; Sonagachi is reputedly South Asia's and hence\nsimultaneously India's largest[1] red-light district. Sonagachi is located in\nKolkata, India.[2] Its area contains several hundred multi-story brothels and\nan estimated 11,000 sex workers (2012).[3][4] Sonagachi is located in North\nKolkata near the intersection of Chittaranjan Avenue and Shobhabazar with\nBeadon Street, about one kilometer north of Kolkata's Marble Palace area. In\nhis documentary The Five Obstructions, renowned Danish filmmaker Lars von Trier\nasks poet and experimental filmmaker Jorgen Leth to name the worst place in the\nworld he's ever visited, and immediately Leth responds with \"The Red Light\nDistrict of Calcutta.\"&nbsp;
