, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVER HEARD OF THE \u201cOPIUM\nRAJA \u201c?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/opium-raja-british-stooge-ram-mohan-roy.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/opium-raja-british-stooge-ram-mohan-roy.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO <span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>41.50 %</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nGetting back-<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Elderly people take statin\ncholesterol-lowering drugs, and this weakens their body's response to the flu\nvaccine.&nbsp; &nbsp;In those over 65 who received a flu shot,\nresearchers found antibody concentrations as much as 67 percent lower than\nthose in people not taking statins</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/cholesterol-lowering-drugs-with-side.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/cholesterol-lowering-drugs-with-side.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Statin drugs are widely\nused to lower lipids and battle cholesterol, but other actions of the drugs may\nblunt the immune response to flu vaccination, making it less effective in\nseniors, the main users of the drugs and among the most vulnerable to flu\ncomplications.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Statins'\nanti-inflammatory properties is responsible for lowering the immune system's\nresponse to the vaccine.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Globally, more than 1.1 billion people are on statin\ndrugs.&nbsp; Statins also suppress T-cell\nactivation and have immunomodulatory and anti-inflammatory effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QH1_LTrXiz0/WQnU63WmJ_I/AAAAAAABTAc/w_0rrxo-xHo6cCHT05n9n2qPtnFxHP3kwCLcB/s1600/imzzages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"225\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-QH1_LTrXiz0/WQnU63WmJ_I/AAAAAAABTAc/w_0rrxo-xHo6cCHT05n9n2qPtnFxHP3kwCLcB/s400/imzzages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now, in another attempt\nto force the elderly to respond to the notoriously ineffective influenza\nvaccine, the FDA has licensed a potentially highly reactive flu vaccine that\ncontains a controversial oil in water MF59 (squalene) adjuvant, which has been\nassociated with development of narcolepsy and other autoimmune disorders and\nchronic illness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pharmaceutical giant Novartis has rolled out a new flu\nvaccine, FLUAD, intended for Americans age 65 and over.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And the vaccine,\ndeveloped for the 2016-2017 flu season, contains a nasty surprise \u2013 squalene,\nthe substance which is responsible for triggering Gulf war syndrome. Gulf war\nsyndrome, which affects returning military veterans of the Persian Gulf War, is\na cascade of conditions and symptoms including fatigue, muscle pain, cognitive\nproblems, rashes, night sweats, and other ills.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over 270,000 of the 701,000 US\nveterans who served in the Persian Gulf are afflicted with the condition.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Squalene was used as an adjuvant in compulsory anthrax vaccinations given to\nservicemen during the Gulf War.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nInitially the U.S. government willfully ignored evidence showing that\nMF59 in anthrax vaccine triggered Gulf war syndrome.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Initially the Department of Defense denied\nsqualene\u2019s presence in the compulsory vaccines, but the FDA found evidence of\nthe substance, and tests detecting anti-squalene antibodies in Gulf War\nSyndrome patients provided a clear link.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Squalene is a naturally occurring\nsubstance in animals, plants and humans. Found in abundant supply throughout\nthe nervous system and brain, squalene is actually a beneficial antioxidant\nwhen consumed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But, injecting squalene\nas an adjuvant is a different story.&nbsp;\nAdjuvants enhance the immune response and cause the immune system to\noverreact to the introduction of the organism being vaccinated against.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Experts\nreport that the immune system is triggered to attack squalene throughout the\nentire body \u2013 even where it is vital to the nervous system.&nbsp; In truth, studies confirm that adjuvants like\nsqualene can generate long-term, concentrated and unremitting immune responses.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dLjPzOtbTk8/WQnhXaMkZMI/AAAAAAABTA4/hVv_mWozGh4qcU6c6C2I04jgb75kyT4kwCLcB/s1600/downlwoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-dLjPzOtbTk8/WQnhXaMkZMI/AAAAAAABTA4/hVv_mWozGh4qcU6c6C2I04jgb75kyT4kwCLcB/s400/downlwoad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FLUAD, which combines\ntwo variants of Influenza A and one of Influenza B, also contains polysorbate\n80, the antibiotic neomycin, barium \u2013 a heavy metal \u2013 and the toxin\nformaldehyde<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blood and lymphatic\nsystem disorders, cellulitis-type reactions, convulsions, allergic reactions\nincluding anaphylactic shock (a life-threatening condition), and nervous system\ndisorders such as Guillain-Barre syndrome have all occurred as a result of the\nvaccine<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yPr1QE-EZGA/WQnm8EG8WvI/AAAAAAABTBI/VVTh9KH1Iv8FJ4DOMYS-U3D4ZSyAjbSWwCLcB/s1600/Nuremmmburg-Code.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"332\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-yPr1QE-EZGA/WQnm8EG8WvI/AAAAAAABTBI/VVTh9KH1Iv8FJ4DOMYS-U3D4ZSyAjbSWwCLcB/s400/Nuremmmburg-Code.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Fluad vaccine\ndeveloped by Novartis (sold in 2015 to Australia's CSL Group now trading as\nSeqiris) is supposed to stimulate a supercharged inflammatory immune response\nin those over age 65 that will be more protective.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At a September 2015 FDA committee meeting,\nconsumer advocates protested that not enough study had been done in U.S.\nseniors to prove the squalene-adjuvanted vaccine was safe for them<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tGqeVtgrRbw/WQnVejzp5EI/AAAAAAABTAk/1-GQ9aUQ_IYu2b-JYLX-tVdT1uv1cIa5gCLcB/s1600/downle2oad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tGqeVtgrRbw/WQnVejzp5EI/AAAAAAABTAk/1-GQ9aUQ_IYu2b-JYLX-tVdT1uv1cIa5gCLcB/s400/downle2oad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Science teaches that\noil and water don\u2019t mix.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) &nbsp;fast-tracked ( Dec 2015 ) Novartis\u2019 oil-in\nwater, squalene-adjuvanted flu shot for approval in individuals 65 and older.\nThe squalene emulsion cocktail is approved for use in the U.S. one year after\nItalian regulators temporarily banned the squalene Fluad vaccine following 19\nelderly deaths reported after vaccination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The new class of\nadjuvants are comprised of phospholipids (surfactants), which make up the\nmembrane of every cell. Using recombinant DNA technology, phospholipids are\ncombined with recombinant proteins and engineered in a way to be structurally\nand functionally identical to their natural counterparts.Synthetic adjuvants\nare controversial because they stimulate antibodies against the body\u2019s own\ncells (i.e., Antiphospholipid syndrome).</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In a game of \u201cRussian Roulette,\u201d the\nresults are unpredictable from person to person, ranging from heart attacks,\nstroke, myelitis, and blindness to cognitive disfunction, skin disorders,\nmiscarriages, and fetal death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The squalene adjuvant\nin the body opens the blood-brain barrier to vaccine contaminants and causes an\nantibody response against naturally occurring squalene oil found in the brain\nand nervous system tissue. Between the various adjuvants and severe overlapping\neffects, it would be almost impossible to make a clear case of cause-and-effect\nbetween adjuvant and disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1991, the\nsqualene-adjuvanted anthrax vaccine was first experimentally given to tens of\nthousands of Gulf War soldiers which resulted in severe, permanent injuries.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Squalene antibodies caused a cascade of autoimmune reactions known as Gulf War\nSyndrome (GWS). Symptoms included severe headaches, nausea, muscular pain,\njoint swelling, short term memory loss, night sweats, depression.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Autoimmune\nconditions ranged from fibromyalgia, lymphadenopathy, Lupus, Multiple\nSclerosis, autoimmune thyroid disease, chronic fatigue syndrome to malar\nrashes, chronic headaches, non-healing skin lesions, musculoskeletal disorders\n(ALS), among others. More than twenty years later thousands of veterans are\nstill ill.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A similar oil-in-water\nemulsion ASO3 adjuvant was licensed in Europe in 2009. In Finalnd, the\nPandermix H1N1 \u201cbird flu\u201d vaccine was associated with a 9-fold increased\nincidence of narcolepsy, a disorder caused by the brain\u2019s inability to regulate\nsleep/wake cycles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Centers for Disease\nControl and Prevention (CDC) target the youngest, the oldest, pregnant women,\nand cancer patients, groups whose immune systems are the most vulnerable. They\nclaim that people over 65 are more susceptible to flu complications due to\ntheir reduced responses to vaccines.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet vaccines are known to compromise\nimmunity. They create an uptick in cytokine molecules (cytokine storms) that\nresult in inflammation, the heart of all disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The CDC claims that\n36,000 Americans die annually from the flu (&nbsp;\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">A FOUL LIE </span></b>) , when actual testing shows only a small portion of flu\ncases ( 5 %) can ever be ascribed to the influenza virus.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Flu is a syndrome or\ngroup of symptoms that can be caused by other viruses and bacteria resulting\nfrom poor diet, and exposure to toxins. Most flu-related deaths are due to\nsecondary pneumonia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WE ASK HEALTH MINISTER JP\nNADDA\u2014 &nbsp; WHY ARE YOU PUSHING FLU VACCINES IN INDIA , WHEN INDIA DOES NOT NEED IT \u2014</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHAT\nARE YOU UP TO ?<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A vaccine is already an\nadjuvant because the antigens (and excipients) it contains stimulate an immune\n(antibody) response. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Prior to this time, there were so many\nlawsuits pending against pharmaceutical companies for injuries and deaths due\nto vaccines, that the pharmaceutical industry basically blackmailed Congress\nand told them that if they did not grant them legal immunity against the\nliabilities of vaccines, that they would quit making them. For an adequate\nresponse, vaccines require a healthy and proper working immune system\u2014this is\nMANADATORY .&nbsp; Flu vaccines do terrible damage\nto poor people who do not get nutritious food and have weak immune systems .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example , cancer\nand cancer treatments, such as chemotherapy and radiation, suppress immune\nfunction, leaving patients in a weakened state. In some cases they can be fatal when the vaccine contains live\nviruses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Without good bacteria, your intestines are at high risk.<br />\nDysbiosis is an imbalance between the protective (good) and harmful (bad) bacteria in your gut.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/04/small-intestinal-bacterial-overgrowth.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/03/ibs-irritable-bowel-syndrome-vagus_14.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMore than 96% of all polyps are benign. They will never become cancers.<br />\n<br />\nNot all colorectal cancers are preceded by detectable polyps. A larger share of colon cancers start from flat lesions and these are 6 times as cancerous as large polyps.<br />\n<br />\nRemoving polyps or even doing biopsies releases cancer cells into the bloodstream and the colon's lumen. In turn, these cells may seed all other cancers throughout the body.<br />\n<br />\nEven an expert endoscopist miss more than 60% polyps, including actual cancer tumors. All of them, regardless of skill or attention, miss 100% of polyps in the right colon.<br />\n<br />\nSerious complications, such as colon perforation, occur in ten out of every one thousand colonoscopies. The risks of delayed bleeding, infection and ulceration are even higher, though they NEVER get reported in connection with colonoscopy.<br />\n<br />\nX-ray exposure from a single virtual colonoscopy increases one\u2018s lifetime risk of cancer by 20%<br />\n<br />\nEvery year, about 16 million Americans undergo a colonoscopy. About 16,000 of them die. Not from the cancer. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although there are over 30\nstrains of HPV that can cause genital infections, the HPV vaccine supposedly\nprotects against four strains and only two of those are known to be\ncancer-causing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are normally no\nsymptoms and 90% of HPV infections are resolved by the body in as little as two\nyears. Only half of the remaining infections have a rare chance of developing\nprecancerous cells that could lead to cervical cancer.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While the majority of\ncervical cancers are caused by HPV, most women who have HPV do not develop\ncervical cancer. However, the pharmaceutical company who makes the HPV vaccine\nwants every girl and young woman and now boys to get another vaccination \u201cjust\nin case\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HPV vaccine Gardasil\nwill become the greatest medical scandal of all time because at some point in\ntime, the evidence will add up to prove that this vaccine, technical and\nscientific feat that it may be, has absolutely no effect on cervical cancer and\nthat all the very many adverse effects which destroy lives and even kill, serve\nno other purpose than to generate profit for the manufacturers.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was only tested for\n6 months (instead of the usual 4 years) and was then fast-tracked by the FDA at\nwhich time Merck stopped testing and began to market it. There is no proof that\nGardasil or Cervarix prevents HPV<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Gardasil vaccine\nharm includes:&nbsp; anaphylactic shock,\nseizures, paralysis, motor neuron disease, blood clots, eye, ear and vascular\nproblems affecting the nervous system, the immune system, the musculoskeletal\nsystem, the blood and lymphatic system, the respiratory system, the\ngastrointestinal system, the vascular system, sterility, and even death.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2012, 528,000 women\nglobally were diagnosed with cervical cancer. Approximately 90% of HPV\ninfections clear up on their own within two years. North America has the lowest\nincidence of cervical cancer. India\u2019s figures are near ZERO-never mind the lies\nof EVIL PHARMA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
