, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lack of realistic\nrisk factors involved in not receiving this vaccination simply don\u2019t support\nthis vaccine and the damage it\u2019s been known to cause.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/say-no-to-hpv-vaccination-for-indian.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/say-no-to-hpv-vaccination-for-indian.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>MMR VACCINES HAVE\nCAUSED AUTISM IN INDIA. &nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>HULLO PM MODI-- TALK \"KAAM KI BAATH\" &nbsp;IN YOUR \"MANN KI BAATH \"-- &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>FAATHU BAATH MATH KARO. &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>WE WANT YOU TO ASK JP NADDA WHAT THE HELL IS HAPPENING.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/autism-in-india-and-triple-vaccine-mmr.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/autism-in-india-and-triple-vaccine-mmr.html</a></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/OuQYMjpCwfU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/OuQYMjpCwfU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">WE ASK JP NADDA \u2013&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">DO YOU CARE WHY WHISTLEBLOWERS ARE TARGETTED\nIN INDIA ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/whistleblower-doctor-seeks-police-help/articleshow/56711498.cms\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/whistleblower-doctor-seeks-police-help/articleshow/56711498.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">To date, the US vaccine injury compensation\ncourt has paid out approximately $3.3 billion to families of vaccine-victimized\nchildren. &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">The actual number of awarded\ncases nevertheless is very small compared to the large number of claims filed\nand subsequently denied.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">We do NOT know of cases where HUSH money was paid\nafter the child died\u2014may parents accepted the heavy hush money as the child\nwont come back to life</span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many more compensations\nhave been awarded to cases of vaccine-induced encephalitis or brain\ninflammation ( myelin sheath damage ) , a common event associated with\nregressive autism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electrical wires\nrequire insulation to efficiently conduct electricity. The same goes for\nneurons, whose projections are sheathed in an insulating material called myelin\nthat allows them to fire rapidly.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brain connectivity\nmediated by myelinated axons is altered or abnormal in autism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is less myelin in\nthe brains of people with autism. Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) has\npreviously shown abnormally structured white matter in people with autism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">White matter is composed of axons, the long, myelin-coated projections that\ntransmit electrical signals between neurons. Low myelin explains the weak\nconnectivity observed in the brains of people with autism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without proper\ninsulation, electrical signals travel slowly along the axons, making it\ndifficult for regions of the brain to coordinate their activity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Individuals with autism\nhad significantly less myelin content in numerous brain regions and white\nmatter tracts.&nbsp; The frontal, parietal,\ntemporal, and occipital lobes were affected, and the white matter tract most\naffected was the corpus collosum, or the area in between the brain that\nconnects the regions with neural fibers.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those individuals with more severe symptoms also showed less myelin\ncontent in various brain regions than those with less severe autism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Children with autism at\nsix months of age had dense white matter, but by age two the condition\nreversed, and white matter thinned out.&nbsp;\nThese studies also point out that it is not just one region of the brain\nthat is affected, but rather the change occurs in many areas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a 2012 issue of the\nJournal of Toxicology, neuroscientists at the prestigious Methodist Hospital\nMedical Center in Houston published their investigation into thimerosal\u2019s\ntoxicological effects upon mitochondria in human astrocyte cells. Astrocytes\nare the most abundant cells found in the human brain and are critical for\nmaintaining normal, healthy blood-brain barrier function.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The researchers observed that vaccine\nethylmercury, which is more lipophilic (able to cross the blood-brain barrier)\nthan methylmercury, is readily taken up by the astrocyte\u2019s mitochondria,\nthereby disrupting the cell\u2019s respiratory functions and eventually leading to\ncell death. The researchers observed that astrocytes, when exposed to\nthimerosal, exhibited extreme signs of oxidation and \u201chighly damaged\nmitochondrial DNA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccines pose an\nimmediate threat to a child at any age, but specifically in reference to those\nvaccines fixed on the Standard Immunization schedule given before the age of 2.\nThese include the Hepatitis B (HepB), Rotavirus, Haemophilus influenzae type b\n(HIB), Pneumococcal conjugate (PCV), Inactivated poliovirus (IPV) and seasonal\nInfluenza vaccine, the Diphtheria, tetanus, &amp; acellular pertussis (DTaP)\nand Measles, mumps, rubella (MMR) series.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccines do nothing,\nwhatsoever, to provide or strengthen&nbsp;\nimmunity. They systematically undermine the body\u2019s ability to function\nnormally, hindering every operation from the brain to the gut.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A baby is not equipped\nto sustain any violation of the electrical grid system \u2013 comprising the Myelin\nSheath, Blood-Brain barrier, and Meninges. Vaccines are given subcutaneously,\nor intramuscularly, allowing them to bypass the body\u2019s natural defences;\npredominantly situated in the nasal passages and gastro-intestinal tract.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All CDC-recommended\nvaccines contain degrees of neurotoxins, chemically altered (mutagenic)\nviruses, antibiotics, sterilant preservatives, detergents, and other harmful\nexcipients, which counteract and/or bond synergistically, increasing their\npotential virulence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aluminum, widely used\nas an adjuvant in vaccines (to boost/jump-start the immunological effect of\nmodified viruses) is an electrically charged neurotoxin. Once injected into the\nbody, it quickly enters the bloodstream, where it coagulates with the other\nvaccine components.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A resulting sludge is\ndrawn magnetically through the tiny veins and arterials to the deep inner\nrecesses of organs, anywhere laden with bioelectric fatty tissue \u2013 the highest\nconcentration found in the white matter infrastructure of the brain, and insulation\nsurrounding the spinal cord.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By 15-18 months,\nsufficient damage has been caused to the axons, neurons and Myelin sheaths\n(protective casing around nerve cells), throughout the brain and central\nnervous system, opening the flood-gates to neurological impairment, a chain\nreaction of chronic auto-immune disease, and increased risk of life-long\nneurodevelopmental disorders such as Autism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It just so happens the Measles,\nMumps, Rubella vaccine series is administered between 12 and 18 months after\nbirth, during the most intense phase in the regime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Antibiotics wipe out\nfriendly bacteria in the gut while they\u2019re knocking out enemies. As a result,\nthe usually benign microorganism, Candida albicans, multiplies. Candida puts\nout toxins which affect the nervous system, the immune system and other parts\nof the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/candida-albicans-darling-of-evil-pharma.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/candida-albicans-darling-of-evil-pharma.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From day one, all\nvaccinated children face an uphill battle in life, their capacity for optimal\nnatural immunity stripped away as early as 12 hours old (Hepatitis B shot).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Primary areas of\nconcern associated with middle ear impairment, precipitated by early childhood\nexposure to vaccine toxicity and prescription antibiotics include: lipid\nperoxidation, ischemia, anaphylaxis, encephalitis, demyelination, dysfunctional\n&amp; dead axons/motor neurons, prolonged/progressive hearing loss (Tinnitus),\nlack of physical co-ordination &amp; muscle reflexes, a plethora of auto-immune\nproblems &amp; neuro-developmental disorders (chiefly Autism, ADD, ADHD), a\ncataclysm of neuro-degenerative disorders linked to Glutamate excitotoxiciy\n(Alzheimer\u2019s, Brain trauma and brain injury, ALS, Multiple sclerosis, Seizure\ndisorders, Parkinson\u2019s, Stroke, Huntington\u2019s, Schizophrenia), viral &amp;\nbacterial diseases (ie. Meningitis, Haemophilus influenzae type b,\nStreptococcus pneumoniae leading to death), vulnerability to\nantibiotic-resistant super bugs (ie. Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus\naureus/MRSA), proliferation of candida (pathogenic mould/gut flora), resulting\nchronic inflammatory bowel disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact, the crux of\nthe entire conundrum known as Autism, whether a child succumbs or skirts that\ncalibrated landmine, hinges on a string of crucial factors, this particular\narea being one of the them.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\">Many of the predictable auto-immune symptoms which\nsurface, for years, in these children, are linked to ongoing complications of\nthe <b><span style=\"color: red;\">inner ear.</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/sound-magic-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/sound-magic-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/cholesteatoma-human-ear-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/06/cholesteatoma-human-ear-capt-ajit.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/4OMMccF8lzY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/4OMMccF8lzY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human ear is a\nprimary outer extension of the brain. This meticulous instrument serves a vital\nrole, calibrating every aspect of communication and physical movement, muscle/joint\nco-ordination, regulating your overall equilibrium in response to auditory\nstimuli, while simultaneously distilling, processing and modulating sensory\ninput from the brain; crucial to our survival within any environment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The structural apparatus\nof the inner ear, comprising the ear drum or tympanic membrane, auditory\nossicles (tuning fork assembly of three inter-connected bones: malleus, incus\nand stapes), three looping semicircular canals (equalizers) and the cochlea\n(functions as a high-frequency microphone), harnesses electro-chemical\nneuro-transmitters operating in the brain, and distills every nuance of sound\n(vibrational frequencies) we receive/absorb, rapidly processing them into a\ncomprehensible range or map of auditory signals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Similar to an elaborate\ndual-capacity router, the ear is designed to streamline two intertwined yet\nindependent systems, simultaneously, assisting every aspect of motor function \u2013\nparticularly sensory awareness, efficiency of movement, speed, accuracy,\nendurance, modulating and differentiating a complex array of reflex actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without the constant\naid of this versatile tool, motor-skill dependant messages emitted from the\nbrain inevitably become scattered, resulting in varying degrees of physical\nimbalance. The body\u2019s internal gyroscope literally disengages, unable to\nmaintain gravitational equilibrium.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The long-term\nimplications of prolonged middle ear infections are far more insidious. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018The outer ear consists\nof the ear shell (pinna) and the auditory canal. Its function is to guide air\npressure waves to the middle ear- with the ear shell increasing the sensitivity\nof the ear to the front side of the head, supporting front/rear localisation of\naudio signals.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The middle ear consists\nof the ear drum (tympanic membrane), attached to the inner ear through a\ndelicate bone structure (malleus, incus and stapes). The middle ear bones\n(ossicles) and the muscles keeping them in place are the smallest in the human\nbody. One of the major functions of the middle ear is to ensure the efficient\ntransfer of sound from the air to the fluids in the inner ear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the sound were to\nimpinge directly onto the inner ear, most of it would simply be reflected back\nbecause acoustical impedance of the air is different from that of the fluids.\nThe middle ear acts as an impedance-matching device that improves sound\ntransmission, reduces the amount of reflect sound and protects the inner ear\nfrom excessive sound pressure levels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This protection is\nactively regulated by the brain using the middle ear\u2019s muscles to tense and\nun-tense the bone structure with a reaction speed as fast as 10 milliseconds.\nThe middle ear\u2019s connection to the inner ear uses the smallest bone in the\nhuman body: the stapes (or stirrup bone), approximately 3 millimetres long,\nweighing approximately 3 milligrams.\u2018<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are four\nessential trace minerals, Potassium, Magnesium, Sodium and Calcium, which\nprovide necessary protection to nerve cells servicing the inner ear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Simultaneous duality\nand inter-dependence of these elements (Potassium &amp; Magnesium vs. Sodium\nand Calcium) poised within the cochlea, ensures cell viability.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note the division of\nproportional responsibilities: \u2018Magnesium and potassium inside the cell assist\noxidation, and sodium and calcium outside the cell wall help transmit the\nenergy produced. The healthy cell wall favors intake of nutrients and\nelimination of waste products.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read all 4 parts of the\npost below \u2013to know more about body electrolytes . This blogsite goes right to\nthe bottom of things which matter \u2013unlike others. This is the reason why I am\nthe No 1 writer on the planet</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/09/marathon-running-secrets-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potassium regulation is\nof course crucial because potassium acts as a counter flow for sodium\u2019s role in\nnerve transmission. The body must put a high priority on regulating the\npotassium of the blood serum and this becomes difficult when magnesium levels\nbecome deficient.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A magnesium deficiency\ncan cause the body to lose potassium and this our bodies cannot afford. Within\nthe cell wall is a sodium pump to provide a high internal potassium and a low\ninternal sodium.\u2018<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Any slight imbalance\n(depletion or excess) in these levels will generate excitotoxicity (unleashing\nof free radicals) and lipid peroxidation (oxidative stress \u2013 associated with\nthe loss of electrons/cell damage) which in turn triggers a range of\nauto-immune symptoms, neurological and neuro-developmental impairment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oxidative stress and\nresulting Ischemia (reduced blood-flow) are hallmarks of vaccine toxicity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The current epidemic in\ncases of Otitis Media is an end-product of collateral damage from having\nreceived a barrage of early childhood vaccines and prescription\ndrugs/antibiotics.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The root cause of chronic middle ear infections is\nneurological in nature, linked directly to vaccine-derived heavy metal\ntoxicity, targeting the brain stem, resulting in demyelination, an escalation\nof dead axons, damaged neurons and neurotransmission failure.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For children with\nAutism, painful inner ear afflictions are just one in a series of seemingly\ninsurmountable challenges they face on a daily basis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccine neurotoxins\ngain access to the inner ear via the bloodstream. The stripping of nerve cells,\nand the premature breach of the Blood-brain barrier and Meninges exposes the\nbrain stem, \u2018a bundle of (electrically charged) nerve tissue at the base of the\nbrain\u2026connects the cerebrum to the spinal cord and sends messages between\ndifferent parts of the body and the brain\u2019, to demyelination.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Diagnosing autism as\nearly as possible is crucial to early intervention.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There exists an inner\near deficiency in children with Autism that may impact their ability to\nrecognize speech<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While many signs of\nautism spectrum disorder (ASD) are present before age 2, the majority of\nchildren with ASD are not diagnosed until after age 4, which means that\ncorrective therapies are started later, delaying their potential impact.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Children with ASD had hearing difficultly in a specific frequency (1-2 kHz)\nthat is important for processing speech.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;There is a correlation between\nthe degree of cochlear impairment and the severity of ASD symptoms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>SANATANA DHARMA HAS\nBEEN INTIMATELY CONNECTED WITH THE INNER EAR COCHLEA. &nbsp;&nbsp;( golden\nspiral ) </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/garbha-sanskar-nurturing-unborn-child.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/garbha-sanskar-nurturing-unborn-child.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>&nbsp;WE HAVE ADOPTED A SANSKRIT MANTRA BASED\nAPPROACH TO DEADLY AILMENTS \u2013AND WE WERECALLED HEATHEN SAVAGES FOR THIS .</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I KALARI WE ARE TAUGHT\nTO UPSET THE INNER EAR SPIRIT LEVEL ( THERE IS NO NEED TO BUST EAR DRUMS ) TO\nDISABLE A MAN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Sanatana Dharma has\nincluded&nbsp; vestibular, proprioceptive and interoceptive\nsense\u2014as a part of consciousness .&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vestibular system in your inner ear\ngives you a sense of balance and coordination<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-bully-reloaded-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-bully-reloaded-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The impact of Ischemia\non (brain-inner ear directed) neurotransmitters, in the human body, is of\nimmense importance. The earlier the damage, the greater the gamble for any\nchild entering the vaccine minefield.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proprioceptive and\nkinesthetic information travels to the brain via the spinal column. Several\ncortical regions in addition to the cerebellum receive information from and\nsend information to the sensory organs of the proprioceptive and kinesthetic\nsystems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Proprioception concerns\nsensations that arise from within the body itself, particularly its motion and\nits position in space. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In equilibrium, also\nknown as the vestibular sense, gravitational force pulls on crystals suspended\nin liquid in the semicircular canals and vestibular sac of the inner ear; these\ncrystals then fall on hair cells arranged in various orientations. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In kinesthesis\n(sensation of the motion of the body), the stretching of the muscles,\ncontracting of the tendons, and movement in the joints stimulates specialized\nnerve endings located nearby.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Autism Society\nlists these signs to look for:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lack of or delay in\nspoken language<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Repetitive use of\nlanguage and/or motor mannerisms (such as hand flapping or twirling objects)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lack of interest in\npeer relationships<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lack of spontaneous or\nmake-believe play<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Persistent fixation on\nparts of objects<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Frequent ear infections\nare a sign of weak immune function.&nbsp; Most\nchildren on the autism spectrum have underlying immune problems.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Either they\nare born with weak immunity, making them more reactive to foods; or they react\nto foods, thus weakening their immune systems.&nbsp;\nResultant ear infections are the symptom of a deeper underlying problem.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The antibiotics used to treat ear infections may make children more susceptible\nto mercury damage. Allergies, ear infections, thimerosal and antibiotics are a\npotent cocktail for autism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A child eats an allergic food and develops an ear\ninfection. The doctor prescribes an antibiotic, killing both good and bad\nbacteria, leaving the gut lining irritated, and further stimulating an allergic\nresponse. Now the child is more reactive to foods, and develops additional ear\ninfections, thus perpetuating an illness cycle.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Introduce into this\ndisturbing spiral a thimerosal-containing vaccine or one that acts on the gut\nlining, like measles. Who will be more likely to sustain vaccine damage, the\ntoddler with an already irritated gut lining and reactive immune system, or a\nhealthy child?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">Children with autism\nhad ten times more ear infections during the first three years than typical\nkids.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eighteen percent also experienced a severe vaccine reaction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our immune system is a\nbalanced network of cells and organs that work together to defend you against\ndisease.&nbsp; &nbsp;It stops threats like bacteria or viruses from\ngetting into your body.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Think of it as a powerful \"search and\ndestroy\" task force that sends immune-cell forces out to hunt down the\nunwanted intruders and get rid of them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Your body makes proteins called\nantibodies that destroy abnormal or foreign cells. They help fend off common\nailments like the flu or a cold, and protect you against major illnesses like cancer\nor heart disease.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You also have a backup response known as the\n\"cell-mediated immune system.\" This involves immune system cells\nrather than antibodies. They help your body create memories of past defenses\nagainst certain threats.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When your body sees that\ninvader again, it calls up that memory and sets out to destroy the threat\nbefore the disease develops.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NOW CHECK THIS OUT\u2014&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: large;\"><b>EVEN\nA RETARDED IDIOT CAN SAY THAT THE BELOW STATEMENT BY EVIL PHARMA DOES NOT WORK\nWITH FLU WHOSE VIRUS STRAINS MUTATE EVERY SEASON</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; This is what makes vaccines or immunizations\nwork for illnesses like the flu, measles, chicken pox, or hepatitis. The shot\nhas a small but harmless amount of the disease in it so your immune cells can\nreact, learn, and remember how to protect you from it next time.&nbsp; UNQUOTE</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We\u2019ve been told for a\nlong time that vaccines stimulate antibodies which in turn, should allow our\nbodies to quickly defeat the disease if or when we\u2019re exposed to it again.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, a critical factor has been\noverlooked in this story.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Vaccines in fact, block our immune systems to a large\ndegree.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">This affects generations of people because a vaccinated mother will not\nproduce the antibodies in her breast milk that in turn should be benefiting her\nbaby by strengthening it\u2019s immune system during that formative time of growth.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">This is why many unvaccinated children resist the illnesses that vaccinated\nchildren are prone to.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1992, a New Zealand group\ncalled the Immunization Awareness Society surveyed 245 families with a total of\n495 children. The children were divided with 226 vaccinated and 269\nunvaccinated. Eighty-one families had both vaccinated and unvaccinated\nchildren. The differences were dramatic, with unvaccinated children showing far\nless incidence of common childhood ailments than vaccinated children.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From a different survey\nin the South Island New Zealand city of Christchurch, among children born\nduring or after 1977, none of the unvaccinated children had asthma events where\nnearly 25% of the vaccinated children were treated for asthma by age 10.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A recent large study\ncorroborates other independent study surveys comparing unvaccinated children to\nvaccinated children. They all show that vaccinated children have five times\nmore childhood diseases, illnesses and allergies than unvaccinated children.\nThese are independent studies that do not involve EVIL PHARMA who has\nhistorically not been willing to conduct their own accurate, subjective\nstudies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccination does not\nengage the genuine mechanism of immunity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Immunology\ndoes not study immunity.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Immunology studies how the immune system responds to\nimmunization as a result an injection of a \u201cforeign\u201d protein or particle\n(virus, bacteria).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That research focuses mainly on the long-term changes that\noccur in immunologic organs and bodily fluids following immunization. Such\nchanges are collectively referred to as \u201cimmunologic memory.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Dhanvantari is\nworshipped all over India as the God of Ayurveda medicine. We do NOT celebrate\nDiwali in Kerala . But two days Dhanwantari is honored. At dusk, a lamp\npointing toward North by North-East is lit at the doorstep of the house to\nwelcome Lord Dhanvantari for health and happiness in life. This day is known\nas&nbsp; Dhanwantari Triodasi.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<br /><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>IMHOTEP ( LORD AYYAPPA--VISHNUs 9TH AVATAR &nbsp;) VACCINATED THE EGYPTIAN PHAROAH</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Yes, Blue Cross Blue Shield pays\nyour doctor a $40,000 bonus for fully vaccinating 100 patients under the age of\n2.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-296wc87zs7g/WQtbaeK0ZRI/AAAAAAABTDk/1HKAgWyMgGkgwa8nopyuap6mF-0yY_5FACLcB/s1600/ff334d2cbcca3a5a99ead2019bea50abb6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-296wc87zs7g/WQtbaeK0ZRI/AAAAAAABTDk/1HKAgWyMgGkgwa8nopyuap6mF-0yY_5FACLcB/s400/ff334d2cbcca3a5a99ead2019bea50abb6.jpg\" width=\"342\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If your doctor manages to fully vaccinate 200 patients, that bonus jumps to\n$80,000. Blue Cross Blue Shield Association (BCBSA) is a federation of 36\nseparate United States health insurance organizations and companies, providing\nhealth insurance to more than 106 million Americans. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/6WQtRI7A064/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/6WQtRI7A064?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The magic wand ( <b><span style=\"color: red;\">SIC</span></b> ) against infection is\nthe Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine (PCV-13), which protects children and adults\nagainst common ear infections and life-threatening infections in the lungs (pneumonia),\nblood (bacteremia) and the membrane covering the brain and spinal cord\n(meningitis). PCV-13 protects against 13 of the 90 strains of bacteria that\ncause the most severe infections in children and about half of infections in\nhigh-risk adults.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">It\u2019s a deactivated vaccine that contains no\nlive bacteria and cannot cause disease. \u201cIt is a highly effective vaccine, and\nmany studies in the European Union, US, Africa and Australia showing it is\n85-100% effective in preventing disease,\u201d says Dr Keith P. Klugman, director,\npneumonia, Bill &amp; Melinda Gates Foundation, on a visit to India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BALLS !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PCV13 protects against\n13 strains of pneumococcus bacteria and PPSV23 protects against 23 strains of\npneumococcus bacteria.&nbsp; PCV13 and PPSV23\nshould not be given at the same time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Nice moolah to be milked out of thin air <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pneumococcal bacteria\nspread from person to person by direct contact with respiratory secretions,\nlike saliva or mucus.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People can carry the bacteria in their nose and throat,\nand can spread the bacteria without feeling sick. Pneumococcal disease is\ncaused by bacteria that are spread by airborne droplets, or by direct contact\nwith infected saliva or mucus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By UP government's own\nadmission, three children under the age of five die of pneumonia in the state\nevery hour. To be rolled out in a phased manner,\nthe programme begins with six districts in the state from May 2017.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Influenza virus is\ngrown in embryonated hens\u2019 eggs . The haemagglutinin protein for each strain is\nharvested and purified for use in influenza vaccine. &nbsp;Pune Serum Institute has jumped from horses to\neggs\u2014BAAAP RE !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Growth in eggs is part\nof the production process for most seasonal influenza vaccines. While all\ninfluenza viruses undergo changes when they are grown in eggs, changes in\ninfluenza A H3N2 viruses tend to be more varied and more likely to have\nantigenic implications compared with changes in other influenza viruses.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These\nso-called \"egg-adapted changes\"are present in the vaccine virus that\nis recommended for use in vaccine production and may reduce its potential\neffectiveness against circulating viruses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I DARE THE FLU VACCINE\nMANUFACTURERS TO DECLARE ON THE VACCINE \u201c SAFE FOR PREGNANT WOMEN\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; If a\nperson has good immunity , he does NOT need a flue shot.&nbsp; After millions of years suddenly we have EVIL\nPHARMA clamoring and tripping over each other to save your lives<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/tivkMHbP2po/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/tivkMHbP2po?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cTrivalent\u201d flu\nvaccines are formulated to protect against three flu viruses, and\n\u201cquadrivalent\u201d flu vaccines protect against four flu viruses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike other vaccines,\nthe flu vaccine is often updated each season to protect against what KOSHER &nbsp;researchers believe will be the dominant\nstrains of the flu that year.. Predictions are not &nbsp;accurate, they vaccines are usually garbage <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All influenza viruses\nundergo frequent genetic changes, H3N2 viruses undergo more frequent antigenic\nchanges compared with H1N1 and influenza B viruses. That means that between the\ntime when the composition of the vaccine is recommended and when vaccine is\ndelivered, H3N2 viruses are more likely than H1N1 or influenza B viruses to\nhave changed in ways that could impact how well the vaccine works.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Influenza A drifts, or\nmutates, three times faster &nbsp;than influenza\nB<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why a new flu shot is\nrequired each year, has to do with that rapid mutation rate. Unlike some\nDNA-based viruses, influenza uses RNA to replicate. Without DNA\u2019s built-in\n\u201cproof-reading\u201d capabilities,&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RNA viruses like influenza and HIV are more prone\nto genetic errors during replication, allowing them to mutate quickly as they\nmove from host cell to cell. In the case of influenza, the virus is continually\nfinding new ways of changing the surface proteins that help it attach to a host\ncell, effectively staying one step ahead of VACCINES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some active strains of\ninfluenza mutate to the point that the vaccine\u2019s potency is diminished.&nbsp; It is not possible to predict how well the\nvaccine and circulating strains will be matched in advance of the influenza\nseason, nor is it possible to predict how this match may affect vaccine\neffectiveness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN BILL GATES AND HIS\nSIDEKICKS WERE GIVING HIS BULL OF TV FOR THE 2015 SEASON \u2013I KNEW THEY WERE &nbsp;LYING THROUGH THEIR TEETH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 2014-15 shot was a\ntotal failure. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conjugate: A type of\nvaccine that joins a protein to part of the bacteria to improve the protection\nthe vaccine provides<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Polysaccharide: A type\nof vaccine that is made to look like the surface of certain bacteria in order\nto help the body build protection against that germ<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chest X-rays and blood\ntests may be ordered to confirm a pneumonia diagnosis. A chest X-ray can\nconfirm pneumonia, find its location, and see how much of the lungs are\naffected.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blood tests measure white blood cell count to determine the severity\nof pneumonia and can be used to determine whether the infection is bacterial,\nviral, fungal, etc. An analysis of sputum also can be used to determine the organism\nthat is causing the pneumonia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
