font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pneumonia treatments\ndepend on the type of pneumonia and the severity of symptoms:--</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">bacterial pneumonias\nare usually treated with antibiotics<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">viral pneumonias are\ntreated with rest and plenty of fluids</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The most common form of narcolepsy, in which the sufferer briefly\nloses muscle tone (cataplexy), is caused by a lack of orexin in the brain due\nto destruction of the cells that produce it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://www.theguardian.com/science/2015/jun/15/narcolepsy-and-the-swine-flu-vaccine-the-girl-who-falls-asleep-40-times-a-day\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://www.theguardian.com/science/2015/jun/15/narcolepsy-and-the-swine-flu-vaccine-the-girl-who-falls-asleep-40-times-a-day</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One ingredient in the\nnasal flu vaccine is BROAD SPECTRUM antibiotic gentamicin. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gentamicin is an antibiotic used to treat\nseveral types of bacterial infections. This may include bone infections,\nendocarditis, pelvic inflammatory disease, meningitis, pneumonia, urinary tract\ninfections, and sepsis among others.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Note: It is not effective for gonorrhea or\nchlamydia infections.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gentamicin can cause inner ear problems and kidney\nproblems. The inner ear problems can include problems with balance and problems\nwith hearing. These problems may be permanent. If used during pregnancy it can\ncause harm to the baby.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gentamicin is a type of aminoglycoside. It works by\nstopping the bacteria from making protein, which typically kills the bacteria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Gentamicin is made from\nthe bacteria Micromonospora purpurea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All know that\nindiscriminate use of BROAD SPECTRUM&nbsp;\nantibiotic overuse, causes SUPER BUGS which are resistant to\nanti-biotics<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet, these nasal flu spray\npromoting BASTARDS &nbsp;allow them to be\nadministered to millions of children through the nasal flu vaccine despite the\nfact that gentamicin has VERY serious side-effects of its own.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Millions of microbes\nthat inhabit the human body and play crucial roles in digesting food,\nmanufacturing vitamins, regulating gene expression, signalling immune responses\nand so on. But they\u2019ve barely begun to look at how prescription drugs,\nincluding vaccines, affect the body\u2019s microbiome (as these microorganisms are\ntermed collectively).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, there are\nother concerning ingredients in vaccines that are not talked about as often,\none of which is Polysorbate 80\u2014also known as Tween 80 and\npolyoxyethylene-sorbitan-20 mono-oleate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many vaccines contain\npolysorbate 80, which can cause anaphylactic shock.&nbsp;&nbsp; Polysorbate 80 causes damage to the uterus\nand ovaries leading to infertility,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Polysorbate 80 is used\nin pharmacology to assist in the delivery of certain drugs or chemotherapeutic\nagents across the blood-brain-barrier.&nbsp; &nbsp;The blood-brain-barrier is a barrier that\nseparates the brain from the circulatory system and protects the central\nnervous system from harmful chemicals and other toxins.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-V1qLpkQZagw/WQjwElGaAKI/AAAAAAABS94/HbTSNvjXrMkvyKlkke664DI0x8DqHWVLACLcB/s1600/fjlushotingredients.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"468\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-V1qLpkQZagw/WQjwElGaAKI/AAAAAAABS94/HbTSNvjXrMkvyKlkke664DI0x8DqHWVLACLcB/s640/fjlushotingredients.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The blood brain barrier\nis particularly weak and more easily penetrated during infancy and in old age.\nConsequently, the concern with using Polysorbate 80 in vaccines is that it may\npermit the entry of other toxic ingredients, such as heavy metals, into the\nbrain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Furthermore, once injected into the body, polysorbate 80 can rapidly\nbreak down into sorbitol and ethylene oxide.&nbsp;\nSorbitol has the ability to increase the risk of diabetes, cell death,\nmitochondrial failure and DNA fragmentation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Polysorbate 80 is a\nsurfactant commonly used in the pharmaceutical, cosmetic and food\nindustry.&nbsp; Surfactants are compounds that\nreduce the surface tension and increase the solubility between two liquids that\nwould normally be unable to dissolve together, e.g. oil in water.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of their ability to lower surface\ntension between liquids, surfactants are known for their spreading and wetting\nproperties. Therefore, surfactants act as detergents, emulsifiers, wetting\nagents, foaming agents and dispersants. On chemical tankers we wash tanks and\nwe are experts in this .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Polysorbate 80 is a chemical found in most flu\nshots and the highly controversial HPV vaccines \u2013 where\n\"coincidentally\" there is a large statistical history of teenage\ngirls going into anaphylactic shock, losing use of their limbs, and slipping\ninto comas. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">there is a glaring lack\nof basic science research into the toxic effects of the vaccine ingredient,\nPolysorbate 80, on human health. owever, the fact remains that the federal\nvaccine schedule directs doctors to give infants and children a whopping 49\ndoses of vaccines by the age of six.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What are the cumulative\neffects of multiple vaccine ingredients on the human body? Shouldn\u2019t we have\nthe right to ask for evidence of short and long-term safety if we are going to\ninject something into our bodies or our child\u2019s body?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Polysorbate 80 is a\nsolubilizing agent able to cause severe nonimmunologic anaphylactoid reactions\nby suppressing your immune system while causing a severe allergic reaction \u2013\nand this combination of events can kill you.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FW2PNKRt6xg/WQjvxWxaKdI/AAAAAAABS90/Yy9jejr1KYorBmdI0SZzxEz7Dmd-TIq2gCLcB/s1600/da7b413ed465f2326e2e8d28443b805be.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"476\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-FW2PNKRt6xg/WQjvxWxaKdI/AAAAAAABS90/Yy9jejr1KYorBmdI0SZzxEz7Dmd-TIq2gCLcB/s640/da7b413ed465f2326e2e8d28443b805be.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pneumococcal\npolysaccharide vaccine (PPSV) is jabbed into adults, and contains 23 strains of\nlive (dormant) bacteria. Pneumococcal conjugate vaccine (PCV) is jabbed into\nchildren as young as 2 months, and contains 13 strains of live bacteria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you mix viruses,\nyou lose complete control of toxicity factor.&nbsp;\nMost viruses, though, especially when combined in the same inoculation,\nare highly unpredictable, and the theory of vaccines being safe goes out the window\nfrom the start.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The CDC wants you to\njab your child three times with this concoction before six months of age.\nReported reactions include fever, vomiting, diarrhea, convulsions, asthma,\npneumonia, and sudden infant death syndrome (SIDS). Yes, pneumonia is listed as\na side effect. That's how dumb they think we are.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">I HAVE SAID SEVERAL TIMES THAT VACCINES IN THRID WORLD NATION ARE MODIFIED TO REDUCE FERTILITY IN BOTH MALES AND FEMALE \u2013AND TO REDUCE BRAIN POWER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Aborted human fetal proteins, altered DNA material, and GM human albumin is used by EVIL pharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">IN KERALA WE NEVER HAD AUTISM BEFORE WE STARTED COMPULSORY VACCINATIONS LIKE MMR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MMR vaccine contains GM human protein, and has caused vaccine-induced neurological damage in Indian babies\u2014all this is hushed up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">INDIAN BABIES ARE USED AS GUINEA PIGS WITH CONNIVANCE OF DOCTORS WHO ARE SENT ON PEDOPHILE SEXUAL JAUNTS TO THAILAND AND EUROPE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Cell culture techniques to produce vaccine viruses in human cell strains is kept as a closely guarded secret<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Vaccine manufacturers do not test their products for mutagenic potential. The long term adverse effects of using aborted fetal cells for vaccine production are virtually unknown, yet millions of these vaccines are administered every day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Cell cultures involve growing cells in a culture vessel. A primary cell culture consists of cells taken directly from living tissue and never subcultivated, and may contain multiple types of cells such as fibroblasts, epithelial, and endothelial cells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">A cell strain is a cell culture that contains only one type of cell in which the cells are normal and have a finite capacity to replicate. Cell strains can be made by taking subcultures from an original, primary culture until only one type remains.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Primary cultures can be manipulated in many different ways in order to isolate a single type of cell; spinning the culture in a centrifuge can separate large cells from small ones, for example. An immortalized cell line is a cell culture of a single type of cell that can reproduce indefinitely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Normally, cells are subject to the Hayflick Limit, a rule named for cell biologist Leonard Hayflick, PhD. Hayflick determined that a population of normal human cells will reproduce only a finite number of times before they cease to reproduce. However some cells in culture have undergone a mutation, or they have been manipulated in the laboratory, so that they reproduce indefinitely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Rubella vaccines developed using duck embryo cells and dog kidney cells. Polio vaccines developed using primary monkey kidney cells were contaminated with simian viruses: this was one of the reasons researchers began using the normal human cell strain WI-38 in the first place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">There are two particular fetal cell lines that have been heavily used in vaccine development. They are named according to the laboratory facilities where they were developed. One cell line is known as WI-38, developed at the Wistar Institute in Philadelphia, PA. The other is MRC-5, developed for the Medical Research Council in England.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 cells are used to produce several vaccines including MMR, Varicella and Polio. Infected MRC-5 cells secrete the virus, and are cultured in large volumes..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 cell line was developed in September 1966 from lung tissue taken from a 14 week fetus aborted for psychiatric reason from a 27 year old physically healthy woman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 (Medical Research Council cell strain 5) is a diploid human cell culture line composed of fibroblasts<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MRC-5 cell strain ( fetal lung cells) was developed, using Hayflick's technology, in 1970 at the Medical Research Center in the United Kingdom. It should be noted that Hayflick's methods involved establishing a huge bank of WI-38 and MRC-5 cells that, while not capable of infinitely replicating like immortal cell lines<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Several vaccines currently available in the United States were developed using animal cell strains, primarily using cells from African green monkeys. These include vaccines against Japanese encephalitis, rotavirus, polio, and smallpox.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Indian babies have been sacrificed for use in the research and development of vaccines. The modern doctors are NOT smart enough to tell you this.</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oLqQblo24r4/WQR1eFsYpQI/AAAAAAABS7A/sPc8MFU5IJYEa8UyJDvNz_g3T5KEIlVSQCLcB/s1600/BloodV66essel.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-oLqQblo24r4/WQR1eFsYpQI/AAAAAAABS7A/sPc8MFU5IJYEa8UyJDvNz_g3T5KEIlVSQCLcB/s400/BloodV66essel.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arteriosclerosis is a\nhardening of the arteries, caused by a loss of elasticity in the arterial walls\ndue to plaque growth. Atherosclerosis is the process of plaque growth in the\narterial wall..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Plaque growth happens when the endothelium, the delicate lining\nof the blood vessels, is damaged. This creates a place for the plaque to\naccumulate. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The endothelium &nbsp;cells line the entire circulatory system from\nthe heart all the way down to the smallest capillary.&nbsp; When added up, the volume of these\nendothelial cells would cover the surface area of 8 tennis courts and weigh as\nmuch as the liver.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That\u2019s amazing since\nthe endothelium is only one cell thick and can\u2019t be seen by the human eye.&nbsp; The endothelium is an active,\nmulti-functional organ that plays a vital role in metabolic, immunologic, and\ncardiovascular health.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The endothelial\ncells ultimately determine the health of your blood vessels and play a major\nrole in preventing cardiovascular disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The endothelial cells\nare the controlling factor in the regulation of blood pressure.&nbsp; They produce both Nitric Oxide (NO) which is\nthe most potent vasodilator and Endothelin-1 the most potent\nvasoconstrictor.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide is a\nmolecule created by a nitrogen atom bound to an oxygen atom. It is made in our\ncells and released into the surrounding tissues as a gas. The release of nitric\noxide by our cells is termed \"puffing\" by scientists to describe the\nrising and falling of this gas. The puffing cycle is like a wave which takes\nthree minutes to rise and three minutes to fall.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The existence and\npredictability of nocturnal tumescence can ascertain whether a given case of\nerectile dysfunction (E.D.) is psychological or physiological in origin. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\npatient presenting E.D. is fitted with an elastic device to wear around his prick\nduring sleep; the device detects changes in girth and relays the information to\na computer for later analysis. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If\nnocturnal tumescence is detected, then the E.D. is presumed to be due to a\npsychosomatic illness such as sexual anxiety; if not, then it is presumed to be\ndue to a physiological cause.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Females have a similar phenomenon called\nnocturnal clitoral tumescence, They persist throughout the lifespan but are not\nassociated with erotic desire.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleep-related erections (SREs) occur in all men,\nregardless of recent sexual activities. These erections related to erotic\ncontent of dreams, previous sexual activity, or a full bladder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NPT is triggered by the\nrelease of nitric oxide (NO). &nbsp;&nbsp;NO is\nreleased by cells that line the inside of blood vessels which then diffuses\ninto smooth muscle, causing it to relax. This causes blood vessels to dilate,\nhence increasing blood flow to the penis and voila, a HOP.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide had blood\nvessel dilation properties. All blood vessels are lined by endothelial cells.\nThese cells act as selective filters that regulate the passage of gases, fluids\nand various molecules across their membranes. They are also instrumental in the\nproduction of the signalling molecule &nbsp;nitric\noxide.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Smooth muscle\nrelaxation is paramount for a penile erection to take place, as the penis needs\nto be filled with blood in order for an erection to happen. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No blood flow to the\npenis means no hop \u2013 HOON HOON ILLLAI !. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The smooth muscles are\nordinarily in a state of contraction, which means that they clench together and\ndo not allow blood to flow to the penis, other than for regular maintenance\npurposes. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand, when\nthese smooth muscle relax, blood is allowed to flow into and engorge the penis.\n&nbsp;&nbsp;Nitric oxide plays a critical role in\nblood pressure and overall circulation, as well as in increasing nutrient and\noxygen delivery to every system, organ, and tissue in the body. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide acts as a\nneurotransmitter in the brain and is especially important in regards to\nlearning and memory tasks that take place specifically in the hypothalamus. No REM\nsleep means you will remain a DUFFER throughout your life <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide is\nsynthesized in the brain upon demand and can be used in cognitive tasks\nimmediately after being formed. Nitric oxide improves brain functioning and\nreduces cognitive decline. This is because it enhances blood flow to the brain\nand also because it functions as a secondary neurotransmitter between nerve\ncells. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide is\nimportant to the immune system as white blood cells use nitric oxide to fight\noff bacteria, parasites and viruses. Nitric oxide produced by white blood cells\nis toxic to these entities and therefore plays an important role in their\ndestruction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide\nfacilitates REM sleep, and it also improves sleep recovery\u2014it is a self feeding\ncycle &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleep apnea syndrome is correlated\nwith decreased levels of nitric oxide.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Erections are neuro-vascular\nevents. This means that the process of getting an erection involves complex\ninteraction between veins, nerves and neurons. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blood naturally flows\ninto the penis through arteries (Helicine arteries) and out of the penis\nthrough veins (venules) just as it flows through the arms, legs and other parts\nof the body. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In order for an\nerection to occur, the blood must be prevented from flowing out of the penis \u2013\ncausing the spongy cylinders to fill with blood, and the penis to become fully\nerect and hard. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why in blue\nmovie the stud wears a constriction band .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Following the stimulus\n(either originating in the brain or from direct stimulation of the penis), the body\nreleases nitric oxide at the nerve endings of the penis. Nitric Oxide causes an\nincrease in blood flow to the area \u2013 filling the spongy cylinders around the\npenis with blood. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To test the impact of\nNO on sleep, researchers gave rabbits various nitric oxide inhibitors and found\nthat it lowered REM eye movements.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Low-grade inflammation\nis one of the things that thickens arteries, reducing blood flow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric oxide is VERY\nimportant to sleep and research has shown that it is an actual regulator of\nyour sleep/wake cycles. Decreased NO will actually alter EEGs and ages the\nbrain in several key ways.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Viagra works, of\ncourse, by slowing the breakdown of endothelial nitric oxide, allowing levels\nto build up more quickly. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Low nitric oxide levels\nworsen insomnia. It is a vicious cycle. This process of aging impairs the way\nin which nitric oxide in the brain induces sleep. The more time you go into\ndeep sleep when rapid eye movement (REM) occurs, the more of the enzyme\n-neuronal nitric oxide synthase (nNOS)- triggers the production of more nitric\noxide.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Longer periods of REM will result in more nitric oxide production and\nbetter sleep, better sex, reduced blood pressure and lower fat triglycerides in\nthe blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Increasing Nitric Oxide\nproduction causes the blood vessels to relax and expand again. Nitric Oxide can\nliterally strengthen the integrity of the cardiovascular system and help you\nturn back the clock-by years. As you age, your body\u2019s ability to produce\nbeneficial levels of Nitric Oxide decreases.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When your body produces less\nNitric Oxide, your arteries stiffen and narrow, leading to a number of serious\nhealth concerns including elevated blood pressure, heart disease, stroke,\nchronic inflammation and decreased sexual function.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nitric Oxide (NO) is an\ncrucial regulator and mediator of innumerable processes in the cardiovascular,\nimmune, and nervous systems. These consist of vascular smooth muscle\nrelaxation, developing into arterial vasodilation and enhancing blood flow.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Macrophages,\nspecific cells of the immune system, create Nitric Oxide to kill invading\nbacteria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">Ganges water &nbsp;does NOT get spoilt as it contains microphages -&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">No other river on this planet has this--&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">This is why Ganga is holy ! font-size: large;\">In Sanskrit verse , the notes are consonant (samvadin), assonant (anuvadin) and dissonant (vivadin) depending on the distance in srutis with respect to the sonant (vadin).</span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In KATHAKALI and\nKATHAPRASANGAM &nbsp;Malayalam &nbsp;sounds we are familiar with this .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assonance,\nconsonance, and dissonance are powerful literary tools not only because they\nare principal in appreciating and understanding literature, but because they\nallow the author to convey meaning without explicitly stating anything to the\nreader.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Works become more lively and vivid depending on with strategies are\nutilized and can assist literature in becoming profound and resonant. Much like\nan artist selects all their colors with purpose, an author\u2019s diction is one of\nthe most important forces in making their pieces come alive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In music, consonance\nand dissonance form a structural dichotomy in which the terms define each other\nby mutual exclusion: a consonance is what is not dissonant, and reciprocally.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consonance is\nassociated with sweetness, pleasantness and acceptability and dissonance with\nharshness, unpleasantness, or unacceptability.. Consonance in music describes\nsounds that have a sense of rest. Parts of music which seem stable and don\u2019t\nleave your ear wanting closure or relief are generally consonant sounds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dissonance can then be\ndefined as a combination of sounds that does not belong to the style under\nconsideration<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN JEW ROTHSCHILD\nINJECTED POISON INTO OUR SRUTI\u2014HE WAS DISSONANT AND HE SCREWED UP THE PROSODY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The distinction mainly\nconcerns simultaneous sounds; if successive sounds are considered, their\nconsonance or dissonance depends on the memorial retention of the first sound\nwhile the second sound (or pitch) is heard.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consonance and\ndissonance exist only between sounds and therefore necessarily describe\nintervals (or chords), such as the perfect intervals, which are often viewed as\nconsonant (e.g., the unison and octave)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The definition of\nconsonance has been variously based on experience, frequency, and both physical\nand psychological considerations.. frequency ratios: with ratios of lower\nsimple numbers being more consonant than those that are higher<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consonance is dependent\nnot only on the width of the interval between two notes (i.e., the musical\ntuning), but also on the combined spectral distribution and thus sound quality\n(i.e., the timbre) of the notes (see the entry under critical band).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thus, a\nnote and the note one octave higher are highly consonant because the partials\nof the higher note are also partials of the lower note<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A stable tone\ncombination is a consonance; consonances are points of arrival, rest, and\nresolution<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Both consonance and\ndissonance are words applied to harmony, chords, and intervals and, by\nextension, to melody, tonality, and even rhythm and metre..&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The basic ideas of dissonance, consonance,\nand resolution&nbsp; have a concept of melody,\nharmony, or tonality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Harmony is generally\ngoverned by chords, which are collections of notes defined as tolerably\nconsonant by the style.&nbsp; Any note that\ndoes not fall within the prevailing harmony is considered dissonant.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Relaxation\nand tension have been used as analogy \u2013Consonance is said perfect, when two\nvoices are joined at the same time, so that the one, by audition, cannot be\ndistinguished from the other because of the concordance, and it is called\nequisonance, as in unison and octave<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A consonant interval is\none that is stable and does not demand treatment. However, dissonance in itself\nis not an undesirable thing; we use dissonance to provide the \"spice\"\nto music. Central to western music theory and ear training are the related\nconcepts of consonance and dissonance.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These ideas are extremely important to\nthe way we hear music, both melodically and harmonically. Dissonant sounds may\nbe best described as \u201cactive\u201d ones; they are not bad sounding . Rather, they\nare the sounds that create forward musical motion and harmonic direction.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In\nwestern music dissonant sounds resolve to consonant ones. Intervals are traditionally\nconsidered either consonant or dissonant. Consonant intervals are usually\ndescribed as pleasant and agreeable. Dissonant intervals are those that cause\ntension and desire to be resolved to consonant intervals.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These descriptions\nrelate to harmonious intervals. The concepts \"consonance\" and\n\"dissonance\" are highly context-related.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How sonance (consonance or\ndissonance) is perceived depends on several music-psychological factors:\ntemperament (other than equal temperament is perceived as dissonance); genre\n(in atonal music, consonances are scarce); timbre; the extent of the interval\n(can be several octaves); harmonic environments before and after the interval;\nand so on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mozart\u2019s music contains\na number of quite radical experiments in dissonance\u2014to be frank BULLSHIT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dissonances can be\ndivided into sharp and soft dissonances. This division relates mainly to atonal\nmusic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dissonance may be the\ndifficulty in determining the relationship between two frequencies, determined\nby their relative wavelengths. Consonant intervals (low whole number ratios)\ntake less, while dissonant intervals take more time to be determined.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In English verse consonance\nis the repetition of consonant sounds, often at the beginning of words.. Assonance\nis a literary device using repeated vowel sounds. Because repeated vowel sounds\ncan create rhymes, assonance is often found in poetry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The literary device\nused to produce euphoric sound is known as \u201cassonance\u201d. In order to achieve\nthis, internal vowel sounds are repeated within prose or verse.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Assonance may\nbe employed for two basic purposes. First, assonance may be utilized if the\nauthor wishes to create a frivolous or whimsical tone or create a comfortable,\nsoothing, or otherwise optimistic mood.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/oteEuCCUm14/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/oteEuCCUm14?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conversely, if employed while the\nauthor describes something unpleasant or within a disturbing context, assonance\ncan take on a sarcastic and morbid meaning.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Repeated consonant\nsounds within a phrase or verse, which are not found at the beginning of words,\ncreates consonance. Like assonance, consonance becomes very obvious after the\ndefinition is understood because it is not subjective.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An author may choose to\nincorporate consonance in order to create a multitude of effects, such as\nelaborating upon their dark and foreboding tone and create an impactful,\ndangerous, or otherwise dismal mood, to merely offering a piece of poetry or\nprose a uniformity or a beat, which may in turn make the piece sweet or\nchildish. Like assonance, consonance\u2019s meaning relies upon context.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">While consonance and\nassonance may be identified by pointing out specifically repeated sounds,\ndissonance is more of a collective effect stemming from vowel and consonant\ndiversification.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/OVMjxenOKmg/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/OVMjxenOKmg?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RAP IS SUPPOSED TO\nFACTOR IN ABOVE THEORIES.&nbsp; BUT WHEN\nSINGERS AND SONG WRITERS ARE DUFFERS , WHAT DO YOU EXPECT \u2013 GENIUS ?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/W9LSj-up1xw/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/W9LSj-up1xw?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">46 YEARS AGO, WHEN I WAS IN SCHOOL WE HAD HINDI BOOKS OF POEMS BY NCERT- &nbsp; &nbsp;\u201cDURGAM PATH KI RAHI\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;PACKED WITH FAKE DASA VERSES \u2013WITH\nPOEMS FROM HARVANSH RAI BACHCHAN ( AMITABHs FATHER ) THROWN IN FOR GOOD MEASURE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EVEN THOSE DAYS AS A CHILD, I KNEW THE\nFALSEHOOD IN THIS BOOK<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SANSKRIT SRUTI VERSES DO NOT RHYME \u2013LIKE STUPID\nENGLISH<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE HAD RHYMING DOHAS FROM DASAS IN HINDI\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SOMETHING SOMETHING &nbsp;SOMETHING &nbsp;\u201c <b><span style=\"color: red;\">HOY</span></b> \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SOMETHING SOMETHING SOMEHING &nbsp;\u201c <span style=\"color: red;\"><b>KOY</b></span> \u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I KNOW HOW TO SPOT JEW ROTHSCHILDs FAKE\nVERSES AND POISON INJECTIONS \u2013&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I HAVE TOLD ONLY 5% -- 95% I HAVE NOT REVEALED<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most majestic temples\nof North Kerala were burnt by Tipu Sultan. &nbsp;The extensive used of wood seasoned in oil\naided the burning by long range rockets supplied by Jew Rothschild ( French\nbranch ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The typical Hindu\ntemple of Kerala is different from the ones you see elsewhere in India or on the\nplanet.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-HlVUYZ9mNSI/WQYrYy20ZGI/AAAAAAABS8A/fmqDRZCQQYsIIZ-L9IEUAV_586qdtTrZACLcB/s1600/guruvayur-tezmple.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
