, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Importance was given to vastu and the equation\nbetween the idol third eye, the sthumb top ( vahana staff ) , the iridium spires\nand the place where threertham ( living water ) was kept &nbsp;which were given to devotees to apply on their\nmoordhavu ( sahasrara chakra ) after drinking a part of it<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every temple had a\nbanyan tree and a grand temple pond with steps<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-y1GOb4-xhmI/WQYrQnPfwKI/AAAAAAABS78/noCCjfajcaE3MgSdMhZhuXEFUV8W2xVcgCLcB/s1600/Guruvayur-Tesmple-photo-1200x800.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-y1GOb4-xhmI/WQYrQnPfwKI/AAAAAAABS78/noCCjfajcaE3MgSdMhZhuXEFUV8W2xVcgCLcB/s640/Guruvayur-Tesmple-photo-1200x800.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kerala temple when\nyou visit on a less crowded day- exudes deep peace , a strange positive energy \u2013\na place where you can soak in the ancient &nbsp;culture of Kerala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The spatiality of\nKerala temples follows the general Indian philosophical concepts of the centre,\naxis mundi and the human relatedness to cosmic reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The axis mundi it\nexpresses a point of connection between sky and earth where the four compass\ndirections meet\u2014represented by 4 cardinal point nadas.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At this point travel\nand correspondence is made between higher and lower realms.&nbsp; Communication from lower realms may ascend to\nhigher ones and blessings from higher realms may descend to lower ones and be\ndisseminated to all<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The human body with 7\nchakras can express the symbol of world axis\u2014 right upto brahmalok ( field of\nbrahman ) &nbsp;at the 7<sup>th</sup> astral\nlayer .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kerala astrology\nassumes a connection between human health and affairs and the orientation with\ncelestial bodies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The axis mundi is\nrepresented by Meru \u2013Pascal\u2019s triangle is embedded in our sruti verses\u2014this was\nthe centre axis before the great continental drift took continents apart<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kurma Puraan states\nthat-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jambudvipa lies in the\nmiddle of all Mortal Realms and in its center is the lofty Mt. Meru, bright as\ngold. Its height is 84,000 yojanas, and it extends 16,000 yojanas below the\nearth; its width at the top is 32,000 and at the base is 16,000 yojanas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most other ancient\nscriptures also describe Meru as a colossal mountain with staggering\ndimensions; situated bang in the middle of the planet; inversely coned;\nexpanding upwards; stretching beyond the skies at one end; and penetrating deep\ninto the bowels of Earth at the other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Suryasiddhanta, locates\nMeru at the 'Navel of the Earth' and describes it as 'Passing through middle of\nthe earth-globe, and protruding on either side'. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Further ahead, it mentions a Meru in the\nmiddle of Earth, a Sumeru at the North Pole and a Kumeru at the South pole\n(which may lead us to believe that this structure stretches from pole-to-pole)!\n&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Vishnu\u2019s Varaha avatar tilted the axis mundi\nby 23.4 degrees.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meru was used as a dasher by 108 devas and asuras to churn the cosmic ocean during SAMUDRA MANTHAN&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Varahamihira ( 2660 BC\n) &nbsp;the most famous Indian astronomer from\nancient times, identified North Pole as the location of Meru in his celebrated\nwork Panch-siddhantika.&nbsp; Meru is math\u2014Pascal\u2019s\ntriangle which contains divine secrets</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above Meru is Brahmalok\nor the 'Abode of Brahman\u2014the field' from which souls were sent down to earth&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/G2xukPZlft0/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/G2xukPZlft0?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since ancient days , the\ncultural richness of Kerala stems from the interrelationship between Sanatana\nDharma, Sanskrit &nbsp;language, dance, music,\nvisual arts and architecture steeped in vaastu.&nbsp;\nIntricate carvings were done on rich wood rather than stone ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even today Kerala\ntemples stand head and shoulders above other Indian temples in \u201cform,\nstructural clarity, stylistic tradition, spiritual symbolism and above all in\nmaterial and craftsmanship in wood\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kerala temples are\ndistinguished by steep and pointed roofs with iridium infused copper spires covered\nwith copper sheets<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the outer parikrama\nthere are &nbsp;vedopadesha shalas ( stalls\nfor teaching Vedas).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is an inner\nparikrama in every temple for clockwise circumambulation<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5XKJKq4ItkU/WQYpkyQtBvI/AAAAAAABS7w/wwbZlY6FrAUwSFG3kRcCkM4R7atHRjJBQCEw/s1600/guruvzzayur-temple-lighting.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The outer parikrama has\nbalikkal in granite with a six pointed star ( Shiva ? Shakti merge ).&nbsp; During Jew Rothschild\u2019s rule all these JUDE\nstars disappeared\u2014they were ground off the stone surface<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a\ndeepasthambam next to the flag post stambh which is a tall layered lamp<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a oottupura (\nfree dining hall), and the koothambalam (theatre hall) which conducted\nKathakali plays and traditional dances\u2014basically a pillared hall with high\nroof, with no walls..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The very presence of\nkoothambalams in temples stands as testimony that the<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">temples were centre of\ncultural activities since early times. Mohiniyattam was banned by Jew\nRothschild because it was a \u201cdance of whores\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many of Kerala\u2019s\nmagnificent temples are hidden in the countryside, along its rivers or high up\nin the hills. In every instance, the location is chosen carefully and the\nsetting is invariably beautiful.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike the grand edifices of the more famous\nIndian temples, these places of worship are low in profile but offer a\ntranquility and serenity as a space for prayer that is rare in today\u2019s world of\nfrenzied activity.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-it4ushuJLdI/WQYpb8MKMNI/AAAAAAABS7s/loIbwLBPOIgaaDsdFfoHQQvAN4N4z7wxQCEw/s1600/kolbr1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"308\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-it4ushuJLdI/WQYpb8MKMNI/AAAAAAABS7s/loIbwLBPOIgaaDsdFfoHQQvAN4N4z7wxQCEw/s640/kolbr1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; By using simple proportion -it can be shown that the height of any particular pinhole producing the patch is approximately<br /><br />108a2/b cm<br /><br />But where does the factor of 108 come from? The angular diameter of the Sun as seen at the surface of the Earth is about 0.53 degrees of arc or 1/108 radians.<br /><br />The size of a radian is determined by the requirement that there are 2 PI radians in a circle. Thus 2 PI radians equals 360 degrees. This means that 1 radian = 180/ PI degrees, and 1 degree = PI /180 radians.<br /><br />To an observer on Earth, the Sun and the Moon subtend the same angle ( 0.53 deg ) in the sky.<br /><br />This is why the Moon sometimes completely blocks the Sun, producing a total solar eclipse\u2014we see only the corona fringe of the sun .<br /><br />108 is a DIVINE NUMBER -- OM is digitally expressed as 108.<br /><br />The jew have stolem OM and made it SHALOM.<br /><br />The christians have made it AMEN<br /><br />Islam has made it 786 ( show OM symbol on the mirror and read from right to left )<br /><br />Only OM --the original-- works<br /><br />Take a stick one metre long . Stick it on the ground after walking 108 metres . The pole will look exactly the same size as the Moon and the Sun ( assuming sun is behind the moon ) if your eye is on the ground . The angle of this triangle with vertical distance 1 and base 108 will be 0.53 deg .<br /><br />ALL THIS WAS FIGURED OUT AND CONVEYED ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 400 CENTURIES BEFORE IT WAS PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO.<br /><br />A WHITE BOY COMPLAINS TO HIS MOM-- \" </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>LOOK MAA THESE DIRTY INDIANS WASH THEIR ASSHOLES AFTER DROPPING THE DUNG </b></span>!\"<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8005660901565391575\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_110M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/03227835169272357552\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">veena janardhanan</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/flu-shots-pneumococcal-vaccines-part-4.html?showComment=1494092015770#c8005660901565391575\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 6, 2017 at 11:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_110MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDearest Captain<br />\nI would request you to write about Pancha Mahabutam with respect to modern science. padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_110b+seedFfxdD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_107B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c405832322812409997\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_107M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/flu-shots-pneumococcal-vaccines-part-4.html?showComment=1494095435634#c405832322812409997\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 7, 2017 at 12:00 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_107MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi vj,<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nIn ayurveda the panch mahabhootas such as Akasha tattva (Ether element); the Agni tattva (Fire element), the Jal tattva (Water element), the Prithvi tattva (Earth element) and the Vayu tattva (Air element).<br />\n<br />\nThere are 3 doshas namely Vata( gas ) , Pitta ( bile ) &amp; Kapha mucus ) . Each dosha is born out of impairment of combinations of Elements.<br />\n<br />\nWhen the Pancha-Mahabhutas or five primordal elements (space, air, fire, water and earth) is balanced, the body is healthy and when they are imbalanced, there is disease.<br />\n<br />\nThe combination of the three Doshas influences our mental, emotional and physical tendencies.<br />\n<br />\nPancha Mahabhuta theory states that everything in the physical creation is composed of these 5 elements. The very first element that comes to existence is akash (Ether). It is most expansive and least concreate of all. The next element derived is Vayu (Air) then comes Agni (Fire), then Jala (water) element is formed and lastly Prithvi (earth) element is formed.<br />\n<br />\nThe tanmatra of ether/ akasha element is Shabda (Sound -inner ear cochlea). Shabda Brahman is associated with akasha . It is the empty space within an atom where electrons whiz around --with perpetual motion. It is the ZPF where the cosmos exists. Vishuddha chakra is located in the area of the throat and is directly related to the ether element and the tanmatra of sound.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Ayurveda and Yoga are based on the principle of the five elements. These five elements are referred to as the panchamahabhutas in Ayurveda or the tattvas in yoga. Pancha means \u201cfive\u201d and mahabhuta and tattva are Sanskrit words meaning \u201celement\u201d or \u201creality.<br />\n<br />\nThese five elements are responsible for the structure of the universe; they are the building blocks of the material world. Everything in the universe, animate and inanimate, is made up of the five mahabhutas<br />\n<br />\nEach object and being in the universe contains a varying degree and combination of the five elements providing its unique features. The elements are not detected in their pure state. We perceive substances that possess many qualities, which come from a combination of more than one element.<br />\n<br />\nThe mahabhutas represent the physical qualities, energetic properties and biological functions related to the given element. STUPID JOHN BULL English equivalents are used to simplify the meaning of the panchamahabhutas.<br />\n<br />\nThe five elements originate from the subtle and all-pervasive universal consciousness. Ether is the most subtle of the five elements and has its origin from consciousness itself, even though less subtle than consciousness or spirit. In this same way, air has its origin from ether and is less subtle and pervasive than ether. Fire originates from air and is more dense than air. Water has its origin from fire and is more dense than fire. Earth has its origin from water and is the most dense of the five elements.<br />\n<br />\nEvery animate and inanimate being is made up of atoms; the five mahabutas can be explained with the example of an atom:<br />\n<br />\nAakash (space component) is the space which the protons and neutrons occupy as well as the space in which the electrons revolve.<br />\nVayu (air component) represents the force of movement of the electrons around the nucleus.<br />\nAgni (fire component) represents the latent energy in an atom as well as the released energy when an atom is broken down.<br />\nJala (water component) gives the force of cohesion that allows the protons, neutrons and electrons to remain attracted towards each other.<br />\nPrithvi (earth component) contributes the solid portion of the atom (i.e. the electrons, protons, and neutrons).<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_107MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_107BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_107B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_108B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6883090196915820110\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_108M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/flu-shots-pneumococcal-vaccines-part-4.html?showComment=1494095659198#c6883090196915820110\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 7, 2017 at 12:04 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_108MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nOur body is made up of the five elements and so is everything we consume. Because natural substances such as foods, herbs, minerals, sunlight, air, and water are of the same composition as our structure, our body\u2019s can utilize them in a harmonious way.<br />\n<br />\nThe panchamahabuta concept can be applied to maintain health and promote healing. In a healthy body, the five elements are maintained in a particular proportion. When the state of the body is not in its natural harmony, the body will try to maintain it\u2019s equilibrium by eliminating excess elements and taking in others. All disorders of the body are manifested because of a disturbance in this balance of the body\u2019s components.<br />\n<br />\nEach of the five elements is also related to a primary organ of action, allowing the body to respond to the input of the five sense. These five organs are named karmendriyas from the Sanskrit word karma meaning \u201caction\u201d.<br />\n<br />\nThe five lower chakras (muladhara, svadhistana, manipura, anahata, and vishuddha) are attuned to the energies of the five elements, and thus also have a relation to the tanmantra and indriyas associated with each element.<br />\n<br />\nIn order to bridge the gulf between consciousness and apparently durable matter, ancient Indian sages postulated (or \u201cdivined\u201d) that all physical things are constituted of five subtle elements called Pancha-Mahabhutas \u2013 earth, fire, water, air, ether. These are not the elements known in the conventional sense (e.g. \u201cwater\u201d does not imply the water, and \u201cearth\u201d does not mean soil) but are actually subtle conditions which together create the perception of forms which can be sensed by the human mind. The actual names of these five elements are Akasha (ether), Vayu(aeriality), Agni(fire), Apas(liquidity) and Prithvi(compaction). The descriptions of these five constituents are quite similar across Sankhya and Tantra philosophy<br />\n<br />\nMaharishis in all their wisdom bridged the gulf between pure Force and its final modifications and satisfied the difficulty which prevents the ordinary human mind from understanding how all these forms which are to his senses so real, solid and durable can be in truth only temporary phenomena---<br />\n<br />\n--- and a thing like pure energy, to the senses non-existent, intangible and almost incredible, can be the one permanent cosmic reality.<br />\n<br />\nFive forms of motion, into which Prakriti differentiates itself:--<br />\n<br />\nAkasha: non-obstructive, all-directed motion radiating lines of force in all directions, symbolized as the \u201cHairs of Siva\u201d affording the space in which the other forces operate;<br />\nVayu: transverse motion and locomotion in space.<br />\nAgni: upward motion giving rise to expansion.<br />\nApas: downward motion giving rise to contraction.<br />\nPrithvi: that motion which produces cohesion, its characteristic of obstruction being the opposite of the non-obstructive ether in which it exists and from which it and the other Tattvas spring.<br />\nThese Bhutas(elements) when compounded make up the material universe.\u2026Matter, thus exists in the five states etheric, aerial, fiery, fluid, and solid. Prithvi does not denote merely what is popularly called \u201cEarth\u201d. All solid (Parthiva) odorous substance is in the Prithvi(earth) state. All substance in the fluid (Apya) state is in the Apas(liquid) state, as everything which has cohesive resistance is in that of Prithvi. This latter, therefore, is the cohesive vibration, the cause of solidity, of which the common earth is a gross compounded form. All matter in the aerial (Vayava) condition is in the Vayu state. These are all primary differentiations of cosmic matter into a universe of subtly fine motion.<br />\n<br />\nThe Garuda Purana refers to the five forms of Vishnu (Pancha-tatvarchana) \u2013 Vasudeva, Sankarsana, Pradyumna, Aniruddha and Narayana<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_108MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_108BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_108B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_109B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5860697747456434726\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_109M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/05/flu-shots-pneumococcal-vaccines-part-4.html?showComment=1494095694435#c5860697747456434726\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">May 7, 2017 at 12:04 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_109MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nVasudeva is \u201cthat in which all things abide\u201d, indicating the element Ether.<br />\nSankarsana indicates \u201csqueezing together.\u201d [Samyak(complete) + Akarshan(attraction)], indicating the element of Aeriality.<br />\nPradyumna means the \u201cradiant one\u201d, indicating the element Fire.<br />\nAniruddha in Sanskrit means \u201cwithout obstacles\u201d, indicating liquidity or Water.<br />\nNarayana: In Sanskrit, another name for water is Nara so Narayana means \u201cone who floats on Water\u201d, which is the previous element. Hence, Narayana indicates Earth.<br />\n<br />\nQUANTUM PHYSICS HAS NOT YET CAUGHT UP WITH VEDANTA<br />\n<br />\nFive quantum-mechanical spin types of a unified quantum field theory --check out the following parallels:<br />\n<br />\nbetween the akasha or \u201cspace\u201d and the gravitational field;<br />\nbetween the vayu or \u201cair\u201d tanmatra, which stands as a link between space and the other tanmatras, and the gravitino field;<br />\nbetween the tejas or \u201cfire\u201d tanmatra, responsible for chemical transformations and the sense of sight, and the spin-1 force fields;<br />\nand between the apas and prithivi (\u201cwater\u201d and \u201cearth\u201d) tanmatras and the spin-1/2 and spin-0 matter fields, respectively<br />\n<br />\nmaha-bhutany ahankaro<br />\nbuddhir avyaktam eva ca<br />\nindriyani dasaikam ca<br />\npanca cendriya-gocarah<br />\niccha dvesah sukham duhkham<br />\nsanghatas cetana dhrtih<br />\netat ksetram samasena<br />\nsa-vikaram udahrtam<br />\nSYNONYMS<br />\nmaha-bhutani\u2014great elements; ahankarah\u2014false ego; buddhih\u2014intelligence; avyaktam\u2014the unmanifested; eva\u2014certainly; ca\u2014also; indriyani\u2014senses ; dasa ekam\u2014eleven; ca\u2014also; panca\u2014five; ca\u2014also; indriya-gocarah\u2014objects of the senses; iccha\u2014desire; dvesah\u2014hatred; sukham\u2014happiness; duhkham\u2014distress; sanghatah\u2014the aggregate; cetana\u2014living symptoms; dhrtih\u2014conviction; etat\u2014all this; ksetram\u2014field of activities; samasena\u2014in summary; sa-vikaram\u2014interaction; udahrtam\u2014exemplified.<br />\nTRANSLATION<br />\nThe five great elements, false ego, intelligence, the unmanifested, the ten senses, the mind, the five sense objects, desire, hatred, happiness, distress, the aggregate, the life symptoms, and convictions-all these are considered, in summary, to be the field of activities and its interactions.<br />\n<br />\nThe first product of creation is Mahat. Mahat is the highest principle; it is the intellect or Buddhi. From Mahat, arises Ego (Ahamkara) and then the mind (Manas.).<br />\n<br />\nSubsequently the 5 sense organs (Jnanendriyas,) 5 organs of action (Karmendriyas,) 5 objects of the senses (Tanmatras) and 5 gross elements (Pancabhutas) are created.<br />\n<br />\nThis is creation.<br />\n<br />\nIn dissolution, the process is reversed.<br />\n<br />\nKarmaendriyas organs of action, viz.<br />\n15 vak (vocal organ)<br />\n14 pani (manual organ)<br />\n13 pada (organ of locomotion)<br />\n12 payu (excretory organ)<br />\n11 upastha (genital organ)<br />\n<br />\nTanmatras \u2013 subtle elements<br />\n10. Shabda \u2013 sound<br />\n9. Sparsha \u2013 feel<br />\n8. Rupa \u2013 form<br />\n7. Rasa \u2013 taste<br />\n6. Gandha \u2013 smell<br />\n<br />\nJnanendriyas Sense-organs, for receiving the bhutas and the tanmatras, viz<br />\n20 karna (the auditory sense)<br />\n19 tvak (the thermal sense)<br />\n18 chaksu (the visual sense)<br />\n17 rasana (the gustatory sense)<br />\n16 nasa (the olfactory sense)<br />\n<br />\nThe five great elements, false ego, intelligence, the unmanifested, the ten senses and the mind, the five sense objects, desire, hatred, happiness, distress, the aggregate, the life symptoms, and convictions -- all these are considered, in summary, to be the field of activities and its interactions.<br />\n<br />\nKrishna refers to the body as Ksetra and which is the part of this prakriti(the material world).<br />\n<br />\nWe all should know the truth that even mind and senses are the part of this prakriti(matter or material world) and not the purusha.<br />\n<br />\nThe tranformations of these elements in our body which is nothing but again the interchange of modes of prakriti(matter) causes all functions and sadness and happinenss<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tYgl_gdHZPs</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU READ THE PRICELESS VEDAS OR AMAZING BHAGAWAD GITA --AND THEN COMPARE IT WITH ALL THESE SINGLE HOLY BOOK RELIGIONS --YOU WILL LAUGH YOUR GUTS OUT.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_110b+seedFfxdD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_110b+seedFfxdD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: Kerala Christian KJ Yesudas has never been banned from any Hindu temple. &nbsp; He is at Sabarimala temple singing HARIVARASANAM just before closing the sanctum door. The ninth avatar of Vishnu HARIHARA ( idol at Sabarimala --this planet's largest pilgrimage ) is loved by both Shaivites and Vaishnavites .</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">HARI HARA IS NOT A PRODUCT OF ANAL SEX BETWEEN HUMPING SHIVA AND RECEIVING VISHNU --</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">-- AS TWEETED AND TOLD ON TV &nbsp;BY ROGUE GURU SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR - &nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS ROGUE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR DOES NOT KNOW THAT BOTH SHIVA AND VISHNU ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"content clearfix\" style=\"color: #14171a; However, in the brain, the\nendothelial cells fit tightly together and substances cannot pass out of the\nbloodstream.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE FOUNTAINHEAD OF\nSHRADDHA IS HIGHER CONSCIOUSNESS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHRADDHA IS THE\nOPPOSITE OF ANDHA-VISHWAS ( SUPERSTITION OR BLIND FAITH ) . THERE IS ZERO\nSUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA. NO BLIND FAITH OR BHAKTI IS ALLOWED IN\nSANATANA DHARMA LIKE IN THE SINGLE HOLY BOOK SINGLE MESSIAH RELIGIONS\u2014WHICH\nPROPAGATE DOGMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA IS\nROOTED IN SPIRITUALITY- IT IS NOT A RELIGION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA ASKS US\nTO DO EVERYTHING WITH SHRADDHA FOR FRUITION. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The essence of Shraddha\nis \u2013 unshakable belief in noble ideals, DHARMA and Srutis <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our ancient Maharishis\nand and spiritual texts have NEVER EVER commanded you to believe DOGMA ; rather\nthey lead you to understand. You have to exercise your conscience at every\nstep\u2014 do your duty while being rooted in the moment. This is the essense of\nBhagawad Gita . The goal, as understood by the ancient rishis, is not to merely\nbelieve in God, but to know God directly. Shraddha is the first step in one's\nsearch for God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">trividh\u0101 bhavati\n\u015braddh\u0101 dehin\u0101\u1e43 s\u0101 svabh\u0101vaj\u0101 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">s\u0101ttvik\u012b r\u0101jas\u012b caiva\nt\u0101mas\u012b ceti t\u0101\u1e43 \u015b\u1e5b\u1e47u 17.2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Supreme Lord said,\naccording to the modes of nature acquired by the embodied soul, one's SHRADDHA\ncan be of three kinds- satviki, rajasi or tamasi . Now hear about these. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The association of the\nliving entity with the opposite forces of nature - rajas ( creation ) and tamas\n(destruction ) mediated by Sattva ( preserver ) has been going on perpetually\nsince the living entity is in contact with material nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HARK THE WISDOM IN\nBHAGAWAD GITA , 6000 YEARS AGO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">sattv\u0101nur\u016bp\u0101 sarvasya\n\u015braddh\u0101 bhavati bh\u0101rata <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u015braddh\u0101mayoya\u1e43 puru\u1e63o\nyo yacchraddha\u1e25 sa eva sa\u1e25 17.3<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">O Arjun! SHRADDHA of\neach man takes the shape given to it by his staff of being \u2013 his soul. This\nsoul is made up of SHRADDHA ; and whatever is that SHRADDHA in him, he is that\nand that is he.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHRADDHA of all humans\nconforms to the nature of their mind. All people possess SHRADDHA and whatever\nthe nature of their SHRADDHA that is verily what they are. Where we decide to\nplace our faith and what we choose to believe in practically shapes the direction\nof our life. The quality of our SHRADDHA decides the direction of our life\u2014we\nforge the hinges of destiny on our own terms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">vidhi-h\u012bnam as\u1e5bi\u1e63h\u1e6d\u0101nna\u1e41\nmantra-h\u012bnam adak\u1e63hi\u1e47am<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u015bhraddh\u0101-virahita\u1e41\nyaj\u00f1a\u1e41 t\u0101masa\u1e41 parichak\u1e63hate ( Bhagawad Gita 17.13 )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yagna devoid of\nSHRADDHA and contrary to the injunctions of the scriptures, in which no food is\noffered, no mantras chanted, and no sacrifice ( bloodless ) is made, is to be\nconsidered in the mode of ignorance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma\nrequired us to be IN THE MOMENT \u2013we must make correct choices and perform the\ncorrect actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the fourth chapter\nof the Bhagavad Gita, Sri Krishna says, \"shraddhavan labhate jnanam\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only the one with\nshraddha gains knowledge. Shraddha is like a stepping stone; with the help of a\nguru, Shraddha is indispensable, because without it, true knowledge will\nforever be beyond ones grasp.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/shravana-manana-nididhyasana-way-of.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patanjali\u2019s Yogasutra\nwas penned down 7000 years ago. All this is beyond the shallow intellect of the\nwhite man<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">1.20\u2014shraddhaviryasmritisamadhiprajnapoorvaka\nitaresham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">For others, clarity is\npreceded by SHRADDHA , energy, memory and discrimination of the real.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Highly evolved souls\nhave the power to differentiate between isolation and emancipation. They are\nneither elated by their conquest of the elements, nor delighted at their\nability to move unreservedly without their bodies. Shraddha should not be\nunderstood just as faith. It also expresses mental and intellectual firmness.\n(The next word, virya, stands for gallantry and power, in the sense of physical\nand nervine strength.) Interestingly, Patanjali's first use of the word\nshraddha is unambiguous, in order to encourage the sadhaka to step up his\nsadhana in order to reach the highest goal. The natural trust of the aspirer is\nconfirmed by revelation and transformed into the faith, which imbues the\nconsciousness of practicians in any field of art, science and philosophy. If\ntrust is instinctive, SHRADDHA is intuitional.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN I WANT TO HAVE A\nNICE BELLY LAUGH \u2013 I SURF EVANGELIST TV CHANNELS . The authors of the Vedas were \"buffoons, knaves, and demons.\" Those who make ritual offerings of food to the dead, why do they not feed the hungry around them?<br />\n<br />\nLike the other two heterodox schools, Jainism and Buddhism, they criticized the caste system and stood opposed to the ritual sacrifice of animals. When the Brahmins defended the latter by claiming that the sacrificed beast goes straight to Swarga Loka (an interim heaven before rebirth), the Carvakas asked why the Brahmans did not kill their aged parents to hasten their arrival in Swarga Loka.<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRUTH IS --ANIMAL SACRIFICE IN TEMPLES WERE CREATED BY ROTHSCHILDs FAKE AND BACKDATES MUTTS<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/11/all-animal-sacrifices-in-hindu-temples.html<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED FOUL AND FALSE TEMPLE WHORES PROPAGANDA -- AS PART OF THE CHARVAKA HEDONIST PHILOSOPHY<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/02/devadasi-system-immoral-lie-of-temple.html<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe R historian has written that Brahaspati is indeed considered to be the founding father of Charvaka thought. It is his verses, for example, that the FAKE Madhvacharya quotes in his \"Sarvadarsanasangraha\"\u2014and thus gave credibility .<br />\n<br />\nSorry Brihaspati existed in hoary antiquity, in the times of Shukracharya \u2013who was the political advisor of King Mahabali of Kerala \u2013whom Vishnu killed by assuming the Vamana avatar.<br />\n<br />\nIn their ethics, the Carvakas upheld a kind of hedonism: the only goal people ought to pursue is maximizing sensual pleasure in life while avoiding pain\u2014the kind that proceeds from over-indulgence and instant gratification\u2014the quintessential Ayn Rand ( JEW ROTHSCHILDs MISTRESS ) philosophy.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild created the FAKE and backdated rishi Charvaka to inject poison into Hinduism.<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s agents LIED that Charvaka atheistic doctrines are part of Rigveda.<br />\n<br />\nIn Charvaka ( Lokayata ) Hindu school where there is \"no God, no samsara (rebirth), no karma, no duty, no fruits of merit, no sin.\"<br />\n<br />\nKUCHCH BHI KARO\u2014MAJJA MAARO ! Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nAugust 2, 2017 at 6:49 PM<br />\n<br />\nhi i,<br />\n<br />\nADI SHANKARACHARYA SUPPORTED \"ADVAITA VEDANTA \"<br />\n<br />\nHE CAN NEVER EVER WRITE A BULLSHIT PIECE LIKE KALABHAIRAV ASHTAKAM<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/advaita-vedanta-philosophy-adi.html<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://www.speakingtree.in/blog/what-is-kalabhairava-ashtakam-and-mantra<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ASa08VbK5V4</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">Jew Rothschild injected poison that vahana (vehicle) of Lord Bhairav is the dog- using his AGAMA stooges.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/nandi-bull-vahana-and-gatekeeper-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS KALA BAIRAVA WAS CREATED TO DRIVE A WEDGE BETWEEN SHAIVITES ND VAISHNAVITES&nbsp;</span></b><br />\nHERE IS THE BULLSHIT<br />\n<br />\nAll four Vedas unanimously concluded that Lord Shiva is the ultimate supreme; a conclusion that was laughed at by both Lord Brahma and Lord Vishnu. Then Lord Shiva appeared as a powerful divine shine between Lord Brahma and Vishnu. Bramha got very angry and started to stare at the shine with his 5th head (which started to burn out of anger). Lord Shiva has instantly created the new being (King of \"Kaal\": \"Kaal Bhairav\"). Lord Shiva then pronounced that \"Kaal Bhairav\" will forever be in Kashi in order to remove sins of the disciples. Kaal Bhairav beheaded the burning head of Brahma.<br />\n<br />\nLord Shiva ordered Kaal Bhairav to go to various places but \"Br\u0101hmanahatya Dosh\" continued to follow him until he reached Kashi (also known as \"Moksha Puri\") where Bramha's head (held by Kaal Bhairav) fell on the ground. The place is called \"Kapal Mochan Teerth\". Br\u0101hmanahatya Dosh on Kaal Bhairav went away as soon as he entered Kashi. Since that day, Kaal Bhairav stayed in Kashi forever and protects devotees from their problems.[2][3][4]<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br />THE TRINITY AND THEIR SPOUSES WORK IN HARMONY--THEY ARE COSMIC FORCES&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/dvaita-vedanta-of-sanatana-dharma-or.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHY DO YOU THINK I STARTED THIS BLOG SITE ?<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kaal_Bhairav_Mandir,_Varanasi<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1774678551024116942\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_174M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/the-thin-red-line-movie-review.html?showComment=1502064668985#c1774678551024116942\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 7, 2017 at 5:41 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_174MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nALL READERS LISTEN UP<br />\n<br />\nIMPORTANT<br />\n<br />\nBHARAT , THE SON OF SHAKUNTANA AND DUSHYANTA NEVER EXISTED.<br />\n<br />\nABOVE IS A FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATION OF JEW ROTHSCHILD<br />\n<br />\nHOWEVER THERE IS A GREAT INDIAN HERO AND EMPEROR NAMED BHARAT ( 8165 BC ) --HE WAS THE SON OF RISHABHA<br />\n<br />\nRishabh was born to Merudevi, Bharat was born to Rishabh, Bharatvarsha was named from Bharat, and Sumati arose from Bharat. ( Vishnu Purana 2.1.31 )<br />\n<br />\nAGAIN, THE LAND MASS OF BHARATA WAS NOT NAMED AFTER THE ELDEST SON OF EMPEROR RISHBHA ( THE FIRST THIRTHANKARA ) FROM WIFE SUMANGALA<br />\n<br />\nRATHER THE SON OF RISHABHA (BHARAT ) WAS NAMED AFTER THE LANDMASS BHARATA<br />\n<br />\nBHARAT IS THE KING-- BHARATA IS THE LANDMASS KNOWN AS INDIA TODAY<br />\n<br />\nBHARATA IS DERIVED FROM BHA ( BHAVA ) RA ( RAGA ) TA ( TALA )<br />\n<br />\nBHAVA is the emotion that creates a sense of enjoyment ( rasa )<br />\n<br />\nRAGA is the melody<br />\n<br />\nTALA is a musical meter in time.<br />\n<br />\nI have explained it in more detail -in the post below.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/04/kathakali-dance-form-of-kerala-part-3.html<br />\n<br />\nWE SAW THE MOVIE BAHUBALI AND WONDERED WHO HE IS , RIGHT?<br />\n<br />\nWELL IN REAL LIFE HE WAS THE BROTHER OF BHARAT -THE ELDEST SON OF RISHABA AND WIFE SUNANDA<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A TUSSLE BETWEEN BHARAT AND BAHUBALI AS TO WHO WOULD BE THE KING-- THOSE DAYS INDIA RULED THE WHOLE PLANET<br />\n<br />\nSeeing mass destruction in war it was decided that there should be a single combat between Bharat and Bahubali . One who wins will be the only Chakravarti or \"Emperor of Emperors\".<br />\n<br />\nIn all the stages of battle Bharat had to face terrible defeat at the hands of his younger brother Bahubali in all these fights.<br />\n<br />\nWhen a point came that Bahubali must give a lethal strike on his elder half brother Bharata, he raised his hand . He felt that his own sister Sundari and step sister Brahmi ( of script Brahmi Lipi fame ) were on the side of Bharata.<br />\n<br />\nInstead of giving the final fatal blow, he suddenly uprooted a large tuft of hair from his own head instead, thus declaring himself as a monk, stunning all .<br />\n<br />\nBahubali \u201cthe would be Chakaravarti who chose to be a monk\u201d, is revered by Hindus and Jains alike as an ideal man who conquers selfishness, jealousy, pride and anger.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kalidasa-did-not-exist-jainism-is.html<br />\n<br />\nBahubali \u201cthe would be Chakaravarti who chose to be a monk\u201d, is revered by Hindus and Jains alike as an ideal man who conquers selfishness, jealousy, pride and anger.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WORD \"HINDU\" REFERS TO THE DENIZEN OF LAND MASS BETWEEN HI-MALAYAS AND THE ROCK AT THE SOUTHER TIP OF INDIA BI--NDU.<br />\n<br />\nALSO KNOWN AS VIVEKANANDA ROCK -THIS IS A PLACE WHERE SHRADDH WAS DONE SINCE TIME IMMEMORIAL --THE SPOT WHERE THREE SEAS MERGE ( INDIAN OCEAN / ARABIAN SEA/ BAY OF BENGAL )<br />\n<br />\nHINDUISM IS THE MODERN ENGLISH NAME OF SANATANA DHARMA<br />\n<br />\nTHIS GREAT WAY OF LIFE ( NOT A RELIGION ) HAS A COSMIC FIELD GOD CALLED SHABDA BRAHMAN<br />\n<br />\nPrimal sound is referred to as Shabda Brahman - \"God as word\".<br />\n<br />\nOur VEDAS are SRUTI --the word of god heard by seers , the 12 strand DNA maharishis in their trances<br />\n<br />\nClosely related to this is the concept of Nada Brahman - \"God as sound\".<br />\n<br />\nThis Nada then gets consolidated into Shabda Brahman (differentiated sound energy), the universal cosmic resonance, symbolized by OM.<br />\n<br />\nOM IS 108 DIGITALLY .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html<br />\n<br />\nSHABDA BRAHMAN, THE CONSCIOUS TRANSCENDENTAL SOUND OF THE VEDAS<br />\n<br />\nVedas have the GOLDEN MEAN , FIBONACCI RATIO , and PASCALs TRIANGLE ( MERU ) embedded in the verses --it cannot lie<br />\n<br />\nSPREAD THIS AROUND AMONG DESH BHAKT HINDUS .. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hyperventilation\nexcessively rids the body of carbon dioxide, low carbon dioxide causes blood\nvessels to constrict, and constricted vessels carry less blood and oxygen to\nthe different parts of the body (including the brain.) This is a condition\nknown as hypoxia, and cells starved of oxygen eventually die.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">These rogues argue that\nthe kriya is \u201ccontrolled hyperventilation\u201d and therefore not harmful.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BALLS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">LAST I SAW WAS A\n\"RUBBER MAN\" WHO COULD BEND HIS LIMBS INTO GROTESQUE POSITIONS , AS\nIF THE BODY DID NOT HAVE SOCKETS FOR BONES--AND THEN HOPPING AROUND AS IT IT IS\nDANCE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ANCIENT PRANAYAMA USES\nNITROGEN (78% )IN THE AIR - NOT JUST OXYGEN ( 20.8%) TO GENERATE NITRIC OXIDE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE STOPPED WATCHING\nBABA RAMDEV.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">NDTV ASKED HIM TO\nDEMONSTRATE TWO YOGA EXERCISES-- THIS STUPID MAN DEMONSTRATED TWO ASANAS --\nBOTH \"HYPERVENTILATION \" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The normal breathing\nrate is 14 to 18 breaths per minute. Carbon dioxide is the gas that normally\nregulates the rate of breathing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A rapid rate of\nbreathing can occur normally after RIGOROUS exercise. In addition, panic states\nand high altitude climbs can also raise the respiratory rate. When these\nconditions occur, individuals may have a variety of symptoms related to pH\nchanges in their bodies caused by the hyperventilation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the blood, much of\nthe carbon dioxide produced is converted into an acid, carbonic acid. When this\nacid reaches the lungs, it is converted back to carbon dioxide and exhaled.\nHyperventilation causes a fall in the body's carbon dioxide. As a result, the\namount of acid produced is decreased, leading to a rise in the body's pH. This\ncondition is known as alkalosis.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Carbon dioxide acts on\ncertain respiratory centers in the brain and normally stimulates breathing. A\nfall in carbon dioxide levels therefore causes a fall in the rate of\nrespiration, which then serves to normalize the levels of this gas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When you do\nhyperventilation the carbon dioxide levels fall abnormally low. As a result, a\nmild level of alkalosis ensues. The alkalosis can cause a number of symptoms,\nsuch as a tingling sensation around the mouth and extremities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHANTING OM LIKE AN\nIDIOT WHEN THIS TINGLING HAPPENS -IS NOT DIVINE REACTION <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA AND\nYOGA BANS HYPERVENTILATION . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN YOGA HYPERVENTLATION\nIS DONE FOR A FEW SECONDS ONLY TO CHANGE THE PREDOMINANT NOSTRIL. THERE ARE\nGREAT VEDIC SECRETS ATTACHED TO THIS INCLUDING HAVING A MALE BABY<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 3-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt. Ajit\nVadakayilAugust 17, 2017 at 6:49 PM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The medical term for\nlow serum carbon dioxide levels caused by hypverventilation is called\nhypocapnia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypocapnia reduces\nblood flow through vasoconstriction, or narrowed blood vessels. Reduced blood\nflow and bronchoconstriction, or narrowed bronchial tubes, reduces blood\noxygenation. These characteristics of hypocapnia place excess pressure on the\nheart. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SRI SRI RAVISHANKARs\nSOHUM SUDARSHAN KRIYA HAS CAUSED DEATHS IN SOUTH AMERICA. HE WILL BE ARRESTED\nTHE NEXT TIME HE GOES THERE AS PER MY OFFICERS . THIS ROGUE HAS FOOLED PEOPLE\nENOUGH.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypocapnia causes\nrespiratory alkalosis, which is an elevation in blood pH. Respiratory alkalosis\nresults in a reduction of serum calcium ions and arterial bicarbonate, which\nstimulates the sympathetic nervous system. Sympathetic stimulation caused by\nhypocapnia can result in numbness, dizziness, fainting, seizures, tingling\nsensations, paralysis, cold flashes and blurred vision, cumulatively known as\nneuronal irritability, or hyperirritability.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hypocapnia causes sharp\nreductions of blood serum phosphate ions, clinically known as hypophosphatemia.\nThis aspect of hypocapnia increases the likelihood of cardiovascular and\nrespiratory difficulties because hypophosphatemia results in the destruction of\nred blood cells, further reducing oxygenation and causing damage that may\npersist even after treatment for hypocapnia. Other direct effects of\nhypophosphatemia include confusion, muscle weakness, heart damage, anemia,\ndisorientation and coma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE NEED GURUS AND YOGA\nMASTERS WITH A TECHNICAL BRAIN-- INSTEAD WE HAVE ENGLISH LITERATURE GURUS LIKE\nSADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">MODI HAS GIVEN PADMA\nVIBHUSHAN TO BOTH SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV -&nbsp; WE KNOW WHY !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;
