font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">An atom is pure energy held together by a intelligent force. The conscious intelligent field lies in the empty space in between the electrons\u2026 The field of brahmAn ( God ) has limitless power and is the key to everything: creation and transmutation . This intelligent field decides why a electron should remain in a particular orbit. The brahmAn (morphogenetic field) is the reason why a partially formed biological structure (the 'morphogentic germ\") gets attached to the morphogentic field of a species, which then guides the growth of the rest of the form.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">THERE ARE 108 ELEMENTS\u2014IF ONE ELECTRON JUMPS ITS ORBIT, THE ELEMENT CHANGES DRASTICALLY.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/perpetual-motion-of-orbiting-electrons.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">SANATANA DHARMA IS SO PROFOUND , THAT IN THE YEAR 2017, NOBODY HAS EVEN UNDERSTOOD 1% OF IT</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">FUCK OFF YOU WHITE CUNTS.. YOU JUST CANT UNDERSTAND THE DEPTH AND GLORY OF SANATANA DHARMA. WE DONT CARE IF YOU CALL A HINDU A HEATHEN SAVAGE ANYMORE.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">..</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">September 10, 2017 at 10:27 AM<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">AFTER SEEING THIS PLANET FOR 40 YEARS --I SAY\nTHAT ALMOST ALL BUDDHIST NATIONS ARE DECADENT, DEBAUCHED AND VIOLENT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE DONT WANT AMARTYA SEN TO BE PART OF\nNALANDA UNIVERSITY EVER AGAIN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">http://www.hindustantimes.com/books/the-case-for-dissidence/story-d8kEUHoVATNoHOlJZ6MoxO.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">OUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT PROTECT DESH\nDROHIS. OUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW EXCESSIVE FREEDOM OF SPEECH TO DESH\nDROHI FOREIGNERS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">NALANDA UNIVERSITY IS A DEN WHERE THEY BREED\nANTI-NATIONALS. THEY HAVE A COLLEGIUM SYSTEM FOR FOREIGN PROFESSORS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN ANCIENT DAYS EVERY PROFESSOR OF NALANDA\nUNIVERSITY WERE KERALA NAMBOODIRIS. ARYABHATTA ( ARYAN BHATTTHIRIPAD ) WAS ONE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">NAMBOODIRIS WERE THE SANSKRIT SPEAKING LAYER\nOF THE THIYYAS OF KERALA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE CREAMY LAYER OF NAMBODIRIS WERE MATH\nEXPERTS AND THESE KODUNGALUR UNIVERSITY TEACHERS , WERE PROFESSORS AT TAXILA,\nNALNDA, SARASWATI DHAR , WERE CALLED BHATTATHIRIPPADS...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Aryabhatta born in Kerala ( my home state )\nin 2700 BC, was one of the early members of this school. Aryabhatta was the\nfirst to calculate Pi of 3.1416 and the solar year of 365.358 days . He\npropounded a heliocentric universe 4200 years before Copernicus, with\nelliptically orbiting planets and a spherical earth spinning on its axis\nexplaining the motion of the heavens. He was the father of plane / spherical\nTrigonometry and Algebra, when Europe was in the dark ages.. Today you don't\nsee this pioneers name in the list of top 100 mathematicians.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Aryabhatta was the first to compute the\ncircumference of the earth, with an error of just 64 miles.. Aryabhatta gave a\nmethod to find the cube root of numbers and dealt with arithmetic,geometric and\nindeterminate equations in algebra. He dealt with square, cube, triangle,\ntrapezium, circle and sphere in geometry. He was called Arjehir by the Arabs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Poor Galileo did a Aryabhatta 4 millenuims\nyears later , that the earth is round and circles the sun , and the church\nblinded him , so that he can never look into another telescope .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Nalanda University was inaugurated in Rajgir\nin Bihar in November 2010, to revive the ancient legacy of higher education in\nNalanda and the glorious tradition of Buddhist education ( SIC ) in the\ncountry.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">SO DHAMMA AND KAMMA AND \"SANGAM SHARANAM\nGACHCHAMI \" IS CALLED EDUCATION ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">BALLS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Italian waitress placed the rabidly\nanti-Hindu Nobel laureate Professor Amartya Sen ( with a Rothschild wife ) as\nthe chairman of the Nalanda Mentor group.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">NALANDA UNIVERSITY IS WORSE THAN JNU / JU /\nFTII WHEN IT COMES TO BREEDING ANTI-NATIOANALS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">EMPEROR ASHOKA WHO CONVERTED FROM BAAAAAD\nHINDUSIM TO GOOOOOOD BUDDHISMA WAS CREATED AND BACKDATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD.\nASHOKA NEVER EXISTED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The famous Chinese pilgrim, Xuanzang (Hiuen\nTsang), who was in India between 630 and 644, visited what Nalanda University .\nWhat he did NOT know that SUNK universities Kodungallur and Saraswati Dhar are\nolder that Taxila and Nalanda. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">WE WANT THE BHARAT RATNA AWARD TO AMARTYA SEN\nTO BE REVOKED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/vedic-hindu-fire-temple-of-baku.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">BHOJ SHALA SARASWATI TEMPLE AT DHAR IS NOW A\nMOSQUE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">kodungallur university was connected with\nkodungallur temple. this ancient bhagawati ( devi/ durga/ kali/ parvati )\ntemple was desecrated last year too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/kodungallur-bharani-festival-capt-ajit.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vararuchi taught KATAPAYADI SYSTEM at the\nancient Bhojsala university <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vararuchi, the great Kerala hero was named by\nthe British historians as one of the 9 gems of Emperor Vikramaditya . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">This is nonsense. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vararuchi was Raja Bhoj\u2019s religious and Vedic\nknowledge minister in 2800 BC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vararuchi from whom Varahamihira drew\ninspiration -- the founder of Kerala system of Astrology, whose work Chandra\nVakyas, and Kapatayadi system of counting is well documented. Vararuchi lived\n200 years before Varahamihira ( Mihir Muni 2660 BC ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vararuchi was a Mathematician from Kerala who\ntaught at Bhoj Shala University inside the Saraswati Temple in 2860 BC . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">There was a large wheel depicted on the wall\non which were written many verses . These were all on Vyaakarana ( grammar ) .\nThe entire Vyaakarana Shastra had been written in verse and charted in the form\nof a wheel . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">A mere glance at the giant wheel would make\nSanskrit Vyaakarana ( grammar ) clear . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Katapa yati is devised by the Kerala hero\nVararuchi who wrote the appendices to the vedas called \u015aulbas\u016btras . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Planetary positions were encoded in Ka\u1e6dapay\u0101di\nsystem. Paralperu depict letters to numerals so as to make memorising easy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Assigning more than one letter to one numeral\nand nullifying certain other letters as valueless, this system provides the\nflexibility in forming meaningful words out of numbers which can be easily\nremembered.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">nany\u0101vaca\u015bca \u015b\u016bny\u0101ni sa\u1e43khy\u0101\u1e25 ka\u1e6dapay\u0101daya\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">mi\u015bre t\u016bp\u0101ntyahal sa\u1e43khy\u0101 na ca cintyo\nhalasvara\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Translation: Vowels na , nya and a represent\nzero. The (nine) integers are represented by consonant group beginning with ka,\n\u1e6da, pa, ya. In a conjunct consonant, the last of the consonants alone will\ncount. A consonant without vowel is to be ignored.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Malayalam consonants are used in the Ka\u1e6dapay\u0101di\nSystem,( Calculus Guru Madhava's sine table).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u015bloka for the value of pi (\u03c0)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">an\u016bnan\u016bnn\u0101nananunnanityai<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ssm\u0101hat\u0101\u015bcakra kal\u0101vibhakto\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ca\u1e47\u1e0d\u0101\u1e43\u015bucandr\u0101dhamaku\u1e43bhip\u0101lair<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">vy\u0101sastadarddha\u1e43 tribhamaurvika sy\u0101t<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">It gives the circumference of a circle of\ndiameter, an\u016bnan\u016bnn\u0101nananunnanityai (10,000,000,000) as ca\u1e47\u1e0d\u0101\u1e43\u015bucandr\u0101dhamaku\u1e43bhip\u0101lair\n(31415926536)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">bhadr\u0101\u1e43buddhisiddhajanmaga\u1e47ita\u015braddh\u0101 sma yad\nbh\u016bpag\u012b\u1e25<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Reversing the digits to modern day usage of\ndescending order of decimal places, we get 314159265358979324 which is the\nvalue of pi (\u03c0) to 17 decimal places, except the last digit might be rounded\noff to 4.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The melakarta ragas of the Carnatic music is\nnamed so that the first two syllables of the name will give its number. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Example: Raga Dheerasankarabharanam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The katapayadi scheme associates dha9 and\nra2, hence the raga's melakarta number is 29 (92 reversed). Now 29 36, hence\nDheerasankarabharanam has Ma1. Divide 28 (1 less than 29)by 6, the quotient is\n4 and the remainder 4. Therefore, this raga has Ri2, Ga3 (quotient is 4) and\nDa2, Ni3 (remainder is 4). Therefore, this raga's scale is Sa Ri2 Ga3 Ma1 Pa\nDa2 Ni3 SA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Important dates were remembered by converting\nthem using Ka\u1e6dapay\u0101di system. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Narayaniyam, written by Melpathur Narayana\nBhattathiripad, ends with the line, \u0101yur\u0101rogyasaukhyam which means long-life,\nhealth and happiness. Value as per Ka\u1e6dapay\u0101di is 1712210<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The following verse compiled in Malayalam by\nKodu\u1e45\u1e45allur Ku\u00f1\u00f1ikku\u1e6d\u1e6dan Ta\u1e43pur\u0101n using Ka\u1e6dapay\u0101di is the number of days in the\nmonths of Gregorian Calendar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">alah\u0101re p\u0101lu nall\u016b, pularnn\u0101lo kalakkil\u0101\u1e43<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">ill\u0101 p\u0101lennu gop\u0101lan - \u0101\u1e43g\u1e37am\u0101sadina\u1e43 kram\u0101l<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Translation: Milk is best for breakfast, when\nit is morning, it should be stirred. But Gop\u0101lan says there is no milk - the\nnumber of days of English months in order.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Converting pairs of letters using Ka\u1e6dapay\u0101di\nyields - pala is 31, h\u0101re is 28, p\u0101lu = 31, nall\u016b is 30, pular is 31, nn\u0101lo is\n30, kala is 31, kkil\u0101\u1e43 is 31, ill\u0101 is 30, p\u0101le is 31, nnu go is 30, p\u0101lan is\n31.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Chowalloor Siva Kshethra or Mahadeva\nTemple, is about 20 minutes east of Guruvayoor temple Kerala. The lingam there\nwas consecrated 6000 years ago by Lord Parashurama. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">This is the only temple where both Siva and\nShakti are in the Sri Kovil ( Garbha Gudi ). The idol of Lord Shiva faces the\nwest, the idol of his wife, Parvati faces the east. At the entrance of the\ntemple, an image of Thiruvambadi Krishna is situated in a shrine.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Maharishi Varahamihira ( Mihira muni ) was\ninspired by Maharishsi Vararuchi from Kerala. Vararuchi is the founder of the\nmodern Kerala system of Astrology, whose work Chandra Vakyas, and Kapatayadi\nsystem of counting is well documented. Vararuchi lived 200 years before\nVarahamihira.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">Capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; HE ALSO OWNED ALL THE LAND.<br />\n<br />\nTHE YOUNGER BROTHERS OF THE ELDEST NAMBOODIRI WERE NOT ALLOWED TO MARRY.<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WERE ALLOWED TO HAVE RAMPANT SEX WITH ANYBODY THEY FANCIED -- A CUSTOM KNOWN AS SAMBANDHAM<br />\n<br />\nTHESE YOUNGER BROTHERS BORE NO RESPONSIBILITY FOR THE CHILDREN THEY PRODUCED -- THE NAIRS<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/10/worst-racists-on-planet-earth-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nPARASHURAMA HAD TWO BONAFIDE MOTIVES<br />\n<br />\n1) PREVENT SUBDIVISION AND FRAGMENTATION OF FERTILE LANDS ( WHICH IS INDIAs BIGGEST PROBLEM SINCE INDEPENDENCE )<br />\n<br />\n2) NAMBOODIRIS HELD THE ORIGINALS 4 VEDAS AND 108 UPANISHADS PENNED DOWN IN 5000 BC AFTER 330 VENTURIES ON ORAL ROUTE -- AND ONLY NAMBOODIRIS KNEW ORAL VERIFICATION BY GHANA . THEY NEED TO BE EMPOWERED .<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS AND UPANISHADS REMAINED IN KERALA FROM 4000 BC TO 2000 BC.<br />\n<br />\nIN 2000 BC A NAMBOODIRI NAMED ADI SHANKARACHARYA FELT THAT HIS CLAN WERE TOO ARROGANT AND SEXUALLY DEBAUCHED . HE DISTRIBUTED THE 4 VEDAS TO THE 4 CORNERS OF INDIA FORMING 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS . HOWEVER HE DECIDED THAT ONLY A NAMBOODIRI CAN BE THE PONTIFF.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN ROTHSCHILD RULED INDIA, HE CREATED HUNDREDS OF FAKE MUTTS AND BACKDATED IT. HE REPLACED THE NAMBOODIRI PONTIFFS WITH DESH DROHI AGENTS OF HIS CHOICE .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/01/my-visit-to-sringeri-mutt-exhuming.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/kanchi-mutt-creation-of-white-invader.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/6000-year-old-kedarnath-temple-highest.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/kudajadri-mountain-chitramoola-cave-adi.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c92924556694101292\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_131M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; His younger brothers were supposed&nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\">to practice pure \"Brahmacharyam\" by being unmarried and to dedicate themselves to preserve Vedams and rituals</span>. The first five are: Ahimsa (non-violence), Satya (truthfulness), Brahmacharya (celibacy in thought, word and deed), Asteya (non-stealing) and Aparigraha (non-covetousness). These constitute Yama or self-restraint. The other five virtues are: Saucha (internal and external purity), Santosha (contentment), Tapas (austerity), Svadhyaya (study of scriptures or recitation of Mantra) and Isvarpranidhana (consecration of the fruits of all works to the Lord). These constitute Niyama or religious observance.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe most foul thing done was to encourage married men in Grihasta stage to practice Brahmacharya by sexual continence. It represents a virtuous lifestyle that also includes simple living, meditation and other behaviors.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBrahmacharyam means an overall lifestyle conducive to the pursuit of sacred knowledge and spiritual liberation. Brahmacharya is a means, not an end. It usually includes cleanliness, ahimsa, simple living, studies, meditation, and voluntary restraints on certain foods, intoxicants, and behaviors-(including sexual behavior.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nQUOTE : Now what people call yajna (sacrifice) is really Brahmacharya, for only by means of Brahmacharya does the knower attain that world (of Brahman). And what people call Ishta (worship) is really Brahmacharya, for only worshipping by means of Brahmacarya does one attain the Atman (the liberated Self).</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNow, what people call the Sattrayana (sacrificial session) is really Brahmacharya, for only by means of Brahmacharya does one obtain one's salvation from Sat (Being). And what people call the Mauna (vow of silence) is really Brahmacharya for only through Brahmacharya does one understand the Atman and then meditate.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nNow, what people call a Anasakayana (vow of fasting) is really Brahmacharya, for this Atman never perishes which one attains by means of Brahmacharya. And what people call the Aranyayana (life of a hermit) is really Brahmacharya, for the world of Brahman belongs to those who by means of Brahmacharya attain the seas Ara and Nya in the world of Brahman. For them there is freedom in all the worlds.\u201d \u2014\u2009Chandogya Upanishad, VIII.5.1 - VIII.5. 5000 BC. It refers to the second phase of an man\u2019s life in a four age-based stages of the Hindu ashram system.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">IN SANATANA DHARMA NO MAN CAN DO A HOMAM ( YAJNA ) WHEN HE IS IN THE BRAHMACHARYA STAGE .</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">ONLY A MAN WHO IS MARRIED AND HAS CHILDREN CAN DO A YAJNA.</span></b></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHIS HAS BEEN SUBVERTED BY THE WHITE INVADER AND TODAY WE FIND FAKE GURUS ( MOSTLY HOMOSEXUALS ) GIVING BULL THAT SAGES MUST BE UNMARRIED, LIKE SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nALL OUR ANCIENT MAHARISHIS WERE MARRIED WITH CHILDREN. IF YOU FIND ANY LITERATURE THAT A MAHARISHI WAS UNMARRIED , IT IS POISON INJECTED.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHERE IS NO PLACE FOR HOMOSEXUALS IN THE SPIRITUAL LIFE OF SANATANA DHARMA .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN ANCIENT INDIAN LITERATURE YOU DO NOT FIND ANY MENTION OF HOMOSEXUALS , DUE TO OUR Y CHROMOSOME PRESERVING GOTRA SYSTEM</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBARREN WOMEN AND UNMARRIED CHILDLESS MEN DO NOT MAKE GOOD RULERS OR SPIRITUAL LEADERS \u2014AS PER SANATANA DHARMA.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSanatana Dharma gives utmost importance to GRIHASTA stage .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSanatana Dharma has recognized the psychological problems associated with barren women/ unmarried men ruling a kingdom or being spiritual leaders. It is about a personal stake in the future.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA major portion of DHARMA is carried out in the Grihasta stage -- where you are creative and do your DUTY for good of society and nation ( age 25 to age 50 ). This is the period when a man demonstrates SELF RESTRAINT .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWhen the scriptural studies appropriate to the student have been completed, and he has received blessings of his Guru, let him enter into the order of the Grihastha (householder). Let him pursue and obtain, by ethical ways, home, wife, children and wealth, discharge to the best of his ability the duties of his life's stage.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u2014\u2009Vishnu Purana, 3.IX.1 - 3.IX.31 5000 BC</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 4</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_127MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_127BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_127B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_128B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5120410332635961364\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_128M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/champion-race-horse-vadakayil-great.html?showComment=1505536262977#c5120410332635961364\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 16, 2017 at 10:01 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_128MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3-<br />\n<br />\nIT IS THE LYING WHITE INVADER WHO MADE PRESERVATION OF SEMEN , AND BEING UNMARRIED AS A GREAT QUALIFICATION IN HINDUISM \u2013 SANATANA DHARMA BANS IT . .<br />\n<br />\nPRESERVATION OF SEMEN IS ALLOWED ONLY IN THE VANAPRASTA ( 50 TO 75 AGE \u2013 OPTIONAL , DEPENDS IF HIS WIFE IS WITH HIM ) AND SANYASA ASHRAM ( 75 TILL DEATH \u2013COMPULSORY ).<br />\n<br />\nIN GRIHASTA STAGE THE MAN IS NOT ALLOWED TO HAVE SEX WITH ANY WOMAN WHO COMES HIS WAY , LIKE HOW THE NAMBOODIRIS DID IN KERALA ( SAMBANDHAM ) .<br />\n<br />\nHE CAN HAVE SEX ONLY WITH HIS WIFE AND CONTINUING HIS LINEAGE IS PART OF HIS DHARMA .<br />\n<br />\nThe 7000 year old Vedas lay down that dharma performed by a man alone without his wife is no dharma and will yield no fruit whatsoever. Such is the paramount nature of Grihasta ashrama.<br />\n<br />\nThe Vedas hold marriage to be one of the important sacraments sanctifying the body. That is why; marriage is given great importance by the Hindus.<br />\n<br />\nIt is said, \u201cThat man who does not win a wife is really half, and he is not the full man as long as he does not beget an offspring.\u201d A wife is also hailed as\u201d the very source of the Purusharthas, not Only of Dharma, Artha and Kama but even of Moksha.\u2019<br />\n<br />\nEvery Hindu god had his wife almost as a part of him, not as a shadow.<br />\n<br />\nShiva is powerless without Shakti.<br />\n<br />\nMarriage in Sanatana Dharma is NOT for sexual pleasure.<br />\n<br />\nEvery Hindus man is compulsorily expected to undergo the \u201cvivaha samskara\u201d and run a family (kutumba). Never mind what FREEMASON and Jew Rothschild\u2019s UNMARRIED Vivekananda said .<br />\n<br />\nVedas ordain that dharma must be practiced by man together with his wife.<br />\n<br />\nIn Sanatana Dharma, marriage is a religious duty, and not a civil contract. It is regarded as one of the most sacred of the sacraments symbolizing the holy and indissoluble union of a couple who thereafter are mutually dependent and indispensable in the performance of religious duties.<br />\n<br />\nProgeny instrumental to cementing a relationship and for bliss.<br />\n<br />\nManu Smriti clearly states that \u201che is a perfect man, who consists of his wife, himself and his offspring.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nVedas have enjoined that dharma must be observed by man together with his wife. No yagna performed or pilgrimages undertaken will have any effect, if the wife is not a partner in those holy duties during the grihasta and vanaprasta ashramas. During Sanyasa the man can go for pilgrimage on his own.<br />\n<br />\nThe early shastras permit unmarried girls to take the whole responsibility upon themselves of choosing their life-mates and enter into wedlock with them. They need to wait for three years only after puberty for some responsible elder to arrange for their marriage, but no more.<br />\n<br />\nIn Sanatana Dharma marriages are made in heaven , NOT by LIVING IN TOGETHER ( like in the west ) and examining if the wife can indeed give him a good blow job whenever he wants it\u2014<br />\n<br />\n--or vice versa--<br />\n<br />\nif the husband can use his tongue power on her fungi affected , smelling like putrid fish part whenever she wishes .<br />\n<br />\nMy own marriage was arranged.<br />\n<br />\nMy elder son\u2019s marriage was arranged<br />\n<br />\nIN OUR FAMILY THERE HAS NEVER EVER BEEN CAESARIAN BIRTHS \u2013THOUGH INDIA WAS THE FIRST TO DO THIS SURGICAL PROCEDURE<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS ROTHSCHILD MEDIA AND HISTORIANS WHO GAVE UNWARRANTED PROPAGANDA FOR UNMARRIED HINDU GURUS ( I AM SURE YOU KNOW WHO THEY ARE ) .<br />\n<br />\nA LOT OF THESE UNMARRIED FAKE GURUS WERE CRYPTO JEW HOMOSEXUALS - -- OR JUST FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS OF THE WHITE INVADER - THEY ARE HEROES IN YOUR NCERT TEXT BOOKS .<br />\n<br />\nIt is the white invader who wrote lies that Hindus ill treat women and suppress them. Nothing is further from the truth.<br />\n<br />\nWomen were NOT expected to be part of the relay chain which conveyed Vedas and Upanishads by oral route for 30 millenniums before they were penned down in 5000 BC and it was too tedious and a full time job.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 5-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_128MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_128BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_128B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_129B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2913778204668641951\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_129M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/12435979452878916185\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Srini</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2014/09/navratri-festival-durga-puja-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1505884010622#c7455938261118256968\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 20, 2017 at 10:36 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_242MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Capt. Ajit,<br />\n<br />\nGreetings! Happy Navarathri to you and your family.<br />\n<br />\nThe elucidation on the cosmic significance of Gayathri Mantra has left me spellbound. As a Hindu, I understood the explanation given by the Pujari, when I was initiated into my rite of passage - Upanayana. Now I realise, after reading your syllable translation and the cosmic significance, how little I understood. I literally have goose pimples, my hair stood at end. Wow! Sir, many salutations to you.<br />\n<br />\nMy wife has been always observing Navarathri and other festivals in the utmost traditional manner. I will share this post with her, she would be thrilled. Your posts on Vrat, Navarathri and significance of fasting has steeled my resolve to wring out the old and ring in the new, during this Navarathri. I seek your best wishes in this journey. I will test for myself the power of Vrat and human intention to aid someone dear to me, who is in distress.<br />\n<br />\nI have certain queries related to this post. My apologies if you have already covered this elsewhere.<br />\na)What is the \u2018cosmic event\u2019 signifying the 9 days followed by Vijayadashami \u2013 both on the macro and micro scale?<br />\nb)As you mentioned: i) Life on Earth is under the rule of vast cosmic forces that originate from the stars. ii) Sapta Rishis are cosmic allegories.<br />\nFor example, how should I interpret Maharishi Agastya\u2019s invocation of \u2018Aditya Hridayam\u2019 to Sri Rama, on the battlefield \u2013 in the cosmic sense? Did Sri Rama pray to the Sapta Rishis and the hymn was the answer he received from the cosmos?<br />\nc)In many pictures, our Gods and Rishis have been depicted seated on deer or tiger skins. Is there any special significance of these?<br />\n<br />\nI have hardly completed 10% of your posts on Sanathana Dharma. You are truly trying to impart an ocean of knowledge to all of us who haven't understood the significance of Hinduism - our way of life. Kudos to you and much appreciation to your supporting family. God Bless.<br />\n<br />\nRegards,<br />\n<br />\nSrini</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_242BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">CONTINUED TO 2--</span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_1B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><br /><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8396341232119134273\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_22.html?showComment=1506149219775#c8396341232119134273\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 23, 2017 at 12:16 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\nHaving a normal level of CO2 in the lungs and arterial blood (40 mm Hg or about 5.3% at sea level) is imperative for normal health.Hypocapnia (CO2 deficiency) in the lungs and, in most cases, arterial blood is a normal finding for chronic diseases due to prevalence of chronic hyperventilation among the sick.<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation naturally promotes inflammatory health problems and CO2 and Earthing (electrical grounding the human body) are the key anti-inflammatory agents.<br />\n<br />\nDuring hyperventilation the rate of removal of carbon dioxide from the blood is increased. As the partial pressure of carbon dioxide in the blood decreases, respiratory alkalosis, characterized by decreased acidity or increased alkalinity of the blood, ensues. In turn, alkalosis causes constriction of the small blood vessels that supply the brain. This causes reduction of Prana.<br />\n<br />\nCO2 levels rise to a certain point, it stimulates our body\u2019s chemical receptors (chemoreceptor). Chemoreceptor send signal to the respiratory center in the brainstem which trigger the breathing cycle.<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation is the most serious form of breathing deregulation.<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation desensitize the chemo-receptors. Such desensitization can reset the chemoreceptor to trigger breathing cycle at lower concentration of CO2, which can further increase respiratory rate.<br />\n<br />\nThe level our chemoreceptors should be triggered to breathe is about 40 mm Hg of arterial CO2. In an asthmatic it gets triggered only at 33 mm Hg of CO2.<br />\n<br />\nHyperventilation is caused by increased alveolar ventilation (exhalation of CO2) relative to metabolic carbon dioxide production, which results in hypocapnia (reduced CO2 levels in the blood). It is one of the most insidious and dangerous response to various stressors in daily lives.<br />\n<br />\nDeficit in CO2 levels can immediately trigger or exacerbate system-wide symptoms that involve physical and mental consequences of all kinds.<br />\n<br />\nGod has NOT declared CO2 as a BAAAAAD gas .<br />\n<br />\nCO2 increases cerebral blood flow (CBF) by 1 to 2 ml/100 g/minute per 1 mmHg of partial pressure of CO2.<br />\n<br />\nReduction of co2 levels to 20- 25 mmHg decreases CBF by 40 to 50% as a result of one minute of over breathing. This is mainly mediated by vasoconstriction of brain blood vessels.<br />\n<br />\nVasoconstriction not only reduces oxygen availability (hypoxia) but also reduces glucose levels (hypoglycemia). This can exacerbate deficits in cognitive, perceptual and motor functioning.<br />\n<br />\nTissue hypoxia along with hypoglycemia can affect our attention, concentration, imagination, performance and ability to perform complex tasks.<br />\n<br />\nLong-term vasoconstriction can result in reduced neurotransmitter synthesis and predisposes an individual to depression and other psychological problems<br />\n<br />\nDeficit in CO2 leads to reduction of carbonic acid and elevation of blood ph above 7.4 leading to respiratory alkalosis. Paradoxically, it can reduce oxygen availability (hypoxia) to the cells as hemoglobin doesn\u2019t release its oxygen readily in alkaline ph.<br />\n<br />\nAlkalosis can increase cellular excitability, increases oxygen demand, induces anaerobic metabolism and leads to antioxidant depletion.<br />\n<br />\nWhen cells get less oxygen they undergo anaerobic respiration. Tissue Hypoxia along with anaerobic respiration can enhance free radical generation.<br />\n<br />\nAlkalosis can increase migration of calcium ions from muscle tissues and increases likelihood of muscle spasms, fatigue and soreness. It can also lead to platelet aggregation and increases risk of blood clotting.<br />\n<br />\nHypocapnia (reduced CO2 levels in the blood) by increasing blood pH can significantly leads to magnesium deficiency.<br />\n<br />\nHypocapnia can affect magnesium-calcium ratio critical for healthy muscle functioning, which can lead to muscle spasms, pain, fatigue and soreness.<br />\n<br />\nAn illiterate rogue guru does NOT know that hyperventilation can reduce blood flow to the heart by more than 50%...Increased platelet aggregation as a result of hypocapnia can increase chances of blood clotting (thrombosis).<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_1MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_1BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_1B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_2B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5423313575162493446\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_2M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Optimization of CO2 levels through correct breathing techniques can instantly reduce levels of stress hormones, calm emotions, boost oxygen levels, gently massage internal organs, reduce inflammation, relax muscles, detox the body, improve pH and simply improve the overall efficiency of all organs.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />\n<br />\nDO YOU KNOW WHY PM MODI DELIBERATELY IGNORES MY BLOGPOSTS -- BECAUSE I DONT GIVE HIM HIS MUCH NEEDED EGO MASSAGE .<br />\n<br />\nHEY APCO MODI--YOU WILL EVER GET AN EGO MASSAGE FROM VADAKAYIL. BE ABUNDANTLY CLEAR ABOUT THIS.<br />\n<br />\nHERE IS JUST ONE PAGE FROM THE THOUSAND PAGES --ABOUT PRANA. &nbsp; &nbsp;SANATANA DHARMA AND PRANA IS INTERLINKED.<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6291778418229511920\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_28M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Pranayama involves techniques to redirect, tore and control prana-- and make the three and a half coiled snake of Kundalini wake up and HISSSS.<br />\n<br />\nPranayama is for beginners.<br />\n<br />\nSwara yoga is about highly technical and precise analysis of the breath and various pranic rhythms.<br />\n<br />\nShifting predominant breath nostril by hyperventilation for a very short time is a part of Swara Yoga.<br />\n<br />\nA swara yogi is the ultimate yogi. He knows how the sure way to charge the sperm of a polarity which can produce a male child. Among Nadis IDA is female while PINGALA is male<br />\n<br />\nHe can kill unnatural sexual desires like homosexuality.<br />\n<br />\nSwara Yoga yokes PRANA with the cosmic life force of AAKASHA ( Zero Point Field-ZPF ). SWAR etymologically means 'the sound of one's own breath'. YOG means 'union'.<br />\n<br />\nEach of the 108 elements has prana within --and hence prana is within inanimate objects too.<br />\n<br />\nThrough the practice of swara yoga, one can realize the breath as being the medium of the cosmic life force.ancient rishis or seers evolved a complete science around it .<br />\n<br />\nAncient Maharishis with 12 strand DNA studied the simple process of respiration made an esoteric science of of it to achieve supernormal powers called SIDDHIS .<br />\n<br />\nKirlean Cameras can record who is a Swara Yogi -some of these hermits come down from Himalayas for the Kumbh Mela -- NO they dont display their powers for limelight.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/kumbh-mela-mother-of-all-pilgrimages.html<br />\n<br />\nThe movement of prana can be controlled by finger tips ( no need for acupunture needles ) and HULLOOOOO by manipulation of the breath and human INTENTION<br />\n<br />\nIN ANCIENT DAYS ALL ASTROLOGERS OF KERALA WERE SWARA YOGIS. WE STILL USE COWRY SHELLS --THEY ARE RUSTLED FOR SCALAR FIELD BEFORE USE .<br />\n<br />\nTantra yoked with Yoga establishes neurological and psychic connections.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Brihadaranyaka Upanishad (2,1,19) penned down 7000 years ago, there is the metaphor of a spider sitting at the center of its web, issuing and reabsorbing its threads in concentric circles, all held at one point. This image recurs constantly in Indian Tantric works.<br />\n<br />\nEven the Mandala, which is a geometrical projection of the 'whole, universe in its essential plan, in its process of emanation and of re-absorption', has the same concept underlying it. All existence is governed by a single principle, the source from which everything is born and into which everything returns.<br />\n<br />\nIn the TV series HOUSE OF CARDS they show some Tibetan monks ( invited to the White House ) labouring for weeks to make a beautiful mandala with coloured powder and then one fine \"minute\" they destroy their own work.<br />\n<br />\nAll of nature has a rhythm, a natural rhythm that it goes by at the macrocosmic level . At a microcosmic level, this is reflected in our breath.<br />\n<br />\nA Swara Yogi knows Svarodaya (Swara + Udaya) Sastra - the act of breathing is called \"Swara\" while the switching over from one nostril to another reflects the \"Rise of breath\" in that nostril or \"Udaya \" meaning \"rise\" .<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_28BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; The Council of Ancyra denounces the worship of Goddess Artemis.<br />\n<br />\n324 The emperor Constantine declares Christianity as the only official religion of the Roman empire. In Dydima, Minor Asia, he sacks the Oracle of the god Apollo and tortures the pagan priests to death. He also evicts all non-Christian peoples from Mount Athos and destroys all the local Hellenic temples.<br />\n<br />\n326 Constantine, following the instructions of his mother Helen, destroys the temple of the god Asclepius in Aigeai of Cilicia and many temples of the goddess Aphrodite in Jerusalem, Aphaca, Mambre, Phoenice, <span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>Baalbek</b></span>, etc.<br />\nUNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nEVERY GLORIOUS STRUCTURE IN ROME AND AROUND WERE CREATED WITH HINDUS MONEY AND HINDU ARCHITECTS<br />\n<br />\nHAS ANYBODY EVER SEEN BAALBECK TEMPLE? IT WAS A HINDU TEMPLE IN LEBANON-- THE GREATEST ARCHITECTURAL STRUCTURE IN THE WEST OF INDIA<br />\n<br />\nBAAL WAS A PAGAN ( HINDU ) GOD--SHIVA<br />\n<br />\nWHEN KERALA NAMBOODIDIRIS CREATED JUDAISM, BAAL WAS THE SUPREME GOD WHICH WAS WORSHIPPED IN PALESTINE AND LEBANON<br />\n<br />\nBAAL WAS RUN DOWN BY JESUS CHRIST ( COOKED UP BY THE ROMAN EMPEROR IN 325 AD AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NISCEA )<br />\n<br />\nIn Matthew 12:27, Jesus calls Satan \u201cBeelzebub,\u201d linking the devil to Baal-Zebub<br />\n<br />\nThe Baalim of the Old Testament were nothing more than demons masquerading as gods, and all idolatry is ultimately devil-worship (1 Corinthians 10:20).<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE SEEN PETRA-- THE UPROOTED SHIVA LINGAM BASES ARE STILL THERE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/lost-civilization-of-petra-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBiblical references to baals associated with various places include: Baal Hazor, Baal Hermon, Baal Heon, Baal Peor, Baal Perazim, Baal Shalisha, Baal Tamar, Baal Zephon etc<br />\n<br />\nThe Bible considers that Israel's destruction by the Assyrian empire in 722 B.C and the later destruction of Judah by Babylon are both due to the failure to follow God's command to completely eliminate Baal worship and other Canaanite religious practices.<br />\n<br />\nDuring the English Puritan period, Baal was equated with Satan<br />\n<br />\nBiblical passages (I Kings, IX: 17-19) mention the name of King Solomon in connection with a place that was ancient Baalbek -- a Hindu temple in Lebanon<br />\n<br />\nJewish historians wrote that Solomon built Baalbek temple.. sorry , it existed hundreds of years before Solomon<br />\n<br />\nAlexander the Great went to see the temple of Baalbek. Greek historians call this place Heliopolis<br />\n<br />\nJulius Caesar settled a legion there and began construction of the great Temple of Jupiter. During the next three centuries, as emperors succeeded one another in the imperial capital of Rome, Heliopolis would be filled with the most massive religious buildings ever constructed in the far reaching Roman Empire. In those days Roman kings and senators were HINDU ( pagan ).<br />\n<br />\nTill 325 AD all Roman emperors were Hindu. Alexander the great was a Hindu.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</span><br />\n<br />\nEmperor Theodosius who converted to Christianity destroyed many significant buildings and statues, and constructed a basilica with stones from the Temple of Jupiter. This signaled the end of Roman Heliopolis.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px; text-align: left;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/nlp-blogpost-part-ten-reposted-capt.html?showComment=1506319788988#c5647530477432963944\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 25, 2017 at 11:39 AM</a></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-bottom: 8px;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 16px;\">In the year 634, Muslim armies entered Syria and besieged Baalbek. A mosque was built within the walls of the temple compound, which was itself converted into a citadel. Over the next several centuries, the city and region of Baalbek were controlled by various Islamic dynasties including the Umayyads, Abbasids and Fatamids as well as the Seljuk and Ottoman Turks.<br /><br />During these years, Baalbek was ravaged by the Tartars in 1260, Tamerlane in 1401 and was also shaken by numerous powerful earthquakes.<br /><br />The massive stones of the Grand Terrace of Baalbek are simply beyond the engineering abilities and it was built to Hindu VAASTU--like the Pyramids at Giza<br /><br />The ceilings have the Hindu LOTUS --India's national flower and the SIX pointed star , the merge of SHIVA and SHAKTI ( Purusha and Prakriti )<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</span><br /><br />The great stones of Baalbek show stylistic similarities to other cyclopean stone walls at verifiably pre-Roman sites such as the Acropolis foundation in Athens, the foundations of Myceneae, Tiryns, Delphi and even megalithic constructions in the \u2018new world\u2019 such as Ollyantaytambo in Peru and Tiahuanaco in Bolivia--all HINDU structures.<br /><br />LEBANON WAS A SPICE TRADE OUTPOST FOR THE CALLICUT KING ( LIKE MECCA OASIS AND PETRA )-- A FREE TRADE AREA AS WELL AS CUSTOMS OUTPOST . Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/09/nlp-blogpost-part-ten-reposted-capt.html?showComment=1506409171615#c7180695739300131479\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">September 26, 2017 at 12:29 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_72MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dvaita_Vedanta<br />\n<br />\nTamas and Rajas are opposing fields like positive and negative while Sattva is neutral. In Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas.7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe. No life is possible on earth without this subtle tension . What has a front has a back-- what has a beginning has an end. Sanatana dharma does not allow stagnancy. If stagnancy happens there will be PRALAYA ( dissolution of cosmos ).. Brahma / Vishnu / Shiva and their wives and children work in tandem and perfect harmony\u2014amazing cosmic allegories personalized as Hindu Gods. Like Padma Vibhushan holder Sri Sri Ravishankar tweeted , Shiva cannot anally FUCK Vishnu-- to producce Ayyappa ( the 9th avatar of Vishnu ) as they are NOT mortals. No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.Whatever is in excess gets reduces, whatever is deficient gets replenished.You must ponder over each waxing-waning cycle to appreciate the absolute truth . They keep each other in check, yet provide fuel to feed off each other.It is a perfect tango of dynamic balance where one polar opposite changes into another smoothly and constantly . If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. It is about the quantum possibility wave vibration between two poles-there is not an IOTA of superstition in Sanatana Dharma .<br />\n<br />\n##############<br />\n<br />\nCCC- THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SANKHYA VEDANTA.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/05/sankhya-philosophy-of-hinduism.html<br />\n<br />\nCHECK OUT THE NONSENSE IN WIKIPEDIA<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samkhya<br />\n<br />\nIN SANKHYA , THE PRIMORDAL TANTRIC FORCES ARE PURUSHA AND PRAKRITI. WE EQUATE THEM WITH SHIVA AND HIS WIFE SHAKTI. THESE FORCES HAVE TO COUPLE --THERE IS NO SEMEN OR SEX INVOLVED AS THESE ARE COSMIC FORCES. HERE WHEN THE INSENTIENT PRAKRITI ( FEMALE ) COMES IN CONTACT WITH THE SENTIENT PURUSHA ( MALE ) THE UNIVERSE EVOLVES . THIS INTELLIGENT CONCEPT CANNOT BE UNDERSTOOD BY HALF WITS. In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva and Shakti. Tantra is NOT perverted sex as made out to be by the white invader .Purusha is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Pragati as the embodiment of pure energy. Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves. The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. Shiva resides in the highest Sahasr\u0101ra Chakra and Shakti in the lowest M\u016bl\u0101dh\u0101ra Chakra. When Prakriti and Purusha unite in the Sahasr\u0101ra Chakra ( raising of Kundalini ) , knowledge, knower and the object of knowledge become one.<br />\n<br />\nIf Hinduism is the vast ocean, the rest all combined together is a drop of dirty water.<br />\n<br />\nI ASK MY READERS TO SPREAD THIS MESSAGE TO EVERY DESH BHAKT AND HINDU STALWART. SUPERMEN\nMAHARISHIS EXISTED ONLY IN THE HOLY LAND OF INDIA<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPRANA in Sanskrit and Malayalam means primal energy or\n\u201cvital force\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrana is the master form of all energy working at every\nlevel of our being. The entire cosmos is a manifestation of prana. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrana awakens the three and a half coils of kundalini\nshakti, with a HISSSSSS --- the serpent power or inner energy which transforms\nour consciousness, develops from awakened prana.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShiva and his wife Shakti are the characters in SANKHYA\nvedanta..From the unmanifest prana of pure awareness comes the manifest prana\nof creation, through which the entire universe comes into being. There is no\nSEMEN here.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe Pranamaya kosha (sheath made of breath) is the vital\nbody, composed of five aspects of prana called vayus. I have written about it\nbefore.. This KOSHA mediates between the physical body on one side and the\nthree sheaths of the mind (outer mind, intelligence, and inner mind) on the\nother. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPranamaya Kosha mediates between the five gross elements and\nthe five sensory impressions. . It provides us with enthusiasm and motivation\nfor all we do.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nI had also written about the VAYUS-- like Prana Vayu , Apana\nVayu , Udana Vayu, Samana Vayu , Vyana Vayu etc before<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPrana brings in the fuel, samana converts this fuel to\nenergy, and vyana circulates the energy to various worksites. Apana disposes of\nthe waste products produced by the conversion process. Udana manages the energy\nthus created, enabling the machine to function effectively. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBreathing is the main form of pranic activity in the body.\nHe who masters BREATH is the true Yogi. I have NOT talked about this is my 2\npart yoga series--as this is advanced level<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/01/yoga-only-complete-exercise-part-2-capt.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nOn a psychological level, prana governs our receptivity to\npositive sources of nourishment, feeling, and knowledge through the mind and\nsenses. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAs we practice yoga, the subtle aspects of these pranas\nbegin to awaken.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe Vedas say that mortals eat food with apana, while the\ngods eat food with prana. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nRegular alternate nostril breathing is the most important\nmethod for keeping our pranas or energies in balance<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/pranayama-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNadi shodhana (alternate nostril breathing), helps balance\nright and left prana currents. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe body and all its channels have a right or left\npredominance. We must learn to be open to and welcome this greater force and\nseek to bring it more fully into our life and actions.
