, &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0938\u0924\u094a\u092c\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0941\u092e\u0938\u0924\u093f</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0928\u093f\u0930\u0935\u093f\u0928\u094d\u0926\u0928\u094d\u0939\u0943\u0926\u093f</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092a\u094d\u0930\u0924\u0940\u0937\u094d\u092f\u093e</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0915\u0935\u092f\u094a</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u092e\u0928\u0940\u0937\u093e</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\">\u0965\u096a\u0965</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nkamastadagre samavartatadhi | manaso retah prathamam yadasit\n|<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nsato bandhumasati niravindanna | hrudi pratishya kavayo\nmanisha || 4 ||<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn the great cosmic mind all pervading<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nVibrations of Kama sprout from conscious thought<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe seers who have searched within with wisdom<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHave witnessed the conscious equation between matter and\nenergy<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe video below is understood in the 7000 year old Vedas- if\nyou are NOT shocked you have NOT understood it . This is the reason why all\nQuantum physicists including Einstein desired to be cremated as Hindus.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\narthashrayatvam shabdasya<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ndrashtur lingatvam eva ca<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ntan-matratvam ca nabhaso<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nlakshanam kavayo viduh-- SRIMAD BHAGAVATAM 3.26.33 --5000 BC\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n\"Persons who are learned and who have true knowledge\ndefine sound as that which conveys the idea of an object, indicates the\npresence of a speaker and constitutes the subtle form of ether\"<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSound is not just the vibration created by the meeting of\ntwo objects. Sound is that which conveys the idea of an object. The exact word\nused in this connection is \"artha-ashraya\" or \"the shelter of\nthe meaning\". In the Vedic conception the aksharas (letters) are bijas, or\nseeds of existence. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe audible sound is categorized into 54 alphabets of\nSanskrit/ Malayalam--the triple intersections of the Sri Yantra divine\ngeometry.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nIn the Tantras the aksharas are traced back to their\nmaterial source level which is a particular deity of Shakti. Each of her stages\nof manifestation are phases in the evolution of the universe. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE WHITE INVADER HAS REDUCED TANTRA TO PERVERTED ANAL SEX.\nALL OF TANTRA ARE SRUTIS--IN THE FORM OF AMAZING CONVERSATIONS BETWEEN PURUSHA\nAND PRAKRITI ( SHIVA AND HIS WIFE SHAKTI ) ABOUT CREATION OF THE COSMOS AT\nMACRO AND MICRO LEVELS.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTantra affirms that the creative force of the universe\nresides in all the 54 letters of the alphabet. The different letters symbolize\nthe different functions of that creative force, and their totality is\ndesignated as matrika or the \"mother in essence\".<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTantra sees the mantras as not just a mere combination of\nwhimsical sounds but as the subtle form of the presiding deity; and the real\npurpose of one\u2019s meditation through the mantra is to communicate with the deity\nof that particular mantra.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nA KOSHER IDIOT NAMED NOAM CHOMSKY TRIED TO MAKE LINGUISTICS\nIN ENGLISH TO MATCH SANSKRIT MANTRAS -- WHAT A CUNT !<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe Shiva-Shakti dance generated a rhythmic spiritual sound\nwhich the Vedic Rishis termed as NADA BRAHMAN, the initial primordial sound of\nextremely high frequencies that were beyond one\u2019s imagination. The union of two\ntriangles is the six pointed star --stolen by Jews<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nYogakundalyupanishad III.18-19 ( 5000 bc ) says that sound\nsprouts in Par\u0101 (supreme) form, it becomes two-leafed (that is first\nmanifested) in Pashyanti (radiant) form, buds in the Madhyama (subliminal) form\nand blooms in Vaikhari (acoustic) form; sound thus produced will become\nunmanifested, when the order is reversed. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShabda Brahman is the source of sound and is in the form of\nsound which is unmanifest, therefore it is called PARA. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSANATANA SHARMA IS ROOTED IN SOUND<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED TO 4-<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nReplyDelete<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nReplies<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCapt. Ajit VadakayilSeptember 27, 2017 at 8:13 PM<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nCONTINUED FROM 3---<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nShabda brahmAn manifests through his power of maya first as\npara vani in the mooladhara chakra at the perineum, then as pashyanti in the\nmanipura chakra at the navel, next as madhyama in the heart and then eventually\nas vaikhari in the throat and mouth. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe first three are internal and yogic and can be\nexperienced only by seers. The fourth stage is Vaikhari is the audible speech,\nwhich is used by all human beings.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThese states of consciousness correspond with the four\nstates known technically as Jagrat, Svapna, Sushupti, and Turiya - or the\nwakeful state, the dreaming state, the dreamless state, and the transcendental\nstate.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/beyond-theta-state-to-turiya-capt-ajit.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPara-vak is also known as \"rava-shabda\" - an\nunvibratory condition of sound beyond the reach of mind and intelligence\n(avyakta), only to be realized by great souls, the 12 strand maharishis,\nparama-jnanis.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPara is pure intention. Pure because it is a direct\nexpression of the will of reality, unadulterated by any personal preference.\nPara means transcendental, \u2018beyond\u2019 or \u2018the other side\u2019. It is beyond the reach\nof the indriyas, or sense organs, and the mind and other means of cognition. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nHence para nada is the transcendental sound. It is\nindicative of a truth that there is a sphere of super-consciousness where the\nsound is heard in different dimensions<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWE HINDUS BREAK COCONUTS WITH INTENTION --SHAMELESSY LIFTED\nBY LYNNE MC TAGGART WITHOUT GIVING CREDIT. HER BOOKS \"THE INTENTION\nEXPERIMENT\" AND \"THE FIELD \" ARE 100% LIFTED FROM SANATANA\nDHARMA. <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/vedic-quantum-intention-experiment.html<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPRANA is the connecting link between the body and the mind.\nThe body and the mind have no direct connection. They are connected through\nPrana alone.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE TRAILER --CHAATNE KE VAASTE IS OVER!<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 1px 1px 5px; max-width: 36px; padding: 5px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1301834754903074033\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_65M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. SOMEONE WANTED ONE SINGLE SOLID PROOF WHICH IS TANGIBLE.<br />\n<br />\nCONSIDER THIS<br />\n<br />\n#######################<br />\n<br />\nAT SEA ON CHEMICAL TANKERS,&nbsp; SAILORS WERE FORCED TO SPRAY METHANOL INSIDE CARGO TANKS.&nbsp; &nbsp;THE WHOLE IDEA WAS TO USE THE TEST MEDIUM WHICH IS USED TO DO WALL WASH AND CHEAT AND PASS TANKS.<br />\n<br />\nIN THE \"SAFETY OF LIFE AT SEA\" ( SOLAS )&nbsp; &nbsp;RULES THERE IS A PASSAGE ON \"<b><span style=\"color: red;\">LUNG DEMAND TIME</span></b>\" WHICH HAS BEEN KOSHER WHITE WASHED AS \"&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WORKING TIME</span></b>\" IN THE PROSE<br />\n<br />\nNO REGULATION ALLOWS SAILORS TO GO DOWN INTO TANKS AND SPRAY METHANOL .<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/airline-breathing-apparatus-on-chemical.html</span><br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: By the way NO regulation allows methanol spray with SCBA IBC sets. IBC sets are not for working in the literal sense. \" Working time \" relates to \"lung demand\" of free air, which is 10 litres / min for rest, 30 litres/ min for light work and 100 litres / min for strain of fireman's lift.&nbsp; &nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Fill up a form in capital does NOT mean you have to take a flight to the capital city of your country.</span></b>&nbsp; &nbsp;SCBA sets are for emergencies and must be donned by two sailors. UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nON CHEMICAL TANKERS WE ARE GIVEN SPARE SCBA SETS CALLED IBC SETS FOR METHANOL SPRAYING ..<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/scba-self-contained-breathing-apparatus.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMETHANOL SPRAY IS JUST CHEATING YOURSELF.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/methanol-spray-on-chemical-tankers-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nQUOTE: In the IBC code , \" working time \" has been erroneously read by vested interests as&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">official sanction</span></b>&nbsp;to do routine WORK inside chemical cargo tanks. IT IS NOT SO. \" WORKING TIME \" IS TO BE READ AS \" LUNG DEMAND TIME \" -- WHICH IS 100 LITRES OF FREE AIR A MINUTE FOR STRAIN ( OF FIREMANS LIFT RESCUE) , 30 LITRES A MINUTE FOR LIGHT ACTIVITY , AND 10 LITRES A MINUTE WHILE AT REST---UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nONLY CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL HAD THE BALLS AND THE PERCEPTION TO SPELL OUT A KOSHER LIE..<br />\n<br />\nTODAY VADAKAYILs WALL WASH METHOD IS USED ALL OVER THE GLOBE.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/02/wall-wash-method-chemical-tankers-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE WORLD RUNS ON LIES.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the physical body we have two types of energies. One is prana and the other is consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In every organ of the body there should be two channels supplying energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Modern physiology ( which lifted from Vedas ) describes two types of nervous systems - the sympathetic and the parasympathetic, and these two nervous systems are interconnected in each and every organ of the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">As per Tantra prana originates in pingala nadi. . Within the framework of the spinal cord, there are three channels known as nadis in yoga. One is called ida, another is pingala and the third is sushumna. Ida nadi represents the mental energy, pingala represents prana or pranic energy and sushumna represents spirit or spiritual awareness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">These three nadis originate in mooladhara chakra, which is situated at the perineum or cervix. Pingala nadi flows to the right from mooladhara and continues to cross ida at each chakra all the way up to ajna. Pingala nadi is the distributing channel for prana in the body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The inner prana is stimulated by the practice of pranayama. For meditation, the brain needs an increased supply. This is why Pranayama precedes meditation..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Kumbhaka, retention of breath, is the actual definition of pranayama. Inhalation and exhalation are just a process.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">AGAIN SRI SRI RAVISHANKARs HYPERVENTILATION ( SOHUM / SUDARSHAN KRIYA) LEAKS PRANA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Through unconscious breathing we cannot supply the brain with sufficient prana for its evolution and growth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Before meditation pranayama should be practised in coordination with specific bandhas. The three bandhas which are incorporated into the practice of pranayama are jalandhara bandha, uddiyana bandha and moola bandha. I have explained it before in great detail.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Through pranayama you generate prana in the lower region of the body, then in order to conduct it up to the brain you must first practise moola bandha, then uddiyana bandha and finally jalandhara bandha.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Moola bandha is contraction of the perineum, uddiyana bandha is contraction of the abdominal muscles and jalandhara bandha is the locking of the chin against the sternum. Prana is then conducted to the brain with the help of the subtle circulatory system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The bandhas function as energy locks to direct prana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MOOLADHARA BANDHANA IS IN THE CONTROL OF LORD GANESHA .. THAT MORON ZAKIR NAIK THINKS GANESHA IS A CARTOON CHARACTER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">By locking or contracting certain muscles on the physical level a subtle process of \u2018unlocking\u2019 goes on simultaneously on physical, mental and pranic levels and within the psychic and causal bodies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/12/awakening-and-raising-kundalini-after.html<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/chakra-vortex-scalar-energy-transciever.html</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Contracting or squeezing of muscles groups form three main groups: perineal muscles, abdominal muscles and cervical muscles. Contraction of these specific muscles affects the nervous, circulatory, respiratory, endocrine and energy systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In yogic language, these granthis prevent the flow of prana into the main pranic passage of the body \u2013 sushumna. When they are released, prana immediately begins to flow through sushumna nadi, which leads to increased receptivity of the mind and in turn higher experiences.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Remember, these so-called knots are in the psychic body, not in the physical body, but physical manipulations such as bandhas can unlock them<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Pranamaya kosha is made up of five major pranas, which are collectively known as the pancha, or five pranas: prana, apana, samana, udana and vyana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Along with five major pranas there are five minor pranas known as the upa-pranas: naga, koorma, krikara, devadatta and dhananjaya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WAR BROKE OUT ONLY\nBECAUSE DRAUPADI SCREAMED IN SARCASM WHEN DURYODHAN FELL INTO THE POOL IN THE\nHALL OF MAGIC ILLUSIONS BUILT BY MAYA DANAVA .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">ONLY DURYODHAN COULD\nHEAR HER EAR DRUM SHATERING VOICE LOUDEST DUE TO ACOUSTIC EFFECTS \u201cANDHASYA\nPUTRA ANDAHAH \u201c \u2014 MEANING SON OF BLING PARENTS IS BLIND TOO<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS INSULT WAS AIMED\nMORE AT HIS CHASTE BLINDFOLDED MOTHER GANDHARI \u2013 WOMAN TO WOMAN, THIS BITCHY\nINSULT WAS INTOLERABLE TO A GUEST KING<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">DURYODHAN REPLIED\nCALMLY \u201c THIS INSULT WILL COST YOU DEAR , DRAUPADI\u201d \u2013 THIS INCIDENT KICKSTARTED\nA WORLD WAR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS SOON AS RUMBLINGS OF\nWAR CAME TO GANDHARI\u2014 SHE CRIED OUT IN GRIEF LOUDLY ( THE FIRST TIME SHE\nCOMPLAINED OF HER SELF IMPOSED BLINDNESS ) \u201cOH, I AM AS MUST AFRAID OF THIS WAR\nTHAN THIS ENDLESS DARKNESS \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN PANIC SHE RUSHED TO\nHER SWORD\u2014 BUT THEN REALIZED SHE CANT FIGHT WITH HER BLINDFOLD ON.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AT THAT MOMENT SAKUNI\nSWORE AN OATH AND PLUNGED HIS DAGGER INTO HIS THIGH SORE , SHATTERING HIS BONE\n\u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">EVERY SINGLE DAY SINCE\nHIS SISTER GOT MARRIED , HE WOULD IMPLORE \u2013SISTER PLEASE REMOVE YOUR BLINFOLD\u2014\nAS SHE WAS AFRAID OF THE DARKNESS IN HER CHILDHOOD \u2013 ALWAYS SLEPT WITH A LAMP\nBY HER SIDE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS THINGS WORLD\nTRANSPIRE \u2013 SAKUNI WOULD BE ONE OF THE LAST TO DIE ON THE KURUSHETRA BATTLE\nFIELD\u2014HE WATCHED BHISHMA LIE ON HIS BED OF ARROWS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his final battle\nwith Sahadeva\u2014Sahadeva advised Shakuni that he should stop fighting, since he\nhad already achieved what he wanted to \u2013the death of Bhishma . He asked him to\ngo back to his kingdom, Gandhara, and rule, instead of participating in this\nmeaningless violence and killing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">At that moment, Shakuni\nfelt deep remorse and a genuine repentance.. He recounted to Sahadeva how his\nsister had died a million deaths everyday afraid of the dark\u2014 yet she never\nremoved her blindfold and suffered in silence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sakuni told Sahadeva\nthat the only thing left for him to do would be to sacrifice his life on this\nvery battlefield. He further stated that it would be an honour for him to shed\nhis mortal coil in a battlefield as great as blood soaked Kurukshetra..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once he had finished\nsaying all that he had to, Shakuni started attacking Sahadeva with arrows. He\nknew he had to die and so, was spurring on the latter to kill him. After a\nbrief fight, Sahadeva cut off his head. He knew Sakuni wanted it\u2014as he was\nrefusing to protect himself .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shakuni had no real\nanimosity toward the Pandavas. His only reason for targeting Bhishma was\nbecause of his sister\u2019s endless suffering.. he had his own Dharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shakuni has a temple\ndedicated to his worship, in the state of Kerala.. No puja or ritual of any\nsort is performed at Shakuni's temple. There is another temple nearby, which is\ndedicated to Duryodhana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yuddhistra got pissed\noff when he reached Vaikunta \u2014 Duryodhana was already there \u2013 he had got MOKSHA\ntoo.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sakuni got MOKSHA too\nahead of the Pandava brothers \u2013 the temple in Kerala is built at the spot where\nSakuni had once come for arrows ( missiles )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ironically Sakuni had\nmade a dice with his own father\u2019s thighbone \u2013which rolled in his favour always\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">GANDHARI REFUSED TO\nREMOVE HER BLINDFOLD EVEN WHEN SHE WAS LED TO THE DEAD BODY OF HER BELOVED SON\nDURYODHANA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">TODAY , WHAT DO WE HAVE\nTO LEARN FROM CHUTNEY SORPOTAL MARYS WHO HAVE ANAL SEX WITH ANOTHER STRANGER\nMAN AS SOON AS HER PICKLE JOHN HUSBAND LOOKS THE OTHER WAY ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/time-has-come-to-save-watan-time-is-now.html?showComment=1508157200873#c2320084546700134565\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 16, 2017 at 6:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_78MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEONE ASKED ME\u2014<br />\n<br />\nJUST BECAUSE BRITISH STONENEHENGE HAS 27 PORTALS HOW CAN IT BE A HINDU STRUCTURE ?<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN--- 27 PORTALS IS FOR 27 NAKSHATRAS<br />\n<br />\nEach of the 27 Nakshatra is divided into four Pada = 4 quarters. 27 x 4 = 108= digital value of OM<br />\n<br />\n108 IS A DIVINE NUMBER --<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY CAN STEAL THIS NUMBER AND GIVE IT TO ANY OTHER LAND OTHER THAN INDIA , OR RELIGION OTHER THAN SANATANA DHARMA.<br />\n<br />\nNakshatra ( Asterism ) is the general term, referring to any identified pattern of stars.<br />\n<br />\nThe ecliptic is divided into each of the nakshatras eastwards starting from this first point of Aries<br />\n<br />\nFirst point of Aries is the spot where equinoctial cuts the ecliptic.. The First Point of Aries, is current at PISCES and is a mismomer . It just show the Greeks lifted from Kerala astrology-- It, defines the zero-point for Right Ascension.<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE \u201c INTERSECTION OF EQUINOCTIAL AND ECLIPTIC \u201c WAS AT ARIES \u2014 ONLY KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING KNEW ASTRONOMY<br />\n<br />\nRISHABHAM- TAURUS (4300 BC ) / MEDAM- ARIES (2150 BC ) / MENAM- PISCES ( 1 AD ) / KUMBHAM - AQUARIUS (2150 AD )<br />\n<br />\nThe First Point of Aries is not a fixed point in space: it moves along the Ecliptic at a rate of roughly one degree every seventy years. When the Equinox was first observed, thousands of years ago, the First Point actually lay in the constellation of Aries.<br />\n<br />\nWhen the Sun reaches the First Point of Aries, as it does once each year, an equinox occurs.<br />\n<br />\nBecause the First Point of Aries is the zero-point for calculating coordinates on the Celestial Sphere, its own coordinates are always fixed, regardless of its motion. They are, of course, zero hours Right Ascension and zero degrees Declination.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html<br />\n<br />\nKERALA SAGES FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY GAVE THE COSMIC ALLEGORIES FOR THE BIBLE IN 325 AD AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA TO THE ROMAN EMPEROR .<br />\n<br />\nJESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED<br />\n<br />\nJESUS WAS A CLEVER COMBINATION OF COSMIC ALLEGORY/ APPOLONIUS OF TYANA , A KERALA SAGE AND HIS SIDE KICK DAMISA ( WHO MARRIED MARY OF MAGDALENE \u2013A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN )</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A time crystal is a\nstate of matter--which will take the western world another 500 years to come to\nterms with.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; This fractures the symmetry of time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS 4D CRYSTAL DIAMOND\nWORKS BEHIND THE QUANTUM SCREEN OF MAYA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The laws of physics are\nnot only symmetrical in space but also in time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Temporal\nsymmetry-breaking would manifest itself in this repeating motion in time, just\nas spatial symmetry-breaking manifests itself as repeating patterns in space<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">BRAHMAs EYE WOULD TURN\nFROM BLUE IN DAYLIGHT TO BRIGHT BLOOD RED IN PITCH DARKNESS . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT HELD A CURSE FOR\nPEOPLE WITH CRIMINAL DNA . THE THIEVES CUT THE DIAMOND AND IT BECAME BLACK. THE\nELECTRONS FLIPPED 180 DEGREES ANALOGOUS TO WHAT HAPPENS DURING MRI TO HUMAN\nBODY NUCLEI.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Atoms of TIME crystals\noperate in a sort of time-array, as opposed to a physical array. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Time crystals are\nclosely related to concepts of ZPF and dynamical Casimir effect--as I have\nexplained in many of my posts. The universe is made up of matter fields whose\nquanta are fermions (i.e. leptons and quarks) and force fields, whose quanta\nare bosons (e.g. photons and gluons). All these fields have zero-point energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE SRI YANTRA GEOMETRY\nCONTAINS THE THEORY OF EVERYTHING<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shah Jahan named Jama\nMasjid ( INDIAs LARGEST MOSQUE ) as The Masjid-i Jah\u0101n-Num\u0101 or Jahan Numa\n(World-reflecting Mosque)-- he got an imam from Bukhara, present-day\nUzbekistan. In ancient days India ruled this place.The mosque was completed in\n1656 AD with three great gates, four towers and two 40 m high minarets\nconstructed of strips of red sandstone and white marble. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Badshahi Masjid,\nbuilt by Shah Jahan's son Aurangzeb at Lahore, was also a Hindu temple. The\nJama Masjid of Agra was also a Hindu temple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shah Jahan also built\nthe Taj Mahal, at Agra and the Red Fort in New Delhi, which stands opposite the\nJama Masjid. KUBERA IS THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION -GUARDIAN OF NORTH.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">IN SANATANA DHARMA YAMA IS LOKPALA ( GUARDIAN ) OF SOUTH DIRECTION. THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH HELL.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YAMA DOES NOT HOLD THE \"FINAL JUDGEMENT\" LIKE IN CHRISTIANITY. THIS GOES AGAINST THE LAWS OF KARMA.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">HERE IS BULLSHIT IN WIKIPEDIA-</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">QUOTE: An ancient legend ascribes the occasion to on interesting story about the 16-year-old son of King Hima. His horoscope predicted his death by snake-bite on the fourth day of his marriage. On that particular day, his newly-wed wife did not allow him to sleep. She laid out all her ornaments and lots of gold and silver coins in a heap at the entrance of the sleeping chamber and lit lamps all over the place. Then she narrated stories and sang songs to keep her husband from falling asleep. The next day, when Yama, the god of Death, arrived at the prince\u2019s doorstep in the guise of a Serpent, his eyes were dazzled and blinded by the brilliance of the lamps and the jewellery. Yama could not enter the Prince's chamber, so he climbed on top of the heap of gold coins and sat there the entire night listening to the stories and songs. In the morning, he silently went away. Thus, the young prince was saved from the clutches of death by the cleverness of his new bride, and the day came to be celebrated as Dhanteras. The following day came to be called Naraka Chaturdashi ('Naraka' means hell and Chaturdashi means 14th). It is also known as \u2018Yamadeepdaan\u2019 as the ladies of the house light earthen lamps or \u2018deep\u2019 and these are kept burning throughout the night glorifying Yama, the God of Death. Since this is the night before Diwali, it is also called 'Chhoti Diwali' or Minor Diwali.[2]</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">According to another popular legend, when the Gods and demons churned the ocean for Amrita or nectar, Dhanvantari (the physician of the Gods and an incarnation of Vishnu) emerged carrying a jar of the elixir on the day of Dhanteras.[2] UNQUOTE</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">YAMA HAS BEEN INJECTED ALL OVER VEDAS / UPANISHADS BY JEW ROTHSCHILD TO SUSTAIN THE FALSE THEORY OF HELL IN HINDUISM.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">######################################</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; text-align: justify;\"></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">TRUTH : CREMATION FIRE ( AGNI ) IS YAMAs PRIEST AS PER VEDAS . A twopenny tram\nwill take you from the centre of Calcutta to the \"Kalighat\", from\nwhich some suppose that the city takes its name, where you may see, in the\nslimy, swarming precincts of the temple, the ground crimson with the blood of\nsacrifices, while in a filthy but very sacred backwater of the Hooghly men,\nwomen and children not only bathe in their hundreds, but drink the yellow ooze\nin which their bodies and their garments have been steeped. Hindusim professes\na superstitious respect for animal life, but it raises no finger to check the\nmost callous cruelty to animals. It is, in short, the great anachronism of the\nmodern world.\"-- \u2013 William Archer, \"India and the future\" (1917)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div ROTHSCHILD DEMOTED ANCIENT RULING CLASS THIYYAS TO COCONUT TREE TODDY TAPPERS ( BASICALLY KINGS CONVERTED TO HEATHEN MONKEY )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THIYYAS WERE DANAVAS ( ASURAS )..&nbsp; IN ANCIENT PERSIA ASURAS ARE GODS ( AHURA )--THEY CANNOT PRONOUNCE ALPHABET &nbsp;\u201c S \u201c .. &nbsp;ASURAS HAD SHUKRACHARYA AS MENTOR.&nbsp; THE REST HAD BRIHASPATI AS MENTOR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE WHOLE PLANET BEFORE 7000 BC WAS DIVIDED INTO TWO --FOLLOWERS OF SHUKRACHARYA AND FOLLOWERS OF BRIHASPATI ( MENTOR OF DEVAS ) .&nbsp; ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">BOTH THESE MAHARISHIS WERE BITTER ENEMIES . ..REASON WAS BOTH WERE CLASSMATES IN THE SAME GURUKUL WHERE BRIHASPATIs FATHER MAHARISHIS ANGIRASA WAS GURU. .. AND THOUGH SHUKRACHARYA WAS BETTER THAN BRIHASPATI&nbsp; EVERY WHICH WAY THERE WAS NEPOTISM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; CHERAMAN PERUMAL WAS KING OF CALICUT --CALLED BY ARABS EVEN TODAY A THIYYAJUDDIN. ( RULER OF THIYYAS )..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CHERAMAN PERUMALs BODY IS BURIED AT SALALAH ( STATE OF DHOFAR --CURRENT DAY SOUTH OMAN/ NORTH YEMEN &nbsp;) . ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">DHOFAR KINGDOM WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING FOR THOUSANDS OF YEARS --SO WAS MECCA OASIS, MADEIN SALEH , PETRA, AND PALESTINE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">JUDAISM WAS CREATED BY DISGRACED NAMBOODIRIS ... EVERY TIME THE ANCIENT JEWS GOT PERSECUTED THEY CAME RUNNING BACK TO KERALA CRYING MOMMMIIEEEEEE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/11/bar-kokhba-in-fight-to-finish-over.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">KING SOLOMONs ( HERO &nbsp;OF JEWS ) &nbsp;MOTHER BATH SHEBA WAS A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">KING SOLOMONs WIFE QUEEN OF SHEBA WAS A NAMBOODIRI WOMAN. SOLOMONs SEAL WAS IN MALAYALAM SCRIPT..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">LAND OF SHEBA WAS ALSO KNOWN AS PUNT/ OPHIR .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">MECCA OASIS IS NOW DEAD.... ONLY A WELL REMAINS WHICH GIVES ZAM ZAM HOLY WATER..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE SHIVA TEMPLE WAS AT THE EDGE OF THIS MECCA OASIS--THE SPOT IS NOW OCCUPIED BY KAABA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHERE THE SHIVA LINGAM GOT SUBMERGED BY WATER IN A FLOOD , &nbsp;THE NAMBOODIRI PRIESTS YOUNGER BROTHERs SON (MOHAMMAD ) UPROOTED THE SHIVA LINGAM BLACK STONE AND FIXED IT ABOVE WATER 5 FEET ABOVE THE GROUND--HORIZONTALLY AT THE SE CORNER .&nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THIS ACT KICK STARTED THE BEGINNINGS OF A NEW RELIGION NAMED ISLAM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/10/blockchain-smart-contracts-part-8-capt.html?showComment=1509465802291#c3803637618666582370\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 31, 2017 at 9:33 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_111MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nCommies write that formalism is \u2018art for art\u2019s sake\u2019. BALLS ! What do these cunts know !<br />\n<br />\nCommie write that frmalists prioritize the medium over the content. Formalism concentrates on the set of rules a language has (competence), and not on the usage of this set when producing phrases (performance). BALLS AGAIN!<br />\n<br />\nWhite formalists believe that the art-object can be isolated from social, cultural and historical influences and examined as an autonomous whole - TEE HEEE . When they wipe their shit laden asshole with toilet paper \u2014it must be such a hole\u2014nay- WHOLE .<br />\n<br />\nFormalism is a description of something in formal mathematical or logical terms. Formal language theory, the discipline which studies formal grammar and language, is a branch of applied mathematics.<br />\n<br />\nFormalism rejects notions of culture or societal influence, authorship, and content, and instead focuses on modes, genres, discourse, and forms. Its applications are found in theoretical computer science, theoretical linguistics, formal semantics, mathematical logic, and other areas<br />\n<br />\nThe \u015aulba sutras are one of the appendices to the great V\u00e9das. Vedas had within it the entire concept of divine Math.<br />\n<br />\nIn computer science, Backus\u2013Naur form or Backus normal form (BNF) is a notation technique for context-free grammars, often used to describe the syntax of languages used in computing, such as computer programming languages, document formats, instruction sets and communication protocols. They are applied wherever exact descriptions of languages are needed: for instance, in official language specifications, in manuals, and in textbooks on programming language theory.<br />\n<br />\nThe idea of describing the structure of language using rewriting rules can be traced back to Panini.<br />\n<br />\nPanini\u2019s grammar includes early use of Boolean logic, of the null operator, and of context free grammars, and includes a precursor of the \u201cBackus\u2013Naur\u201d form (used in the description programming languages) .<br />\n<br />\nPanini lived 7500 years ago. The white invader kicked him forward in time as the Big Bang of the bible was only in 4004 BC.<br />\n<br />\nBoolean Algebra served the basis of early transistors and capacitors used in early primitive form of the computer.<br />\n<br />\nCHOOT CHOMSKY DOES NOT KNOW LIBGUISTICS OF SANSKRIT CANNOT BE APPLIED TO A DUMB LANGUAGE CALLED ENGLISH<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild stole the technical texts BRAHMANAS ( part 2 ) and the ARANYAKAS ( part 3) of our Vedas\u2014leaving us with SAMHITAS ( ridiculed as cowherds\u2019s verses ) and UPANISHADS ( philosophy )<br />\n<br />\nSanskrit is rich in many mathematical features like its logic, context free grammar, in particular Boolean logic, null operator, etc.<br />\n<br />\nA context-free grammar is simple and mathematically precise mechanism which gives methods by which phrases in language are built from smaller blocks, capturing the \u201cblock structure\u201d of sentences in a natural way. It\u2019s where formalism is applied which is base for mathematical study.<br />\n<br />\nThis wouldn\u2019t have been possible without implicit and explicit knowledge and application of mathematical tools.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_112b+seedBnscD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_112b+seedBnscD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; The function of the human body is much like a transformer, receiving energy from the Universal flow of Prana, distributing that energy, and then eliminating it<br />\n<br />\nSage Markandeya who remained alive through PRALAYA explains, the qualities that we admire in a divine being are within us. When we worship the images that personify such attributes, we awaken those divine aspects latent in us. When we are filled by that grace, there is no space left for base desires and pain; we have become that deity.<br />\n<br />\nThe image and its symbolisms are idioms of beauty grace and power nurtured by Sanatana Dharma<br />\n<br />\nVedas declare that there exists a natural affinity between forms and ideas.<br />\n<br />\nA mobius strips, which generate scalar energy is an object in topology-- the mathematical study of abstract shape..<br />\n<br />\nA mobius coil is a topological modification of a toroid coil which is folded back on itself, thereby allowing current to flow in opposite directions.<br />\n<br />\nIn mathematics, topology is concerned with the properties of space that are preserved under continuous deformations, such as stretching, crumpling and bending, but not tearing or gluing.<br />\n<br />\nTopology developed as a field of study out of geometry and set theory, through analysis of concepts such as space, dimension, and transformation<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_90BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; This has made topology one of the great unifying ideas of mathematics.<br />\n<br />\nThe topology of M\u00f6bius strips make it a rare Euclidean representation of the infinite, and mathematicians have expanded on this and generalized it in the form of klein bottles ( the breath of Brahma )<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/oort-cloud-hindu-yugas-and-breath-of.html<br />\n<br />\nThe endless knot appears in Vedas representing strength in unity. Vishnu had a Srivatsa endless knot on his right side chest. The tenth avatar of Vishnu, Kalki, will bear the Shrivatsa mark on his chest.<br />\n<br />\nThe srivatsa is the symbol of the HINDU Rohingyas of the Rakhine State of Myanmar<br />\n<br />\nA Hindu god idol is a form which brings the mind to focus on abstraction.<br />\n<br />\nUR ANANTHAMURTY WHO PISSED OF A VISHNU IDOL--IS MADE OUT TO BE A GENIUS BY ANTI-HINDU COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY<br />\n<br />\nThe motivating insight behind topology is that some geometric problems depend not on the exact shape of the objects involved, but rather on the way they are put together.<br />\n<br />\nTopological FRACTAL thinking shifts seamlessly from left to right brainlobes ( RAM cloud memory ) and back<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/fractal-mind-of-srinivasa-ramanujan.html<br />\n<br />\nLeft brain lobe ( for right handers ) is conscious brainlobe . In right-lobe, for every information set one slips into, one adds that into the RAM memory set of one\u2019s being and is able to remember what was processed in sequence and at the same time also be able to detect, decode and quickly decipher relationships between the information sets, elements thereof, and connect these quickly and effortlessly, reaching and gaining new knowings as one goes forward in thinking in the given flow.<br />\n<br />\nWhen Arjun looked into the water pool and shot his arrow through the eye of a magnetic fish with a ruby eye, unsteadily floating in a rotating transparent container overhead it was a supreme test of consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nA MAD JEW NAMED SIGMUND FREUD TRIED TO SHOW\u2014APUN BHI TOPOLOGICAL THINKER\u2014 BALLS !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_90b+seedBlO1D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_90b+seedBlO1D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_61M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. places on earth- Prayag ( named by Muslim invaders as Allah- abad ), Hardwar, Ujain and Nasik.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/kumbh-mela-mother-of-all-pilgrimages.html<br />\n<br />\nSince then, Rahu and Ketu were deprived of the amrit by Sun and Moon sneaking to Mohini , they developed bitter enmity against the Sun and the Moon.<br />\n<br />\nThe nodal points of the Moon what we call Rahu and Ketu are, clubs of magnetic and gravitational forces of two celestial bodies, the Moon and the Earth and hence are very influential on the life of mankind.<br />\n<br />\nThese points affect our central nervous system as well as sympathetic and para-sympathetic nervous systems which work on the principles of electro-magnetic systems.<br />\n<br />\nThey have direct impacts on the generation of signals of informations in neurons and neuro-transmitters and their movement from brain to various parts of our body and back to the brain.<br />\n<br />\nThe nodal points (Rahu and Ketu) are psycho-somatic which govern not only the stress level of our mind but also the activities of hormones, blood circulation and function of the heart.<br />\n<br />\nRothschild used his FAKE KaliDASA to inject poison into Rahu and Ketu in his FAKE work Uttar Kalamrita .<br />\n<br />\nKalidasa was a FAKE poet created and backdated by Jew Rothschild. NOT an astronomer.<br />\n<br />\nNorth node Rahu is like gravity- pulling us toward something whether we really want to or not, whether we have agency over this desire or not. The South Node Ketu is like anti-matter in a natal chart.<br />\n<br />\nMY WIFE AND ALMOST ALL ANCIENT FAMILIES IN KERALA CONSULT THE RAHU KALAM CHART BEFORE WE DO SOMETHING CRITICAL.<br />\n<br />\nThe Moon (Chandra) completes its orbit round the earth in about a month crossing the orbit of earth twice in the same period, once when it goes from south to north and at another time while travelling from north to south.<br />\n<br />\nThe ascending point is called \"Rahu\" and descending point - \"Ketu\". These have retrograde motion in the zodiac at the rate of 19\u00b020' per year.<br />\n<br />\nIt has been established beyond doubt that Rahu and Ketu influence an individual\u2019s life, at times more than other planets.<br />\n<br />\nSince Rahu and Ketu are in exact opposition to each other, their effect should be considered simultaneously.<br />\n<br />\nRahu has the properties of Shani (Saturn) whereas Ketu has the influence of Mangala (Mars)<br />\n<br />\nThey indicate the precise point of the harmony with the three most important influences in our life- the Sun, the Earth and the Moon. This relationship plays an important part in the enfolding of individual consciousness.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_92BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; (During New Moon when it is +/- 18 degrees from Rahu Ketu, the Solar eclipse takes place. At the full Moon +/- 11 degrees 15' from the nodal position, the Lunar eclipse takes place.)<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nAs they symbolically eclipse the Sun (consciousness) and the Moon (the Mind), they have a great part to play in darkening our perspective in order to bring in new light. They deal with the concept of death and re-birth, transformation and regeneration.<br />\n<br />\nThey have been given the status of planets to emphasise their significance and the importance placed on eclipses.<br />\n<br />\nThey have no substance and are physically non-existent. Yet their influence is full of potency and spiritual significance.<br />\n<br />\nThey work in unison 180 degrees apart, two opposite points in the zodiac with a mission to churn our lives in order to externalise hidden potential and wisdom. In keeping with their shadowy nature, they work on a psychological level.<br />\n<br />\nIt is always difficult to gauge their effect because their main concern is with our emotional makeup. They effect us internally. We are unaware of what exactly is happening to us at the time..<br />\n<br />\nKetu deals with the past Karma and Rahu with the future.<br />\n<br />\nThe five instincts that keep us attached to the materialistic purpose of life are Kaam (Desire, passions) Krodh (Anger) Madh (intoxicants- drugs, alcohol etc) Moh (Attachment) Lobh(Greed) and Matsaya(Jealousy).<br />\n<br />\nWe need to control our instincts rather than allowing ourselves to be controlled by them. Both Rahu and Ketu have the ability to keep our mind focused on these instincts- Rahu by exaggerating and Ketu by obscuring or blocking.<br />\n<br />\nWe are tied down to the cycle of unhappiness and dissatisfaction as we cannot break away from our lower selves. We are born again and again to experience the pleasures and pains of the earthly life until we recognise them to be the illusions that they are.<br />\n<br />\nRahu Ketu deals with the inner fight within us, the moral and the social choices we have to constantly make and the inner dilemmas.<br />\n<br />\nRahu takes people off their Dharmic past path to tempt them on the road of self destruction. Ketu is considered the keeper of the book of our life- past and present Karmas.<br />\n<br />\nWhen all the planets are hemmed between Rahu and Ketu (i.e., the moon's north node and the moon's south node), Kaalsarpa YOGAM ( not dosham ) is formed.<br />\n<br />\nKalasarpa yogam is a karmic dosha that may run across the generations\u2014bad luck galore .<br />\n<br />\nPeople go for Kalsarpa Shanti Pooja to Trimbakeshwar Temple at Nasik .<br />\n<br />\nA FAKE GURU AND A DROHI NAMED SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR TWEETED AND TOLD ON NDTV, THAT LORD AYYAPPA ( 9TH AVATAR OF VISHNU ) IS A PRODUCT OF A HOMOSEXUAL UNION BETWEEN LORD SHIVA AND LORD VISHNU.<br />\n<br />\nHE HAS USED THE STORY OF MOHINI AND RAHU/ KETU TO LIE THAT SANATANA DHARMA SUPPORTS ANAL SEX --AND THAT VISHNU ( MOHINI ) AND SHIVA HAD ANAL SEX TO PRODUCE LORD AYYAPPA ( VISHNUs 9TH AVATAR )<br />\n<br />\nMODI GAVE THIS DROHI SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR A PADMA VIBHUSHAN--INDIAs SECOND HIGHEST AWARD.. This difference is called \u201cayanamsa\u201d (sidereal difference)<br />\n<br />\nMAYA DANAVA WROTE IN 4000 BC IN HIS ASTRONOMICAL TREATISE THAT AYANAMSHA WILL BE ZERO IN 499 AD (Mesha Samkranti). THANK GOD THE WHITE BASTARDS DID NOT SAY THAT MAYA DANAVA WAS BORN IN 499 AD .<br />\n<br />\nMAYA DANAVA FROM KERALA MADE THE HALL OF ILLUSIONS AT INDRAPRASTA FOR THE PANDAVAS 6000 YEARS AGO .<br />\n<br />\nAT THIS TIME THE WHITE AN WAS RUNNING AROUND NAKED DOING GRUNT GRUNT FOR LANGUAGE<br />\n<br />\nMAYA DANAVA RAN AWAY TO PERU AND HE MADE THE MAYAN CALENDER<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html<br />\n<br />\nIN KERALA WE USED SIDERIAL SYSTEM WHICH IS ACCURATE-- NOT INACCURATE TROPICAL WHICH WAS USED BY THE WHITE MAN 4000 YEARS LATER<br />\n<br />\nWhile classical tropical astrology is based on the orientation of the Earth relative to the Sun and planets of the solar system, sidereal astrology deals with the position of the Earth relative to both of these as well as the stars of the celestial sphere.<br />\n<br />\nIN 325 AD, AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA WHERE ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTIN THE GREAT COOKED UP A GOD NAMED JESUS CHRIST THE POPE WITH NO KNOWLEDGE OF ASTRONOMY FUCKED IT UP.<br />\n<br />\nTHE STUPID POPE WANTED EASTER TO BE THE FIRST SUNDAY AFTER THE FULL MOON AFTER THE VERNAL EQUINOX.<br />\n<br />\n21 March 325 AD is the day allocated to it in the Easter table of the Julian calendar<br />\n<br />\nAT THIS COUNCIL THERE WAS AN ASTRONOMER FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY WHO LOUDLY WARNED THE ROMAN EMPEROR NOT TO ALLOW THE ILLITERATE POPE SUCH SCIENTIFIC LIBERTIES --THAT SIDERIAL ZODIAC WILL DRIFT AWAY FROM TROPICAL ZODIAC AND CAUSE TERRIBLE CONFUSION LATER IN TIME<br />\n<br />\nThe difference between the Vedic and the Western zodiacs is currently around 24 degrees. OR-- Ayanamsa is around 24 degrees today. The ayanamsha describes the increasing gap between the tropical and sidereal zodiacs.<br />\n<br />\nVARAHAMIHIRA ( MIHIRA MUNI ) WAS A DISCIPLE OF ARYABHATTA . BOTH WERE EMINENT ASTRONOMERS FROM KERALA.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html<br />\n<br />\nMIHIRA MUNI ALSO WROTE THAT THE ZERO ANAYAMSHA YEAR WAS IN 499 AD<br />\n<br />\nAryabhatta of 2700 BC, from my hometown of Calicut was the first to propound the HELIOCENTRIC model of the cosmos, the Siderial day length, and that the earth rotates on its own axis, all the while moving in space -- in writing.<br />\n<br />\nARYABHATTA WROTE ARYABHATITA IN 2700 BC. NOT 500 AD, AS WRITTEN BY THE BASTARD WHITE MAN SO THAT THEY COULD STEAL ALL INDIAN ASTRONOMY AND PATENT IT IN THEIR PATHETIC NAMES<br />\n<br />\nIn 2700 BC , Aryabhatta , a astronomer professor , who went from Kodungallur University to Nalanda to teach as a visiting professor pinged the value for the length of the sidereal year at 365 days 6 hours 12 minutes 30 seconds is only 3 minutes 20 seconds longer than the modern scientific value of 365 days 6 hours 9 minutes 10 seconds.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_67MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_67BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_67B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_68B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2679817984750338857\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_68M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
