The white bastards have used this date to say Aryabhatta was born at this time.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE BASTARDS COOKED UP A FAKE VERSE ( IT IS SO EASY TO CATCH THEIR FOUL LIES )<br />\n<br />\n(Kalakriya Section Verse 10)<br />\n\u0937\u091f\u094d\u092f\u092c\u094d\u0926\u093e\u0928\u093e\u0902 \u0937\u0936\u094d\u091f\u093f\u0930\u094d\u092f\u0926\u093e<br />\n\u0935\u094d\u092f\u0924\u0940\u0924\u093e\u0938\u094d\u0924\u094d\u0930\u092f\u0937\u094d\u091a \u092f\u0941\u0917\u092a\u093e\u0926\u093e \u3163<br />\n\u0924\u094d\u0930\u094d\u092f\u0927\u093f\u0915\u093e \u0935\u093f\u0936\u0924\u093f\u0930\u092c\u094d\u0926\u093e\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0926\u0947\u0939<br />\n\u092f\u092e \u091c\u0928\u094d\u092e\u0928\u094b\u0924\u0940\u0924\u093e\u0903 \u2225<br />\n<br />\nWhen sixty times sixty years and three<br />\nquarter Yugas had elapsed, twenty three years<br />\nhad then passed since my birth.<br />\n<br />\nHere, three quarters of Yugas means Krita, Treta and Dwapara had elapsed and it was then Kali Yuga. It means 3600 years had elapsed since the beginning of Kali Yuga. Many scholars have taken 3101 B.C. as the beginning of Kali Yuga.<br />\nSo 3102 - 3600 = 499 A.D.<br />\n<br />\n499 A.D. was taken as the year in which the compilation of Aryabhatiya was done and die birth year of Aryabhata is taken to be 499-23 = 476 A.D.<br />\n<br />\nBASTARDS --YOU LYING THIEVING WHITE MEN -- CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL IS RIGHT BEHIND YOU .<br />\n<br />\nAYANANAMSA is the Sanskrit/ Malayalam term in Indian astronomy for the amount of precession. In astrology, this is the longitudinal difference between the Tropical (S\u0101yana) and Sidereal (Nirayana) zodiacs.<br />\n<br />\nIn astronomy , this is the difference between the length of a tropical year (365.2422 rotations of the earth) and a sidereal year (365.2563 rotations) required to complete one orbit relative to the sun (tropical) or stars (sidereal)<br />\n<br />\nIn Surya Siddh\u0101nta ayan\u0101msa rises from 0\u00b0 to +27\u00b0 during 1800 years, then decreases to 0\u00b0 and further to -27\u00b0, thereafter rising again, thus oscillating within a rage of \u00b127\u00b0 instead of cyclically moving in a circle as modern concept of ayan\u0101msa suggests.<br />\n<br />\n(i) HINDU Yuga or the ecliptic rotation around a star takes 24000 years.<br />\n(ii) 24000 years were divided by 12, or 24000 / 12 = 2000 years for each sign of the Zodiac<br />\n(iii) The rate of Precession was worked out as:-<br />\n360 / 24000 = 360 x 60 x 60 / 24000 = 54\"<br />\n(iv) 24000 / 360 = 66-66 years or 1\u00b0 Precession takes place in 66-66 years.<br />\n<br />\nThe rate of Precession of the Equinoxes as 1\u00b0 of precession in 66.664 years is close to the figure mentioned in Surya Siddhanta.<br />\n<br />\nAs per Surya Siddhanta, the Precession of the Equinoxes is an oscillating one. It moves 27\u00b0 to the West, retreats again to the zero point, again moves 27\u00b0 to the East and retreats again thus making an angle of 108\u00b0.<br />\n<br />\nThe to and fro movement of the Equinox is taken as one revolution. Therefore the above cited four revolutions of to and fro movements have been taken as 2 revolutions. In this way when 108\u00b0 is divided by 2, the figure obtained is 54\".<br />\n<br />\nThe variation in the rate of Precession of the Equinoxes invariably depends upon the revolution of the ecliptic. If the period of revolution of ecliptic is taken to be 24000 years ( as per Veda Yugas of yore ) , the rate is 54\" per year and, slightly more than 50\" if the period is taken to be 25765 years.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/oort-cloud-hindu-yugas-and-breath-of.html<br />\n<br />\nThere is no written authority to accept the year 285 AD as the zero year of equinoxes.<br />\n<br />\nIn astronomy, axial precession is a gravity-induced, slow, and continuous change in the orientation of an astronomical body's rotational axis. In particular, it can refer to the gradual shift in the orientation of Earth's axis of rotation, which, similar to a wobbling top, traces out a pair of cones joined at their apices in a cycle of approximately 25765 years.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_68MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_68BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_68B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_69B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7519634698234380545\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_69M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/11/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load.html?showComment=1510609229093#c7519634698234380545\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 14, 2017 at 3:10 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_69MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nThe term \"precession\" typically refers only to this largest part of the motion; other changes in the alignment of Earth's axis\u2014nutation and polar motion\u2014are much smaller in magnitude.<br />\n<br />\nWhile the sidereal system defines the signs based on the fixed stars, the tropical system defines it based on the position of vernal equinox in the northern hemisphere (i.e., the intersection of the ecliptic with the celestial equator).<br />\n<br />\nBecause of the precession of the equinoxes, the two systems do not remain fixed relative to each other but drift apart by about 1.4 arc degrees per century. The tropical system was adopted during the Hellenistic period and remains prevalent in Western astrology. The accurate sidereal system is used in Hindu astrology<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html<br />\n<br />\nThe Hindu Jyotisha system of Kerala opted for defining the zodiac based on the fixed stars, i.e., directly tied to the eponymous zodiacal constellations<br />\n<br />\nTraditional Hindu astrology is based on the sidereal or visible zodiac, accounting for the shift of the equinoxes by a correction called ayanamsa. The ayanamsha is the difference between the tropical and sidereal zodiac.<br />\n<br />\nThe Tropical Zodiac is the position of the sun referenced against the earth's horizon at a particular locale which gives you the seasons as a measure of the flow of time. The framework for the 4 seasons are the 2 solstices and the 2 equinoxes. This is the one STUPID PRETENDER western astrologers use.<br />\n<br />\nThe Sidereal Zodiac is the position of the sun referenced against the star background, as a measure of the flow of time. The framework for the star background is the constellations the sun passes in front of. This is the one REAL Hindu astronomers use.<br />\n<br />\nWe can measure time by the seasons (tropical time) or by the stars (sidereal time). The sun, as the time hour hand, is common to both. To compile the Tropical Zodiac no reference was made to any stars.<br />\n<br />\nThe sidereal zodiac (as seen by a person standing on the earth) is that belt of stars 7 deg either side of the sun\u2019s path (ecliptic) through the sky that is divided into 12 equal sized (300) constellations.<br />\n<br />\nThe Sidereal Zodiac (Sidereal = Star) DOES take the precession of the equinoxes into account, and rather than beginning its cycle at the point of the Spring Equinox each year, it begins when the Sun aligns with a Fixed Star in the Constellation of Aries. The Sidereal Zodiac is also known as the Fixed Zodiac.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=2&amp;v=-gh7wWVsPjo<br />\n<br />\nThe Vernal Equinox was in Libra sign in the year 11501 B.C.; therefore, to reach 0\u00b0 of Aries, the V.E. would take 12000 years. Therefore the meeting of V.E. with the first point of Aries took place in 499 A.D. (12000-11501= 499 A.D.)<br />\n<br />\nSanskrit term Ayanamsa is the angle by which the sidereal ecliptic longitude of a celestial body is less than its tropical ecliptic longitude.<br />\n<br />\nThe sidereal ecliptic longitude of a celestial body is its longitude on the ecliptic defined with respect to the \"fixed\" stars.<br />\n<br />\nThe tropical ecliptic longitude of a celestial body is its longitude on the ecliptic defined with respect to the vernal equinox point.<br />\n<br />\nTropical (sayana) zodiac is analogous to measuring the positions of trees and buildings sitting in a slowly moving bus. Sidereal (nirayana) zodiac, on the other hand, considers a fixed zodiac.<br />\n<br />\nIn the sidereal zodiac favoured by Kerala Hindu astrologers the signs more closely overlap with their constellations.<br />\n<br />\nCurrently the difference between the two systems, in terms of the sign placement of a given planet, is about 23.5 degrees (the so-called ayanamsha). The ayanamsa, changes continually through the Precession of the Equinoxes at the rate of approximately 50\" a year.<br />\n<br />\nVEDAS ( WITH YUGAS EXPOUNDED ) WENT OF ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES BEFORE BEING PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURIES AGO. text-decoration-line: none;\">November 15, 2017 at 8:28 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_185MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nThe most famous Egyptian queen was Nefertari , principal wife of King Ramses II.<br />\n<br />\nShe is the most celebrated and widely depicted among the 4 famous Egyptians queens - Cleopatra, Nefertiti, and Hatshepsut.<br />\n<br />\nNefertari was born in the Land of Punt ( North Kerala \u2013where I am from ).&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_185MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n&nbsp;I have seen several depictions of Nefertari burning incense ( from Punt ) in alabaster bowls\u2014which is nothing but a BHARANI from Calicut.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNefertari appears as Ramesses II\u2019s consort on many statues in both Luxor and Karnak.. &nbsp;&nbsp;Nefertari is depicted in statue form at the great temple, in Abu Simbel..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe small temple at Abu Simbel was dedicated to Nefertari and Goddess Hathor.. The dedication text on one of the buttresses states :&nbsp; \u2018\u2019 A temple of great and Mighty monuments, for the Great Royal Wife Nefertari Meryetmut, for whose sake the very sun does shine, given life and beloved\u201d<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe two colossal standing statues of Nefertari in front of the small temple are equal in size to those of Ramesses II. &nbsp;&nbsp;I have seen this and the pyramids / sphinx of Giza.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAfter Nefertari\u2019s death she was buried in tomb QV66 in the Valley of the Queens.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nBelow Goddess Hathor giving the Aankh to Nefertari<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RG7DJM9MIAE\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RG7DJM9MIAE</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nQueen Nefertiti was the chief wife of &nbsp;of Pharaoh Akhenaten<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nNefertiti had many titles including Lady of two lands Punt and Egypt..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nQueen Nefertiti ruled Egypt when her &nbsp;husband Pharaoh Akhentaten was in ill health for a few years before he died. She is remembered as a wise ruler.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nAfter Akhentaten died the people wanted her to continue .. Nefertiti, like &nbsp;female Pharaoh Hatshepsut, assumed the kingship under the name Pharaoh Neferneferuaten after her husband's death.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1GULSVk5dc\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-1GULSVk5dc</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n..<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_185MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; text-align: left;\" /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_189M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Muslims, Jews, Christians etc.<br />\n<br />\nHe had told me of a shrine at Beith Jala near Bethlehem. Previously all faiths used to pray at this PAGAN temple. He said , mad people used to be hit with peacock feathers on the head by the priest.<br />\n<br />\nWELL- THIS IS LIFTED FROM KERALA PRANIK HEAING , WHERE BLACK HOLES IN THE AURA ARE SWIPED OFF<br />\n<br />\nKARALI HAS THIS SYSTEM OF SWIPING THE AURA AND MAKING AN UNCONSCIOUS MAN WAKE UP<br />\n<br />\nI remember watching the Bollywood movie TERE NAAM ( Salman Khan ) who became mad due to head injury and a Muslim Sufi priest used to swipe his head with peacock feathers<br />\n<br />\nIn my home , when I was a small boy we had peacock feathers to dust . Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/11/blockchain-bitcoins-ponzi-part-13-capt.html?showComment=1510901330465#c8599629421260302338\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 17, 2017 at 12:18 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_95MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME \u2013<br />\n<br />\nIF EGYPTIAN QUEENS NEFERTARI, NEFERTITI AND HATSHEPUT ARE FROM PUNT ( MALABAR KERALA) \u2014 WHAT ABOUT CLEOPATRA --- WAS SHE ALSO FROM KERALA ( IN A SACRACSTIC MANNER )<br />\n<br />\nINDEED<br />\n<br />\nAND THIS WILL RAISE MY REVELATIONS TO 51.90 %<br />\n<br />\nLISTEN CLEOPATRAs BABY CAESARION WAS DELIVERED IN ROME BY A SURGERY EXPERT SENT BY THE CALICUT KING ..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS SURGEON WAS KEPT IN THE ROMAN PALACE WELL IN ADVANCE BY JULIUS CAESAR AS AN ASTROLOGER HAD PREDICTED THAT CLEOPATRA WOULD DEVELOP COMPLICATIONS .<br />\n<br />\nVaginal delivery failed and emergency surgery was carried out. The child would have epilepsy later \u2013like his father Julius Caeser.<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A LIE THAT THE PLANETs FIRST CAESAREAN DELIVERY WAS DONE IN ROME.<br />\n<br />\nTHE 6200 YEAR OLD TEXTS OF SUSRUTA ELUCIDATE SUCH CHILD DELIVERIES BY SURGERY<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</span><br />\n<br />\nMUZIRIS PORT IS KODUNGALLUR ( CRANGANORE ) AND WAS OWNED BY THE CALICUT KING<br />\n<br />\nMUZIRIS HAD EXTENSIVE SPICE SHIPPING TRADE WITH THE RED SEA EGYPTIAN PORT OF BERENICE ( BERENIKE ). THE WHITE HISTORIAN HAS THE \u201cMUZIRIS PAPYRUS SCROLL\u201d .<br />\n<br />\nThe Murziris Papyrus tells that a Customs due of 25%, was levied by the King of Calicut on spices imported via Berinice and other Red Sea harbors. The Calicut king has similar customs tax collection/ free trade outposts in Salalah, Mecca, Petra, Madein Saleh, Palmyra( Tadmor ) , Jerusalem, etc<br />\n<br />\nThe main camel overland route for spices was from Palmyra in Syria to Mesopotamia, the Parthian Empire and beyond. A secondary, more northerly overland route branched off from the first and connected Armenia to the western segment of the Silk Road leading to Central Asia. A southern overland route led from Gaza on the Mediterranean, through the Nabataean Kingdom, with Petra at its hub, into Arabia. It served the spice, incense and aromatics trade into the Roman Empire and Constantinople ( by ships )<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nJULIUS CAESAR WAS A HINDU AND SO WERE ALL ROMAN SENATORS ( SORRY ITALIAN WAITRESS ).<br />\n<br />\nCLEOPATRA VII WAS FROM THE LAND OF PUNT ( MALABAR )<br />\nJULIUS CAESARS PERSONAL SWORD WAS FOUND IN KODUNGALLUR AND THE WHITE INVADER TOOK IT AWAY. BUT WE HAVE FOUND HUNDREDS OF GOLD COINS WITH JULIUS CEASARS FACE AND INSCRIPTION ON IT .<br />\n<br />\nCLEOPATRAs SON CAESARION WAS SENT TO BERNICE PORT AS SOON AS CLEOPATRA KNEW THAT JULIUS CAESARs ADOPTED SON OCTAVIAN WOULD COME TO EGYPT TO KILL HER SON<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS OCTAVIAN INVADED EGYPT SON CAESARION ( 15 YEARS OF AGE ) WAS SENT BY SHIP TO MUZIRIS, TO THE CALICUT KING FOR SAFETY , WITH LOT OF GOLD FOR HIS SAFE UPKEEP IN LUXURY<br />\n<br />\nJULIUS CAESARS ONLY SON WAS CHRISTENED AS PTOLEMY XV PHILOPATOR PHILOMETOR CAESAR ON BIRTH. HE WAS EIGIBLE TO RULE BOTH ROMAN EMPIRE AND EGYPT . SUCH WAS HIS ROYAL LINEAGE.<br />\n<br />\nCaesarion ( little Caesar ) born at Rome in 47 BC was the last Pharaoh of the Ptolemaic dynasty. He was NOT killed by Octavian as history suggests .<br />\n<br />\nJulius Caesar was murdered in 44 BC. Cleopatra committed suicide in 30 BC before Octavian ( later Augustus Caesar ) could kill her.<br />\n<br />\nAugustus was Roman emperor from 27 BC until his death in AD 14.. Julius Caesar was his maternal great-uncle .<br />\n<br />\nOctavian was named in Caesar's will as his adopted son and heir.<br />\n<br />\nMark Antony had charged that Octavian had earned his adoption by Caesar through sexual favours<br />\n<br />\nOctavian , Mark Antony, and Marcus Lepidus formed the Second Triumvirate to defeat the assassins of Caesar.<br />\n<br />\nFollowing their victory at the Battle of Philippi, the Triumvirate divided the Roman Republic among themselves and ruled as military dictators. The Triumvirate was eventually torn apart by the competing ambitions of its members.<br />\n<br />\nLepidus was forced into retirement by Octavian in 36 BC. Octavian and Mark Antony were then left in control of the Western and Eastern provinces respectively.<br />\n<br />\nMark Antony committed suicide following his defeat at the Battle of Actium by Octavian in 31 BC.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_95BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedFv3QD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_94T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedFv3QD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_94TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_94TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_94TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedFv3QD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_94TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_94TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedFv3QD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_94TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_94TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_94TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedFv3QD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_94B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"background: rgb(255, 255, 255); position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_94M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/11/blockchain-bitcoins-ponzi-part-13-capt.html?showComment=1510901360352#c2881144180512741929\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 17, 2017 at 12:19 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_94MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nAfter Julius Caesar\u2019s death, Cleopatra needed to maintain a close relationship with Marcus Antonius ( Mark Antony ) because he controlled the eastern Roman Empire, her geographical neighbor.<br />\n<br />\nCleopatra had twins, Alexander Helios and Cleopatra Selene, as well as another son, Ptolemy Philadelphos, all by Marcus Antonius.<br />\nCleopatra lived in Rome with Julius Caesar from 47 BC to 44 BC.<br />\n<br />\nCaesar was assassinated in Rome in 44BCE. Cleopatra took her son back to Egypt and they began to rule there as co-rulers. It was known that while Cleopatra wanted her son to rule the country with her she did not give up any of her authority. This was not surprising since the boy was only three years of age when he was proclaimed King of Egypt.<br />\n<br />\nAfter Cleopatra commited suicide , Octavian then declared himself ruler of Egypt, and went on to become the first Roman emperor, under the name of Augustus.<br />\n<br />\nAfter Octavian\u2019s death Cleopatra\u2019s son went back from Calicut to Egypt as a commoner.<br />\n<br />\nFew images of Caesarion survive. He is thought to be depicted in a partial statue found in the harbor of Alexandria in 1997. He is also portrayed twice in relief, as an adult pharaoh, with his mother on the Temple of Hathor at Dendera. His infant image appears on some bronze coins of Cleopatra.<br />\n<br />\nPLUTARCH HAS WRITTEN THAT CAESARION WAS SENT TO INDIA.<br />\n<br />\nBECAUSE OF PLUTARCH ( 46 AD TO 120 AD ) WE KNOW OF APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ON WHOM JESUS CHRIST ( WHO NEVER EXISTED ) WAS MODELLED AFTER<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCaesarion was born in Egypt on June 23, 47 BC.. Caesarion has his father\u2019s eyes , hair and manners ( including epilepsy )<br />\n<br />\nAfter Caesar's assassination on March 15, 44 BC, Cleopatra and Caesarion returned to Egypt. Caesarion was named co-ruler by his mother on September 2, 44 BC at the age of three, although he was pharaoh in name only, with Cleopatra keeping actual authority all to herself.<br />\n<br />\nCleopatra compared her relationship to her son with the Egyptian goddess Isis and her divine child Horus<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWe have this in our records \u201c Prime Minister Chanakya was concerned that Chandragupta might be poisoned by his enemies, so started introducing small amounts of poison into the emperor\u2019s food in order to build up a tolerance. Chandragupta was unaware of this plan, and shared some of his food with his wife Durdhara when she was very pregnant with their first son. Durdhara died, but Chanakya the professor of Surgery at Taxila university rushed in and performed an emergency operation to remove the full-term baby. The infant Bindusara survived, but a bit of his mother\u2019s poisoned blood touched his forehead, leaving a blue bindu spot that inspired his name\u201d.<br />\nI wonder why we attribute Caesarian births to a Roman king \u2014for he came more than 2 centuries later .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html<br />\n<br />\nWELL WELL- WHAT DO YOU KNOW<br />\n<br />\nRead all 4 parts --<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/apollonius-or-jesus-christ-who-is-real.html</span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedFv3QD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_95b+seedFv3QD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_189B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 20, 2017 at 11:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_191MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASK ME TO GIVE ONE EXAMPLE OF KNOWLEDGE STOLEN FROM ANANYAKAS<br />\n<br />\nANANYAKAS HAD KNOWLEDGE ABOUT VULCANISATION OF RUBBER<br />\n<br />\nSO WHICH WAS THE BEST WAY TO STEAL IT AND HIDE THE SOURCE?<br />\n<br />\nJUST DESTROY THE SOURCE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE INVADER WROTE THAT INDIA DID NOT HAVE ANY RUBBER TREES AND THEY PLANTED IT<br />\n<br />\nSORRY-- RUBBER EXISTED FIRST ON THE WAYANAD MOUNTAINS ON THIS PLANET<br />\n<br />\nWE HEATED RUBBER SAP WITH SULPHUR-- SO THAT IF YOU PULL THE RUBBER IT COMES BACK TO ITS ORIGINAL SHAPE<br />\n<br />\nIN SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM SULPHURE IS CALLED GANDHAKA -- WHEN WE USED THIS TERM ( BOOK RASASHASTRA ) , THE WHITE MAN WAS RUNNING AROUND NAKED USING GRUNT GRUNT FOR LANGUAGE<br />\n<br />\nAYURVEDA USED SUPHUR FOR SKIN CREAMS<br />\n<br />\nSindhoor ( red pigment vermilion ), a pure form of mercuric sulfide, is traditionally obtained by reaction of mercury ( produced by reduction from cinnabar ) with sulfur, since the past 9000 years in India.<br />\n<br />\nIn India , Hindu women show a vermilion dot on the forehead and a line on the hair parting above the dot ( see first picture ) to show that they are married and the husband is still alive.<br />\n<br />\nThe sindoor on the parting in the bride's hair is first applied by the bride groom as a part of the wedding ceremony. After that the bride puts it on her own every day after a bath, till she becomes a widow.<br />\n<br />\nWhen the married woman applied the sindoor on her hair parting everyday, she remembers her husband with gratitude .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS CALLED VULCANISATION<br />\n<br />\nI KNOW MORE ABOUT RUBBER AND LATEX THAN MOST ON THIS PLANET<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/latex-on-chemical-tankers-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHEN RAM CROSSES OVER FROM KERALA TO SRILANKA --HE MADE A BRIDGE WHICH WAS FLOATING IN CERTAIN AREAS -- COIR AND RUBBER ( like mattresses ) WERE USED EXTENSIVELY<br />\n<br />\nEVEN TODAY WE IN KERALA PREFER COIR RUBBERISED MATTRESS-- I SLEEP ON ONE .<br />\n<br />\nIT IS THE BEST MATTRESS EVER-- COOL DUE TO AIR CIRCULATION --SUPPORTS THE SPINE<br />\n<br />\nWhile coir (coconut fibre) by itself does not have any resilience, once processed with latex solution, the coir sheets get resilience and ability to conform to our body shape.<br />\n<br />\nMAYA DANAVA TOOK RUBBER AND VULCANISATION TO PERU<br />\n<br />\nGOOD YEAR WAS NOT EVEN THE WESTERN INVENTOR OF VULCANISATION<br />\n<br />\nA BRIT NAMED THOMAS HANCOCK WAS THE FIRST TO LIFT THE KNOWLEDGE FORM KERALA<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/07/maya-inca-aztec-civilizations-decoded.html<br />\n<br />\nJarana, is a method of stadial consumption or digestion of ever increasing quantities of mica or sulfur by mercury, until mercury is de-toxified and harnessed ( for making PARAD SHIVA LINGAM ) .<br />\n<br />\nMercury is the representation of male (Shiva) form and the chemical element sulfur associated in the solidification process considered as the representation of female (Shakti or Gauri, consort of Shiva) form<br />\n<br />\nSiddhar Tirumular spake:--<br />\n\"Enter the tenth one.\"<br />\nI took what was given me<br />\nand put it in my mouth.<br />\n<br />\nAnd a bunch<br />\nof mercurial amalgams<br />\nI tied onto my wrist.<br />\nOff I went.<br />\nEntering the universe<br />\nof fire and light.<br />\n<br />\nBALLS TO THE LYING WHITE HISTORIAN BASTARDS !<br />\n<br (Rig Veda III 62. 10) which went on oral route for 330 centuries and was penned down 70 centuries ago<br />\n<br />\nThe Vedas proclaim Gayatri to be a Mother as light.<br />\n<br />\nGayatri is chanted for the attainment of universal consciousness and for the awakening of intuitive powers. Gayatri meditation destroys all delusions and energises prana,<br />\n<br />\nTHE EFFICACY OF A SRUTI ( OF VEDA SAMHITA ) IS IN THE SOUND --NOT THE MEANING<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_163b+seedCGv_D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_163b+seedCGv_D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/11/hindu-holocaust-continues-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1511707602711#c5072846834668540758\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 26, 2017 at 8:16 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_185MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nTrikartika, is the festival of lights celebrated in Kerala on the Kartika Nakshatram (star) in the Malayalam month of Vrischikam (November \u2013 December).<br />\n<br />\nIt usually falls on the full moon day in the month and on the day all the houses, streets and temples are well lit with traditional oil lamps. The festival is mainly observed in Kerala<br />\n<br />\nThis occurs on the day when the moon is in conjunction with the constellation Karthigai (Pleiades) and pournami.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe constellation of Karthika are the Pleiades, the Seven wives of the Sapt rishis.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t31lVCPMEZc<br />\n<br />\n#### Sapt rishi husband \u2013 star / Sapt rishi wife #####<br />\n<br />\nKrathu- Dubhe / Santhati<br />\nAtri- Megrez / Anasuya<br />\nVasishta - Mizar / Arundhathi<br />\nAngiras - Alioth / Shraddha<br />\nPulaha- Merak / Havubhuh<br />\nPulastya -Phecd /Gathih<br />\nBhrigu -Alkaid / Puloma<br />\n<br />\nTrikartika, is the festival of lights celebrated in Kerala on the Kartika Nakshatram (star) in the Malayalam month of Vrischikam (November \u2013 December). It usually falls on the full moon day in the month and on the day all the houses, streets and temples are well lit with traditional oil lamps.<br />\nThe lamps are placed on the banana stems supported by coconut leaves.<br />\nThe festival is mainly observed in Kerala for the wives of the Sapt Rishis . In 2017, the date of Thrikarthika is December 3.<br />\nSpecial food for women is prepared using SEVEN tuber roots ( colocasia/ papioca/ elephant yam etc ) with lot of grated coconut on the day and is known as Kartika Puzhukku. They eat under full moon light .<br />\nWHEN I WROTE ABOUT MENSTRUATION CYCLES , PMS PROBLEMS OF WOMEN AND THE MOON , THE CHUTNEY MARYs WHOSE MOTHERS WERE WHORES WENT CRAZY<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/karva-chauth-synchronising-fertility.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/06/chembu-kizhangu-colocasia-and-pms.html<br />\n<br />\nWELL , WHAT DO THESE DAUGHTERS OF WHORES KNOW ?<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_185MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_185BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Does light pollution at nightfall affect the influence of the constellations on earth?</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_219MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-750681058\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_219BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_219B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_226B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c42078564842223304\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_226M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/11/hindu-holocaust-continues-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1511757049155#c42078564842223304\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 27, 2017 at 10:00 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_226MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nWHATEVER IS WRITTEN BY SIR WILLIAM HERSHEL ABOUT BINARY STARS IS STOLEN FROM KERALA ASTROLOGY --WITH HIS OWN SPIN<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nBinary stars are two stars orbiting a common center of mass. The brighter star is officially classified as the primary star, while the dimmer of the two is the secondary<br />\n<br />\nKepler's laws are lifted from ancient Kerala astronomy<br />\n<br />\nKepler\u2019s three laws of planetary motion can be stated as follows: (1) All planets move about the Sun in elliptical orbits, having the Sun as one of the foci. (2) A radius vector joining any planet to the Sun sweeps out equal areas in equal lengths of time. (3) The squares of the sidereal periods (of revolution) of the planets are directly proportional to the cubes of their mean distances from the Sun.<br />\n<br />\nFrom Kepler\u2019s second law, it may be observed further that the angular momentum of any planet about an axis through the Sun and perpendicular to the orbital plane is also unchanging.<br />\n<br />\nBinary stars orbit in ellipses around a common center of mass--at any time, the line that connects the two stars must pass through the center of mass.<br />\n<br />\nBecause the orbits are quite elliptical, the stars must travel at quite different speeds as they orbit.<br />\n<br />\nKepler's third law includes the masses of both objects.<br />\n<br />\nSHIVA LINGAM BLACK METERORITE STONE CAME ON EARTH FROM BINARY STAR MARTHANDA<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/nibiru-planet-x-is-not-marthanda-source.html<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE LIKE NEWTON, HERSHEL AND KEPLER WHO KNEW SHIT ABOUT ASTRONOMY SUDDENLY BECAME GREAT ASTRONOMERS<br />\n<br />\nALBERT EINSTEIN WHO KNEW SHIT ABOUT THE COSMOS SUDDENLY BECAME A GREAT COSMOLOGIST<br />\n<br />\nWHATEVER EINSTEIN WAS AWARDED FOR --WAS STOLEN FROM VEDANTA -- HE DID NOT EVEN HAVE AN UNDERSTANDING<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/yellapragada-subbarow-nobel-prize-and.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE LAWS OF PRECESSION ARE STOLEN FROM VEDANTA. OUR YUGAS ARE BASED ON PRECESSION<br />\n<br />\nQUTAB MINAR IS A REPRESENTATION OF PRECESSION<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html<br />\n<br />\nThe Earth's axis rotates (precesses) just as a spinning top does. The period of precession is about 25765 years. Therefore, the North Celestial Pole will not always be point towards the same starfield. Precession is caused by the gravitational pull of the Sun and the Moon on the Earth.<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHAPE OF QUTAB MINAR SHOWS NUTATION<br />\n<br />\nNutation is a rocking, swaying, or nodding motion in the axis of rotation of a largely axially symmetric object, such as a gyroscope, planet - as an intended behavior of a mechanism.<br />\n<br />\nVISHNU NABHI WITH BRAHMA SITTING ON TOP OF A SWAYING TENDER STALKED LOTUS REPRESENTS WHAT ? ARE WE STUPID ?<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></span></ol>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; The Hindu pilgrims also take bath at a facility attached to the church or at the sea. This custom traces its roots to a mythical story that links the Arthunkal Veluthachan with the Sabarimala Ayyappan. Sabarimala is the second largest pilgrimage site in the world, with 50 million devotees visiting every year.<br />\n<br />\nThe church, officially 'Arthunkal St. Andrew's Forane Church', was originally built by the Portuguese missionaries in the 16th century. It has a fascinating history.[3] The church was rebuilt in 1584, under the then vicar Fr. Jacoma Fenicio, whom the devotees claim, possessed magical powers to heal the body and mind. Devotees fondly referred to him as Arthunkal Veluthachan, which in English translates to fair skinned father. Fr. Fenicio died in 1632. That\u2019s what theoretical physics is all about.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Not only did CUNT Einstein NOT successfully explain why the stars in our galaxy remain in a roughly stable configuration \u2014 because they\u2019re in quasi-stable orbits around the galaxy \u2014 but he also failed to predict the phenomena of the expanding Universe.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Had he gone with the expanding Universe solution instead of the cosmological constant solution to the problem of a Universe that hadn\u2019t yet collapsed into a black hole, that would\u2019ve been correct.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Even today, looking back and recognizing that there is, in fact, a cosmological constant / dark energy component to the Universe, Einstein was still wrong!</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">It isn\u2019t enough to get the right answer in physics, or in science in general. You need to get the right answer for the right reasons</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">A Belgian priest Georges Lema\u00eetre lifted from Vedanta in 1931 \u2013 he said that that the EXPANDING universe originated from a small and compact state, what he called a \"Cosmic Egg\" ( HIRANYAGARBHA ) and what is now called the Big Bang.</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large; font-weight: 700;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><b>Hiranyagarbha is a Sanskrit term that translates to \u201cgolden womb\u201d .&nbsp; &nbsp;It is derived from the root words hiranya, meaning \u201cgolden\u201dand garbha, meaning \u201cwomb,\u201d . The BIG BANG in Vedanta is called the EXHALATION OF BRAHMA</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In hiranyagarbha, the universal womb, everything exists in a potential state.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/07/oort-cloud-hindu-yugas-and-breath-of.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The KALPA VIGRAHA Vishnu idol was carbon dated as 26450 BC. This stunned everybody as Bible said Big Bang happened in 4004 BC</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Hira\u1e47yagarbha S\u016bkta of the Rigveda ( 5000 BC ) declares that God manifested Himself in the beginning as the Creator of the Universe, encompassing all things, including everything within Himself, the collective totality, as it were, of the whole of creation, animating it as the Supreme Intelligence.</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The Hiranyagarbha Sukta in the Rig Veda, the Vayu Purana, Bhagavata Purana , Brahmanda Purana etc mention the golden womb, the Hiranyagarbha or Brahmanda, the Cosmic Egg - that is sometimes interpreted as the golden foetus or embryo - that, floating in a dark void, contracted and gave birth to the universe and all that's part of it - containing both male and female principles in union</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; aakasha beyond..<br />\nWhat cloaked all, where, by whose maya ?<br />\nDid not the cosmic waters pervade dark and deep !.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n\u0928 thus covered<br />\nBurst forth in glory self excited by intent<br />\n<br />\n\u0915\u093e\u092e\u0938\u094d\u0924\u0926\u0917\u094d\u0930\u0946 kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_76b+seedBcV1D\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-size: 16px;\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; text-align: left; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7738364316970763322\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative; text-align: left;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_114M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/08/nasa-dna-building-blocks-in-meteorite.html?showComment=1511936380001#c7738364316970763322\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">November 29, 2017 at 11:49 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_114MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\n\u201cSPEED OF LIGHT\u201d restriction only applies to objects that are moving through spacetime, but it's possible for spacetime itself to expand at a rate such that objects within it are separating faster than the speed of light.<br />\n<br />\nThe observable universe is a spherical region of the Universe comprising all matter that can be observed from Earth at the present time, because electromagnetic radiation from these objects have had time to reach Earth since the beginning of the cosmological expansion. There are at least 2 trillion galaxies in the observable universe, containing more stars than all the grains of sand on planet Earth<br />\n<br />\nThe universe expands at about 70 kilometers per second per megaparsec. This means that a galaxy 1 megaparsec away from us is receding at about 70 km/s, another galaxy 2 megaparsecs away from us is receding at 140 km/s, and so on. This is Hubble's law.<br />\n<br />\nDue to Hubble's law, regions sufficiently distant from the Earth are expanding away from it faster than the speed of light. Special relativity prevents nearby objects in the same local region from moving faster than the speed of light with respect to each other, but there is no such constraint for distant objects when the space between them is expanding. The expansion rate is accelerating due to dark energy.<br />\n<br />\nAssuming dark energy remains constant (an unchanging cosmological constant), so that the expansion rate of the Universe continues to accelerate, there is a \"future visibility limit\" beyond which objects will never enter our observable universe at any time in the infinite future, because light emitted by objects outside that limit would never reach the Earth.<br />\n<br />\nWhen Edwin Hubble examined the velocities of nearby galaxies almost a century ago, he found they were all drifting away from the Milky Way \u2014 and the farther they were, the faster they appeared to be moving. He measured the current rate of recession, now known as the Hubble constant in kilometers per second per megaparsec.<br />\n<br />\nA megaparsec is a million parsecs, and a parsec is 3.26 light-years.<br />\n<br />\nThe universe is expanding - with all of the galaxies moving away from each other. This phenomenon was observed as a RED SHIFT of a galaxy's spectrum. This redshift appeared to be larger for faint, presumably further, galaxies. Hence, the farther a galaxy, the faster it is receding from Earth.<br />\n<br />\nHow can we tell the universe is expanding faster than the speed of light ? The wavelength of a light pulse traveling the universe is stretched as space expands, so the light gets redder. (That is, its wavelength increases.) This so-called cosmological REDSHIFT is measured by astronomers, so distant galaxies can be labeled by their redshift.<br />\n<br />\nThe higher redshift of a galaxy, the faster it is receding from us. For any plausible model of our expanding universe, there exists a relatively simple conversion to translate redshift into recessional velocity. Some of the galaxies we have observed exhibit redshifts resulting in superluminal ( faster than light ) recessional velocities!<br />\n<br />\nNeutrinos, the nearly massless particles that are a fundamental component of the universe, can zip through a million miles of lead without skipping a beat. Neutrinos are among the most abundant particles in the cosmos. With almost no mass and no charge, they rarely interact with matter. Tens of trillions of neutrinos course through our bodies every second. Neutrinos are faster than light.<br />\n<br />\nScalar waves are faster than light<br />\n<br />\nBut fans of mad man Charles Darwin who still hold on to the MAD theory of \u201cmonkey to man\u201d in this DNA age will not agree . For example, the rotation rate of galaxies is much faster than expected based on their visible matter, suggesting there is \"missing\" mass that has so far remained invisible to us.<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J1P5r3IvVrM<br />\n<br />\nQUASAR LIGHT IS SARASWATI ( WIFE OF BRAHMA ) \u2013 DARK ENERGY IS KALI ( WIFE OF SHIVA )<br />\n<br />\nSCIENCE WILL MEET WITH VEDANTA IN ANOTHER 500 YEARS<br />\n<br />\nHOW MUCH THE WHITE MAN RIDICULED VEDANTA FOR SAYING SHIVA LINGAM PROVIDES THE SEED ( DNA )<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/nasa-dna-building-blocks-in-meteorite.html<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QAa2O_8wBUQ<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_114b+seedQKXD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_114b+seedQKXD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Serapeum of Alexandria was closed in July of 325 AD, on the orders of Roman Emperor Constantine the Great..., the Serapeum was the largest and most magnificent of all temples in the Greek quarter of Alexandria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Besides the image of the god, the temple precinct housed an offshoot collection of the great Library of Alexandria.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">UNKNOWN TO ALL A BIG SECTION OF THE LIBRARY WAS UNDERGROUND IN A SUBTERRANEAN VAULT--AND MANY BOOKS ABOUT APOLLONIUS OF TYANA WERE RESCUED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Later a decree of Coptic Christian pope Theophilus of Alexandria in AD 391 called for all rescued books to be hunted down and burned<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Hindu Manichaeans were burnt alive along with their Hindu scriptures and books on Apollonius of Tyana<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Thousands of followers of Apollonius of Tyna were put to death \u2013and lot of the survivors came running to Calicut by ship \u2013 they were NOT Jews\u2014 they were Hindus , a sect named MANICHAEANS..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Even today Christian In Kerala call each other CHAENS . ( chayyan )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">EVIL CYRIL WAS SAINTED LIKE EVIL MOTHER TERESA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Namboodiri woman mathematician Hypatia would be murdered by a Christian mob in an revenge assault instigated by Cyril, the bishop's nephew and successor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With her death, the glory of Alexandria finally was extinguished.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hypatia was on deputation to the Alexandia school of Math , the wife of a Namboodiri Astronomer / Ayurveda professor, from the Kodungallur University , owned by the Calicut King ( my hometown )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia&nbsp;&nbsp;was pulled down from her chariot, and dragged naked through the streets. ( IN THE LINK BELOW I HAVE SHOWN THE PAINTING )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/st-patrick-genocide-of-druids-pope-leo.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Her father Theon was a professor in Geometry and Math. The University of Alexandria was headed by a Namboodiri professor named Orestes .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The great Library of Alexandria had a million books on its shelves containing Pagan knowledge . As a professor at the university, Hypatia and her father Theon were always inside this library.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia's death ( hacked into pieces on the streets ) is a watershed mark in history delineating the classical age of Hindu paganism from the age of Christianity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Cyril was made Pope or Patriarch of Alexandria on 18 October 412<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Hypatia was a beautiful woman who would wear a sari -- the pieces of her body, carried around by the Christian mob through the streets of Alexandria, are finally burned together with her books in a place called Cynaron.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">IN THE LINK ABOVE YOU CAN SEE A PICTURE OF HYPATHIA ( MATH PROFESSOR ON DEPUTATION FROM KODUNGALLUR UNIVERSITY --LIKE HER MATH PROFESSOR FATHER THEON ) TEACHING AT THE UNIVERSITY OF ALEXANDRIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE POPE SANK ALL REFERENCES TO HYPATIA .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">WHY WAS THE GREAT LIBRARY OF ALEXANDRIA BURNT?&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">TO SINK APOLLONIUS OF TYANA --&nbsp;&nbsp;A KERALA SAGE WHO WAS BEING WORSHIPED AS GOD..&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;HE WAS A SPIRITUAL ANCHOR FOR ROMANS WHO WENT THROUGH TEN DESPOT ROMAN EMPERORS IN HIS LIFETIME<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; font-size: medium; text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">THE COLOSSEUM OF ROME ( CONSTRUCTED ON TOP OF A DRIED UP LAKE ) WAS NOT MADE FOR BLOODSPORT.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;IT WAS MADE FOR HEARING THE SPEECHES OF APOLLONIUS OF TYANA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; MOMENTUM \u2013<br />\n-- That every object will remain at rest or in uniform motion in a straight line unless compelled to change its state by the action of an external force.<br />\n... \u0935\u0947\u0917\u0903 \u0928\u093f\u092e\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u0935\u093f\u0936\u0947\u0937\u093e\u0924 \u0915\u0930\u094d\u092e\u0923\u094b \u091c\u093e\u092f\u0924\u0947 |<br />\n--- In an inertial reference frame, the vector sum of the forces F on an object is equal to the mass m of that object multiplied by the acceleration a of the object: F = ma ( for projectile ).<br />\n... \u0935\u0947\u0917\u0903 \u0928\u093f\u092e\u093f\u0924\u094d\u0924\u093e\u092a\u0947\u0915\u094d\u0937\u093e\u0924 \u0915\u0930\u094d\u092e\u0923\u094b \u091c\u093e\u092f\u0924\u0947 \u0928\u093f\u092f\u0924\u0926\u093f\u0915 \u0915\u094d\u0930\u093f\u092f\u093e\u092a\u094d\u0930\u092c\u0928\u094d\u0927\u0939\u0947\u0924\u0941 |<br />\nRather he wrote further about scalar howitzers using the formula<br />\nE = t MC2.<br />\n( delta t is change in time for scalar brahmastras )<br />\n---- That for every action (force) in nature there is an equal and opposite reaction.<br />\nWhether leaf falls on thorn or thorn falls on leaf effect is same.<br />\n... \u0935\u0947\u0917\u0903 \u0938\u0902\u092f\u094b\u0917\u0935\u093f\u0936\u0947\u0937\u0935\u093f\u0930\u094b\u0927\u0940 |<br />\n--- That if two objects A and B collide in an isolated system, the total momentum of the two objects before the collision is equal to the total momentum of the two objects after the collision.<br />\nKashyapa is NOT a Sapt Rishi<br />\n- as falsely claimed by Wikipedia.<br />\nKashyapa\u2019s ( Not Kanada ) wife is Danu<br />\n- from whom Danava race originated. I am a Danava.<br />\nIn the Rigveda (I.32.9) 5000 BC<br />\n-Danu is the mother of Vritra, the great serpent slain by Indra.<br />\nAs early as 2500 BC, Greeks Leucippus and Democritus who studied in Kodungallur University, stole Kashyapa\u2019s atomic theories and patented it in their names.<br />\nGreek thieves Leucippus and Democritus wrote<br />\n\u2013 Straight lift WORD BY WORD from Vaisheshika Sutra..<br />\n1. Matter is composed of atoms separated by empty space through which the atoms move.<br />\n2. Atoms are solid, homogeneous, indivisible, and unchangeable.<br />\n3. All apparent changes in matter result from changes in the groupings of atoms.<br />\n4. There are different kinds of atoms that differ in size and shape.<br />\n5. The properties of matter reflect the properties of the atoms the matter contains.<br />\nThe white Christian historian dated Kashyapa at 200 BC because the creation of cosmos -<br />\n- BIG BANG in the Bible, was put as 4004 BC.<br />\nMaharishi Kanad wrote:<br />\nQUOTE;<br />\nWays to Increase the Speed For quick action, it is important to take care of the rules-- Rapidly Special philosophy<br />\n-- That is, velocity or motion occurs due to the excitement and special action on the five substances and due to the action in the regular direction, the combination is destroyed by special or generated. UNQUOTE<br />\nThe Vai\u015be\u1e63ika S\u016btra is written in aphoristic sutras style, and presents its theories on the creation and existence of the universe using naturalistic atomism, applying logic and realism, and is<br />\n- THE earliest known systematic realist ontology in human history.<br />\nGerman Jew Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche had read Kashyapa\u2019s works<br />\n\u2013 He wrote;<br />\n\u201c With piety and knowledge of the Vedas, nothing is impossible \".<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\n############<br />\n<br />\nDALTON STOLE HIS ATOMIC THEORY FROM MAHARISHI KASHYAPA ( KANADA MUNI )<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/daltons-atomic-theory-sage-kashyapa-and.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nShreem</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nDecember 3, 2017 at 2:55 PM</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nCould you explain why you say Silapathikaram is bullshit? It has nothing to do with agamas.</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\n############</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #eeeeee;\">\nCapt. text-decoration-line: none;\">December 6, 2017 at 3:13 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_194MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA HAS NEVER ADVOCATED BHAKTI\u2014RATHER IT ADVOCATED SHRADDA AND DHARMA\u2014 OBEDIENCE TO THE LAWS OF RIGHTEOUSNESS<br />\n<br />\nSTAND UP FOR WHAT IS RIGHT, EVEN IF YOU HAVE TO STAND ALONE AGAINST THE HOWLING MOB.<br />\n<br />\nWHEN FORCED TO CHOSE BETWEEN PEACE AND RIGHTEOUSNESS CHOOSE THE LATTER<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n\u092f\u0924\u094d\u0930 \u092f\u094b\u0917\u0947\u0936\u094d\u0935\u0930: \u0915\u0943\u0937\u094d\u0923\u094b \u092f\u0924\u094d\u0930 \u092a\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0925\u094b \u0927\u0928\u0941\u0930\u094d\u0927\u0930: |<br />\n\u0924\u0924\u094d\u0930 \u0936\u094d\u0930\u0940\u0930\u094d\u0935\u093f\u091c\u092f\u094b \u092d\u0942\u0924\u093f\u0927\u094d\u0930\u0941\u0935\u093e \u0928\u0940\u0924\u093f\u0930\u094d\u092e\u0924\u093f\u0930\u094d\u092e\u092e || 78||<br />\n<br />\nyatra yoge\u015bhvara\u1e25 k\u1e5bi\u1e63h\u1e47o yatra p\u0101rtho dhanur-dhara\u1e25<br />\ntatra \u015bhr\u012br vijayo bh\u016btir dhruv\u0101 n\u012btir matir mama<br />\n<br />\nyatra\u2014wherever; yoga-\u012b\u015bhvara\u1e25\u2014Shree Krishna, the Lord of Yog; k\u1e5bi\u1e63h\u1e47a\u1e25\u2014Shree Krishna; yatra\u2014wherever; p\u0101rtha\u1e25\u2014Arjun, the son of Pritha; dhanu\u1e25-dhara\u1e25\u2014the supreme archer; tatra\u2014there; \u015bhr\u012b\u1e25\u2014opulence; vijaya\u1e25\u2014victory; bh\u016bti\u1e25\u2014prosperity; dhruv\u0101\u2014unending; n\u012bti\u1e25\u2014righteousness; mati\u1e25 mama\u2014my opinion<br />\n<br />\nBG 18.78: Wherever there is Shree Krishna, the Lord of all Yog, and wherever there is Arjun, the supreme archer, there will also certainly be unending opulence, victory, prosperity, and the immutable law of righteousness. Of this, I am certain.<br />\n<br />\nSEER Sanjaya wanted to very subtly inform blind king Dhritraashtra that the Paandava army would be victorious, and that his sons, the Kauravas, would be annihilated. This was bound to happen because the world\u2019s foremost warrior, Arjuna, and Shri Krishna, the lord of all yogas, were on the opposing side of the Kauravas. There was not even a tiny chance that the Kauravas would win the war. This was the conclusive answer to the first line of the Gita, where Dhritraashtra wanted to know what did the Kauravas and Paandavas do on the battlefield.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nRegardless of how much time and effort we put into any action, we cannot be assured of success.. Self effort or purushaartha alone cannot guarantee a result<br />\n<br />\nThe Bhagavad-gita had commenced with Dhrtrastra asking Sanjaya about the occurrence on the battlefield, because he was worried about the fate of his sons. Sanjaya concludes this part of the conversation by indicating to Dhrtrastra that since Krishna and Arjuna are personally present on the battle field, victory, power and opulence are assured. Thus the Pandavas were sure to win and the Kurus headed by Duryodhana were certain to face defeat.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_195b+seeditXD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_195b+seeditXD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; text-align: justify;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</span><br />\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">-</span>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 84, BELOW--</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2018/01/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><b><span style=\"color: red;\">-</span></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yGkK0-ueNDA/WQRzU6BpfhI/AAAAAAABS60/AXGQHNOC3PYMeojwctLyEI7n2f4PcnPzACLcB/s1600/20161222_120707_resized.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-yGkK0-ueNDA/WQRzU6BpfhI/AAAAAAABS60/AXGQHNOC3PYMeojwctLyEI7n2f4PcnPzACLcB/s640/20161222_120707_resized.jpg\" width=\"386\" /></a></div>\n<br />\nCAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n", "author": {"id": "14410812789424637654", "displayName": "Capt. font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7259095234279166275\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_266M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/revamp-indian-technical-education.html?showComment=1493350382786#c7259095234279166275\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 28, 2017 at 9:03 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_266MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi pkp,<br />\n<br />\nWHY DID THE DESCENDANTS OF A GANG OF WHITE SKINNED JEWS FROM ANCIENT KHAZAR AREA ( GEORGIA ) DECIDE TO MIGRATE TO PALESTINE AFTER WW2 ?<br />\n<br />\nIT IS ABOUT ONLY ONE SINGLE THING --<br />\n<br />\nAN ENTIRELY CRIMINAL AND CULTURELESS WHITE GANG HAS GRABBED PALESTINE -- AND CLAIMED AN ANCIENT CIVILIZATION AND CULTURE FOR THEMSELVES AND GRABBED ALL DUE RESPECT--WHICH WAS NEVER THEIRS.<br />\n<br />\nAN EXAMPLE WOULD BE SOME BLACK GANG FROM CONGO CONVERTING TO ROMAN ANCIENT RELIGION ( PAGAN HINDU ) TODAY AND THEN GRABBING THE GLORY OF ROME AFTER 500 YEARS .<br />\n<br />\nTHE ITALIAN WAITRESS DOES NOT KNOW THE GLORY OF ROME IS HINDU-- ALL ROMAN SENATORS WERE HINDU. ALL ROMAN CAESARS WERE HINDU.. EVERY ROMAN ANCIENT RUIN IS HINDUS.<br />\n<br />\nTHE WHITE JEWS THEN CREATED THEIR OWN HEROES LIKE ALBERT EINSTEIN --JUST AN EXAMPLE -AND THEY CONVERTED THEMSELVES TO BE THE MOST BRAINY . font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can observe the\nmovement of pendulum clocks.&nbsp;&nbsp; Two\nsimilar clocks can be kept in close proximity, their pendulums, no matter how\nthey started swinging initially, would soon fall into a precise anti-synchrony\n(swinging precisely in the same rhythm, but in exactly opposite directions).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
