, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On\nthe biological plane, the principle is known as biosynchronization.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Examples\ninclude circadian rhythms governing metabolism, synchronization of menstrual\ncycles among women who live closely together ( <span style=\"background-color: white;\">I would have written more in my\nKarva Chauth post \u2013it is now gone forever</span> ) , and movements of fish schools and\nflocks of migratory birds. Essentially, it is about saving energy: when part of\na coherent group momentum, an individual conserves energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound is THE most\npowerful means of entraining brainwave patterns. Brainwaves will time\nthemselves to external sound pulses, if we provide those pulses at specific\nbrainwave speeds<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normal daily awareness,\nthe so-called Beta wave pattern, is characterized by electrical activity at\n13-30 cycles per second.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If someone in their ordinary state listens to sounds\npulsing at 4.5 cycles per second, a frequency characteristic of Theta brainwave\nstates, his or her brain will naturally synchronize to the sound, thus inducing\na theta state. Theta is, essentially, \u201cwhere the brain goes when it is dreaming..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our sages knew the\nhealing powers -using sound to induce Theta states or \u201cwaking dreams.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/sound-magic-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/sound-magic-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Binaural beats\ninvariably induced synchronization of electrical activity in the right and left\nhemispheres, something that rarely occurs in ordinary waking consciousness.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is explained by the fact that each ear is physiologically\n\"hardwired\" to both hemispheres. Each hemisphere has its own olivary\nnucleus, which processes sound signals.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When someone perceives a binaural beat,\nthere are actually two standing waves of equal amplitude and frequency present,\none in each hemisphere. These two standing waves entrain portions of each\nhemisphere to the same frequency.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/7000-year-old-vedic-brain-wave-theories.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/7000-year-old-vedic-brain-wave-theories.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By entraining\nbrainwaves with binaural beats using headphones, it is possible to float the\nbrain in this state of hemispheric synchronization for prolonged periods. Each\ntime we do this, it is like exercising a new brain function, which makes the\nbrain more able to engage this function as it's normal repertoire of behavior<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Using sound in these\nways, it is possible to make profound changes in brainwave patterns and states\nof consciousness, observable on brainwave mapping equipment (EEG), as well as\npositive changes in the body, measurable with blood tests, bio-feedback\nequipment and other sophisticated procedures.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We are also able to influence the\ncore balance and functioning of the brain and central nervous system as a whole<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can use sound to\nbalance a patient\u2019s sympathetic and parasympathetic nervous system activity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We can assess HRV (\nheart rate variability ) &nbsp;to correlate\nchanges in sympathetic and parasympathetic tone with changes in brainwave\nactivity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most overly stressed\npeople show sympathetic dominance all of the time. They are unable to relax,\ncannot wind down, and have difficulty sleeping. People with clinical depression\nshow a different pattern, characterized by high levels of both anxiety and\ninhibition.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They usually show both high sympathetic and high parasympathetic\ntone,&nbsp; like having your feet on the gas\npedal and the brake at the same time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Below: The 108 elements of the Periodic table is a sound keyboard .&nbsp;</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_28.html?showComment=1493391756951#c4573070919006916702\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 28, 2017 at 8:32 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_48MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi a,<br />\n<br />\nEVEN WIKIPEDIA HAS COPIED FROM THIS BLOGSITE ABOUT PANINI<br />\n<br />\n108 ELEMENTS IS ATTACHED TO HE DIGITAL VERSION OF OM<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A GRAND DIVINE 108 MUSICIAN ORCHESTRA<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dmitri_Mendeleev</span><br />\n<br />\nQUOTE : By giving Sanskrit names to his \"missing\" elements, Mendeleev showed his appreciation and debt to the Sanskrit grammarians of ancient India, who had created sophisticated theories of language based on their discovery of the two-dimensional patterns in basic sounds. Mendeleev was a friend and colleague of the Sanskritist B\u00f6htlingk, who was preparing the second edition of his book on P\u0101\u1e47ini[33] at about this time, and Mendeleev wished to honor P\u0101\u1e47ini with his nomenclature.[34] Noting that there are striking similarities between the periodic table and the introductory \u015aiva S\u016btras in P\u0101\u1e47ini's grammar, Prof. Kiparsky says: \"The analogies between the two systems are striking. Just as Panini found that the phonological patterning of sounds in the language is a function of their articulatory properties, so Mendeleev found that the chemical properties of elements are a function of their atomic weights. Like Panini, Mendeleev arrived at his discovery through a search for the \"grammar\" of the elements...[35]\" UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nMY RUSSIAN OFFICERS HAVE SHOWN ME WHAT IS WRITTEN IN RUSSIAN<br />\n<br />\nTHERE ARE 54 TRIPLE INTERSECTIONS IN SRI YANTRA-- 54 IS THE NUMBER OF ALPHABETS IN SANSKRIT AND MALAYALAM ( THERE ARE NO OTHER )<br />\n<br />\nIN SHIVA SHAKTI FORMAT IT IS 108<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/12/108-numerical-equivalent-of-hindu-king.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBR AMBEDKAR WHO RIDICULED VEDAS WILL NEVER UNDERSTAND AL THIS<br />\n<br />\n4000 years ago Adi Shankaracharya wrote \u2013<br />\nShivah Shakthyaa Yuktho Yadi Bhavathi Shakthaha Prabhavithum<br />\nNa Chedevam Devo Na Khalu Kushalaha Sphandithumapi<br />\n<br />\nTranslation Verse No 1 : Shiva becomes capable of creating the Universe, only when united with Shakti , but otherwise , He is incapable of even a stir.<br />\n<br />\nThe whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva and Shakti.<br />\n<br />\nTantric art has captured the images of the Shiva ( Purusha ) and his consort, Shakti ( Pragati ), in ecstatic union. This is NOT perverted sex.<br />\n<br />\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept. The shallow white mind can never discern this<br />\n<br />\nShiva is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Shakti as the embodiment of pure energy.<br />\n<br />\nBoth Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<br />\n<br />\nThrough uniting with Shiva , Shakti gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small atheist/ white minds)<br />\n<br />\nWhen the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<br />\n<br />\nShiva ( Purusha) symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Shakti ( Pragati ) symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<br />\n<br />\nThe cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love in the midst of a grand orchestra. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy experienced within each of us, regardless of gender.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_48MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_48BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_48B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_49B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c931535695901559035\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_49M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<br />\n<br />\nShakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<br />\n<br />\nModern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy . In the highest planes they are interchangeable, which is why we see a great incongruence between our spiritual experiences and the external reality.<br />\n<br />\nIn the higher metaphysical realms and subtle planes of our consciousness the physical laws of our universe lose their validity.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\">DO YOU THINK BR AMBEDKAR / EVR PERIYAR CAN EVER UNDERSTAND ALL THIS?</b></div>\n<br />\nTayor yad yamalam rupam sa samghatta iti smrtah---<br />\nAnanda-saktih saivokta yato visvam visrjyati,<br />\nNa Sivah Saktirahito na Saktih Sivavarjita. --- (Tantraloka-Ahnika, 3.5000 BC)<br />\n<br />\n\"The coupled form of these two (Shiva-Shakti) is called junction. That is called the blissful Shakti from which creation arises.<br />\n<br />\nThere is no Shiva without Shakti, nor Shakti without Shiva.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\">The Vedas are a worthless set of books. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM stands for rapid eye movement. During REM sleep, your eyes move quickly in\ndifferent directions. That doesn't happen during non-REM sleep.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">First comes non-REM\nsleep, followed by a shorter period of REM sleep, and then the cycle starts\nover again. Dreams typically happen during REM sleep.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usually, REM sleep\nhappens 90 minutes after you fall asleep. The first period of REM typically\nlasts 10 minutes. Each of your later REM stages gets longer, and the final one\nmay last up to an hour. Your heart rate and breathing quickens.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can have intense\ndreams during REM sleep, since your brain is more active.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Babies can spend up to\n50% of their sleep in the REM stage, compared to only about 20% for adults.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I MEASURE MY REM SLEEP\nDAILY USING A WRIST BAND. Suryanamaskar gives\nyou better REM sleep.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During REM sleep the brain transfers valuable information\nfrom the conscious brainlobe to the sub-conscious brain lobe. For a right\nhander the subconscious brainlobe is the RIGHT brain lobe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">REM sleep is an active\nperiod of sleep marked by intense brain activity. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the soldiers of Alexander the great saw\nthis they became very afraid.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As NON \u2013REM&nbsp;\nsleep deepens, a person\u2019s brain waves slow down and gain amplitude, both\nbreathing and the heart rate slow down\u2026&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This unihemispheric sleep state enables\ndolphins and whales&nbsp;&nbsp; to keep one eye\nopen, to come up by lashing their tails to the surface for air&nbsp; even while they\u2019re asleep.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/U7D-fRx88qY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/U7D-fRx88qY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only dolphins and\nwhales have horizontal tail\u2014they are mammals not fishes ..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ShPrjpEPmck/WQQ3R6PDPUI/AAAAAAABS6k/pNKFD0OVbJYkXA0TULlfkMFS_FX6xN9MwCLcB/s1600/downxxxxload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Have you seen\nflamingos sleep on one leg ?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vYGs__GP7mw/WQQ2o_ppQ6I/AAAAAAABS6c/DmlRf8RXvz4-hKCyJILbbD7niGH7Sk_mwCLcB/s1600/dowssqnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The corpus\ncallosum \u2013 the bundle of fibers that links the brain\u2019s two hemispheres and\nallows neural signals to flow between them..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Split brain patients are those who\nunderwent surgery to sever the corpus callosum, the nerve tract connecting the\ntwo hemispheres of the brain. Ancient sages needed NO such surgery, they could\ndo this at will.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Split-brain patients\ncan only respond to stimuli in the right visual field with their right hand and\nvice versa. This was taken as evidence that severing the corpus callosum causes\neach hemisphere to gain its own consciousness. This is nonsense as there is\nunity of consciousness in split-brain patients\u2014and&nbsp; the body has gut feelings <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AMERICAN JEWS STOLE THE\nWORK OF DR SHIRO ISHII BY QUID PRO QUO\u2014TO SAVE THE JAPANESE EMPEROR <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/10/doctor-death-shiro-ishii-emperor.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/10/doctor-death-shiro-ishii-emperor.html</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is most difficult\nto be awakened during SWS, ( SLOW WAVE SLEEP )&nbsp;\nand people may feel groggy or disoriented for several minutes after they\nwake up from this stage. During SWS, some children experience bedwetting, night\nterrors, or sleepwalking.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleepwalkers often have\nlittle or no memory of the incident, as their consciousness has altered into a\nstate in which it is harder to recall memories. Although their eyes are open,\ntheir expression is dim and glazed over.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sleepwalking may last as little as 30\nseconds or as long as 30 minutes. Scientists often use EEG to precisely capture\neach sleep stage, which involves placing 256 electrodes against a person\u2019s\nscalp to monitor the number and size of brainwaves at different frequencies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WATER DROP DRIP ON\nFOREHEAD IS THE GREATEST OF ALL TORTURES\u2014IT CAN BREAK DOWN ANY MAN WHO CAN\nABSORB PAIN OUTSIDE THE PAIN THRESHOLD.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nI SHOULD NOT HAVE TOLD THIS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_106B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1692368086098259444\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_106M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. JETHRO A KERALA NAMBOODIRI WAS A VEGETARIAN..<br />\n<br />\nBULLSHIT BIBLICAL STORIES TALK ABOUT MOUNTAINS IN EGYPT-- SORRY- THERE ARE NO SUCH MOUNTAINS IN EGYPT<br />\n<br />\nJESUS CHRIST NEVER EXISTED--RED SEA NEVER PARTED--ALL THIS IS A FUCKIN' LIE !<br />\n<br />\nJethro, known as Nabi Schweib by the Druze, was a Midianite (Exodus 18:1), a tribe descending from Keturah, a wife of Abraham (Genesis 25:1-2). Genesis (25:6) describes that Abraham sent the sons of Keturah to the East.<br />\n<br />\nRabbi Menashe Ben Israel (Glazerson, 1984) asserts that Abraham sent them to land of OPHIR ( North Kerala ) by ship<br />\n<br />\nIn Exodus (Chapter 18), Jethro brings Zipporah and her two sons to Moses, and Moses bows down and kisses Jethro.<br />\n<br />\nThen Jethro praises the God of the Jews and \"took a burnt-offering and sacrifices for God; and Aaron came, and all the elders of Israel, to eat bread with Moses' father-in-law before God.\"<br />\n<br />\nJethro admonishes Moses for placing himself (Moses) as direct arbitrator for all decisions, great and small. Also, he introduces his remarks by stating: \"Hearken now unto my voice, I will give thee counsel, and God be with thee.\" It sounds like Jethro has quite a bit of authority, granted by God Himself. According to Exodus, \"Moses did all that he [Jethro] had said.\"<br />\n<br />\nBefore returning to Egypt, Moses asks Jethro's permission to embark on the journey (Exodus 4:18).<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE WRITTEN SEVERAL TIMES THAT JETHRO ( BEING AN INDIAN ) WAS SUBSTITUTED BY JEWS. JETHRO WAS SUNK AND BURIED BY WHITE JEWS<br />\n<br />\nThe first sacrifice in Israel was offered up not by Moses but by the Midianite priest Jethro<br />\n<br />\nJethro was the first priest of the Israeli nation-- Hindu Jethro instructed Moses and Aaron in the practices of priesthood<br />\n<br />\nMoses asked Jethro to be his guide<br />\n<br />\nIn The Midrash Rabbah (1977, Vol. 3: Numbers, p. 90) it is stated: \"The east ( OPHIR ) is the source from which light goes forth into the world, and there camped the standard of Judah which bred kings, scholars, and men of pious deeds.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/land-of-punt-ophir-and-sheba-is-north.html</span><br />\n<br />\nLegends of the Jews (1925, Vol. 5, p. 196) delineates stories of sages who went to India to obtain \"plants of paradise,\" and narrates how Solomon (Vol. 4, p. 149) secured water with special healing powers from India.<br />\n<br />\nAnd in Volume 1, page 11, of The Legends of the Jews, it is written: \"Beyond the inhabited parts to the east is Paradise with its seven divisions, each assigned to the pious of a certain degree.\"<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_106MN\" kind=\"m\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_106BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; Her tomb Ein Qiniyye and Jethro's tomb is at Nabi Shu'ayb -- a place for pilgrimage.<br />\n<br />\nHINDU DRUZE TOOK UP ARMS ( KALARI ) WHEN WARRANTED --AND THEY WERE LEFT ALONE ( MOUNT HERMON ) .<br />\n<br />\nThe Hindu temple of Qasr Antar, dedicated to IMHOTEP ( Lord Ayyappa ) was the highest temple of the ancient world, sitting at 9,300 feet above sea level..<br />\n<br />\nAn inscription on the stele was translated by George Nickelsburg to read--<br />\n\u201cAccording to the command of the greatest and Holy God, those who take an oath (proceed) from here.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nHermon was said to have become known as \u201cthe mountain of oath\u201d by Charles Simon Clermont-Ganneau.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/imhotep-patron-saint-of-freemasons-capt.html</span><br />\n<br />\nWHITE JEW LIES WONT WORK ANYMORE<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/secret-excavations-at-jerusalem-by.html</span><br />\n<br />\nThe Temples of Mount Hermon are around thirty Shrines and temples that are dispersed around the slopes of Mount Hermon in Lebanon , Syria and Palestine.<br />\n<br />\n27 temples are dispersed in the Beqaa Valley, all temples are mysteriously oriented to Qasr Antar<br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS A CHRISTIAN CUNT CLAIMING EVERYTHING FOR JESUS .<br />\n<br />\nJESUS NEVER EXISTED --BUT WAS COOKED UP AT THE FIRST COUNCIL OF NICEA BY ROMAN EMPEROR CONSTANTIN THE GREAT ( TO SINK APOLLONIUS OF TYANA--A HINDU SAGE FROM KERALA )<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/the-huge-statue-of-colossus-of-rome-at.html<br /><br />https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qP158uWce8w</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_158M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 10, 2017 at 9:07 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_158MC\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://www.timesnownews.com/india/article/banaras-hindu-university-triple-talaq-nikkah-halala-alauddin-khilji-political-science-question-paper-ma-students-master-of-arts-degree/143420<br />\n<br />\nNOBODY IN INDIA HEARD OF CHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT TILL THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA..'<br />\n<br />\nCHAITANYA MAHAPRABHU AND BHAKTI MOVEMENT ARE JEW ROTHSCHILDs FAKE AND BACKDATED CREATIONS.<br />\n<br />\nSANATANA DHARMA ALLOWS ONLY SHRADDHA --NEVER BHAKTI....<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nAll the BHAKTI MOVEMENT HEROES are FAKE and backdated creations of Jew Rothschild who ruled India \u2014the most famous being the DASA characters .<br />\n<br />\nJew Rothschild\u2019s historians LIED that Bhakti movement was a revival, reworking and recontextualisation of ancient Vedic traditions..<br />\n<br />\nIn Sanatana Dharma the six virtues are Sama, dama, uparati, titiksha, SHRADDHA and samadhana..<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna also gives importance to Shraddha and says in the Bhagavad Gita:--<br />\n<br />\nOne who has Shraddha ( not BHAKTI ) gains knowledge.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha hrudayya yakutyaa shradhayaa vindate vasu. --(Rig Veda 10/151/4) 5000 BC.<br />\nMeaning: Shraddha (faith) is the symbol of the high sentiment of the heart.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha cannot be aptly translated into English. Loosely put, it may be be called faith / trust.<br />\n<br />\nYour willingness to know the unknown is shraddha...shraddha is not blind faith, but enlightened faith based on verification.<br />\n<br />\nIf your mind is fixed, and says \u201cThat\u2019s it. I know it all\u201d, that is ego. The more you know, the more will be the feeling that you don\u2019t know. Recognition of the unknown is Shraddha....<br />\n<br />\nShraddha means unwavering faith in the sacred scriptures or shastras and in the moral codes they contain as well as in the atma ( soul )...<br />\n<br />\nThe shastras are designed to ensure the peace and prosperity of the world and the spiritual perfection of mankind..<br />\n<br />\nThis is not blind faith like is SINGLE MESSIAH, SINGLE HOLY BO RELIGIONS...<br />\n<br />\nIt is based on accurate reasoning, evidence and experience. Then only it can be lasting faith. Then only it can be perfect, unshakeable faith....<br />\n<br />\nSuperstitious beliefs, beliefs in mere religious traditions ( like AGAMA ) or social customs cannot help one in spiritual advancement......<br />\n<br />\nNo spiritual progress is possible without shraddha. ..From shraddha comes nistha or one-pointed devotion and from nistha comes self-realization. If the faith is flickering, it will die soon and the aspirant will be drifted aimlessly hither and thither...<br />\n<br />\nAncient maharishis talked about the quality of \u201cshraddha\u201d which is a positive energy that comes from within. ..<br />\n<br />\nShraddha should not be translated as a \u201csimple\u201d faith / trust, --it also conveys mental and intellectual firmness...<br />\n<br />\nSINGING BHAJANS LIKE ASSHOLES ( BHAKTI MOVEMENT OF JEW ROTHSCHILD ) BEATING DHOLAKS AND SHAKING ASS , HAS NEVER BEEN PART OF HINDUISM.<br />\n<br />\nBHAJANS IN VERNACULAR ARE NOT MANTRAS IN SANSKRIT..<br />\n<br />\nIn the opening verses of the 17th chapter OF Bhagwad Gita , Krishna says that faith results from our most steadfast convictions.<br />\n<br />\nWhen our mind is pure, he says, we find faith in benevolence, having little attachment to what we ourselves can gain.<br />\n<br />\nAt such times, faith leads us to value yoga as a means for curtailing sorrow and suffering, and for directing our mind toward transcendental truths.<br />\n<br />\nYoga itself is an act of faith arising from the heart, and by having faith in the fundamental aims of yoga, \u201ca faithful person obtains knowledge.\u201d (Bhagawad Gita 4.39- 4000 BC)<br />\n<br />\nA Hindu free of BHAKTI dogma ( like in other single holy book religions ) is skeptical when this question of trust / faith arises because faith is always understood to be blind faith.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is more than mere faith. It also implies self\u2013reliance, an independent sense of right and wrong, reliance on conscience and the courage of one\u2019s own conviction<br />\n<br />\nSHRADDA WAS REPLACED BY BHAKTI (BLIND DEVOTION ) AND SANATANA DHARMA WAS HIJACKED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_158BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Yet, no white man understood the Earth's magnetic field until the 20th century.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Mahabharata Arjuna shot his arrow into the red ruby eye of a magnetic fish floating unsteadily overhead in a transparent rotating bowl filled with water, by looking at its reflection in a placid pool of water below. He won the hand of Princess Draupadi at the Swayamvar. This is the ultimate test of human consciousness .</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Only a couple of mammals like elephant, dolphin and bonobos can pass the mirror and colour test.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement breaks the bedrock rules of standard physics: that nothing can travel FASTER THAN LIGHT , that objects are only influenced by their immediate surroundings\u2014that we need to verify by using our limited bandwith five sense for scientific approval.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Through quantum entanglement, seemingly independent particles become intertwined. Entangled atoms can no longer be considered separate entities, but make sense only as part of a whole \u2014 even though the atoms may be far apart.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entangled particles can be used for \u201cquantum communication\u201d \u2014 a means of sending super secure messages that doesn't rely on cables, wireless signals, or code.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Through a trick of quantum mechanics, you can link two particles in a special way, separate them, and then observe the effects of one upon the other over large distances. This is known as quantum entanglement \u2014 placing two objects in the same entangled quantum state.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Entanglement can be demonstrated in the lab with particles of light. When these two particles, or photons, are separated over large distances, they are still correlated with each other. If you measure one particle, the other particle's state will be determined immediately no matter how far it is away.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Because any interference with an entangled particle, even the mere act of observing it, automatically affects its partner, these missives can't be hacked. To hear quantum physicists tell it, entangled particles could help build a \u201cquantum internet,\u201d give rise to new kinds of coding, and allow for faster-than-light communication \u2014 possibilities that have powerful appeal in an era where hospitals, credit card companies, government agencies, even election systems are falling victim to cyber attacks.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Quantum entanglement is a quantum mechanical phenomenon in which the quantum states of two or more objects have to be described with reference to each other, even though the individual objects may be spatially separated. This leads to correlations between observable physical properties of the systems.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_22BR\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\"></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_18T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_18TN\"></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TD\" style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_18TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n</div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"></span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_18TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_18B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">For example, it is possible to prepare two particles in a single quantum state such that when one is observed to be spin-up, the other one will always be observed to be spin-down and vice versa, this despite the fact that it is impossible to predict, according to quantum mechanics, which set of measurements will be observed.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">As a result, measurements performed on one system seem to be instantaneously influencing other systems entangled with it. Quantum entanglement has applications in the emerging technologies of quantum computing and quantum cryptography, and has been used to realize quantum teleportation experimentally.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Imagine you are a photon, a packet of light. You are a tiny blip of energy, hurtling through the universe on your own. But you have a twin, another photon to whom you have been intimately connected since the day you were born. No matter what distance separates you, be it the width of a lab bench or the breadth of the universe, you mirror each other. Whatever happens to your twin instantaneously affects you, and vice versa.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Entangled photons don't need wires or cables to link them, but on Earth it is necessary to use a fiber optic cable to transmit one of the particles to its desired location. But fibers absorb light as the photon travels through, so the quantum connection weakens with every mile the particle is transmitted. The previous distance record for what's known as quantum teleportation, or sending information via entangled particles, was about 141 kilometers</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">But no light gets absorbed in space, because there's nothing to do the absorbing. Space is empty. This means that entangled particles can be transmitted long distances across the vacuum and not lose information. Entangled particles sent through space could vastly extend the distance across which entangled particles communicate. The behavior of entangled particles in space and across vast distances offers insight into the nature of space-time.. Entangled photons know what their partner is doing</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Modern physicists know that there are actually four fundamental forces: the two nuclear forces, the electromagnetic force and the gravitational force. All of these play a role in binding matter together, from the tiniest of atoms to the largest of planets.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is well known in physics experiments that the observer can become entangled with the object that they are measuring, changing the measurement.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is written in the Vedas that we are all entangled in some way, and there really is a connection between every living thing in the galaxy. The effects of quantum entanglement tend to be very small for everyday objects.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Ancient Maharishis with 12 strand DNA and king sized pineal glands used their bodies for generating laser beams.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Processes in large biomolecules could be influenced by quantum entanglement effects. In the world of condensed matter physics \u2014 the study of solids \u2014 entanglement is more commonplace.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">A superconductor floating over a magnet in the Meissner effect \u2014 are from macroscopic quantum entanglements of electrons, or a spooky \"force\" acting over large distances. Quantum entanglement plays a role in modern physics and it is a binding principle for matter and energy. However, quantum entanglement on a large scale is difficult to achieve, and even more difficult to observe in living creatures.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Scientists are still struggling to develop a theory of Quantum Gravity and as a result a Grand Unified Field Theory\u2014which is represented by the divine 3D geometry of Sri Yantra\u2014the symbol of OM , whose digital number is 108.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Vedic Puranas the Great bear constellation stars ( 7 Sapt Rishis ) and entangled with their 7 wives in Pleiades constellation</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 3-</span></div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_19B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; Photons are exchanged whenever electrically charged subatomic particles interact.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The photon has no electric charge, so it does not experience the electromagnetic force itself\u2014in other words, photons cannot interact with one another.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">At the level of quantum reality the universe is not made up of things. The 5 senses create the set for the stage we call our lives.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">ALL INITIAL QUANTUM PHYCISISTS LEARNT SANSKRIT, AND THE VEDAS . THEY PONDERED ABOUT MAYA BEHIND THE QUANTUM SCREEN. . THEY ARE NOT STUPID TO DO THIS.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The theory of Maya is one of the grand pillars upon which Vedanta rests. The word origin of MAYA is derived from the Sanskrit roots MA ( not ) and YA ( that ). The term MAYA is mentioned 72 times in Rigveda written down in Sanskrit in 5000 BC. Maya is mentioned 29 times in the Atharva Veda.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">In Puranas and Vaishnava theology, Maya is described as one of the nine shaktis of the reclining Vishnu. MAYA is the veritable fabric of duality, and she performs this role at the behest of BrahmAn, the morphogenetic consciousness field.. The Supreme God is not bound by Maya just as magicians do not believe the illusions of their own magic.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Our 5 senses serve as a filter allowing us to experience only what is absolutely necessary for our physical existence. The 5 senses create the set for the stage we call our lives. The senses squelch out , let we will have a breakdown due to excess information. The quantum world cannot be observed by our 5 senses, and they do NOT follow the cause and effect laws of classical physics.</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED TO 5--</span></div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_20MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_20BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_20B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_21B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3316054655910645909\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_21MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">CONTINUED FROM 4-</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Maya is invisible and beyond sense-perception. No human can see beyond the quantum screen . What we have called matter is energy, whose vibration has been so lowered as to be perceptible to the senses. There is no matter. What is the difference between a quantum physicist and an ancient Indian maharishi seer of 9500 BC ?</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The mystics took existence for granted, and knew how to get from here to there. They got to see beyond the apparition of MAYA. The distinction between the self and the Universe is a false dichotomy.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It is written in the Vedas that energy and matter are inter convertible.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The cosmos expands and contracts at regular cycles as explained by Sri Krishna in the Bhagawat Gita--just like inhalation and exhalation. ( breath of Brahma ).. The Puranas speak of the creation and destruction of the universe in cycles of 8.64 billion years, that is quite close to currently accepted value regarding the time of the big bang.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Even today the speed of light calculated by most modern means is same as what was calculated in Surya Siddhantam 6000 years ago.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The seer placed himself inside and saw outwards, for he has the perception afforded by a king sized pineal gland and 12 strand DNA to do so.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The CLASSICAL scientist with a shriveled pineal gland and 2 strand DNA ( 97% junk ) with pre-conceived notions pounded in by a moron Isaac Newton stood outside and peeked inside all the while scratching his head.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The Bible says that the big bang happened in 4004 BC, while Vedanta and the modern quantum theory agrees that it is around 15 billion years.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">None of the quantum scientists have categorized Vedanta as a religious work. They have perused and found that it is a subtle mathematical or scientific analysis. Vedanta and modern Quantum Mechanics describe the same subject\u2014ultimate reality\u2014from opposite points of view and perspective. Vedanta says that we live in a time obstructed world using 5 narrow band senses -- and also a timeless realm in the quantum dimension, where what you see is NOT what you get.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">It was written down in the Vedas said 7000 years ago that mind is over matter. Quantum physicists were shocked at the results of the double slit experiment, which proved that our ancient maharishi seers were right.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The intuition of Indian mystics led them to understand the multidimensional reality and of space-time continuum which is the basis of the modern theory of relativity.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">While modern mathematics, science and technology centre around linear dimensional reality , but the Vedic systems avail multidimensional spiraling reality.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">The timeless principles of Vedanta is expressed in the technical language of Quantum Mechanics and the philosophy of science, even today with little or no attenuation of meaning.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Vedas are NOT about Indra running around like a jack ass looking for lost cows and then doing a sacrifice so that he can get the strength to screw the asuras...as told by BR Ambedkar and EVR Periyar.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Heisenberg's uncertainty principle, is an equation of maya.</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">Ideas of quantum physics do not seem so crazy if we read Indian philosophy\u2014W Heisenberg ( German physicist )</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">WHEN THEY LEARNT THAT MODERN SCIENCE IN ENTABGLED WITH VEDAS PASSED ON ORAL ROUTE FOR 330 CENTURIES AND PENNED DOWN 70 CENTURUES AGO, THEY ALL CONVERTED TO HINDUISM, THREW AWAY THEIR BIBLES, PICKED UP BHAGAWAD GITA AND WROTE IN THEIR WILLS THAT THEY WANT TO BE CREMATED ( NOT BURIED )</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/rip-impossible-with-burial-world-is.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: purple; font-size: large;\">VEDIC SRUTIS HAVE GOLDEN MEAN (1.618 ) , FIBONACCI SERIES , PASCALS TRIANGLE, LUCAS NUMBERS , SRI YANTRA ( GEOMETRY OF OM ), ULAM SPIRAL, PRIME NUMBER MAGIC EMBEDDED IN IT \u2013</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Capt ajit vadakayil</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">..</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_22b+seedBpewD\" kind=\"d\" style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4002999443229292065\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_4M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/steroid-pumped-muscles-do-not-provide.html?showComment=1513658708572#c4002999443229292065\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 19, 2017 at 10:15 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_4MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nThe Banyan tree symbolises eternal life and CHANGE , due to its unending expansion. It is also called the Kalpaka Vriksha or the wish full filling tree, in the Atharva Veda. Every ancient temple had a pool and a banyan tree on the east side<br />\n<br />\nThis is a tree that does NOT grow out of the soil. It grows out of its own branches. The seed alights on the branch, germinates from there and produces handing roots that invade the soils to grow into a new tree. After a couple of centuries the host tree does NOT exist any more, like how the human race changes form.<br />\n<br />\nCHANGE IS THE ONLY CONSTANT.<br />\n<br />\nEvery single village in India has a Banyan tree who stood as a mute spiritual witness to deeds conducted under it. Every village held court, without written records under it, the tree being the sole witness. Under this tree people do NOT tell lies, lest the spirits in the tree get offended.<br />\n<br />\nProvoking the spirits within the tree brings misfortune and ill health. Instant justice was provided under the canopy of this majestic sacred tree of wisdom. People behaved themselves and did not tell lies under a Banyan tree, where the village deity is installed.<br />\n<br />\nIt is about culture--people without culture will never understand this. In India when we are respectful to our parents , it is a part of our culture, and is programmed into our DNA. If you see America TV soaps, all for the sake of canned laughter, just see how a daughter insults her father of a son insults his mother, on wife insults the husband in front of her children. Thank god we do not have such bullshit uncultured serials in India even today.<br />\nIn ancient days the stutterers and the stammer party used to lick honey out of a Peepal leaf to get magic cures. Women keep vrat , walk clockwise around the tree 7 times , and tie sacred thread around the tree, to be removed when the vow is full filled.<br />\n<br />\nIt is written in the Rig Veda written in Sanskrit in 5000 BC, that the Vat Vriksha ( belittled by Vatican as the banyan tree , under which Banias held their shopkeeping business ) has a spiritual role in human life and must be revered.<br />\n<br />\nsri-bhagavan uvaca--<br />\nurdhva-mulam adhah-sakham<br />\nashvattham prahur avyayam<br />\nchandamsi yasya parnani<br />\nyas tam veda sa veda-vit<br />\n<br />\nTranslation: The Blessed Lord said, \u201cThere is a banyan tree which has its roots upward and its branches down and whose leaves are the Vedic hymns. One who knows this tree is the knower of the Vedas.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nThe tree of cosmic existence has no beginning and no end, n\u0101nto na c\u0101dih, in space or in time; for it is eternal and imperishable, avyaya. The hymns of the Veda are compared to its leaves and the man who knows this tree of the cosmos is the Veda-knower.<br />\n<br />\nIn the Bhagawat Gita Lord Krishna praises the tree as immortal.Sanatana Dharma ( Hinduism ) is known as a giant banyan tree, under whose shade a thousand faiths bloom.<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna tells Arjuna in the Kuruskhetra field , just before the war 6000 years ago-<br />\n<br />\n\" This world is a Banyan tree whose roots are above and branches below, and whose attractive leaves are promises of enjoyment. He who knows this tree well knows the methods of gaining such enjoyment. Watered by the three qualities of nature, its branches expand in all directions, upwards and downwards, finally producing buds of enjoyable sense objects. From these branches, roots also fall downwards and find nourishment in the selfish deeds of the mortal world\"<br />\n<br />\nYou must search out what is beyond it; some place from which no one ever strays. There, finally, seek for that Original Person \u2013 the ancient one from whom the true tree grows \u2013 and give yourself to him.<br />\n<br />\nThe upside-down tree is the banyan tree, representing the material world, which is a perverted reflection of the spiritual world. The demigods are on the top branches, the human beings are on the middle branches, and the animals are on the lower branches. A man disentangles himself from the tree by cutting it with the WEAPON OF DETACHMENT.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_4MN\" kind=\"m\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/null\" kind=\"i\" o=\"r\" style=\"color: #888888;
