display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_1TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_1TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_4b+seedGzED\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_1B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8502180205573181103\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/steroid-pumped-muscles-do-not-provide.html?showComment=1513658815543#c8502180205573181103\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 19, 2017 at 10:16 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nThe entanglement of this material world is compared here to a banyan tree. For one who is engaged in fruitive activities, there is no end to the banyan tree. He wanders from one branch to another, to another, to another. The tree of this material world has no end, and for one who is attached to this tree, there is no possibility of liberation.<br />\n<br />\nThe Vedic hymns, meant for elevating oneself, are called the leaves of this tree. This tree's roots grow upward because they begin from where Brahma is located, the topmost planet of this universe. If one can understand this indestructible tree of MAYA (illusion) , then one can get out of it.<br />\n<br />\nThe banyan tree can be found beside a reservoir of temple pond water. We can see that the trees on the bank reflect upon the water with their branches down and roots up. The tree of this material world is only a reflection of the real tree of the spiritual world. This reflection of the spiritual world is situated on desire, just as a tree's reflection is on water.<br />\n<br />\nDesire is the cause of things being situated in this reflected material light. One who wants to get out of this material existence must know this tree thoroughly through study of the Vedas . Then he can cut off his relationship with it.<br />\n<br />\nA reflection is temporary, for it is sometimes seen and sometimes not seen. But the origin from whence the reflection is reflected is eternal. The material reflection of the real tree has to be cut off.<br />\n<br />\nWhen it is said that a person knows the Vedas, it is assumed that he knows how to cut off attachment to this material world. If one knows that process, he actually knows the Vedas.<br />\n<br />\nOne who is attracted by the ritualistic formulas of the Vedas is attracted by the beautiful green leaves of the tree. He does not exactly know the true purpose of the Vedas.<br />\n<br />\nThe purpose of the Vedas, as disclosed by the Personality of Godhead Himself, is to CUT DOWN THE REFLECTED TREE and attain the real tree of the spiritual world.<br />\n<br />\nTO UNDERSTAND THIS PROFOUND TRUTH, EVERY TEMPLE HAS A WATER BODY WITH A BANYAN TREE REFLECTED IN THE WATER.<br />\n<br />\nLord Krishna tells Arjuna 6000 years ago at the battlefield of Kurukshetra --<br />\n\"The branches of this tree extend downward and upward, nourished by the three modes of material nature. The twigs are the objects of the senses. This tree also has roots going down, and these are bound to the fruitive actions of human society.\"<br />\nBhagavad-gita 15:2<br />\n<br />\nThe real root is from Brahmaloka, and the other roots are in the human planetary systems. After one enjoys the results of virtuous activities in the upper planetary systems ( one of the lower 6 dimensions ) , he comes down to this earth to lighten his KARMIC BAGGAGE , in the hope of attaining the topmost 7th dimension for MOKSHA.<br />\n<br />\n\"The real form of this tree cannot be perceived in this world. No one can understand where it ends, where it begins, or where its foundation is. But with determination one must cut down this tree with the weapon of detachment. So doing, one must seek that place from which, having once gone, one never returns, and there surrender to that Supreme Personality of Godhead from whom everything has began and in whom everything is abiding since time immemorial.<br />\n<br />\naham sarvasya prabhavah, \"I am the origin of everything.\"<br />\n<br />\nTo get out of the entanglement of this strong banyan tree of material life, one must surrender to Krishna. As soon as one surrenders unto Krishna, he becomes detached automatically from this material extension.<br />\nIn Bhagawat Gita Sri Krishna tells Prince Arjuna before the great war. \" Of all the trees I am the Banyan tree\". This is where the creation and destruction of the Cosmos comes. This is the concept of Singularity ( which Einstein did NOT understand ) or the Bindu of the Sri Yantra sacred geometry.<br />\n<br />\nWhen you have a big bang which created the cosmos, you need to have a black hole singularity too.<br />\n<br />\nPeepal trees emit positive energy-- the peepal ( female ) and banyan tree (male ) has a HUGE aura. This is NOT superstition.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_1MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/delete-comment.g?blogID=3564735312144269387&amp;postID=8502180205573181103\" o=\"d\" style=\"color: #888888; padding-right: 5px; padding-top: 5px; text-decoration-line: none;\" target=\"_self\">Delete</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_1BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_1B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_2B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1519618927496853393\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_2M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/steroid-pumped-muscles-do-not-provide.html?showComment=1513658935990#c1519618927496853393\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 19, 2017 at 10:18 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_2MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--<br />\n<br />\nRightly after Independence the Indian Govt has chosen Banyan tree as our national tree, for here is a a tree that regenerates unlike other trees, and is immortal unless sabotaged..<br />\n<br />\nThe Bindu of the Sri yantra represents singularity. The cosmos expands and contracts at regular cycles as explained by Sri Krishna in the Bhagawat Gita--just like inhalation and exhalation.<br />\n<br />\nSingularity existed before the big-bang.<br />\naha\u1e3f sarvasya prabhavo<br />\nmatta\u1e25 sarva\u1e3f pravartate<br />\n<br />\nI am the origin of everything<br />\nEverything comes from me<br />\nVarahamihira the great Astrologer and astronomer from wrote 4600 years ago, in the opening of his Samhita, \u201c It has been said in Vedas that the first primeval thing was darkness, which is not identical with the black colour, but a kind of non-existence like the state of a sleeping person. The big bang is merely a prelude to the big crunch, and the universe is caught in an infinite cycle of expansion and contraction, symbolizing the primordial black-hole like state is Aditi, the mother of all mothers and the mother of the cosmos .<br />\n<br />\nWe exist in the dot or Turiya or stillness of OM, in absolute consciousness-- which is the equilibrium of Bindu. We are unaware of the zero point field , as a fish is unaware of the water..<br />\n<br />\nAs per the Vedas the sole witness to the cosmic deluge is Maharishi Markandeya.<br />\n<br />\nIt was stated by the Lord in the Vedas: \u201cOh, Human! This village of yours is balanced on the banyan leaf and your lifespan is just a like a drop of water running down that leaf, which may fall any minute.\u201d<br />\n<br />\nSuddenly, amongst all the confusion, Markandeya noticed a banyan leaf floating on the ocean, tossed by the waves. On this unlikely raft lay a beautiful and adorable child, suckling his right toe, unperturbed by the calamity that had befallen the world. It was Vishnu, the newborn cosmic child. The infant's heavenly smile negated the brutality of the pralaya (cosmic deluge). His compassionate glance reassured Markandeya that life would go on, convincing him that the world never ends, but only changes.<br />\n<br />\nWhen Markandeya went close to this baby, he was sucked in with the air, when the baby took a breath.<br />\n<br />\nInside, he saw hundreds of thousand of universes and all that had been consumed by the deluge - the skies, the seas, the earth, gods, demons, humans, animals and plants.<br />\n<br />\nSo much so, that he even had a glimpse of his own Ashram on the banks of the Subhadra River. He saw himself sitting in meditation. Markandeya thus realized that the child was none other than the cosmic god (Narayana) who had withdrawn the world into himself. In that vast sea he again saw the banyan tree growing on the tiny island and the infant boy lying within the leaf.<br />\n<br />\nThe child ( Vishnu ) glanced at him from the corner of His eyes with a smile imbued with the nectar of love, and Markandeya took Him into his heart through his eyes. Greatly agitated, the sage ran to embrace the transcendental Personality of Godhead. At that moment the Supreme Personality of Godhead, who is the original master of all mysticism and who is hidden within everyone's heart, became invisible to the sage, just as the achievements of an incompetent person can suddenly vanish.<br />\n<br />\nAfter the Lord disappeared, O brahmana, the banyan tree, the great water and the dissolution of the universe all vanished as well, and in an instant Markandeya found himself back in his own hermitage, just as before.<br />\n<br />\nHere Lord Vishnu after reversing the big bang, turned himself into a child ( read as DNA from cosmos ) as small as that could fit on a tiny leaf of a banyan tree, floating in the Aakasha , until he himself decides to recreate everything back out from himself.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 4--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_2MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/delete-comment.g?blogID=3564735312144269387&amp;postID=1519618927496853393\" o=\"d\" style=\"color: #888888; padding-right: 5px; padding-top: 5px; text-decoration-line: none;\" target=\"_self\">Delete</a></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_2BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_2B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; Sri Krishna died ( as he willed- iccha mrityu ) under a banyan tree, shot on the foot by an archer, whom he had killed in his previous birth.<br />\n<br />\nIf you get high on Soma ( the ancient super LSD ) you will see banyan tree leaves blue in colour, and you can talk to the tree for hours together.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_4b+seedGzED\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_4b+seedGzED\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4173502023863731969\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_215M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14300435831539783069\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Gopi Krishna</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/steroid-pumped-muscles-do-not-provide.html?showComment=1513937686350#c4173502023863731969\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 22, 2017 at 3:44 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_215MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCaptain,<br />\nWhen you say Bhakti you surely mean Bhakti movements and fake heroes and not Bhakti per se right? font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">INDIAN ENGINEERING COLLEGES LAG BEHIND IN\nPRACTICALS AND PROJECTS &nbsp;.&nbsp; THE TEACHERS JUST MUG UP SOME THEORY AND\nVOMIT IT IN CLASS.&nbsp; THEY WONT REPLY TO\nDOUBTS\u2014 AS THEY DON\u2019T KNOW THEIR SUBJECT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">RUNNING PRIVATE COLLEGES IS A MONEY MAKING\nGAME.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">IT IS ALSO A \u201cPOWER GRABBING GAME\u201d\u2014AS\nTHE COLLEGE OWNERS GIVE FREE SEATS TO CHILDREN OF JUDGES / POLICE / POLITICIANS\netc</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SOMEONE ASKED ME \u2014WHEN YOU ARE THE ONLY SHIP\nCAPTAIN ON THE PLANET TO WRITE CHEMICAL STUFF\u2014WHY DID YOU GIVE IT AWAY FREE?</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IT IS A CONCEPT OF GIVING BACK TO THE SEA&nbsp; WHICH GAVE ME A LOT \u2013 RESPECT , MONEY ETC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I WAS A CAPTAIN FOR 30 YEARS. &nbsp; &nbsp;ONLY TWO ELECTRICAL OFFICERS KNEW HOW TO READ\nA CIRCUIT DIAGRAM , AMONG MORE THAN 50. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE LAST STRAW WAS A RUSSIAN ELECTRICAL OFFICER BLOWING UP THE BOW THRUSTER ELECTRONICS BY USING A MEGGER &nbsp;-- ON A SHIP WHICH WAS JUST TWO MONTHS OLD .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: 18.6667px;\">Losing the bow thruster means , you have to employ an expensive tug. &nbsp;Nobody knew the electrical officer bust the bow thruster . &nbsp;It was nicely put as a guarantee defect. &nbsp; I asked for his work done register , saw that he had taken insulation readings of the HUGE bow thruster motor , took him forward along with the Chief Engineer and asked him , how he did the insulation check . &nbsp; And then he says, he used the megger and pointed to the spots when he touched the leaders . He blew the thyristor . &nbsp;This Russian electrician did not even know what he had done &nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HAVING BEEN BURNT LIKE THIS SEVERAL TIME , IN MY LAST EIGHT YEARS &nbsp;AS SHIP CAPTAIN, &nbsp;I REFUSED\nTO HAVE AN ELECTRICAL OFFICER RANK ON MY SHIP.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THIS UPSET MOST OF MY CHIEF ENGINEERS AS THEY TOO KNEW SHIT<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">when the shore technical superintendents\ncalled up by telephone during extreme breakdown shipboard engineering crisis,\nthey only asked for the captain-- never the chief engineer .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">you do NOT need to check the PHASE ROTATION\non ships -- as this is done before the ship is delivered. now we have to think\nlike shore manufacturer installers and not shipboard sailing operators. &nbsp; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The United Nations Academic Impact, ( UNAI ),\nis a United Nations initiative to align institutions of higher education,\nscholarship and research with the United Nations and with each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">More than 50 Indian institutions have joined\nUnited Nations Academic Impact (UNAI) initiative</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; MOST OF IT WAS NEVER WRITTEN DOWN AND IS LOST FOREVER<br />\n<br />\nTHE 0.001% WE WROTE DOWN IN 5000 BC RUNS INTO MILLIONS OF PAGES .<br />\n<br />\nIF WE ARE NO 1 --THE NO2 WOULD BE IN PLACE ONE MILLION.<br />\n<br />\nINDIAN THINKERS OCCUPIED THE PLACES FROM NO 2 TO NO -ONE MILLION<br />\n<br />\nYET THESE WHITE BASTARDS CALLED US HEATHEN PAGAN SAVAGES<br />\n<br />\nTHEY PATENTED OUR ANCIENT KNOWLEDGE IN THEIR OWN NAMES<br />\n<br />\nNOT ANY MORE !<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_61b+seedxiLD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_61b+seedxiLD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; If you\u2019re learning about gravity for example, computer or\nmobile phone apps will let you move objects around under the earth\u2019s normal\ngravity, and then change parameters to see how it might look on the moon, or\nwith liquid.<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 25, 2017 at 5:53 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_120MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi vk,<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">https://scroll.in/article/829448/vyapam-scam-stripped-of-their-qualifications-by-sc-students-say-big-fish-are-roaming-free</span><br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">42 PEOPLE WERE MURDERED TO SAVE PEOPLE INVOLVED IN THE VYAPAM SCAM</span></b><br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS OUR INTELLIGENCE AGENCIES WORTH ?<br />\n<br />\nThe Vyapam scam was an admission and recruitment scam involving politicians,<br />\nsenior officials and businessmen in Madhya Pradesh.<br />\n<br />\n\"Vyapam\" (Vyavsayik Pariksha Mandal), is a self-financed and autonomous body incorporated by the State government responsible for conducting several entrance tests in the state.<br />\n<br />\nThese entrance exams are held for recruitment in government jobs and admissions in educational institutes of the state.<br />\n<br />\nThe scam involved a collusion of undeserving candidates, who bribed politicians and Madhya Pradesh Professional Examination Board (MPPEB), officials through middlemen, to get high ranks in these entrance tests.<br />\n<br />\nThe scam involved 13 different exams conducted by Vyapam, for selection of medical students and state government employees (including food inspectors, transport constables, police personnel, school teachers, dairy supply officers and forest guards). The exams were taken by around 3.3 million students.<br />\n<br />\nCases of irregularities in these entrance tests had been reported since the mid-1990s\u2014all kept quiet<br />\n<br />\nIn 2013, when the Indore police arrested 20 people who had come to impersonate candidates for PMT 2009. Subsequent interrogations and arrests uncovered the involvement of several politicians, bureaucrats, MPPEB officials, racket leaders, middlemen, candidates and their parents in the scam.<br />\n<br />\nBy June 2015, more than 2000 people had been arrested in connection with the scam. These included the state's ex-education minister Laxmikant Sharma and over a hundred other politicians.<br />\n<br />\nThe Vyapam scam involved collusion among exam candidates, government officials and middlemen: undeserving candidates were offered high marks in the exams, in exchange for kickbacks. Brilliant students (including previous years' top candidates) or practicing doctors would be paid to impersonate exam candidates.<br />\n<br />\nThe photograph on the candidate's admit card was replaced by the impersonator's photograph. After the exam, it was changed back to the original.<br />\n<br />\nThis was done in collusion with the corrupt board officials. Undeserving candidates bribed the board officials through middlemen to be seated strategically next to a brilliant dummy candidate, who was also paid money.<br />\n<br />\nThe dummy candidate let them copy from his sheet or exchanged the sheet at the end of the exam. The undeserving candidates would leave their OMR answer sheets blank or fill in only the answers they were sure about.<br />\n<br />\nThe corrupt board officials would manipulate records to give these candidates randomly high percentages. To avoid being caught in case of an audit, they would file an RTI request demanding to view these answer sheets, and fill in the answers according to the marks. The corrupt board officials leaked the answer key to the selected candidates.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">On February 13, 2017, the Supreme Court of India delivered an 83-page judgement and cancelled the degrees of 634 doctors.</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bhopal/vyapam-to-click-photos-of-candidates-to-curb-fraud/articleshow/58037146.cms</span><br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_121b+seedBq0hD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_121b+seedBq0hD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nMarch 8, 2014 at 1:04 AM<br />\nhi lk,<br />\n<br />\nyou just made me open my mouth a little-- it is better that i do NOT open more.<br />\n<br />\ni had a 58 year old \"experienced\" electrical officer on board my brand new ship. He spent almost his whole life in the electrical dept on indian navy ships.<br />\n<br />\nthis muslim guy used to give my sindhi chief engineer pin pricks daily -- despite the fact that there was NO work for him on board , as the ship was NEW.<br />\n<br />\none day the chief engineer , when he came to my cabin for a usual pre-lunch beer was not himself. he mind was chattering and he was silent .<br />\n<br />\nso in between he went to his cabin for a pee , i asked his wife ( just married ) if she fought with her husband.<br />\n<br />\nshe laughed and said NO-- &nbsp; but whispered it is due to the indian navy electrical officer giving him a major pin prick.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_8BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/k3OHzKz0qNc/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/k3OHzKz0qNc?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Neutral is return path\nfor an AC circuit which is supposed to carry current in normal condition.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Grounding:--- &nbsp;Location is between the neutral of the\nequipment and ground..&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Protect the\npower system equipment. Provide the return path to the current.&nbsp; The current carrying part is connected to the\nground<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Earthing:-- &nbsp;Location is between the equipment body and\nearth pit which is placed under the earth surface. &nbsp;&nbsp;Protect the human from electric shock.. It\ndischarges the electrical energy to the earth. &nbsp;The non-current carrying parts is connected to\nground.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c7229942148256467436\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_52M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/marine-engineering-self-examiner.html?showComment=1485354546353#c7229942148256467436\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 25, 2017 at 7:59 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_52MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nKaushik Sharma<br />\nJanuary 25, 2017 at 5:04 PM<br />\n<br />\nAjitji, I was wondering how the electrical equipment in a ship is earthed? I tried to search the net but could not find a suitable answer.<br />\n<br />\nReplyDelete<br />\nReplies<br />\n##########<br />\nCapt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nJanuary 25, 2017 at 7:58 PM<br />\n<br />\nhi ks,<br />\n<br />\nI WILL KEEP ELECTRICALS AWAY --LIKE ASTROLOGY. &nbsp; &nbsp;I JUST DONT HAVE THE TIME.<br />\n<br />\nhowever only this time around--<br />\n<br />\nIn electrical engineeering, the ground means reference in electrical circuits from which other voltages are measured. The earth point means a solid connection to the earth, which due to its massive section and mass has almost no resistance for electrical current<br />\n<br />\nOn board a metallic ship \u201cEarth\u201d is the hull and superstructure and as a consequence it is everywhere.<br />\n<br />\nEven if no earting connection has been made, the grid is connected to earth through (parasitic) apacitances and inductive couplings.<br />\n<br />\nOnboard a ship, the priority requirement is to maintain continuity of the electrical supply to essential equipment in event of a single earth fault occurring. The priority requirement ashore is the immediate isolation of earth-faulted equipment which is automatically achieved by an earthed system.<br />\n<br />\nOnboard a ship, a neutral insulated system is to be used. And, in shore installations neutral earthed system is used.<br />\n<br />\nA ship's electrical system can take any of the two forms:<br />\nNeutral Insulated system, ( totally electrically isolated from earth/ ships hull )<br />\nor<br />\nNeutral Earthed system. ( supply neutral point connected to earth )<br />\n<br />\nOnboard ship, if the earth current increases beyond the current rating of the generator, the entire system may collapse causing irreparable damage. To limit this earth current, a Neutral Earthing Resistor is connected to the earthed neutral of the source. This resistor is of sufficient ohmic value to limit the earth current within rating of the generator.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, the magnitude of earth current is sufficiently large to operate the tripping mechanism of the faulted equipment immediately isolating it from supply and rendering it safe.<br />\n<br />\nIn a neutral insulated system, a single earth fault occurring in a system would not cause any earth current to flow in the ship's hull.This is because a single earth fault current does not provide a complete circuit for earth current to flow. So no protective trip will operate and system will continue to function normally.<br />\n<br />\nHowever, if a second earth fault occurs on another line in the insulated system, the two earth faults together will be equivalent to a short circuit and the resulting earth fault current will operate protection devices and cause disconnection of services.<br />\n<br />\nShipboard main LV systems at 440 V are normally provided with neutral insulated system. On the other hand HV system (1000 V to 3.3 KV) are usually provided with neutral earthed system via a neutral earthing resistor.<br />\n<br />\nIn a HV system, certain essential loads can be supplied by a transformer with it's secondary insulated to ensure no earth fault current flows in the equipment. This maintains the continuity of service.<br />\n<br />\nSOLAS regulations require that the hazardous areas of tanker viz. cargo area, pump room should have a neutral insulated system to prevent any stray earth current from flowing in the hull and causing explosion hazard.<br />\n<br />\nHowever an exception is included in case if tanker has a 3.3 KV system, the earthed system is permitted provided that the earthed system does not extend forward of engine room bulkhead and into the hazardous area.<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_52BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_52b+seedCb_yD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_51T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_52b+seedCb_yD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_51TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_51TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_51TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_52b+seedCb_yD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_51TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_51TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_52b+seedCb_yD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_51TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_51TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_51TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_52b+seedCb_yD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_51B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vG3e4yBDTaU/WF61PSK1MlI/AAAAAAABP5g/DNh5i6N7VbEuFyZOlv1_bosR9sG0B50GgCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c793731370411372171\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_51M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2012/05/marine-engineering-self-examiner.html?showComment=1485354568735#c793731370411372171\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">January 25, 2017 at 7:59 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_51MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nBoth the Insulated neutral and Earthed neutral system have got their own advantages and disadvantages. Where it is easier in the earthed neutral system to detect any earth faults in system, it is easier in isolated neutral system to maintain the continuity of service.<br />\n<br />\nConventional ships which operate on 3 Phase, 440V, have earth fault indicators installed on all three phases. Any earth fault on a 440V system is considered to be a serious trouble and immediate action is required to identify the faulty circuit.<br />\n<br />\nAny earth fault on 220V or any low voltage lighting circuit can be considered as important but need not require immediate attention. However, attention should be paid at the next earliest opportunity. Any earth fault alarm with respect to a 220V circuit is usually treated as important but not an emergency.<br />\n<br />\nWhen there are two or more earth faults in 220V lighting circuit. By turning off all the breakers of a particular area, then switching on the breaker one by one will eliminate multiple earth fault<br />\n<br />\nAN INSULATED NEUTRAL DISTRIBUTION SYSTEM REQUIRES TWO EARTH FAULTS ON TWO DIFFERENT LINES TO CAUSE AN EARTH FAULT CURRENT TO FLOW.<br />\n<br />\nASHORE NEUTRAL IS EARTHED FOR SAFETY OF HUMANS<br />\n<br />\nON SHIP ESSENTIAL MACHINES HAVE TO RUN FOR SAFETY. PRIORITY IS TO MAINTAIN CONTINUITY OF SUPPLY IN EVENT OF SINGLE EARTH FAULT.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_52b+seedCb_yD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_52b+seedCb_yD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c1628501688733721014\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_181M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/revamp-indian-technical-education.html?showComment=1493117636801#c1628501688733721014\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 25, 2017 at 4:23 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_181MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOME ONE ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nHE SAYS-- FOR PAST 5 YEARS YOU HAVE SAID THAT YOU HAVE MADE MORE THAN 10,000 REVELATIONS AT INVENTION / DISCOVERY LEVEL<br />\n<br />\nPLEASE GIVE AN EXAMPLE OF SOMETHING WHICH IS NOT IN THE 10,000 BASKET<br />\n<br />\nWOOKAY !<br />\n<br />\nI HAD TO FIGHT TOOTH AND NAIL TO STOP MARITIME FRAUD WHICH WAS GOING ON FOR DECADES--INVOLVING MIND BOGGLING AMOUNT OF MONEY<br />\n<br />\nTHE SHIPPERS WOULD DECLARE WEIGHT IN TONNES AND ASK ME TO SIGN<br />\n<br />\nI WOULD TELL THEM--THIS IS WEIGHT IN VACUUM<br />\n<br />\nI WILL SIGN ONLY WEIGHT IN AIR ON THE BILL OF LADING--OR YOU MUST SPECIFICALLY MENTION THAT THE WEIGHT IS IN VACUUM<br />\n<br />\nTHEY WOULD RANT AND RAVE -- THREATEN TO BAN ME FROM THE TERMINAL/ THREATEN TO BIT MY HEAD OFF</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">I WOULD REPLY-- I AM NOT AN UNEDUCATED CUNT LIKE YOU .-- I DO NOT ARGUE WITH MONKEYS -- I LEARNT THIS IS 6TH STANDARD AT SCHOOL</b></div>\n<br />\nI WON THIS BATTLE AFTER SEVERAL YEARS --TODAY ALL OIL / CHEMICAL TERMINALS ENTER \"WEIGHT IN AIR \" ON THE BILL OF LADING<br />\n<br />\nIN THIS POST , YOU WILL FIND SOMETHING IN RED FONT --RIGHT ON TOP OF MY PHOTO .<br />\n<br />\nON A VLCC CARRYING 3 LAKH TONNES OF OIL IT MEANS A LOT<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/cargo-claims-and-losses-on-chemical.html<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>Density at 15 deg C in air = Density at 15 deg C in vacuum - 0.0011</b></span><br />\nWRF= weight reduction factor which is .0011 and should be reduced from the given density in vacuum to allow for the upthrust of the atmosphere<br />\nDensity is by definition measured in vacuum at 15C<br />\nDensity x volume (M\u00b3) gives WEIGHT in metric tonnes in vacuum.<br />\nDensity in vacuum subtracted by 0.0011 is known as density in air\u201d.<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>Note: One kg of mass on earth surface will have same mass on moon</b></span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/the-thin-red-line-movie-review.html?showComment=1501992080230#c5420990453362286041\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 6, 2017 at 9:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_140MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIMPORTANT--<br />\n<br />\nIMPORTANT--<br />\n<br />\nIMPORTANT---<br />\n<br />\nDespite Typhoon Noru, 2017 is NOT yet an El Nino year. What is making Europe so warm ?<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide, a highly potent greenhouse gas is now being released from a warming Arctic<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide emissions have increased from Arctic peatlands following permafrost thaw- caused by Methane release.<br />\n<br />\nIf the GLOBAL WARMING POTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon Dioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104 for Methane over a 20 year period.<br />\n<br />\nPARIS COP21 KICKED METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE UNDER THE KOSHER CARPET SO THAT THE JEWS CAN BLAME CO2 AS THE VILLAIN AND MAKE MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR ( CARBON CREDIT- OFFSET ).<br />\n<br />\nAT THE G20 SUMMIT IN HAMBURG 2017- ALL WORLD LEADERS ( INCLUDING MODI ) WERE IN JEW ROTHSCHILDs POCKET EXCEPT DONALD TRUMP.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK PM MODI\u2014WHAT IS THE USE OF HAVING AN ICE STATION HEMADRI AT ARCTIC? HAVE THE SCIENTISTS GONE THERE TO HAVE BOOZE AND ENJOY ?<br />\n<br />\nMore than 70 billion tons of nitrogen stocks are stored in the upper 3.5 metres of permafrost soil, a vast sum accumulated over thousands of years through the nitrogen cycle<br />\n<br />\nThe permafrost stocks are more than 600 times larger than the annual nitrogen load added as GM fertiliser to soils globally<br />\n<br />\nSome of that nitrogen already exists in the form of \u201cold\u201d nitrous oxide, built up during the permafrost formation, while other mineralized nitrogen interacts with microbes to produce \u201cnew\u201d nitrous oxide.<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide that is released into the atmosphere remains in the troposphere for more than a century and then it migrates to the stratosphere, where it depletes the ozone layer. The ozone layer serves as a protective barrier absorbing solar radiation; without it the sun\u2019s ultraviolet rays would severely damage biological organisms, including humans.<br />\n<br />\nAlthough the Montreal Protocol, an international treaty signed in 1987 to protect the ozone layer, Nitrous oxide was ignored. The Zionist Jews concentrated on WEE ozone depleting items ( like refrigerants ) where they can make money out of thin air.<br />\n<br />\nLoss of nitrogen to the atmosphere may also reduce plant biomass, further contributing to climate change.<br />\n<br />\nIf nitrogen is lost to the atmosphere, plant growth won't be able to compensate for carbon being lost from permafrost soils<br />\n<br />\nThe most alarming phenomenon in the Arctic is the loss of the highly reflective snow and ice cover, known as the albedo..<br />\n<br />\nHigh nitrous oxide saturations were recently observed in productive shallow Arctic shelf waters following significant reduction in sea ice cover..<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide is produced in the ocean water column and sediments by two pathways. The first is in oxygen-rich conditions in which ammonium is converted to nitrate, creating nitrous oxide as a byproduct. The second occurs in deoxygenated sediments where nitrous oxide is produced in an intermediate stage between the conversion of nitrate to nitrogen gas.<br />\n<br />\nThe loss of sea ice cover in Arctic shelf waters has resulted in increased sunlight absorption, fueling phytoplankton growth. Following phytoplankton death, organic material is remineralized to ammonium, which can be converted to nitrate and ultimately produce nitrous oxide.<br />\n<br />\nWhat happens in the Arctic doesn\u2019t stay in the Arctic ( unlike the Cricket team dressing room politics )<br />\n<br />\nIndians were the first to use BIOCHAR for agriculture . It converts agricultural waste into a soil enhancer that can hold carbon, boost food security, and increase soil biodiversity, and discourage deforestation. The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water.<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years. Just 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil.<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_140BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; WE WONT ALLOW YOUR MANN KE TAMANNA \u201cKOSHER COMPUTER COW\u201d IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nSoil building is the product of a self-reinforcing, positive feedback loop. But soil decline is also a self-reinforcing loop that can result in catastrophic soil loss.<br />\n<br />\nNitrogen fertilizers combined with tillage accelerate microbial respiration, burning up soil carbon faster than it is replaced. Due to the loss of organic carbon reservoirs, many soils have become nearly lifeless substrates that must be continually fed with irrigation water, mineral nutrients and pesticides to produce a crop. Although productive in the short term, this practice is not sustainable<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool.<br />\n<br />\nWE DON\u2019T WANT COMMIES AND WHITE JEWS TO DRIVE OUR EDUCATION<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. With its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. The surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients.<br />\nbalanced compost, with the optimum C:N ratio, will contain lots of humus. However, if there is not enough stable carbon (from wood, straw or other lignin sources), then the easily degradable sugars, fats and proteins will be completely consumed by microbes leaving very little substrate behind<br />\n<br />\nBoth biochar and compost increases cation exchange capacity (CEC - the ability to hold onto and transfer nutrient cations: ammonium, calcium, magnesium, and potassium)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThey supports soil microbial life and biodiversity and helps plants resist diseases and pathogens. They add humus carbon to the soil carbon pool, reducing the atmospheric carbon pool\u2014and increases soil water holding capacity. In coastal areas they help plants grow better in high salt situations.<br />\n<br />\nUnlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate. Biochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.. Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_138MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_138BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_138B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_139B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8131227607787448028\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_139M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil&nbsp; January 4, 2018 at 11:38 AM<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/nostradamus-predicted-in-21st-century-worlds-best-actor-will-be-from-india-jignesh-mevani-mocks-pm-narendra-modi/articleshow/62361212.cms</span><br />\n<br />\nJIGNESH MEVANI MUST BE JAILED IMMEDIATELY--HE IS NOT A PATRIOT ..<br />\n<br />\nTIME TO BREAK THE BIGGEST BOMBSHELL OF 2018..<br />\n<br />\nTHE LEGEND OF CHRISTIAN NOSTRADAMUS WAS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD ( FRENCH BRANCH )..<br />\n<br />\nNOSTRADAMUS WAS A JEW\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE READ HIS BOOK OF PREDICTIONS AT THE AGE OF 11.. THE BOOKS IS STILL IN MY HOME LIBRARY..<br />\n<br />\nHIS QUATRAINS ARE VAGUE\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nPEOPLE LIKE HITLERs NAME WAS CONVERTED TO HISTER TO ACCOMODATE THE PREDICTIONS..<br />\n<br />\nJEW HITLER WAS USED BY ROTHSCHILD TO CARVE OUT ISRAEL -- HIS ORIGINAL NAME WAS NOT HILTER ( BUT HEIDLER AS PER SCHOOL RECORDS )-- IT WAS GRANTED TO HIM..<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS A PERFECT CASE OF CREATING TRUTHS VIA THE BACK DOOR..<br />\n<br />\nDURING WW1 AND WW2 --ROTHSCHILD DROPPED LEAFLETS ALL OVER EUROPE QUOTING NOSTRADAMUS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe book of predictions is Les Propheties, a collection of 942 poetic quatrains allegedly predicting future events. The book was first published in 1555 and has rarely been out of print since his death. ..WHY ?..<br />\n<br />\nWHO IS SO KEEN ON PROPAGATING THE FAME AND POWERS ( SIC) OF NOSTRADAMUS ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW NOSTRADAMUS WAS MADE POPULAR BY HIS ALMANAC WHICH WAS LIFTED FROM KERALA ..<br />\n<br />\nCapt Ajit Vadakayil declares today at 1105 AM, on 4th Jan 2018-- SATYA VACHAN that Nostradamus's predictions have been DELIBERATELY kept vague-- they could be applied to virtually anything, and are 100% useless for determining whether Nostradamus had any real prophetic powers. ..<br />\n<br />\nMost of the quatrains deal with disasters, such as plagues, earthquakes, wars, floods, invasions, murders, droughts, and battles\u2014all undated-..<br />\n<br />\nANY CHARLATAN CAN WRITE SUCH QUATRAINS \u2026<br />\n<br />\nOUR OWN VEDAS HAS SUCH COOKED UP VERSES INJECTED --BY JEW ROTHSCHILD..<br />\n<br />\nTHE FRENCH REVOLUTION WAS WORKED VIA BACKDOOR BY FRENCH ROTHSCHILDs FREEMASONS --THIS WAS THE FIRST REAL VICTORY OF FAKE NOSTRADAMUS..<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/11/the-french-revolution-conceived-and.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBELOW IS THE FRENCH REVOLUTION PREDICTION..( BULLSHIT )..<br />\n<br />\nTHE TRUTH IS ROTHSCHILDs MEDIA LIE THAT THEY HEARD THE QUEEN SAYING \"IF PEOPLE DONT HAVE BREAD LET THEM EAT CAKE \"..<br />\n<br />\nCentury VI.--Quatrain 74.<br />\n<br />\nLa. dechass\u00e9e 1 an regne tournera,<br />\nSes ennemies trouv\u00e9s des conjur\u00e9s:<br />\nPlus que jamais son temps triomphera,<br />\nTrois et septante \u00e0 mort trop asseur\u00e9s.<br />\n<br />\nTranslation.<br />\n<br />\nShe who was proscribed will return to the kingdom,<br />\nHer enemies will be treated as conspirators;<br />\nMore than ever her time (or empire) will triumph;<br />\nSeventy-three years its deathly domination is assured.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://www.sacred-texts.com/nos/oon/oon15.htm</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nHis astrologies were disastrously wrong, containing flagrant astronomical errors\u2014we in Kerala know astronomy..<br />\n<br />\nHe did not use a bowl of water as a \"magic mirror\" when writing his prophecies, he used a regular mirror. ..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD MATCHED HIS DEATH DATE ON LATER EDITIONS\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIf he predicted his own death in Presage 141, he missed it by a year \u2014 so some editions show a version of that Presage posthumously edited by his secretary to match the correct date\u2026<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus was reputed to be a plague doctor\u2014he knew SHIT about plague..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD GAVE BULL THAT NOSTRADAMUS WAS BURIED UPRIGHT LIKE HINDU JIVAN MUKTS .. IN REALITY HE WAS BURIED IN LYING POSITION<br />\n<br />\nThe RIDICULOUS tale about Nostradamus is that he was buried standing up so that nobody would step on his grave; and when his body was later disinterred during the French Revolution to be relocated, he was wearing a FORGED medallion on which the exact date of the disinterment was engraved\u2026<br />\n<br />\nI have two editions of his book Les Propheties\u2014both are different to accommodate LIES converted to truths ..<br />\n<br />\nVarious versions were published during his lifetime, and there is no one authoritative collection<br />\n<br />\nOver 200 different translations and interpreted versions have been published since his death, so the folly of hoping to find Nostradamus' original text is IMPOSSIBLE..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nNobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true. Nobody has ever used Nostradamus' writings to predict a future event in specific terms which later came true.<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus' writings are exploited in a number of fallacious ways. Ambiguous and wrong translations, \"creative\" interpretations, hoax writings, fictional accounts, and the breaking of non-existent codes within his quatrains all contribute to a vast body of BULLSHIT work, all of it wrong, and many times the size of everything Nostradamus ever actually wrote\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIT WAS ONLY USED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD FOR FAKE PROPAGANDA \u2013WITH THE SINGLE MINDED AIM OF CARVING OUT ISRAEL..<br />\n<br />\nSO HOW DOES CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL KNOW ?..<br />\n<br />\nNostradamus wrote in 16th century French, which was significantly different from modern French\u2026<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS LIKE OUR JESUS WHEN THE LETTER J NEVER EXISTED TILL THE 17TH CENTURY !..<br />\n<br />\nRothschild\u2019s histrorians gave bull that fear of prosecution by POPE for heresy compelled Nostradamus to write only vaguely, but there is no historical evidence for this\u2026<br />\n<br />\nSome books and websites even go so far as to allege the presence of meaningful anagrams found in modern English translations, or even more strangely, English anagrams found within French translations\u2026<br />\n<br />\nErika Cheetham\u2014an agent of Jew Rothschild was involed in MODERN bull..<br />\n<br />\nCheetham's books were full of historical events into which she shoehorned Nostradamus' quatrains, with word, name and number substitutions whenever convenient, and she called them \"amazingly accurate predictions\".<br />\n<br />\nOccasionally she went out on a limb and made future predictions, and when those years came and went with none of her predictions coming true, she'd issue updated editions of her books with new names and dates and make the same tired old predictions again. First she interpreted references to Moammar Qaddafi, and later changed them to the Ayatollah Khomeini, and later changed them again to Saddam Hussein..<br />\n<br />\nNEW YORK NEVER EXISTED DURING TIMES OF NOSTRADAMUS .. IT IS NOT THERE IN THE BOOK I READ IN MY CHILDHOOD\u2014WHICH IS IN MY LIBRARY ( BROUGH FROM AN OLD CALICUT BOOK STORE \u2013PROPERTY OF AN ENGLISHMAN IN CALICUT WHO DIED 150 YEARS AGO ) ..<br />\n<br />\nIn the city of York there will be a great collapse,<br />\n2 twin brothers torn apart by chaos<br />\nWhile the fortress falls; the great leader will succumb;<br />\nThird big war will begin when the big city is burning.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nOn the 11th day of the 9 month,<br />\nTwo metal birds will crash into two tall statues<br />\nIn the new city,<br />\nAnd the world will end soon after.<br />\n<br />\nWITH EVERY NEW EDITION JEW ROTHSCHILD DELETED AND INSERTED MERRILY-- TO MAKE THE BOOK HOLD WATER..<br />\n<br />\nIT TAKES A CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO EXPOSE JEW NOSTRODAMUS ( A MERE FRONT OF ROTHSCHILD ) LIKE JEW HITLER ..<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO 52.95%..<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_207BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/06/miss-neat-little-goody-pants-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1530109854299#c1656624571752202381\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">June 27, 2018 at 8:00 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_153MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/home/education/news/mhrd-to-upload-repeal-of-ugc-act-draft-for-public-feedback/articleshow/64760818.cms<br /><br />UGC NET is OBJECTIVE . Prior to June 2012, th exam consisted of a subjective paper. From June 2012 onwards, the structure of the exam was changed.<br /><br />Same way in my days at school IIT exams were SUBJECTIVE. Today only cram and vomit KOTA students can get through the IIT entrance exams.<br /><br />My elder son who recruits has told me that IIT computer science products cant think for nuts.. Ordinary colleges are better..<br /><br />OUR IAS OFFICERS CANT THINK FOR NUTS.. THEY MAN OUR THINK TANKS \u2013PEOPLE WHO HAVE SHIT FOR BRAINS<br /><br />Here is a question asked in paper 2 of UGC NET exam for English,--\"In Women in Love what is Winifred's Pekinese dog called?\u201d<br /><br />BAAP RE ! SUCH A CEREBRAL QUESTION !!<br /><br /><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">UGC HAS OUTLIVED ITS ULILITY\u2026 IT REDUCED ITSELF TO FUNDING AND ABDICATED ACCOUNTABILITY FOR EDUCATION..</span></b><br /><br />UGC ALLOWED A JNU TO HAPPEN..<br /><br />UGC WAS STARTED WHEN INDIA HAD 30 UNIVERSITIES..TODAY THERE ARE NEARLY 700.<br /><br /><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">90% OF OUR TECHNICAL PROFESSORS ( EVEN IN IIT ) DESERVE TO BE SACKED.</span></b><br /><br /><b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">THE LIBRARIES OF \u201cSOCIAL SCIENCES \u201c OF JNU/ JU/ DU/ TISS ETC UST BE PERSUSED AND USLESS COMMIE BOOKS MUST BE BURNT \u2013OR DONATED TO NORTH KOREA.</span></b></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">A COMMIE IS SOMEONE WHO HAS NOTHING AND WANTS TO OFFER IT TO YOU..AKKA MAAL..&nbsp; PHUKKAT MEIN ..BRINDA KARAT KNOWS BETTER.</span></div>\n<br /><b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">YOU CANNOT SOVE A COMPLEX PROBLEM WITH OBJECTIVE THINKING OR OBJECTIVE ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS..</span></b><br /><br />AT SEA I SHUNNED PLANNED MAINTENANCE AND DOVE OFF THE DEEP END TO PREDICTIVE MAINTENANCE. WE HAD ONLY 24 HOURS A DAY AND LIMITED CREW..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/12/predictive-maintenance-on-chemical.html</span><br /><br />GOING THROUGH THE MOTIONS OF ACTIVITY TRAPS IS NOT AN OPTION IN THE DANGEROUS AND MERCILESS CHEMICAL FIELD.<br /><br /><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NO DIAGNOSIS CAN BE DONE BY AN OBJECTIVE COMPUTER.. FOR THIS YOU NEED A CONSCIOUS SUBJECTIVE HUMAN BRAIN\u2026&nbsp;</span></b><br /><br />THIS IS WHY WE HAVE A SUB-CONSIOUS BRAIN LOBE , WHICH INVOKES PAST EXPERIENCE WHEN WARRANTED.. EVOLVED CAPACITIES ARE THE CONSTRUCTION MATERIAL FOR RULES OF THUMB.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/06/root-cause-analysis-part-2-capt-ajit.html</span><br /><br />WHAT IS THE NEED FOR A PHD DEGREE? .. THIS IS SOLELY FOR SUBJECTIVE THINKING..<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/05/discretion-subjective-objective-value.html</span><br /><br />OUR COLLEGES MUST CREATE THINKERS AND LEADERS .. NOT MERE MANAGERS, FIT ONLY TO MANAGE INVENTORIES..<br /><br />MANY TIMES MY READERS HAVE ASKED ME\u2014WHY DO YOU USE CAPITAL LETTERS WHEN YOU INSIST ON SMALL CASE FOR YOUR READERS .<br /><br /><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">OH BLIMEY\u2014I HAVE TO GIVE AWAY Me SECRET\u2026.</span><br />SPEED READING ( IN THE REALM OF SUBJECTIVE ) IS IMPOSSIBLE WHEN YOU WRITE IN CAPITAL LETTERS.<br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2011/02/speed-reading-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</span><br />MY ELDER SON GOT INTO CORNELL \u2013HE HAD MAXED MATHS ( 800/ 800 ) AND GOT THE BEST MARKS IN TOEFL ENGLISH ( GOLD CERTIFICATE )<br /><br />WHEN MY ELDER SON WENT FOR THE TOEFL EXAM -- MY CONDITION WAS \" NO PERMISSION TO CHANGE YOUR INDIAN ACCENT AND ROLL YOUR R -s \"<br /><br />YET HE SCORED 118 OUT OF 120 -- SECURING A TREACLE DRIP DRIP PRAISE LETTER ALONG WITH THE GOLD CARD.<br /><br />BUT CORNELL DOES NOT CARE FOR GRE MARKS..<br /><br />THEY WERE IMPRESSED BY THE LAVISH PRAISE IN HIS THREE TESTIMONIALS GIVEN BY HIS UNDERGRADUATE PROFESSORS\u2014 ONE WHICH SAID&nbsp;<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">\u201c THIS BOY HAS THE SEEDS OF THE FUTURE IN HIM\u201d..</span></b><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2010/11/my-son-at-cornell-university-capt-ajit_25.html</span><br /><br />THE MAIN REASON MY ELDER SON GOT INTO CORNELL WAS BECAUSE HIS BTECH PROJECT \" EXTENSION OF EARLEY PARSER FOR MATRIX GRAMMARS \" IMPRESSED ALL ..<br /><br />-- AND HE WAS INVITED TO WCECS SAN FRANSISCO TO PRESENT IT PERSONALLY -- THEY ADDRESSED MY SON IN THE INVITATION AS \"DOCTOR\" THOUGH HE WAS JUST A UNDER GRADUATE STUDENT..<br /><br />MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO&nbsp;<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">59.05 %</span></b><br /><br />Capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
