, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most people seek\nexternal happiness from external objects, while the truth is that eternal bliss\nis within oneself and the search must be made within to attain this supreme\nbliss.&nbsp; All the pleasures that are\nderived from the external objects are trifles compared to that eternal bliss\nwhich is the Supreme.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advaitins believe that\nsuffering is due to Maya. Only knowledge of Brahman can destroy Maya.&nbsp;&nbsp; Maya tricks us with regard to our\nselves&nbsp; When Maya is removed, the truth\nof \"Brahma Satyam Jagan Mithya Jivo Brahmaiva Na Aparah\" is realized\nBrahman (the Absolute) is alone real; this world is unreal; the Jiva or the\nindividual soul is non-different from Brahman Such a state of bliss when\nachieved while living is called Jivanmukta-the liberated soul..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All sense data entering\nones awareness via the five senses are Maya.&nbsp;\nMaya is neither completely real nor completely unreal, hence\nindescribable.&nbsp; Maya is temporary and is\ntranscended with \"true knowledge\", or perception of the more\nfundamental reality which permeates Maya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maya has two main\nfunctions:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To \"hide\"\nBrahman from ordinary human perception,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To present the material\nworld in its (Brahmam) place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">na jayathe mriyathe va\nkathachith nayam bhuthua bhavitha va na bhuya:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ajo nithya:\nshashwathohayam purano na hanyathe hanyamane shareere&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That Supreme Soul or\nParamathma or Iswara was never ever born, nor does It die. And since It is now,\nit does not mean that It will not be. That Soul is unborn, is always, forever,\nand ancient also. As the (human) body is killed, It is not killed. Bhagawat\nGita&nbsp; [Chapter 2, verse 20]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"As it is\nanywhere, so it is everywhere.\"&nbsp; You\nare the embodiment of all the Laws of Nature. You are the constitution of the\nUniverse.--7000 year old Rig Veda<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Morphogenetic fields\nhelp to differentiate cells and form biological systems. They&nbsp; instruct genes to produce necessary proteins\nin a given biological environment. Morphogenetic fields are not material, but\nare more like biological blueprints giving birth to various forms. They carry\nencoded organizational information.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pineal Gland (\nShiva Lingam ) is the seat of consciousness.&nbsp;\nThe Vedas said that this universe and everything in it are a\nsingularity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Yatha pinde tatha\nbrahmande, yatha brahmande tatha pinde\"--\"As is the individual, so is\nthe universe, as is the universe, so is the individual.\"&nbsp; --Yajur Veda 5000 BC.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our consciousness is a\ncosmic DVD player . There is a cosmic dance of energy back and forth between\nthe physical realm and the zero point field,&nbsp;\na constant creation and destruction of matter from the void.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness becomes\nenergy and then transforms to matter.&nbsp;\nForces of attraction cause the particles to come together to form nuclei\nwith electrons orbiting around them giving the illusion of matter.&nbsp; These atoms are attracted together to form\nmolecules. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Molecules are brought\ntogether by organizing forces inherent in the particular morphogenetic field of\nthat being or material, causing the creation of DNA, cells, tissue, organs, systems,\norganisms, societies and on a larger scale, planets, solar systems, galaxies\nand universes.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All of this from the\none and only quantum field of consciousness Our consciousness creates our\nreality. What our consciousness can conceive , it can also create.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God resides in your DNA\u2014called\nTVATSA is the Vedas .&nbsp; DNA is a\nblueprint. It is a transceiver for information at 98.7 deg F.. DNA has powerful\nMobius coil which can generate scalar energy, which cannot be blocked by\nFaraday\u2019s cage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is DNA everywhere\naround you. It remains unchanged for the past 4 billion years. In your body you\nhave 125 billion miles of DNA, which is 500 billion trips around the earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The DNA double helix\nlooks like 2 snakes making love, or rather a twisted rope ladder.&nbsp; DNA is conscious.&nbsp; It knows where to go and what to do and how\nand when to divide.&nbsp; It is a\nsupercomputer which can hold enormous information.&nbsp; Yet, it is so small that you cannot see it\nwithout a electron microscope.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Charles Darwin and his\nmonkey gang will never ever understand all this.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This intelligent field\ndecides why a electron should remain in a particular orbit. : Electrons can\nchange position instantly without taking time. They suddenly appear in another\norbit of higher or lower energy or distance from the nucleus.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SOME ORBITS ARE IN\nMOBIUS FIGURE OF EIGHT FORMATION -- GENERATING SCALAR ENERGY FOR PERPETUAL\nMOTION OF ELECTRONS. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum Physics which\nsuddenly appeared in the 20th century is the result of ancient Vedic Sanskrit\ntexts being translated by the Christian invaders . These texts are 7000 years\nold.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The universe is in\nperfect harmony and balance. The cosmos is a unified system. A little\ndisharmony and the entire matter of the universe will go back into the black\nhole.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matter is NOT a inert\nsubstance. It is conscious and active. Experts in organic and inorganic&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">chemistry know what I mean. Matter constantly makes choices for alternate\npossibilities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Purushyo'yam loka\nsannidah\" . \"Man is a miniature universe\" --(Charaka Samhita\nIV).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Consciousness ( Brahman\n) is the only element in creation that knows itself.&nbsp; By being in constant interaction with itself,\nconsciousness knows everything about itself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"Prajn\u0101nam\nbrahma\u201d-- \"Brahman is knowledge\".&nbsp;\nBrahman knows everything.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MOKSHA SOULD GIVE\nCONSTANT CLOSED LOOP FEEDBACK TO THE MOTHER FIELD OF BRAHMAN<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without factoring in\nconsciousness there can be NO Theory of Every Thing (TOE) and Grand Unification\nTheory (GUT).&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When science meets the\nconsciousness field of Vedanta written 7000 years ago, the last frontier can be\nbreached. The morphogenetic field or BrahmAn of Vedanta, has a self organizing\nelectro magnetic nature.&nbsp; This is a\nmerged grand Akashik field of several morphic fields of different nature by\nresonant coupling.&nbsp; This inductive field\nhas consciousness and self initiating nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This non-linear field\nis holographic and holds information of not only past history by even every\nthought , emotion and feeling held in the right hand subconscious lobe of your\nbrain. This explains the power of prayer and intention. The whole cosmos is\ninterconnected in this field and speed is NOT restricted to speed of light.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">God has given us 5\nsenses of narrow bandwidth, so that we do NOT have an information overload breakdown.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The quantum world\ncannot be observed by our 5 senses, and they do NOT follow the cause and effect\nlaws of classical physics. We live in a time obstructed world using 5 senses --\nand also a timeless realm in the quantum dimension, where what you see is NOT\nwhat you get.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That Vedanta is\navailable in the \u201csoap is civilization\u201d Christian West primarily through\nreligious interpreters in pagan saffron robes has prejudiced their evaluation\nof its relevance to scientific concerns.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ironically today we have\nour Hindu hating ruler -- the Italian WTE ( waitress turned empress ) calling\nsaffron the color of terror. No wonder she cannot go beyond a restaurant\ntable.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sorry, I have to lose\nsome grace here. What does this queen bee&nbsp;\n( who is the most hated woman in India ) know of the past glory of\nIndia? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Does she know that\nsaffron color is the soul of India--the color of the robes of our Vedic\nMaharishis?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DOES THIS ITALIAN WOMAN\nKNOW THAT THE ANCIENT GLORY OF ROME IS 100% HINDU\u2014THAT CAESARS AND ROMAN\nSENATORS WERE HINDUS ?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THAT EVERY\nGLORIUS RUIN IN ROME IS MADE BY HINDUS ?&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THAT JESUS CHRIST IS MODELLED AFTER AN INDIAN HINDU SAGE &nbsp;APOLLONIUS OF TYANA ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Bible says that the\nuniverse is only thousands of years old. While Vedanta and the modern quantum\ntheory agrees that it is around 15 billion years.&nbsp; It is amazing that the timeless Vedic\ntradition remains relevant and easily expressible in terms of contemporary\nscientific concepts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The theory of\nrelativity, and the space-time character of the universe, were perceived by the\nold Indian Rishis in their advanced stage of spiritual consciousness<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In their state of\nhigher consciousness they realized that the ultimate constituents of the\nuniverse - energy and mass, particle and wave, - were but different aspects of\nthe same basic process,&nbsp; but the same\nOneness which pervaded the entire universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Science, in its most\nadvanced stage, is closer to Vedanta than ever before. The intuition of Indian\nmystics led them to understand the multidimensional reality and of space-time\ncontinuum which is the basis of the modern theory of relativity.&nbsp; Akasha \u2013the morphogenetic consciousness field\n, as per Vedanta is the source of everything that exists, and in which the\nmemory of the cosmos is encoded.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Everything we know,\nperceive, and imagine, every color, sound, sensation, every thought and every\nfeeling, is a form appearing in the mind.&nbsp;\nIt is all an in-forming of consciousness\u2014mind stuff- or Chitta.&nbsp; The brahmAn (morphogenetic field) is the\nreason why a partially formed biological structure (the 'morphogentic\ngerm\") gets attached to the morphogentic field of a species, which then\nguides the growth of the rest of the form.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adi Shankaracharya\u2019s Advaita\nproclaims that the truth which is BrahmAn is the only reality and that the\napparent notion of diversity (the root cause of all miseries) is only due to\nignorance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Despite the seeming\nduality that we experience, according to Advaita reality is actually non-dual.\nThis non-dual reality is called Brahman.&nbsp;\nAs a matter of fact we do feel ourselves to be other than our body or\nmind.&nbsp; Advaita calls our essential self,\nwhich is beyond body and mind, the Atman. And it teaches that this Atman is\nBrahman, which is non-dual.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Adi Sankaracharya\n&nbsp;and others, anyone seeking to follow the\nphilosophy of Advaita Ved\u0101nta must do so under the guidance of a Guru\n(teacher).&nbsp; It is the teacher who through\nexegesis of Sruti and skillful handling of words generates a hitherto unknown\nknowledge in the disciple. The teacher does not merely provide stimulus or\nsuggestion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHRADDHA \u2013NOT BHAKTI --\nIS A MUST<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHRADDHA IS ASSOCIATED\nWITH ADI SHANKARACHARYA <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Guru must have the\nfollowing qualities (see Mundaka Upanishad 1.2.12):<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u015arotriya \u2014 must be\nlearned in the Vedic scriptures and Sampradaya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahmani\u1e63\u1e6dh\u0101 \u2014\nliterally meaning 'established in Brahman'; must have realised the oneness of\nBrahman in everything, and in himself/herself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The seeker must serve\nthe Guru, and submit questions with all humility in order to remove all doubts\n(see Bhagavad Gita 4.34).&nbsp; By doing so,\nAdvaita says, the seeker will attain Moksha ('liberation from the cycle of\nbirths and deaths')<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The purpose of\nSelf-Discovery is not that of God-Discovery. The concern is not about the\nexistence of God, or the verification of God\u2019s existence. Man has to discover\nhis own true or real nature. For this, man has to understand as to what it is\nto be a substance and as to what it is to be in a condition, or state called existence.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The teaching of Advaita\nis a proven methodology for discovering the nature of your Self and that of the\nworld. And the realization of the fundamental truth that is presented reduces\nall other considerations to complete insignificance. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advaita Vedanta\nsuggests that this nondual state of mind can be realized personally, in\nexperience, aided by certain contemplative practices such as meditation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nothing exists separate\nfrom the One God, because God is present everywhere.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cBrahma Satyam Jagan\nMithya Jivo Brahmaiva Na Aparah\u2014Brahman (the Absolute) is alone real; this\nworld is unreal; and the Jiva or the individual soul is non-different from\nBrahman.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Advaita is the only\nphilosophy that helps us to be free of \u2018bondage\u2019 right in this life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JEW Tipu Sultan\ndestroyed the the ancient Thirunavaya&nbsp;\ntemple at the banks of Bharatapuzha river, a village 8 km south of Tirur\nin the Malappuram district of Kerala state,&nbsp;\nalong with priceless Vedic records containing Adi Shankaracharya\u2019s\ntexts. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This temple was even\nolder than 6000 year old Guruvayur.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Advaita form of\nHinduism looks at God , as brahmAn-- the intelligent morphogenetic\nconsciousness field , the akasha&nbsp; or&nbsp; the space between the whizzing electrons in\nan atom.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Matter exists because\nof this intelligent force which holds the spiraling electrons in its\norbit--&nbsp; for if it drops or rises one\nsingle orbit the matter changes into something totally different.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/-l9153k6s6w/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/-l9153k6s6w?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">Bhaja govindam is\nmetrically highly irregular.&nbsp; &nbsp;It does not follow the same Chandas\nthroughout.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">Not a SINGLE stanzas is\nthe toTaka meter. &nbsp;Adi Shankaracharya's disciple &nbsp;<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>Totakacharya</b></span> is supposed to have recorded BhajaGovindam&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">An example of toTaka\nmeter is the toTaka-aShTaka, in which each paada (quarter) is metrically\nequivalent to -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">bhava\nshankara-deshika-me sharaNam.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">Using 1 to represent\n'laghu' and 2 to represent 'guru', the format is<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">1 1 2 - 1 1 2 - 1 1 2 -\n1 1 2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">And toTaka is not related\nto indravajra or upendravajra, both of which are types of triShTup.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>When\nsyllabic instants (matra) is the foundation of the Sanskrit prosody, a short\nsyllable is counted as one instant, and a long syllable is counted as two\ninstants.. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://translate.google.co.in/translate?hl=en&amp;sl=hi&amp;u=http://sanskrit.sai.uni-heidelberg.de/Chanda/HTML/v_sundarI_1.html&amp;prev=search\" style=\"background-color: lime;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">https://translate.google.co.in/translate?hl=en&amp;sl=hi&amp;u=http://sanskrit.sai.uni-heidelberg.de/Chanda/HTML/v_sundarI_1.html&amp;prev=search</span></a><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>Matra is a meter in Sanskrit\nprosody is measured in terms of a matra (i.e. the time taken in uttering a\nshort vowel). A laghu is a syllable containing one matra</b></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/CNnUhll0zzA/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/CNnUhll0zzA?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HERE\nIS THE BULLSHIT GIVEN BY JEW ROTHSCHILDs HISTORIANS\u2014 AS TO WHY BHJAGOVINDAM IS\nLIKE TASTELESS &nbsp;KHICHDI COOKED BY A MAN\nWHO DOES NOT KNOW THE ART OF COOKING -- <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE:\nBhaja govindaM is divided into dvAdashamanjarikA stotram and chaturdashamanjarika\nstotram. At the end of composing the first stanza, it is said that Shankara\nburst forth with the next 12 stanzas of bhaja govindam.&nbsp; Thus stanzas 2-13 with 1st as refrain are\ncalled dvAdashmanjarika stotram. Inspired by the extempore recital by Shankara,\neach of his 14 disciples composed a verse and the 14 verse compendium is called\nchaturdashamanjarika stotram. (There are no evidences to prove the exact\nindividual authorship of these 14 verses, we have some traditional hearsay evidences\nas attribution.) Shankara added the finishing touches by adding five of his own\nstanzas at the last bringing the total to 31. The combined 31 are also termed\nas mohamudgaraH by some.&nbsp; The last two verses\nin this version is not found in all editions UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>OH &nbsp;FUCKIN\u2019 &nbsp;YEAH ?</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 200%;\"></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">REAL\nAdi Shankaracharya\u2019s&nbsp; words are never so\nharsh and cynical.&nbsp; He was a graceful\nmaharishi ,&nbsp; his REAL works are full of\nwisdom-- fragrant , soft and tender</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DiviRPCQn-E/WPnR27VGEhI/AAAAAAABSyU/rf38JGQDsjc-cUPXoRorgNa0ZQ_1zA5qACLcB/s1600/imaeges.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"272\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DiviRPCQn-E/WPnR27VGEhI/AAAAAAABSyU/rf38JGQDsjc-cUPXoRorgNa0ZQ_1zA5qACLcB/s400/imaeges.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><br /></b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8117643033551691733\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_23M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/16142894564723797861\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Murali Meleth</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1492766184780#c8117643033551691733\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 21, 2017 at 2:46 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_23MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Captain,<br />\nYour observations on \"Shraddha\" being the key element in spirituality (that aims Self-Realization) is spot on. As you mentioned, it is hard to translate Shraddha into any other language. It implies multi-dimensional aspects starting with Faith/Trust. One stage of \"Shraddha\" which I would like to emphasis is that where it stays as 'focused awareness' with nothing in focus. That gives a chance to bring what is 'beyond' into the ambit of awareness. You have beautifully expressed it when you said \"Recognition of the unknown is Shraddha.\"</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_23BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seednSID\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_22T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_22TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_22TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seednSID\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_22TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_22TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seednSID\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_22TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_22TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_22TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_23b+seednSID\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_22B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6720838403015149454\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_22M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html?showComment=1492766958249#c6720838403015149454\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 21, 2017 at 2:59 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_22MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi mm,<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is a faith that you are moving in the right direction.<br />\n<br />\nIt is not a blind faith in some organization, institution, or teacher. Rather, it is an inner feeling of certainty that you are moving in the right direction.<br />\n<br />\nYou may not know exactly how your journey is unfolding, but have an inner intuition of walking steadily towards the goal of life.<br />\n<br />\nThe \"faith\" of Yoga is not one of \"blind faith\" as is the case with some, if not most religions. Oral tradition of Yoga suggests that the aspirant not merely \"believe\" in anything.<br />\n<br />\nRather, it is suggested that one test the ideas in one's own inner laboratory, with the \"faith\" of Yoga thus being based on direct experience.<br />\n<br />\nIf one has practiced breath awareness and diaphragmatic breathing and finds that it leads to a calm, quiet mind, that direct experience is the foundation of the \"faith\" that continuing such breathing will, in the future, lead to similar experience of calm and quiet.<br />\n<br />\nShraddha is not exactly faith, it is more like trust.<br />\n<br />\nTrust is very, very different from faith. Faith is something you are born into, trust is something you grow in.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>When I say \u201c I trust my wife \u201c that explains it.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<br />\nThe white man says \u201c I love my wife \u201c ( basically she still gives him good head )<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>You may not trust the woman you love, but you definitely love the woman you trust.</b></span> &nbsp; &nbsp;The white man\u2019s intellect is so shallow\u2014he wont understand this<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seednSID\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_23b+seednSID\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-fObQaZE2FlU/WPnRlNBpemI/AAAAAAABSyQ/pRlzdmOsc_knaHDa0nsQX4HC2OaWQo2yACLcB/s1600/dowfrnload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-fObQaZE2FlU/WPnRlNBpemI/AAAAAAABSyQ/pRlzdmOsc_knaHDa0nsQX4HC2OaWQo2yACLcB/s400/dowfrnload.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">SANATANA\nDHARMA DOES NOT DEMAND SERVILITY TO DOGMA. &nbsp; &nbsp;THIS IS THE ONLY RELIGION WHICH ASKS SEEKERS TO APPLY THEIR OWN\nCONSCIENCE</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">In the\ntradition of Vedanta the meaning of the word shraddha is expanded to be \u2018faith\npending understanding.\u2019</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THE FAKE BHAKTI MOVEMENT HIJACKED THE HINDU SPIRITUAL MIND ROOTED IN \u201cSHRADDHA \u201c&nbsp;-- &nbsp; &nbsp;TO \u201cBLIND FAITH \u201c LIKE IN SINGLE HOLY BOOK /\nSINGLE MESSIAH RELIGIONS.. </b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Shraddha\nitself is considered to be one of the mental qualifications for the gain of\nself-knowledge.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">Shraddha is not\nblind belief in something or someone, nor is it a belief in a theory or\ndogma,.&nbsp; There is a big difference between\nblind belief and sraddha, i.e. faith pending understanding.</span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Faith in\nsuch single messiah / single holy book religions is the surrender of the mind,\nit\u2019s the surrender of reason . It is the surrender of the only thing that makes\nus different from other animals.&nbsp; Out of\nall the virtues, all the supposed virtues, faith must be the most overrated</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Indeed,\nit\u2019s odd that we regard faith as a virtue at all.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Faith\ntruly is the abandonment of scientific principles.&nbsp; Faith is the refutation of tangible\nevidence.&nbsp; Faith in all its forms is a\nwild jackal roaming the global Serengeti, steeped in the poverty of superfluous\ninstinct, seemingly without cogitation or purpose.&nbsp; Faith confuses things and makes truth more\nambiguous.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>YET\nTHESE SINGLE HOLY BOOK BHAKTI ADHERENTS CALL HINDUS SUPERSTITIOUS.&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; THERE IS ZERO SUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA\n, STEEPED IN SHRADDHA</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Society\nwould be much better off with more trust, and less faith.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Faith\nhas been called \u201cthe substance of hope.\u201d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">It requires no evidence for belief or practice.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">The very nature of faith surmises that\ntangible evidence doesn\u2019t exist.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Otherwise, there is manifestation.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">On the other hand, trust is based largely on evidence that is real.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Trust is the core conviction of judgment\nbased on knowledge, instinct, and experience.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\nmeaning of the phrase \u2018faith pending understanding\u2019 implies that you will\nyourself one day recognize that what the Upanishads , the Guru&nbsp; and the teachings are pointing out is\ntrue.&nbsp; At that point one doesn\u2019t need\nshraddha anymore because one has&nbsp;\nrecognized the truth for oneself.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">The logo of Delhi University&nbsp; is - </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">\u0928\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0920\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">\u0927\u0943\u0924\u093f\u0903</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">, meaning - \"Reverent dedication grasps the\ntruth\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
