, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> ||<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"O\nsinless one! Two kinds of disciplines in this world were set forth by Me in\ntimes of yore \u2013 for the Samkhyas the discipline of knowledge (Jnana-nishtha),\nand for the yogins, that of works (Karma-nishtha). \" \u2013 (Bhagavad Gita\nIII.3) 4000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">2000\nYEARS LATER&nbsp; --in his commentary on this\nsloka,&nbsp; Adi Shankaracharya&nbsp; states \u2013 \"</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0924\u0924\u094d\u0930</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0915\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0938\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0926\u094d\u0935\u093f\u0935\u093f\u0927\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0928\u093f\u0937\u094d\u0920\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0907\u0924\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">? </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0906\u0939</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> - What is this two-fold discipline?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Listen: (i) The\ndiscipline of knowledge (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u091c\u094d\u091e\u093e\u0928\u092f\u094b\u0917</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">),\u2026.(for)\nthe renouncers of the Paramhamsa order who have established themselves in the\nultimate Reality, and&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">(ii) The discipline of works (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0915\u0930\u094d\u092e\u092f\u094b\u0917</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">)\u2026. (for) the performers of works\u2026the discipline of works\nmay promote life\u2019s ends by endowing the agent with the fitness to adopt the\ndiscipline of knowledge, and not independently, by itself, whereas the\ndiscipline of knowledge, generated by that of works, is totally independent\nmeans to life\u2019s supreme end.\"&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nthis Sloka, the word Nishtha means \u2018devoted to\u2019, \u2018established in\u2019. Faith with\ntrust and dedication is called shraddha; faith with trust and confidence is\nnishtha, in this sloka, Krishna speaks about the twofold path of faith and\nconfidence.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Self-knowledge (atma jnana)\ncan exist when self-knowledge is not fully established; Jnana-nishtha refers to\nself-knowledge that is fully assimilated and established.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The idea of faith\npending understanding is one we are all familiar with.&nbsp; If we take a course in physics for example we\nhave \u2018faith\u2019 that the teacher knows the subject and that the textbook contains\ncorrect information. Sanatana Dharma encourages the student to refute the book\nand the teacher , if the student has clear reasons to disagree\u2014it is mandatory<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>Adi Shankaracharya has NEVER EVER extolled\nthe virtues of BHAKTI \u2013blind belief to an avatar god \u2013 the way HARE KRISHNA sect \u2013 &nbsp;followers\nof BHAKTI movement Rothschild\u2019s FAKE creation Chaitanya Mahaprabhu did<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><b>Rather in his ADVAITA VEDANTA works Adi hankaracharya tolls the death knell of BLIND BHAKTI \u2013he explains SHRADDHA as\nthat attempt at a clear intellectual appreciation by which an individual\nreadily understands the secret depths of significance, the exact import behind\nthe words of the texts as well as of the gurus</b></span></span>.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The capacity at realizing the SRUTI&nbsp; of the Scriptures in all their suggestiveness\nis termed as Shraddha.&nbsp;&nbsp; Shraddha is the\nbelief in what we do not know so that we may come to know what we believe in.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The special capacity of the human intellect,\nnot only to know and appreciate the Sastra, but also, to absorb and assimilate\nthe noble ideals, so completely as to bear upon all one\u2019s actions, is called\nShraddha.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is that powerful,\nimpelling force which springs forth spontaneously from within, and propelled by\nwhich all layers of personality in an individual act in their appointed fields.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shraddha is the content and the very essence\nof the equipment\u2019s of man\u2019s whole being.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nShraddha&nbsp; gives the direction, the\ndash, and provides a destination for one\u2019s determination.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Faith is seen in\nvarious fields of human endeavors \u2014 in man\u2019s physical indulgences (ahara), his\ndedicated activities (yajna), his self-denials (tapas), and his charities\n(daana).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sraddha determines the texture of our\nimpressions (vasanas) in us, which, in their turn, command our view-of-life.\nOur desires, thoughts and actions are charted by our view of life.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Naturally,\nan individual's physical activities, .psychological behaviors and intellectual\nmake up are all ordered by the type of Shraddha he has come to maintain in\nhimself and if the Sraddha is of the wrong type, the entire expression of his\npersonality in all walks of life and in every field of endeavor, can only be\nugly.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As his inner disposition, so will be the man. The more an individual\nidentifies himself with his physical sheath, the more crystallized becomes his\nego, under the influence of his inner disposition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE BHAKTI MOVEMENT HAD MISLED A HINDU INTO\nBELIEVING THAT PRAYING TO GOD BY CHANTING BHAJANS , RUNNING AROUND BEATING\nDHOLAKS , DOING ENDLESS MEANINGLESS RITUALS CAN REDUCE HIS KARMIC BAGGAGE..&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">&nbsp;I ASK THE HARE KRISHNA SECT TO UNDERSTAND\nTHIS, AND NOT HIJACK SANATANA DHARMA</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">A true friend always helps us when we are in\nneed of help without expecting anything in return and even if he is\ninconvenienced himself. He helps in a way that we do not feel uncomfortable and\nindebted to him. He stands up for us and supports us against bullies, God is\nour truest friend.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All of our other friends may leave us behind one day, or\nbetray us, or refuse to help us when we need it the most. But God looks after\nus unselfishly, and is constantly guiding all humanity to the right path always\nthrough , through scriptures and through our conscience. We only have to listen\nto his guidance, acknowledge it, follow it and extend our own hand back to him\nin friendship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Having GOD as our refuge and friend does not\nmean that we do not do our duty or that we do not put in our best effort.\nRather, it means we should not worry about the results too much.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We should\ninstead focus on doing our studies and other tasks well, and then just leave\nthe results in His hands. God is loving and fair, and whatever he will give to\nus will be in accordance of our past karma. Therefore, we should not worry and\ninstead we should keep a positive attitude in our life at all times.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0924\u0947\u0937\u093e\u092e\u0939\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0938\u092e\u0941\u0926\u094d\u0927\u0930\u094d\u0924\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u092e\u0943\u0924\u094d\u092f\u0941\u0938\u0902\u0938\u093e\u0930\u0938\u093e\u0917\u0930\u093e\u0924\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u092d\u0935\u093e\u092e\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0928\u091a\u093f\u0930\u093e\u0924\u094d\u092a\u093e\u0930\u094d\u0925</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u092e\u092f\u094d\u092f\u093e\u0935\u0947\u0936\u093f\u0924\u091a\u0947\u0924\u0938\u093e\u092e\u094d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"> .. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u0967\u0968</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">- </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u096d</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">te\u1e63\u0101\u1e43 aha\u1e43 samuddhart\u0101 m\u1e5btyusa\u1e43s\u0101ras\u0101gar\u0101t<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">bhav\u0101mi na cir\u0101t p\u0101rtha mayy \u0101ve\u015bitacetas\u0101m\n12.7<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">te\u1e63\u0101m\u2014of them; aham\u2014I; samuddhart\u0101\u2014deliverer;\nm\u1e5btyu\u2014that; sa\u1e41s\u0101ra\u2014material existence; s\u0101gar\u0101t\u2014from the ocean; bhav\u0101mi\u2014become;\nna cir\u0101t\u2014not a long time; p\u0101rtha\u2014O son of P\u1e5bth\u0101; mayi\u2014unto Me; \u0101ve\u015bita\u2014fixed / shraddha;\ncetas\u0101m\u2014of those whose minds are like that.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Arjuna asks Krishna what state of\nconsciousness will emerge in one who has faith but who does not follow the\nlaws, rites, injunctions of the sacred writings (XVII.1). In response Krishna\nteaches his friend the profound implications of shraddha on consciousness.\nWhatever we are is the result of our shraddha .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u2018...as our shraddha is, so will we be\u2019<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">What we believe truly does matter, for our shraddha\n&nbsp;reflects our beliefs and lays the\nfoundation for our consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The shraddha of each one of us follows the\nform (anurupa) of our own unique individual nature (XVII.3). This is what we\ncall our \u2018human nature\u2019 when we say \u2018it\u2019s only human nature\u2019 to behave in a\nparticular way. This \u2018nature\u2019 is produced by the relative distribution of\nPrakriti\u2019s (Nature) three qualities, the three gunas in each of us.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shraddha is that power which sustains the\naspirant on the path towards perfection. It supports him during tests and\ntrials, temptations and pitfalls and in overcoming seemingly insurmountable\nobstacles.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Therefore, always keep alive your shraddha in your guru. Let your\nfaith be unsullied and staunch. Your efforts to attain the true goal of life\nwill be crowned with success.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shraddha in the teachings and the teacher are\nvital to conducting successful self-inquiry.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Without shraddha in both of these\nfactors, the mind will be continuously disturbed with doubt and too caught up\nin an ongoing debate with the teachings to ever abide in the contemplative\nquietude that fosters one\u2019s capacity to \u201csee through the veil\u201d of one\u2019s\npreconceived notions and gain a correct understanding of the nature of reality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shraddha is most likely to develop with a guru\nwith ETHOS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/06/ethos-logos-pathos-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/06/ethos-logos-pathos-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;AS A\nSHIP CAPTAIN I WAS ABLE TO DEVELOP SHRADDHA IN MY CREW &nbsp;&nbsp;.. THIS IS THE WAY OF A MENTOR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/mentoring-at-sea-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/mentoring-at-sea-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Shraddha is traditionally one of the six\nvirtues that are part of the four-fold set of qualifications laid out by\nSankara for the study of Vedanta, which are: first, the ability to discriminate\nbetween the permanent and&nbsp; impermanent\n(Nitya-Anitya-Vastu-Viveka), second, non-attachment to the fruits of actions in\nthis world and the next (Iha-Amutra-Phala-Bhoga-Vairagya), third, the six virtues\n(control of&nbsp; the mind (Shama), control of\nthe senses (Dama), satiety in the enjoyment of sense-objects (Uparati),\nendurance (Titiksha), faith (Shraddha), balanced concentration (Sama dhana)),\nand fourth, the sustained desire to achieve Moksha (Mumukshutva). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In Vedanta blind belief is something that is\nconsidered counterproductive to the teaching.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Vedanta gurus have never wanted\nYES MEN among the students<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Blind belief is opposed to a strong buddhi\nand for a student of Vedanta everything revolves around developing a strong\nbuddhi. Why? Because only with a strong buddhi will you be able to learn,\ndiscern and thus understand. Understand what?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Understand how you cannot\npossibly be what you naturally assumed yourself to be, i.e. a limited entity\nmade up of matter; understand what in truth you are, what the scriptures talk\nabout: timeless, formless and all pervading.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As far as Vedanta is concerned,\nthere is absolutely no use at all in simply believing this. What is needed is\nunderstanding.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">But how does one bridge the gap between what is experienced\nand/or scientifically proved on the one hand and what Vedanta says on the other\nhand?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;Gurus\nshow us the path of fulfillment, the Sreyomarga. The Sastras are designed to\nensure the peace and prosperity of the world and the spiritual perfection of\nmankind.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The method Vedanta uses is quite similar to\nsomething used in science: what you cannot prove, you take as a working\nhypothesis in order to proceed with your investigation. &nbsp;&nbsp;You assume that it is so until you know\nwhether it really is so or not.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Many\nidiots called this &nbsp;\u201cbelief pending\nunderstanding\u201d. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Capt Ajit Vadakayil\nsays&nbsp; --\u201cbelief\u201d &nbsp;means here just refers to information received\u2014pending\nNIDDHIDYASANA \u2013a priceless gurukul ritual where the CUD is chewed between\nstudents with the Guru mediating .. Shraddha thrives in an environment of\nenthusiasm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN MALAYALAM SHRADDHA HAS THE ELEMENT OF \u201c AWARENESS\n\u201c INFUSED INTO TRUST.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN KERALA SCHOOLS WE HEAR ALMOST EVERY DAY\nTHE TEACHER EXHORTING STUDENTS \u2013 \u201cKUTTIKAL &nbsp;SHRADDIKUKA\u201d &nbsp;\u2013 BEFORE HE STARTS TEACHING <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">YES\u2014THIS IS WHAT IT MEANS .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">BHAKTI MOVEMENT DOES NOT ASK FOR AWARENESS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Practice must be pursued with shraddha\n,confidence, vigour, keen memory and power of absorption to break this\nspiritual complacency. <b>Yoga Sutra I-20 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ytwMuAq3WIc/WPoXrnQmakI/AAAAAAABSyw/PAFHfv50TxoVtjrJ9ZowdLaMH311WJeLACLcB/s1600/divya_shrawwddha_divine_instrumental_tunes_to_invoke_icn042.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I ASK MY READERS TO SPREAD THIS LINK BELOW BY\nALL AVAILABLE MEANS\u2014 FACEBOOK,TWITTER , WHATSUP, EMAIL , SMS ETC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sraddha suktam,\nwhich is part of the Taittiriya Brahmana, underlines the significance of\nSraddha and honours it as a goddess. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Listening to this chant\nin times of fear or confusion, can help restore faith and inspire us to\npersevere in our efforts.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chanting this chant can also bring the much needed\nvitality to face the challenges of life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shraddha Suktam \u2013 </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u0942\u0915\u094d\u0924\u092e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: white;\">Rigveda Mandala 10\nSukta 151- 5000 BC&nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0927\u094d\u0926\u092f\u093e\u0917\u094d\u0928\u093f\u0938\u094d\u0938\u092e\u093f\u0927\u094d\u092f\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0927\u094d\u0926\u092f\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0939\u0942\u092f\u0924\u0947</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0939\u0935\u093f\u0903\u0964</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0936\u094d\u0930\u0926\u094d\u0927\u093e\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092d\u0917\u0938\u094d\u092f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u0942\u0930\u094d\u0927\u0928\u093f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0935\u091a\u0938\u093e\u0935\u0947\u0926\u092f\u093e\u092e\u0938\u0940\u0965</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0965</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shraddh\u00e4 makes the fire\nburn splendidly. The oblation is offered with Shraddh\u00e4. Shraddh\u00e4 is the best\namong all kinds of wealth. We assert this fact with our words of praise. (1)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; I pray that You may bestow the pleasing and agreeable\non those who perform rituals for enjoying the fruits thereof. line-height: 150%;\">The gods pay particular\nattention to the frightening demons (or: they show reverence to the superior\ngods). In the same way, O Goddess Shraddh\u00e4, (we are showing reverence to you).\nKindly fulfill our intent towards our priests who perform rituals to enjoy the\nfruits thereof. Allworship Goddess Shraddh\u00e4 with (devotional) intent in their heart.\nOne gains wealth through&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">shraddh\u00e4. (4)</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; line-height: 150%;\">We invite the Goddess\nShraddh\u00e4 in the morning. We invite Goddess shraddh\u00e4 at noon and at sunset. O\nGoddess Shraddh\u00e4, bless us that we may have Shraddh\u00e4 in this life, at this\ntime, and in this place. (5)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANANATA DHARMA HAS\nROOM ONLY FOR \"SHRADDHA \" - CORNER STONE OF SPIRITUALITY <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA HAS NO\nROOM FOR \"BHAKTI \" --LIKE ALL OTHER SINGLE HOLY BOOK WORLD RELIGIONS <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE FAKE \"BHAKTI\nMOVEMENT \" WAS CREATED BY JEW ROTHSCHILD --WITH ALL COOKED UP AND BACK\nDATED CHARACTERS WHO NEVER EXISTED--LIKE THE DASAS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA HAS\nNEVER ALLOWED HINDUS TO RUN AROUND BEATING DHOLAKS AND CYMBALS LIKE STUPID\nMORONS --LIKE THESE HARE KRISHNA MOVEMENT STOOGES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/04/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_21.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE FOUNTAINHEAD OF\nSHRADDHA IS HIGHER CONSCIOUSNESS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHRADDHA IS THE\nOPPOSITE OF ANDHA-VISHWAS ( SUPERSTITION OR BLIND FAITH ) . THERE IS ZERO\nSUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA. NO BLIND FAITH OR BHAKTI IS ALLOWED IN\nSANATANA DHARMA LIKE IN THE SINGLE HOLY BOOK SINGLE MESSIAH RELIGIONS\u2014WHICH\nPROPAGATE DOGMA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA IS\nROOTED IN SPIRITUALITY- IT IS NOT A RELIGION<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA ASKS US\nTO DO EVERYTHING WITH SHRADDHA FOR FRUITION. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The essence of Shraddha\nis \u2013 unshakable belief in noble ideals, DHARMA and Srutis <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our ancient Maharishis\nand and spiritual texts have NEVER EVER commanded you to believe DOGMA ; rather\nthey lead you to understand. You have to exercise your conscience at every\nstep\u2014 do your duty while being rooted in the moment. This is the essense of\nBhagawad Gita . The goal, as understood by the ancient rishis, is not to merely\nbelieve in God, but to know God directly. Shraddha is the first step in one's\nsearch for God.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">trividh\u0101 bhavati\n\u015braddh\u0101 dehin\u0101\u1e43 s\u0101 svabh\u0101vaj\u0101 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">s\u0101ttvik\u012b r\u0101jas\u012b caiva\nt\u0101mas\u012b ceti t\u0101\u1e43 \u015b\u1e5b\u1e47u 17.2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Supreme Lord said,\naccording to the modes of nature acquired by the embodied soul, one's SHRADDHA\ncan be of three kinds- satviki, rajasi or tamasi . Now hear about these. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The association of the\nliving entity with the opposite forces of nature - rajas ( creation ) and tamas\n(destruction ) mediated by Sattva ( preserver ) has been going on perpetually\nsince the living entity is in contact with material nature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">HARK THE WISDOM IN\nBHAGAWAD GITA , 6000 YEARS AGO.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">sattv\u0101nur\u016bp\u0101 sarvasya\n\u015braddh\u0101 bhavati bh\u0101rata <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u015braddh\u0101mayoya\u1e43 puru\u1e63o\nyo yacchraddha\u1e25 sa eva sa\u1e25 17.3<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">O Arjun! SHRADDHA of\neach man takes the shape given to it by his staff of being \u2013 his soul. This\nsoul is made up of SHRADDHA ; and whatever is that SHRADDHA in him, he is that\nand that is he.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SHRADDHA of all humans\nconforms to the nature of their mind. All people possess SHRADDHA and whatever\nthe nature of their SHRADDHA that is verily what they are. Where we decide to\nplace our faith and what we choose to believe in practically shapes the direction\nof our life. The quality of our SHRADDHA decides the direction of our life\u2014we\nforge the hinges of destiny on our own terms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2-</span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">vidhi-h\u012bnam as\u1e5bi\u1e63h\u1e6d\u0101nna\u1e41\nmantra-h\u012bnam adak\u1e63hi\u1e47am<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u015bhraddh\u0101-virahita\u1e41\nyaj\u00f1a\u1e41 t\u0101masa\u1e41 parichak\u1e63hate ( Bhagawad Gita 17.13 )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yagna devoid of\nSHRADDHA and contrary to the injunctions of the scriptures, in which no food is\noffered, no mantras chanted, and no sacrifice ( bloodless ) is made, is to be\nconsidered in the mode of ignorance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatana Dharma\nrequired us to be IN THE MOMENT \u2013we must make correct choices and perform the\ncorrect actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the fourth chapter\nof the Bhagavad Gita, Sri Krishna says, \"shraddhavan labhate jnanam\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only the one with\nshraddha gains knowledge. Shraddha is like a stepping stone; with the help of a\nguru, Shraddha is indispensable, because without it, true knowledge will\nforever be beyond ones grasp.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/10/shravana-manana-nididhyasana-way-of.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Patanjali\u2019s Yogasutra\nwas penned down 7000 years ago. All this is beyond the shallow intellect of the\nwhite man<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">1.20\u2014shraddhaviryasmritisamadhiprajnapoorvaka\nitaresham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">For others, clarity is\npreceded by SHRADDHA , energy, memory and discrimination of the real.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Highly evolved souls\nhave the power to differentiate between isolation and emancipation. They are\nneither elated by their conquest of the elements, nor delighted at their\nability to move unreservedly without their bodies. Shraddha should not be\nunderstood just as faith. It also expresses mental and intellectual firmness.\n(The next word, virya, stands for gallantry and power, in the sense of physical\nand nervine strength.) Interestingly, Patanjali's first use of the word\nshraddha is unambiguous, in order to encourage the sadhaka to step up his\nsadhana in order to reach the highest goal. The natural trust of the aspirer is\nconfirmed by revelation and transformed into the faith, which imbues the\nconsciousness of practicians in any field of art, science and philosophy. If\ntrust is instinctive, SHRADDHA is intuitional.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHEN I WANT TO HAVE A\nNICE BELLY LAUGH \u2013 I SURF EVANGELIST TV CHANNELS . THEY EXPOUND DROPS OF\nPOLLUTED WATER IN A RIDICULOUS MANNER . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SANATANA DHARMA IS THE\nMIGHTY BLUE OCEAN\u2014NOT MEANT FOR HALF WITS .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Capt ajit vadakayil<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>ABOVE IS THE GREATEST REVELATION AMONG MY 1180\nPOSTS AND 1.2 LAKH COMMENTS&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
