, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">As per Vedanta consciousness is a fundamental\nquality of information. The entire cosmos is suffused with sentience.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">We are surrounded and immersed in\nconsciousness; it is in the air we breathe, the soil we tread on, the bacteria\nthat colonize our intestines, and the brain that enables us to think.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Our pilgrimages are rooted in the FIELD OF\nCONSCIOUSNESS\u2014an ocean of it<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jealous white men ( with COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY\nin cahoots ) are now trying to SHUT DOWN both these festivals \u2013nay\u2014 planet sustaining pilgrimages below.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/thrissur-pooram-festival-mother-of-all.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/thrissur-pooram-festival-mother-of-all.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern science was\nshackled by classical IDIOTS who wanted everything to be verified by the 5\nhuman senses\u2014 narrow and squelched bands . &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today these shackles\nhave been broken by SKYPE , BLUE TOOTH and electronic REMOTE CONTROLS . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ancient Maharishis with\n12 strand DNA and king sized pineals glands used their own bodies for skype,\nblue tooth and remote control. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wonders of the human\nbody is yet to be unearthed. Probably it will take another 600 years <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today intelligent scientists\n&nbsp;consider &nbsp;the subjective as an intrinsic aspect of\nreality <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In considering\nfundamental questions of cosmology, such as why the universe is so precisely\nsuited for the evolution of complex life, to how reality self-generates its own\nexistence, to the mysteriously observer-dependent character of the universe\nrevealed by modern physics.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scientists now call for\nus to recognize an essentially interior and perspectival aspect of reality. &nbsp;Evolution is no longer about MAD MAN Charles\nDarwin\u2019s ridiculous theories&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A new cosmology is\ncoming into view \u2013 a new story of our place in the universe. In full acceptance\nof the discovered facts of science, the new view regards the human and all life\nas participators in the larger cosmic evolutionary process. We humans are no\nlonger considered insignificant cogs of this cosmos<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Doctors now have shifted\ntowards Ayurveda\u2014they adopt an integral approach to healing\u2014it &nbsp;involves a whole-systems approach based in\nhealing and the restoration of wholeness. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They realize that we are part of an\ninterconnected whole that includes biological, personal, cultural, and\ntranspersonal dimension<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That understanding\nconsciousness and awareness helps us understand and experience health and\nwell-being, including our will to live, grow, and die with grace.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That our interpersonal\nrelationships are a vital part of our integral nature and they impact our\nhealth and well-being.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our ability to see the\nway to a new approach to health and healing requires deep humility in the face\nof wonder and mystery. Gratitude, love, and compassion are essential tools to\nan inclusive and whole-hearted healing system<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8389521671144600343\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_58M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">April 20, 2017 at 1:28 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_58MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nI NOW ADD SWAMI CHINMAYANANDA TO THE \"VADAKAYIL PRIZE\" LIST--.<br />\n<br />\nAAA ) HERE IS THE LIST OF MAHA MERUS WHO FOOLED THE WORLD , WHOM I HAVE TRASHED INTO THE GARBAGE BIN OF THE PLANET.<br />\n<br />\nGARBAGE BUCKET LIST:<br />\n<br />\n1) BERTRAND RUSSEL<br />\n2) ROMILA THAPAR<br />\n3) IRFAN HABIB<br />\n4) NOAM CHOMSKY<br />\n5) RAMCHANDRA GUHA<br />\n6) SHELDON POLLOCK<br />\n7) SIGMUND FREUD<br />\n8) GEORG WILHELM HEGEL<br />\n9) AMARTYA SEN<br />\n10) WENDY DONIGER<br />\n11) FREIDRICH WILHELM NIETZSCHE<br />\n12) IMMANUEL KANT<br />\n13 ) BARUCH SPINOZA<br />\n14) ALBERT EINSTEIN<br />\n15) ISAAC NEWTON<br />\n16) GUGLEILMO MARCONI<br />\n17) CHARLES DARWIN<br />\n18) KARL MARX<br />\n19) MAX WEBER<br />\n20) THOMAS ALVA EDISON<br />\n21) FIBONACCI<br />\n22) BARKHA DUTT<br />\n23) ADMIRAL LN RAMDAS , WIFE LALITA AND DAUGHTER KAVITA.<br />\n24) EDWARD BERNAYS<br />\n25) JOHN DEWEY<br />\n26) GEORGE IVANOVICH GURDJEIFF<br />\n27) PETER D OUPENSKY<br />\n28) OPRAH WINFREY<br />\n29) RICHARD BANDLER AND JOHN GRINDER<br />\n30) CHRISTIANE AMANPOUR<br />\nNOTE: MENTAL MIDGETS LIKE ROMILA THAPAR , IRFAN HABIB , RAMACHANDRA GUHA, SHELDON POLLOCK, WENDY DONIGER , BARKHA DUTT , RAMDAS FAMILY MUST BE THANKFUL THAT THEY ARE INCLUDED AMONG A LIST OF CEREBRAL GIANTS<br />\n<br />\n#########################<br />\n<br />\nBBB ) HERE ARE PEOPLE WHO MADE A DENT IN THE UNIVERSE\u2014 THEY GET THE \"VADAKAYIL PRIZE\". THIS IS NOT A VESTED \u201cNOBEL PRIZE \u201c<br />\n<br />\n1) NIKOLA TESLA<br />\n2) DIMITRI MENDELEYEEV<br />\n3) IE IRODOV<br />\n4) ARYABHATTA<br />\n5) SRINIVASAN RAMANUJAN<br />\n6) CHANAKYA<br />\n7) ADI SHANKARACHARYA<br />\n8) APOLLONIUS ( AN INDIAN SAGE \u2013WHO LEGACY WAS SHIFTED ON TO A COOKED UP JESUS IN 325 AD )<br />\n9) \"JOHN DOE\"<br />\n10) JULIAN ASSANGE<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">11) SWAMI CHINMAYANANDA</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCCC) DOWN THE SHIT HOLE----<br />\n<br />\n1) SUHEL SETH<br />\n2) PRITISH NANDI<br />\n3) DILIP CHERIAN<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2714995591762006659\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_119M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/04/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_19.html?showComment=1492713778031#c2714995591762006659\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 21, 2017 at 12:12 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_119MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSOMEBODY ASKED ME<br />\n<br />\nWHY DO WE SACRIFICE IN A YAGNA ?<br />\n<br />\nIT IS A BLOODLESS SACRIFICE -GHEE / UNBROKEN RICE/ INCENSE ARE THE OFFERINGS<br />\n<br />\nAGNI ( FIRE ) DESTROYS WHAT IS OFFERED--HENCE THE TERM SACRIFICE<br />\n<br />\nFIRE IS THE ONLY THING WHICH CANNOT BE POLLUTED<br />\n<br />\nFIRE IS THE ONLY THING WHICH DOES NOT CARE FOR GRAVITY<br />\n<br />\nIN SPACE WHERE THERE IS NO GRAVITY FIRE BURNS COLORLESS ( WITH A SLIGHT BLUE TINGE ) LIKE A GLOBE<br />\n<br />\nWHEN RUSSIAN SPACE STATION MIR CAUGHT FIRE THE CAMERAS COULD NOT DETECT THE BLUE TINGE<br />\n<b style=\"font-size: 16px;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><br />AGNI IS WITNESS TO EVERY SAMSKARA ( RITES OF PASSAGE IN A HINDUs LIFE ) -- THE LAST BEING CREMATION WHERE AGNI CONSUMES THE DEAD BODY</span></b><br />\n<br />\nAgni is prominent in the hymns of the Vedas and particularly the Brahmanas.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>In the Rig Veda there are over 200 hymns that praise Agni. His name or synonyms appear in nearly a third of 1,028 hymns in the Rigveda.</b></span><br />\n<br />\nThe Rigveda opens with a hymn inviting Agni, who is then addressed later in the hymn as the guardian of \u1e5ata (Dharma )<br />\n<br />\nAgnihotra is a symbolic reminder and equivalent to the Sun, where the fire keeper is reminded of the heat that creates life, the fire in beings, the heat in the womb behind the cycle of life<br />\n<br />\nAgni is a symbol of piety and purity.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/agnihotra-ghee-cow-dung-fuel-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DUOJiRC5obw/UwiDtflONuI/AAAAAAAAppU/hpxnNJK2CIw/s113/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c19686056583133172\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_210M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nDecember 29, 2017 at 5:18 AM<br />\n<br />\nBEFORE THE WHITE INVADER CAME TO INDIA--<br />\n<br />\nFULL MOON DAY ( POORNIMA ) AND THREE DAYS FOLLOWING IT..<br />\n<br />\nAND ..<br />\n<br />\nNEW MOON DAY ( AMAVASYA ) -- AND THREE DAYS FOLLOWING IT..<br />\n<br />\nWERE HOLIDAYS --FOR FASTING ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/amavasya-poornima-ekadashi-fasting.html<br />\n<br />\nSIX FIXED HOLIDAYS IN A MONTH\u2026<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU DO THIS TODAY IN MODERN TIMES--AND EAT ORGANIC FOOD , YOU WILL NOT GET CANCER..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN THE EVIL WHITE INVADER-- BASTARD-- CAME TO INDIA-- HE MADE US WORSE THAN MONKEYS BY MAKING US FAST ON WRONG MEANINGLESS DATES ..<br />\n<br />\nBY 1947 JEW ROTHSCHILD CREATED HUNDREDS OF FAKE MUTTS IN INDIA. \u2026 HE MADE THE PONTIFFS OF THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS CRYPTO JEWS WITH PALE EYES --STOPPING THE 4000 YEAR OLD TRADITION OK KERALA NAMBOODIRIS HEADING THE 4 ORIGINAL MUTTS ..<br />\n<br />\nTHE POST ABOVE IS THE REPEAT THE MOST IMPORTANT FOR 1.1 BILLION HINDUS ON THIS PLANET..<br />\n<br />\nSPRING TIDES ARE STRONGEST THREE DAYS-- REPEAT ---THREE DAYS AFTER FULL MOON AND NEW MOON..<br />\n<br />\nTides are long-period waves that roll around the planet as the ocean is \"pulled\" back and forth by the gravitational pull of the moon and the sun as these bodies interact with the Earth in their monthly and yearly orbits\u2026<br />\n<br />\nDuring full or new moons\u2014which occur when the Earth, sun, and moon are nearly in alignment\u2014average tidal ranges are slightly larger. ..This occurs twice each month. ..<br />\n<br />\nThe moon appears new (dark) when it is directly between the Earth and the sun. The moon appears full when the Earth is between the moon and the sun. In both cases, the gravitational pull of the sun is \"added\" to the gravitational pull of the moon on Earth, causing the oceans to bulge a bit more than usual. This means that high tides are a little higher and low tides are a little lower than average.<br />\n<br />\nSpring tides, has nothing to do with the season of spring. Rather, the term is derived from the concept of the tide \"springing forth.\" ..<br />\n<br />\nSpring tides occur twice each lunar month all year long, without regard to the season\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://tides.mobilegeographics.com/calendar/month/547.html<br />\n<br />\nIN THE LINK ABOVE YOU CAN SEE THAT FULL MOON IS ON 3RD DEC 2017..<br />\n<br />\nTHREE DAYS LATER THE DATE IS 6TH DEC..<br />\n<br />\nTHE HIGH TIDE ( SPRING ) IS 12.5 METRES --THE HIGHEST..<br />\n<br />\nJEW ROTHSCHILD TOOK AWAY INDIANS TO WORK AS INDENTURED LABOUR.. HE CUT THEM OFF CULTURALLY FROM INDIA BY INTRODUCING FAKE FESTIVALS AT FAKE DATES ..<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/04/indentured-coolie-slavery-reinvented.html<br />\n<br />\nIF CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL WAS NOT BORN ON THIS PLANET..-- HINDUS WOULD HAVE NEVER EVER KNOW ABOUT THIS HUMONGOUS DECEIT\u2026 THIS IS WHY I STARTED THIS BLOGSITE ..<br />\n<br />\nHUMAN BODY AND BRAIN IS FULL OF WATER --AND SPRING TIDES AFFECT US..<br />\n<br />\nWater covers 70 percent of Earth\u2019s surface, makes up 66% of the human body. Brain is 83% water, blood-92%, kidneys - 82%, liver-69% , muscles-75%, bones-28%...<br />\n<br />\nIn my language Malayalam and in Sanskrit Kapha, Pitta and Vata means the same. Kapha is mucous , Pitta is bile and Vata means vayu or fart ( flatulence ). ..<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU FAST YOU BALANCE THE TRI DOSHAS..<br />\n<br />\nMost Hindus observe fast on Purnima and Amavasya. ..<br />\n<br />\nPeople who fast SERIOUSLY continue till the third day when the water pull/ push in human cells is highest . ..<br />\n<br />\nThese three days Hindus fast or take light veggie food rich in Magnesium\u2026<br />\n<br />\nFasting is done to reduce the acidic content in our system and to slow down the metabolic rates\u2026 This restores the body and mind balance. ..Meditation helps in centering your body, mind and soul\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2\u2014</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_141BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; When the body is not cleansing properly, this process is impaired and instead you wake up tired and lethargic . There is a higher sodium content in the cell, therefore a higher hydrogen (acidifying) content, and as water follows sodium in the body, the water content of the cell starts to swell. ..<br />\n<br />\nSo the cell is under pressure from high acidity \u2013 so it pulls in more calcium, which displaces more magnesium causing an imbalance\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe moon-pull is much gentler than the sun-push. Only if conditions are right within the body can the moon pull the sodium back across the cell membrane, thus making way for the Magnesium to exert a gentle push with the potassium, so that they go back to their rightful position, which is inside the cell\u2026<br />\n<br />\nWhat is lymph? Ayurveda knew it 6000 years ago, while modern science knew about it just 60 years back\u2026<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/yoga-and-ayurvedic-massage-for-draining.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/lymph-nodes-vs-endocrine-exocrine.html<br />\n<br />\n6200 YEAR OLD Ayurveda was the first to write about AUTOPHAGY.. literally SELF EATING -- it\u2019s the body\u2019s system of cleaning house: Your cells create membranes that hunt out scraps of dead, diseased, or worn-out cells; gobble them up; strip them for parts; and use the resulting molecules for energy or to make new cell parts.<br />\n<br />\nAutophagy makes us more efficient machines to get rid of faulty parts, stop cancerous growths, and stop metabolic dysfunction like obesity and diabetes.. the process plays a hand in controlling inflammation and immunity.<br />\n<br />\nTHE MOST IMPORTANT EFFECT IS THAT THE BRAIN GETS SHARPENED AND THE AGEING PROCESS SLOWS DOWN<br />\n<br />\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=10jNZleNH9w<br />\n<br />\nFROM NOW ON HINDUS WILL CREATE THEIR OWN DESTINY--WE DONT CARE FOR THE WHITE MEN WHO FOOLED US USING AGENTS LIKE GANDHI AND BR AMBEDKAR\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_139MN\" kind=\"m\"></span></div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_139B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px;
